story:
I have a Bachelor degree in Public Relations.  My previous role was in marketing and communications, I left this role in 2014 when I had my baby girl and I am now pursuing my dream of creating the best maternity and nursing sportswear brand. 

M.I.M Sportswear stands for Mums in Movement and will consist of maternity sports bras, tops, leggings and shorts. 
The reason for creating this campaign is because I have no capital to invest into my business idea to get it off the ground. I have beautiful designs, an in depth business plan and a huge vision for the brand.

The funding will allow me to finally take the next step in my business idea and have my samples produced from my designs and get my brand out into the public eye. 

Please see my designs below: 



I am aiming to raise $5,000 to assist me in getting my samples produced, then I can do a photo-shoot and set up a website to take pre-orders of my products and gage the demand for each product and then launch into manufacturing. 

My maternity and nursing sportswear brand will not only offer the best products on the market, it will also encompass a holistic view of wellness and offer workout clips for expectant mums and new mums and a nutritional guide.

If you are not able to contribute financially I would be so appreciative of you helping spread the word about my campaign on social media, use the Indiegogo share tools. 

Thank you so much xo

story:
R-U-MAD™ 

R-U-MAD™ stands for the Revolutionary Ultimate Mixed Martial Arts Dummy™  Patent Application Number GB1502559.6. 

My name is Ronnie Smith, I have thirty years’ experience in the fighting & combat arts and have been an instructor for twenty years. 

As an independent designer for twenty years, I work in conjunction with other companies who provide the necessary skills required to fulfil any projects potential. 

In training, I was known as the mauler or I ron for iron; this was due to my heavy handedness. I did not like the nicknames because it was never my intent to hurt anyone while training.

Back in the eighties and nineties, I used to think wouldn’t it be good if we had robots to train with.  

Then came the grappling dummies, which are great but without going into too much detail, they lacked some basic abilities for all round fighting & training and like the punch bag, seemed more focused on a certain type of fighting style. I still found myself longing for my robot.

Then one day whilst training, as I was going from the punch bag to the grappling dummy to the wooden Dummy, which we in the fighting arts use for blocking conditioning of the arms and legs, it came to me.

If I put all three together into one product, I could have my robot, the next best thing to an actual training partner; and it would never complain or get hurt and that is how  the Revolutionary Ultimate Mixed Martial Arts Dummy™ was born.  


All drawings are for illustration purposes only and do not represent the exact look of the finished product. 

The Revolutionary Ultimate Mixed Martial Arts Dummy™ is a bold statement but here is why I believe it is true when compared to today’s punch bag & grappling dummies.

R-U-MAD™ is an all in one multi-functional, multi combinational punch bag and grappling dummy. What makes it unique is its patent pending detachable parts, which allow the R-U-MAD™ to transform from a normal punch bag dummy, into a full-bodied grappling dummy. What’s more, because of its patent pending joint system, the robust joints move almost human like with a smooth rotational movement and with the patent pending tension and resistance system, an adjustable stiffness and resistance can be applied.

All drawings are for illustration purposes only and do not represent the exact look of the finished product. 

The patent pending stand is designed to allow use not just as a standard punch bag stand, but it too has detachable parts that allow for multi uses; from a standard punch bag stand to a grappling dummy throwing stand. It is designed to allow the full-bodied grappling dummy to be hit with high and low kicks, as its design keeps the dummy at a distance away from the base of the stand, unlike the normal punch bag stands that place the dummy over its centre.

All drawings are for illustration purposes only and do not represent the exact look of the finished product. 

The stand is also designed to store free weights at its base and has retractable and lockable wheels that allow for push and pull wrestling type training, which is aided by removing or adding the free weights that are able to be stored on its base. And if that’s not enough to allow me to call it revolutionary and ultimate, it may also comes with storage space.


All drawings are for illustration purposes only and do not represent the exact look of the finished product. 

Oh and one final important point, the R-U-MAD™ is able to be sold as an all in one unit or in separate parts, due to the fact the arms are designed to work with other punch bag dummies and the stand is designed to be used with other grappling dummies. Meaning the arms can be sold as a single item, the stand can be sold on its own, the grappling dummy is for use with or without the stand and so may also be sold separately, and the body and stand may be sold as one unit, as a punch bag dummy without the arms and legs. 

I hope that is enough to convince you that it is a truly revolutionary and ultimate product. 

All drawings are for illustration purposes only and do not represent the exact look of the finished product. 

Here at R-U-MAD™ we are dedicated and determined to design, develop and produce the ultimate all in one hybrid punch bag & grappling dummy.

We have identified a void in the market, created by the rise of the mixed martial arts market. 

We do not say this to criticize but to merely point out the great opportunity this market offers to innovation and design, I designed the R-U-MAD™ to fill this void.

Market research suggests it is long overdue, that the merge between grappling dummy and punch bag be made properly; as the market is crying out for the equipment in this area to be more suited to the martial artist of the 21st century.

I hope I have begun that innovation step with the Revolutionary Ultimate Mixed Martial Arts Dummy™

Here is a quick summary of how it works. 

By designing detachable parts, the R-U-MAD™ is able to transform from a fully functional grappling dummy into a punch bag dummy.

Simply detach the arms and legs from the fully functional grappling dummy, place the head and body on the stand and the R-U-MAD™ is now a punch bag.

With the R-U-MAD™ in punch bag mode, you can also attach arms and/ or legs whilst on the stand.

By designing the R-U-MAD joints system ™ that mimic the human body joint movement, the fully functional grappling dummy has the ability to have its joints locked and twisted, as if they were human joints.

The R-U-MAD stand ™ is designed with a removable arm that allows the arm to be used in two positions, one for throwing and one for striking.

The stand and dummy are also designed to allow the dummy to be attached or removed from the stand.  This means the user can go from a full body-grappling dummy on the floor, to a free standing-grappling dummy, and because of the lockable retractable wheels, the user is able to wrestle, grapple, and throw the dummy while it is standing upright.

After extensive research, design, development, engineering and testing, we have been able to turn an idea into a working prototype.

All drawings are for illustration purposes only and do not represent the exact look of the finished product. 

The detachable arms used in the demonstration video are called the Revolutionary Ultimate Mixed Martial Arts Dummy arms™. They are a part of the R-U-MAD™ range; however, they have the ability to be used with other makes of similar type punch bag dummies.

We are extremely excited about R-U-MAD™ and hope you will be to.

Currently, there is nothing on the market that offers the flexibility and multi functionality of R-U-MAD™.

Now we need you to help us bring the world’s first Revolutionary Ultimate Mixed Martial Arts Dummy™ to market, starting with Phase 1.

What is Phase 1?

With the crowd funding communities help, I hope to take the design and create the punch bag/grappling dummies of the future, where fighting/martial arts practitioners of all genres can practice some of the more painful moves at full strength repeatedly, without risk of injury to their training partners.

Depending on how much money is raised from crowd funding, the design and production of R-U-MAD™ may take two or more phases to reach its ultimate goal.

Phase 1’s route to market may be to design and develop the Revolutionary Ultimate Mixed Martial Arts Dummy arms™ first.

For the following reasons: the cost to develop and produce the arms is lower than that of the fully functional grappling dummy at this stage, the lead-time for design to production is quicker and the market potential is vast with the millions of punch bag dummies already been sold worldwide. This will allow cash flow projections to be achieved at a faster pace, while allowing for time in R & D on the more complex fully functional version.

I have covered the first stage attorney filing cost of £4,500 along with the £3,000 cost for the first two types of prototyping for Phase 1.

Which are Visual prototype - This type of prototype conveys the overall shape and size of the product but does not usually prove the function of the idea. It is not designed to represent the materials or production methods of a final mass produced product.

And Proof of concept prototype. - A prototype that demonstrates the main functionality of the idea. This type of prototype will probably make use of ‘off the shelf’ components and is unlikely to look like the final product.

How can you help

You can take part in our project simply by sharing it on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest etc. It will mean a lot to us. If we gather and meet the funding goal, we can all bring this project into reality.

Your pledge makes everything possible. 100% of the money raised will go towards finishing phase 1 & starting phase 2.

The minimum target Investment required is £3,000 = $4,673

 The maximum target investment for all of phase 1 is £18,670 = $29,084 .

This is what is required to kick-start the revolution and begin the journey towards taking full advantage of and filling the void in the market.

Below is what we will spend your donations on for phase 1

Investment

The next 6 months of phase 1 Prototyping

Presentation prototype. - This type of prototype combines the functionality of the product with the overall appearance, often using bespoke parts. It is likely that production grade materials will be used.

At a cost of £3000

Pre-Production prototype. - This type of prototype builds on the work of a presentation prototype, by fully considering mass production manufacturing methods and production. The parts are likely to be created using production methods and materials.

At a cost of £5000.

Total prototyping Cost £8000

The next 12 months of patent process & fees

Reporting filing details £110

Optional early search £500-£1750

Filing new/updated UK application, claiming

priority from first application* £1200-£3000

Reporting filing details stage 2 £110

Trade Marks & Admin fees of £700.

Cost £5670

CAD  £5000

Total cost £18,670

If we reach £25,000 plus, we will reach the minimum production requirements for phase 1.

If we reach £30,000, then we can start phase 2 which is the fully functional Revolutionary Ultimate Mixed Martial Arts Dummy™. We will begin with a Proof of concept prototype.

Then if we reach £35,000 we can move on to the Presentation prototype.

If we reach £45,000 plus, we can then move on to the Pre-Production prototype.

If we reach £50,000 plus we will begin phase 2 patent procedures which is an international (PCT) patent application.

R-U-MAD™ has all relevant protection with patents pending in the following areas, with international patents to be filed as part of phase 2 in the near future.

The protection of Intellectual Property

The Revolutionary Ultimate Mixed Martial Arts Dummy™ Patent Application Number GB1502559.6

The Revolutionary Ultimate Mixed Martial Arts Dummy arms™ range Patent Application Number GB1503091.9

The Revolutionary Ultimate Mixed Martial Arts Dummy stand™ Patent Application Number GB1505994.2

The Revolutionary Ultimate Mixed Martial Arts Dummy joint system™ range Patent Application Number GB1505996.7

R-U-MAD™ Product range

R-U-MAD™ all in one Premier range

1 x punch body & head

1 x arms & connector frame

1 x legs & connector frame

1 x back piece

1 x stand base

1 x R stand arm

2 x weight racks

Approx: £499 


R-U-MAD™ Grappling Dummy Premier range

1 x punch body & head

1 x arms & connector frame

1 x legs & connector frame

Approx: £399 


R-U-MAD™ arms Premier range

1 x arms & connector frame

2 x hands

2 x pads

1 x holding harness strap

1 x fastening belt

2 x stabilising cords

Approx: £299 


R-U-MAD™ Stand Premier range

1 x stand base

1 x R stand arm

2 x weight racks

2 x holding harness straps

Approx: £199 


R-U-MAD™ arms standard range

1 x arms & connector frame

2 x hands or 2 x pads

1 x holding harness strap

1 x fastening belt

2 x stabilising cords

Approx: £250


R-U-MAD™ Stand standard range

1 x stand base

1 x R stand arm

2 x holding harness straps

Approx: £150


Perks

R-U-MAD T-Shirt

R-U-MAD Long Sleeves 

R-U-MAD Baseball Cap & R-U-MAD Mug

R-U-MAD Mouse Mat & Keyring

Thank you ever so much for taking the time to read this.

Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word!

story:
WHY WE DO IT

The Wayuu live in the mineral-rich department of La Guajira in north-eastern Colombia. Despite the wealth generated by mining operations, the Wayuu suffer from poverty rates of 58.4% (which is almost twice the national average) and more than 15.000 children are chronically malnourished and highly socially underdeveloped. In addition, climate change has left devastating consequences for the community’s economic and social order. As a result, the Wayuu require urgent, efficient and innovative solutions to ensure their long-term sustainability.

WARUM WIR DAS MACHEN

In Norden Kolumbiens lebt in einer steppenähnlichen Region namens La Guajira der Eingeborenenstamm der Wayuu.  Die Armutsrate beträgt dort 58,4 % (das ist doppelt soviel wie im restlichen Land Kolumbiens).  Es herrscht neben einem Defizit an Bildung und Soziales v.a. eine Wasser- und Nahrungsmittelknappheit: Mehr als 15.000 Kinder sind chronisch unterernährt. Der Stamm der Wayuu wird mittelfristig vom Erdboden verschwinden, wenn nicht an einem ganzheitlichen Konzept gearbeitet wird.  


WHAT WE ARE DOING

We aim to transform the community of women entrepreneurs in La Guajira in sustainable handicraft production centers, strengthening their culture, their individual identity and technical capabilities, by providing training and helping to bring their unique products to an international market.

WAS WIR MACHEN

Wir verhelfen den Frauen der Wayuu zu Selbstständigkeit und unterstützen sie in der Rolle der Kleinunternehmer, indem sie ihr traditionelles Handwerk ausführen können und dazu auch alle technischen Mittel zur Verfügung haben. 

Wir fördern damit in erster Linie nachhaltig ihre Kultur und individuelle Identität und können so die Grundbedürfnisse von Bildung und Nahrung in der Region der Wayuu sichern. 


WHO WE ARE

Fundación Hilo Sagrado is a young dynamic foundation formed by a small group of young Colombians who are eager to make a difference and turn ideas into actions for positive change. By implementing creative thinking, sustainable development and interdisciplinary backgrounds. 

WER WIR SIND

Die Stiftung Hilo Sagrado besteht aus einem jungen dynamischen kolumbianischen Team, das voller Eifer die Zustände in La Guajira zum Besseren ändern wird. In interdisziplinärer Zusammenarbeit und mit eurer Hilfe setzen wir dort eine nachhaltige Entwicklung in Gang. 



WHAT WE NEED

In order to develop a comprehensive program for Wayuu women entrepreneurs we urgently need your help to be able to implement our strategy for the next 5 months:

We need €4.500 for the next 5 months to cover the following:


- Product: Design and production, materials, package, labels, transport 

-Training: Customized to their needs, such as production techniques, material selection, design and support from local mentors.

- Marketing & Sales: website design, social media, promotion, crowdfunding and POS

WAS WIR BRAUCHEN

Um ein tragfähiges Konzept für die Wayuu zu entwickeln , benötigen wir 4.500 € für die nächsten 5 Monate. Diese werden wie folgt aufgeteilt:

Produkt: Design und Produktion, Materialien, Verpackung, Etikett, Transport

Training: Für die Frauen in der Rolle als Unternehmerin (Auf ihre Bedürfnisse angepasst: Content Design, Produktion, lokale Mentoren, anthropologische Forschung und Studien)

Marketing & Sales: Website, Social Media, Werbung, Crowdfunding, Point of Sale (POS) / Netzwerkaufbau der Verkaufsorte


WHAT WE OFFER

Through promoting ethical trade and awareness of environmental impacts, we support the women of this community and help them sell their products. Through this crowdfunding you can purchase some Mochila Bags (AMUCHI) and bracelets (YOSUSI) weaved by the Wayuu women.

WAS WIR ANBIETEN

Ethical & Fair Trade – bedeutet für uns, dass die Einnahmen direkt in nachhaltige Projekte für die Menschen in La Guajira fließen. Für die erste Crowdfunding-Runde bieten wir von den Frauen der Wayuu gewebte, traditionelle Mochila Taschen und Yosusi Armbänder an.


€5 REWEAVING The Wayuu's History

Hi 5! Thanks for donating

We'll be sending you via e-mail exclusive campaign updates and a special thank you art work for #ReweavingWayuusHistory, so you can share it and let friends know about your participation in the project.

5€ ÄNDERE DIE ZUKUNFT DER WAYUU

High 5! 5x Danke! Euch werden dazu noch 5 Karmapunkte gutgeschrieben J  Wir werden dich dazu auf dem Laufenden halten, was zur Zeit mit deiner Hilfe alles bewerkstelligt wurde.  #reweavingwayuushistory – share, like & participate

€15 YOSUSI (Bracelets)


These amazing bracelets are hand made by the community. The process can take up to 4 hours to complete. Bold and bright colors are always used in their patterns as a reflection of nature and their creativity. 

FREE SHIPPING for USA & Germany only. 

Add €15 everywhere else.


15€ YOSUSI ARMBÄNDER

Diese einmaligen Armbänder sind wie die Taschen handgemacht. Der Arbeitsaufwand beträgt ca. 4 Stunden. Traditionell haben die neon-hellen und bunten Farben in Verbindung mit den Mustern unterschiedlichste Bedeutung: Sie zeigen die Reflektion und kreativen Prozess mit der Mutter Natur und ihrer spirituellen Umwelt.

KEINE VERSANDKOSTEN für USA und Deutschland (15€ in andere Länder) 

€150 AMUCHI (Personalized Mochila Bags)

Model: Ariana von Bandemer

Photographer: Oliver Ajkovic


The rich cultural heritage of the Wayuu is carefully woven into each mochila. These bags are crocheted by hand through traditional techniques that have been passed on from generation to generation. The process can take over a month to complete, resulting in a object that is not just a bag, but a reflection of deeply rooted traditions and values.

On the surface the bucket-shaped mochila features bold and bright patterns that are designed by the Wayuu people. Each mochila has a unique, natural and bohemian appeal. A sturdy shoulder strap makes the bag a functional item that is convenient for both work and leisure use. You can choose the colors of the pattern so is 100% personalized!

The livelihood of the Wayuu people depends on the production of the mochila. The Wayuu community consists of generations of artisans that are rarely recognized for their skills and hard work, and as a result often live in impoverished conditions. By purchasing this item, you are recognizing the value of their artistry, and ultimately extending support to the community.

FREE SHIPPING for USA & Germany only

Add €15 everywhere else.

150€ AMUCHI (Personalisierte Mochila Taschen)

Das Wissen und die Technik eine Mochila zu weben wird von Generation zu Generation weitergegeben. Der Prozess des Webens kosten pro Tasche ca. einen ganzen Monat täglicher Arbeit. 

Eine Mochila ist nicht einfach nur eine Tasche, sie zeigt eine tiefverwurzelte Tradition und die Werte der Menschen der Wayuu. 

Auch hier werden mit besonderen Mustern und Farben gearbeitet, doch speziell für dieses Crowdfunding-Event haben wir realisiert, dass 25 Taschen in der Farbe frei wählbar sind. Ihr könnt entscheiden mit welchen Farben ihr eure Taschen gerne hättet – sie sind so 100 % personalisiert!

Ihr unterstützt mit dem Kauf dieser Tasche die Existenz der Wayuu.

KEINE VERSANDKOSTEN für USA und Deutschland (15€ in andere Länder) 


SHARING IS CARING

We understand that there are many people that want to help us but can't afford to donate. However you can always contribute by sharing this project and creating word of mouth! 

To read more about us and the projects we have with the community please visit our Facebook Page www.facebook.com/HiloSagrado and Instagram@fundacionhilosagrado

SHARING IS CARING

Wir verstehen, dass manche von Euch, auch wenn euch unsere Arbeit gefällt, einfach nicht finanziell helfen könnt. Aber auch euer Wort hat enorme Kraft! Unterstützt uns auf facebook oder schickt den link einfach an 5 Menschen, die auch daran interessiert wären. 

Mehr Informationen auf www.facebook.com/hilosagrado und auf instagram @fundacionhilosagrado


OUR PROJECTS

Fundación Hilo Sagrado is a Fellowship 500 member of the Ethical Fashion Forum. Learn more about it here


Wir sind sehr stolz darauf, dass die Stiftung Hilo Sagrado vom renommierten Ethical Fashion Forum unter den 500 besten Initiativen in der Kategorie "Ethical Fashion" gewählt wurde. Mehr Informationen hier
story_txt:
WHY WE DO IT

The Wayuu live in the mineral-rich
department of La Guajira in north-eastern Colombia. Despite the wealth generated by
mining operations, the Wayuu suffer from poverty rates of 58.4% (which is
almost twice the national average) and more than 15.000 children are
chronically malnourished and highly socially underdeveloped. In addition,
climate change has left devastating consequences for the community’s economic
and social order. As a result, the Wayuu require urgent, efficient and
innovative solutions to ensure their long-term sustainability.
WARUM WIR DAS MACHENIn Norden Kolumbiens lebt in einer steppenähnlichen Region namens La Guajira der Eingeborenenstamm der Wayuu.  Die Armutsrate beträgt dort 58,4 % (das ist doppelt soviel wie im restlichen Land Kolumbiens).  Es herrscht neben einem Defizit an Bildung und Soziales v.a. eine Wasser- und Nahrungsmittelknappheit: Mehr als 15.000 Kinder sind chronisch unterernährt. Der Stamm der Wayuu wird mittelfristig vom Erdboden verschwinden, wenn nicht an einem ganzheitlichen Konzept gearbeitet wird.  WHAT WE ARE DOINGWe aim to transform the community of women entrepreneurs in La Guajira in sustainable handicraft production centers, strengthening their culture, their individual identity and technical capabilities, by providing training and helping to
bring their unique products to an international market.
WAS WIR MACHENWir verhelfen den Frauen der Wayuu zu Selbstständigkeit und unterstützen sie in der Rolle der Kleinunternehmer, indem sie ihr traditionelles Handwerk ausführen können und dazu auch alle technischen Mittel zur Verfügung haben. Wir fördern damit in erster Linie nachhaltig ihre Kultur und individuelle Identität und können so die Grundbedürfnisse von Bildung und Nahrung in der Region der Wayuu sichern. WHO WE AREFundación Hilo Sagrado is a young dynamic foundation formed by a small group of young Colombians who are eager to make a difference and turn ideas into actions for positive change. By implementing creative thinking, sustainable development and interdisciplinary backgrounds. WER WIR SINDDie Stiftung Hilo Sagrado besteht aus einem jungen dynamischen kolumbianischen Team, das voller Eifer die Zustände in La Guajira zum Besseren ändern wird. In interdisziplinärer Zusammenarbeit und mit eurer Hilfe setzen wir dort eine nachhaltige Entwicklung in Gang. WHAT WE NEED
In order to develop a comprehensive
program for Wayuu women entrepreneurs we urgently need your help to be able to implement
our strategy for the next 5 months:
We need €4.500 for the next 5 months to cover the following:- Product: Design and production, materials, package, labels, transport -Training: Customized to their needs, such as production
techniques, material selection, design and support from local mentors.
- Marketing & Sales: website design, social media, promotion, crowdfunding and POSWAS WIR BRAUCHENUm ein tragfähiges Konzept für die Wayuu zu entwickeln , benötigen wir 4.500 € für die nächsten 5 Monate. Diese werden wie folgt aufgeteilt:Produkt: Design und Produktion, Materialien, Verpackung, Etikett, TransportTraining: Für die Frauen in der Rolle als Unternehmerin (Auf ihre Bedürfnisse angepasst: Content Design, Produktion, lokale Mentoren, anthropologische Forschung und Studien)Marketing & Sales: Website, Social Media, Werbung, Crowdfunding, Point of Sale (POS) / Netzwerkaufbau der VerkaufsorteWHAT WE OFFERThrough promoting ethical trade and awareness of environmental impacts, we support the women of this community and help them sell their products. Through this crowdfunding you can purchase some Mochila Bags (AMUCHI) and bracelets (YOSUSI) weaved by the Wayuu women.
WAS WIR ANBIETEN
Ethical & Fair Trade – bedeutet für uns, dass die Einnahmen direkt in nachhaltige Projekte für die Menschen in La Guajira fließen. Für die erste Crowdfunding-Runde bieten wir von den Frauen der Wayuu gewebte, traditionelle Mochila Taschen und Yosusi Armbänder an.


€5 REWEAVING The Wayuu's HistoryHi 5! Thanks for donating
We'll be sending you via e-mail exclusive campaign updates and a special thank you art work for #ReweavingWayuusHistory, so you can share it and let friends know about your participation in the project.
5€ ÄNDERE DIE ZUKUNFT DER WAYUU
High 5! 5x Danke! Euch werden dazu noch 5 Karmapunkte gutgeschrieben J  Wir werden dich dazu auf dem Laufenden halten, was zur Zeit mit deiner Hilfe alles bewerkstelligt wurde.  #reweavingwayuushistory – share, like & participate

FREE SHIPPING for USA & Germany only. 
Add €15 everywhere else.

Traditionell haben die neon-hellen und bunten Farben in Verbindung mit den Mustern unterschiedlichste Bedeutung: Sie zeigen die Reflektion und kreativen Prozess mit der Mutter Natur und ihrer spirituellen Umwelt.

story:
_______________________________________________________________

FROM SICKNESS TO SUCCESS

A little over 11 years ago I moved to Temecula and was hired to work as a sales manager for a construction equipment company. Toward the end of my first year I was injured on a jobsite that ultimately left me disabled and unable to work or sometimes even walk. I had injured my spine and going through over a year of seeing different doctors, attempting ways to try and cure the injury and control the pain, nothing was working; I had tried every neuropathic pain medication known to man and refused to take any type of narcotic pain medications fearing it would only add to my problems.

After three years of testing, hoping and praying I was finally diagnosed with a plethora of autoimmune diseases that were exacerbated by the spinal injury. To name a few, Lupus, Sjogren's, and Fibromylagia as well as moderate osteoarthritis and bone spurs on my neck and spine. My neuro-surgeon said he wouldn't touch me with a 10 foot pole because doing surgery on me "would be disastrous". It didn't sound very hopeful... There was and is no cure for any of it. The only hope that I had was trusting in God and giving it over to the Lord. 


Feeling so scared, I still went into a serious depression...


So many days that I could not walk or even get out of bed left me feeling worthless and hopeless, and especially to my family that depended on me. I was always a very active woman and to say the least, an absolute go-getter. In June of 2009 I often tried to go for short walks with my pups to get out for some fresh air....as we were walking one day I remember thinking that it was really difficult carrying my cell phone, my ID and my keys in one hand and a cane in the other, all while holding 2 leashes attached to my little dogs. After several walks I started to realize that I needed something that was lightweight and of course "fashionable" that I could carry these little necessities in. I searched for a couple of months looking on all the designers sites as well as many other online accessory sites, looking for something other than a plain black leather belt pouch or a hot pink neoprene phone bag.
Finally giving up on my search, one day I searched through my closet looking for something to cut up that I could make into something that I could use. I found a little black patent leather drawstring bag. I cut it into a rectangle shaped piece about 10" x 4", folded it in half and stapled it together. I then tied a dog leash snap lock to it so that I could hang it on a belt loop or the strap of my dresses and voila! There I had it! Wherever I went I received so many compliments and had friends asking me to make some for them in various fabrics and colors... they told their friends who told their friends and I was amazed at the response!
__________________________________________________________________

THE MIRACLE

After a few weeks of this I started to think... This could be a business....I decided to take it a step further and took a dozen or so of these little bags that I had made over to a beautiful upscale boutique in town and presented them to the owner. She went crazy and insisted that I get this patented... She really scared me! I thought to myself "I really have to do something before this gets out". I didn't have the strength or energy to do this... How would this at all be possible? I prayed about it and thought to myself... I have no money, my husband lost his job and I had to battle with my long term disability every year to maintain my benefits. How could I possibly do this? And well, there was also the fact that the President of the United States was on TV stating that we were on the brink of a depression... I thought I could never make it. All I had was my monthly disability check that was $4000...Those funds were supposed to be used to pay the house payment, the car payment and the utilities that were due. I took the chance and used those funds to move forward...

In September 2009, I filed for my patent on the Original B Bag, started my company and sold about $5000 in the first month, recouped the $4000, was left with $1000 working capital and then November - December 2009, I sold $12,000; this was with no sales representatives or showrooms, only referrals and my family working for me and helping me make my bags. All of my B Bags and handbags were named after my children, grandchildren and scripture. In November of 2010 we sold almost $80,000 in just that month. I was then branded by Swarovski to be an exclusive Swarovski branded product.  

__________________________________________________________________

RECORD BREAKING SALES 

The company exploded and had record breaking sales... 2010 - Our first full year in business we sold close to a quarter of a million dollars and then came 2011, ending with close to half of a million dollars in revenue. Magazine articles, a celebrity following and the line was all the buzz! Even voted Top Hottest Teen Brands!

    

  

    

LoveToKnow Magazine - Hottest Teen Clothing Brands

 

SET BACK

And then came 2012... more than 100 retailers that carried the line closed their doors and went out of business. Sales went from nearly half of a million dollars in 2011, to just over $120,000 in 2012 and less than half of that in 2013.  And to add salt to the wound, one of my very own nationwide representatives took the B Bag to China to replicate it in faux leathers and plastic crystals. Once leaked, the B Bag replica was sold all over the world at every airport and casino. I still kept the fire burning for my company and refused to let it get me down.

_______________________________________________________________

NEVER GIVE UP

In January 2013 I decided to take a step back and went to work full time in a completely different industry working only part time for my company and hoping for the economy to heal... I always prayed for direction and finally, in September 2014, I came back to working full time for my company and have been so blessed to have an average of $10,000 in sales monthly since then. These sales are only obtained through emails and phone calls...

Thankful that I NEVER gave up, it is now time to get back to presenting the line at the major market venues and let the world see the brand new LisaBerck designs. The line has grown to be much more than just the B Bag; some of our top selling handbags are the Suraya fringe crossbody bag... And our convertible foldover crossbody tote. 


IMPORTANT FACTS

  • ALL PRODUCTS ARE HANDMADE TO ORDER AND SHIP WITHIN 2 WEEKS
  • ALL PRODUCTS ARE MADE IN SAN DIEGO CALIFORNIA
  • ALL PRODUCTS ARE MADE OF GENUINE LEATHERS 
  • ANY PRODUCT MADE WITH CRYSTALS ARE GENUINE SWAROVSKI
_________________________________________________________________

WHY HELP?

One of the most amazing feelings is to be proud of what you do and for all the right reasons... Here at LisaBerck we are proud to be part of our economic growth. We are proud to keep the work within our country and to provide jobs for the residents of our local community. We are proud to make a difference. 

Our products are made of the finest materials and are hand crafted by skilled artisans who meticulously make each and every item, one by one. No two pieces will be exactly alike. With the variations in the natural hides, each bag or wallet will uniquely form it's own personality over time and as each piece ages with graceful beauty you will find yourself with a luxurious, expertly made leather product  that will last a lifetime.

We are so thankful for making it through one of the toughest times in history as a small business and are wanting to take it to the next level... We want to relaunch the line by being able to present at one of the biggest venues in the world; the Las Vegas Project Show. It was by juried selection that we were chosen, and now we are in need of funding to pay for the booth, samples to show and our stay for the event. This one show will propel the brand to the next level. We are determined to keep the brand manufactured locally and to keep the line exclusive to the small business owners rather than big box retailers. We currently only sell to small boutiques that love and appreciate handmade quality goods manufactured in our United States and that love sharing the story of success, setback and relaunch!

__________________________________________________________________

THE IMPACT OF HELPING US

By helping us achieve this goal, you are also helping to stimulate and fuel our own economy and the strengthening needed to help the generations ahead of us. I personally think of the future of my grandchildren often and what that may look like, and what I can do to make a difference for them in their life and existence after I am gone. What do you think the future will look like for your loved ones that will live on after you have gone... What can you do to help make a difference? I would like to think that we can make a difference together... Will you help us achieve this goal? 

__________________________________________________________________

WHAT WE NEED - WHAT YOU GET

What we are asking for is funding that will allow us to present the line at one of the worlds largest trade show venues for apparel and accessories. It will allow us the opportunity to relaunch the brand and have it seen by thousands of small business owners/buyers from around the world and to receive orders from these buyers to carry the line in their respective boutiques worldwide. 

Financial Contribution Disbursement Schedule

  • Show/Booth Fee $6900
  • Travel, Food, Hotel $1600
  • Product Display Samples $5000
  • Miscellaneous Show Expenses - ie. Additional Fixtures, Lighting, Etc. $1500
________________________________________________________________

OUR PERKS! 

We are so excited to share our amazing handbags with you as well! The perks include receiving a handmade leather piece for your contribution from our product line up that retail for much more than each coinciding contribution (see perks). We have sold over 30,000 pieces to date and have had such amazing responses from our customers regarding our quality of workmanship and the choices in our luxurious leathers. To date we have had less than 10 pieces come in for repair or manufacturers defects. We offer a lifetime warranty to repair all of our handmade products. We are certain that you will love LisaBerck designs and will be thrilled with the bag that you will be getting for your contribution.

PERK! 

Contribute $100 Receive a Simply Raw B Bag

PERK!

Contribute $200 Receive an Anabelle Convertible Crossbody/Clutch

PERK! 

Contribute $250 Receive a

Simply Raw Glory Convertible Backpack/Crossbody


PERK! 

Contribute $300 Receive a Suraya Quilted Fringe Crossbody

PERK! 

Contribute $500 Receive a Tote Foldover/Crossbody Wristlet Wallet & Keychain/Purse Charm 



 PERK!

Contribute $50 Receive a Simply Raw Coin Purse/Card Wallet


WE WILL DO THIS

Should we receive less than our goal for this project, all funds will still go toward the show and will still help us get there! We haven't given up yet and we're not giving up now! This is the beginning of an amazing future!

OTHER WAYS TO HELP US

We completely understand that some of you may not be in a position to help us financially. We know that your hearts are in it and are here to help however you can... For those of you that are in this position, we ask that you just help us by sharing this campaign for funding with anyone that you think might be interested in doing so... Even if it's your best girlfriend that you know absolutely loves to shop for shoes and handbags often... Her contribution will be getting her a handbag at far less than what the retailers are selling it for while at the same time is helping us fund our campaign and get to the show! 

And don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!! We've made it easy for you!

We are so thankful for making it through one of the toughest times in history as a small business and are wanting to take it to the next level... We want to relaunch the line by being able to present at one of the biggest venues in the world; the Las Vegas Project Show. It was by juried selection that we were chosen, and now we are in need of funding to pay for the booth, samples to show and our stay for the event. This one show will propel the brand to the next level. We are determined to keep the brand manufactured locally and to keep the line exclusive to the small business owners rather than big box retailers. We currently only sell to small boutiques that love and appreciate handmade quality goods manufactured in our United States and that love sharing the story of success, setback and relaunch!
__________________________________________________________________
THE IMPACT OF HELPING US
By helping us achieve this goal, you are also helping to stimulate and fuel our own economy and the strengthening needed to help the generations ahead of us. I personally think of the future of my grandchildren often and what that may look like, and what I can do to make a difference for them in their life and existence after I am gone. What do you think the future will look like for your loved ones that will live on after you have gone... What can you do to help make a difference? I would like to think that we can make a difference together... Will you help us achieve this goal? 
__________________________________________________________________
WHAT WE NEED - WHAT YOU GET
 What we are asking for is funding that will allow us to present the line at one of the worlds largest trade show venues for apparel and accessories. It will allow us the opportunity to relaunch the brand and have it seen by thousands of small business owners/buyers from around the world and to receive orders from these buyers to carry the line in their respective boutiques worldwide. 
Financial Contribution Disbursement Schedule


Show/Booth Fee $6900
Travel, Food, Hotel $1600
Product Display Samples $5000
Miscellaneous Show Expenses - ie. Additional Fixtures, Lighting, Etc. $1500

________________________________________________________________
OUR PERKS! 
We are so excited to share our amazing handbags with you as well! The perks include receiving a handmade leather piece for your contribution from our product line up that retail for much more than each coinciding contribution (see perks). We have sold over 30,000 pieces to date and have had such amazing responses from our customers regarding our quality of workmanship and the choices in our luxurious leathers. To date we have had less than 10 pieces come in for repair or manufacturers defects. We offer a lifetime warranty to repair all of our handmade products. We are certain that you will love LisaBerck designs and will be thrilled with the bag that you will be getting for your contribution.






PERK! 

Contribute $100 Receive a Simply Raw B Bag


PERK!

Contribute $200 Receive an Anabelle Convertible Crossbody/Clutch





PERK! 
Contribute $250 Receive a
Simply Raw Glory Convertible Backpack/Crossbody








PERK! 

Contribute $300 Receive a Suraya Quilted Fringe Crossbody


PERK! 

Contribute $500 Receive a Tote Foldover/Crossbody Wristlet Wallet & Keychain/Purse Charm 










 PERK!

Contribute $50 Receive a Simply Raw Coin Purse/Card Wallet





WE WILL DO THIS
Should we receive less than our goal for this project, all funds will still go toward the show and will still help us get there! We haven't given up yet and we're not giving up now! This is the beginning of an amazing future!
OTHER WAYS TO HELP US
 We completely understand that some of you may not be in a position to help us financially. We know that your hearts are in it and are here to help however you can... For those of you that are in this position, we ask that you just help us by sharing this campaign for funding with anyone that you think might be interested in doing so... Even if it's your best girlfriend that you know absolutely loves to shop for shoes and handbags often... Her contribution will be getting her a handbag at far less than what the retailers are selling it for while at the same time is helping us fund our campaign and get to the show! 
And don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!! We've made it easy for you!

story:
What started as a seemingly simple product to manufacture turned out to be quite exotic. No company in the United States produces suction cup matting. It's all manufactured in the Asian countries. The mold had to be designed from scratch. Pulling suction cups from an injection mold without tearing is no easy task. Mark Prestwood owner of Cad Design Manufacturing has worked diligently to insure this complicated mold will produce an outstanding component. In addition, Mark's price quote of $25,000 for the production mold beat China's price by $17,000.

             Thank you Mark!
Mark Prestwood, Cad Design Mfg,

Harbor City, California - 310/780.7281.

BARNES PLASTICS MANUFACTURING, Gardena, California

is ready to set up tooling as soon as we can hand them the mold. Barnes Plastics is expert in their field and has many products for the top companies in the U.S.

Thank you Scott Pietmeyer for all your help and support.

U.F.O., Inc. our laminating company is located in Huntington Park, California.

They are a leader in the FOAM FABRICATION INDUSTRY for over two decades. From custom designed specialty foam components, to premium cleaning products, they excel in delivering the highest quality and value to their customers.

U.F.O., Inc. was kind enough to make the prototypes of the back scrubber. Thank you Joseph Ben for hanging in there and not giving up on me and Shower Smart.

Contact Joseph Ben at  (323) 588-6696  or email -  info@ufobrand.com..

     
 


.


.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Dr Cedrick Noel and I am a chiropractor. I invented the Inversion Belt as part of my journey to seek more effective ways to provide my patients with a method to maintain a healthier spine at home and ease low back pain.

80% of the population will experience low back pain at some point in their lives. The most effective way to reduce low back pain and promote healing is to decompress your spine. This method has been successfully used in a clinical setting for decades, but there has never been a home device that has come close to the effectiveness of in-office decompression therapy until now.

The Inversion Belt is designed to enhance decompression of your lower back when using any inversion table. The number 1 reason why people purchase inversion tables is to alleviate low back pain. The number 1 complaint from people that use inversion tables is too much discomfort at the ankles and not enough decompressive force in the lower back. We have resolved that problem with the Inversion Belt.

We need your help to fund the first production run in order to provide a high quality product at a more affordable price.


What We Need & What You Get

Our first production run will cost us $150,000.  Your contribution will help us meet this goal.  If we don't reach the entire goal we will stand by our promise to send you your gift anyway.  We are prepared to take the necessary steps to complete our first production run.

Risks & Challenges

At the completion of a successful campaign, manufacturing will begin immediately. Our primary obstacle will be the amount of time required for manufacturing and shipping. The minimum time required is 3 months. Once we receive the shipment, we will inspect each Inversion Belt and ship them to your destination immediately.  In the event that we don't reach our goal, it could take an extra 30 days to send your gift.

Other Ways You Can Help

I you don't have the means to make a contribution to our campaign, you can still support us by spreading the word to people you know and they may thank you for it!

See what some of our customers have to say about their experience using the Inversion Belt.

story:
"This project merits strong consideration for funding of prototypical development, and has my full support in achieving that goal."

Alice Waters, Owner, Chez Panisse Restaurant


SUMMARY

My name is James Monday and i am an architect with experience in large & small projects over a period of 35 years. After visiting Haiti in the aftermath of the devastating earthquake in 2010, working on assessments for rebuilding schools and preparing sustainable preservation and reconstruction guidelines for the town of Jacmel, I realized that the most critical need for survivors of natural and geo-political disasters is medical care, durable shelter and relief aid infrastructure. I believe that providing essential infrastructure facilities are key elements in any effort to rebuild the fabric of a damaged society. This habitat offers a prototypical solution for rapidly deployable infrastructure facilities: specifically modular medical health clinics.

The modular medical clinic will able to be shipped anywhere in the world in standard cargo containers and can be erected and fully functioning in a matter of days. Constructed of durable materials and systems, the wwMH Medical Module is designed to be ready to stand alone off the damaged infrastructure grid and remain in place for as long as it is needed; or moved to other sites with a minimum effort.

We are currently developing prototype models and are seeking partners who are willing to collaborate with us to put these ideas and ideals into action. This is a  campaign to establish a non-profit business venture for the purpose of the design and manufacturing of sustainable modular structures where they are needed most for the following market groups:

Group 1: Farm workers housing (providing habitat with dignity to those who tie the knot between field & market & table). Estimate population 120 million worldwide.

Group 2: Community housing for new urban edge villages with co-op based gardens. Estimate population 12 million worldwide.

Group 3: Research community housing for artists, writers, musicians, painters & scientists. Estimate population 120,000 worldwide.

Group 4: Construction site office/Guest cottage for developers/landowners. Estimate population 12,000 worldwide.

Group 5: Disaster relief infrastructure facilities; specifically mobile modular medical clinics for devastated disaster areas and areas of critical endemic disease outbreaks. Estimate of this condition: unknown.


WHAT WE NEED

In order to demonstrate the viability of this design idea and be able to provide these habitats to government and non-government organizations on a non-profit basis, initial investment capital in the amount of $300,000 is being sought to fund the development and marketing of 2 prototypes: one for demonstration of viability in Groups 1-4 and one in the Group 5 infrastructure facilities (ModularMedicalClinic) described above. We estimate $100,000 is needed to complete the design research and $200,000 to build the 2 prototypes. If we do not reach our outside goal of $300,000, we will apply whatever is raised to further the completion of the specific design effort. If we exceed our goal, we will extend our effort to implement production of specific prototypes by an outreach program to international relief organizations and NGOs (UNESCO, Partners in Health, Doctors Without Borders, Red Cross et. al). Perks (Rewards) will be offered for various donation levels, including custom pendant necklaces & wristbands; limited edition pamphlet & broadsides;  and custom design services and products for large donors.


IMPACT

Initially, the prototype habitat will serve as a laboratory model in different environments to explore modifications and refine techniques for future sustainable facilities on sites wherever they are needed, acquiring their own regional identities.  The worldwide modular habitat will promote independence from non-renewable resources, raise standards of sustainable design in mobile modular developments and will contribute to a bio-diverse permaculture landscape program with its “tread lightly” eco-efficient footprint. It is being designed for on-grid and off-grid installations and is targeted for a Net Zero Carbon Footprint.


RISKS & CHALLENGES

The major risks facing the venture will be lack of capital for developing the products and marketing them successfully; failure to reach new markets and customers; failure to recognize a downturn in the general economy and make necessary adjustments; slow cash flow from accounts receivable; failure of owners to manage the business successfully.  The major risk to donors & investors will be the loss of funds ventured. We intend to manage these risks with care and due diligence to protect our joint investment and embrace the challenge to succeed.


OTHER WAYS TO HELP

If you are unable to donate, you can help spread the word through your social contacts & networks and that would be most appreciated !

story:
Short Summary

We are fathers, mothers, grandparents and children. We communicate, protect and always care about people we love.


We on Press


That's why we introducing to you GUARDDY waterproof GPS Safe Watch.

The smallest, thinnest and most protective GPS watch in the world for kids and adults.





Created by modern technology with GPS,GSM, Bluetooth, Touch Sensors, Oled Display , feats in beautifully design from soft  silicon and aluminum, that perfectly connects with body and becomes part of it.



3 Systems Tech

We offering 3 systems technology like GPS System , Phone System and Health System. And all you need we feet in one beautifully designed GUARDDY Safe Watch.




 

Why GUARDDY?

If we just watch some news on TV or Internet, we can see some sad numbers. 

And we have elder people with different diseases like Parkinson's, Alzheimer's, heart problems, blood pressure other...

Imagine, how GUARDDY will give to us much more comfort and less fears. It our dream that we can help them on time when they need us .

Features


Locating- With a simple touch you can localize your GUARDDY GPS Safe Watch.


Anti-Removing Alert - If the GUARDDY will be removed, you receive instantly alert to app with the last location.


Safe Zone - Create yout GEO-FENCE and receive alerts if the GUARDDY Safe Watch cross the area.


History - Every step will be registered. You can follow the path history.


NEXT TO ME - Tecnology by Bluetooh is perfect to keep the person close to you with a low range.


Phone System - You can call to GUARDDY GPS Safe Watch. More Safer than a phone, because just the registered numbers can call.


Audio Monitor - With audio monitor you can hear around. Enjoy the good moments.


SOS Button - SOS Button Triggers instantly alert to all numbers registred in our system.


Sleep Monitor - Out technology analyse you when sleeping and count how much rolls per night. You can monitoring your sleep quality and have good dreams.


Steps Monitor - Our Technology analyse every step. Counting steps and distance traveled during a day. You can monitoring and care your health.


App and Software

GUARDDY offering to you free software for one year. You dont have monthly charge when you using your watch through your computer at home, office or friend house.


Technology

GUARDDY GPS Safe Watch have battery alert system. Before battery will turn off, system sending to software last localization of watch.



Warranty and Return

1. All products and accessories have been tested by three times before ship out.
2. All products have one year warranty. If there is no man-made problems,we will replace or repair for customers freely.
3. We offer the best aftersale service. If any problems happen, our team will do our best to solve for customers.


Team Work :)


How We Created

It was very important to get small size as thin as possible with all technology can feet in. 

 Safe watch is totally waterproof to use it on the beach or at rainy weather. We were choosing the right colors for the kids and adults, thinking about every function.

Prototype and Factory

Is just the start, our first prototypes were created. It working well and we did necessary adjustments. After campaign we are releasing final prototype and after last tests we are opening mass production. All our production team and equipment already set up.

Safe watch is just the beginning. Our production team preparing accessories for the future . That's why our important strategy to keep our trust and strong production.


Timeline 

The Impact of Your Lifes



Sure we can say that we make world better or we will save it. But we wouldn't. What we will say, that we just creating comfort for us and safety for our loved ones.

We can see that GUARDDY GPS Safe Watch is necessary for each family. We have children and elder people. We all have different situations in our lives. Sometimes we are questioning ourselfs "what if ...."

Just in our lives we have many situations , like grandfather caring cell phone, but never gets to use when is emergency, because it too far. We have aunt, that fale down and was laying one hour and nobody was around to help. We had child lost in airport or park. We have child abused by other children and we could not know who was doing it to him, because child was crying but holding this as a secret. We had child who hated mathematics and with watch we could monitoring and listen what happening during the lesson. And why you think he hate math? We heard that teacher was screaming on him and calling him dumb. With voice monitoring we heard and recognized guys who were offering drugs in Basketball lessons to kids..... And many more situations. 

We cant find solutions for our children if we don't know what happening with them, when we are far. Actually, we can write many pages or even small book, how important have this technology with our loved ones. Not because we want to know, to hear, to make safe zone and control,  because we have just fears. Because we can help our loved ones and give us wonderful solutions. We can protect from danger and mistakes. And positive impact is huge, because we can help on much higher level. We did not had this technology in our lifes when we were children but now we have for our loved ones. And we all together would use this possibilities to help and protect people who we love on higher level and be part of there happiness.


Risks & Challenges


Sure we are open with you and want to share risks and challenges .We are very serious with our planning and thinking about every small detail to make everything on time . It is very important for us to make on time because we have new models and new Guarddy products coming 2016 . Success of next our products directly depends on our reputation.
We have planned production and based on all contracts shipping will be on time . But if our production late because of some reasons, we promise high level communication with each contributor. Would like to repeat that our reputation is fuel of our success and we are creating it together for not to loose it .
During our production we will not change any feature, but it possible that it can be some small changes in software design and in GPS smart watch. Technology is progressing and we always can try to make battery better or make more comfort upgrade on design. This upgrade can make small changes, but we can guaranty that this changes to make product more comfortable and better for our loved ones.

Other Ways You Can Help


We are happy that you can contribute with money. But we always happy and very appreciate you contribution as a sharing with your friends on your social networks, using whatsapp, e-mail and other. Imagine, that your contributing by telling and sharing to people you know can make miracles in there life. Let's all be part of it, because we all have possibilities to make it happen.

CONTACT US



FAQ

Don’t see your question answered? Feel free to contact us at hello@guarddy.com and we’d be glad to help you out.

story:
MANATEE GRAPHICS e le sue magliette

Il marchio Manatee Graphics nasce dal bisogno di reagire alla crisi lavorativa del momento, che mi ha spinto ad arricciarmi le maniche e a pensare in maniera alternativa a come sfruttare la mia passione per la grafica e le illustrazioni.

… EUREKA!

Dalle prime confuse idee, nasce su carta la prima linea di T-shirt a tema: la "B(eard) Movie" composta da 6 diversi modelli e colori, che potete vedere sul sito www.manateegraphics.it

Il progetto e i disegni sembrano piacere molto, la risposta è positiva! MA per avviare una vera produzione della linea ho bisogno di fondi, per stampare le magliette e cercare di farmi strada pubblicizzandomi al meglio...

Credo molto in questo progetto, sto lavorando già ad altre linee perché con l'entusiasmo le idee si moltiplicano, vivere le proprie passioni è il modo migliore per aprire la mente e lasciar andare la propria creatività. Il primo passo verso la creazione di qualcosa di TUO.


…E ADESSO?

Adesso ho bisogno di voi, amici, e per ringraziarvi del vostro sostegno ho preparato diverse ricompense:

€ 5,00 - un enorme GRAZIE! per voi via mail e sul sito www.manateegraphics.it. 

€ 10,00 - n°5 spillette di MANATEE GRAPHICS e un enorme GRAZIE! per voi via mail e sul sito. 


€ 20,00 - la maglietta di "Shaved basterds", prima della linea B(eard) Movie (colore a scelta tra bianco o grigio)

€ 50,00 - n°5 spillette MANATEE GRAPHICS, la maglietta di "Shaved basterds"della linea B(eard) Movie e - a scelta - un secondo pezzo della stessa linea o in anteprima assoluta una t-shirt dalla nuova linea BE.

€ 100,00 - Dato che il mio principale lavoro è Graphic Designer, come ricompensa offro la realizzazione o il restyling di un LOGO personalizzato per voi o la vostra azienda :)


Per realizzare il mio progetto manca solamente il vostro aiuto!

story:
Thank you in advance for your visit on my Indiegogo page, I truly appreciate all the support.
By supporting me in this campaign you can make happy at least a few people. Yourself,  by ordering jewelry, someone of your friends who you can give it as a gift and me, approaching me to achieve the objective and fulfill my dreams.

 
                                                 WHO I AM AND WHAT I MAKE

My name is Richard and from several months I am creating jewelry for women under the name of Cio Gio. Before that I was designing leather clothing and accessories but I decided to create something under my own brand and something more permanent that does not change with every coming season.



Jewelry is a fascinating thing, from the beginning of mankind constitutes an essential element of human adornment. It is less variable than clothing, does not give up so easily the passage of time and brings into our lives lots of additional colors and positive energy. Creating jewelry is a new adventure for me that brings me a lot of satisfaction and eventually became my passion. I would like to continue and expand it, but for that I need your support.



                                                           MY MISSION

What made me to establish Indiegogo campaign is striving to collect the missing funds to produce the minimum number of models that is needed to start selling it in my own online store. The opening of the store linked to the presence and campaign on all major social media could be a big step towards the promotion of my jewelry and allow me to further development and implementation of further designs.

                                                          MY GOAL  6,000 USD 

In preparation I have many projects and I am inspired by the minimalist and sophisticated jewelry that does not need to spend hundreds of dollars, pounds or euros to wear it. With your help I would like to expand my ideas and intentions to create gold and silver, modern and in ancient style. Plain and multicolored patterns characterized by beauty, elegance and high quality.   

By bypassing middlemen and web galleries receiving high commissions, my jewelry will not reach astronomical price and would be available to all. During the last months, I have gained a lot of new valuable experience and I established contacts with specialized companies and experienced people, so that the whole project is possible. I am a person well familiar with the fashion industry, and I know that it is not enough to think of anything immediately translated into a lasting success. That's why my approach is very pragmatic and hence the first projects alludes to the two consistently popular patterns which are the heart and a diamond, in a very trendy oriental and openwork variants.



                                             ABOUT JEWELRY OF CIO GIO

                                                                   MATERIALS

Chains and earwires for earrings are made of 925 silver covered with the 24 carat  gold. Bracelets, pendants and most additives are made of brass coated with a 24 carat gold.




                                                             CRAFTSMANSHIP

Chains and additions made of silver and brass are produced in two craft factories with a long tradition. Labels according to my design are manufactured with the latest CNC technology, ground and polished in a specialized subcontracting factory. I personally deal with assembly of jewelry in the finished product.




                                              

                                                             GILDING

Jewelry as a whole is covered with galvanic coating of 24 carat yellow gold and on request can be also covered with galvanic coating of 18 carat white gold. It contains gold alloy of the highest quality with the addition of special materials, which increase the resistance for human sweat and atrition. Gilding finished jewelry is done by an experienced and specialized in this direction galvanic plant.


                                                             DESIGN


                         All jewelry designs are my idea and executed on my own.





                                                         FAIR PRICES

Prices of jewelry are attractive and reasonable in comparison to a similar due to two factors. The first is that the production and gilding takes place in Poland, where production costs are much lower than in the UK and the US. The second is that you are buying directly from the manufacturer bypassing intermediaries or online galleries receiving high commissions of designers. 


                        COMPARE WITH LUXURY BRANDS AND GALLERIES



                                                      YOUR REWARDS


Deciding to buy PRE - SALE one or more of the models offered here, you invest in my project, and you allow the start of my store. You become one of the first to receive the first of my designs with a large discount at INDIEGOGO SPECIAL PRICE and  additionally receive a permanent discount 20% on all purchases of jewelry in my shop online.
   
                                    WHERE WILL  YOUR CONTRIBUTIONS GO ?


The jewelry design and construction of an online store I invested my own money, and effort and time. Now what I need is your full support to my dream could become a reality.

Firstly, the payment will be used to purchase necessary materials and elegant packaging, the start of production, gilding finished products and finally send the jewelry to you.

Secondly, it allows me to register a company with oficial office in London and will allow me to run an online store where you can buy jewelry with a fixed discount.

Thirdly, it allows me to implement further projects and produce more models jewelry and will allow me to organize a professional photo shoot with models for the best presentation of my products in the online store.




                                         --------------------   PERKS   --------------------

                                                                           25 USD

On request made of 24ct yellow gold plated brass or 18ct white gold plated brass. Width 4 cm.


                                                               MORE MODELS

The presented models are only part of a larger collection. If the campaign is successful on Indiegogo, in few weeks you will be able to buy the online store Cio Gio other models in the collection, and many entirely new projects in a very good retail price.  

                                                           DELIVERY

Jewelry will be sent from Scunthorpe / UK via DHL to contributors in European Union  and via UPC to contributors in United States and other countries of the world. The shipping cost is 5 USD in European Union and  10 USD to the United States and other countries.

                                                         PACKAGING

Jewelry will be packaged in elegant boxes with print and shipped in special packaging with foam bubble in the middle. In each box is a note / card with thanks for your support.

                                                    RISKS AND CHALLENGES

The last few months I spent on designing jewelry and the process for its preparation. I have taken every effort to find specialized companies to cooperate to the overall process of making my jewelry stood at the highest level, so you can receive jewelry of the highest quality. Due to the fact that the subcontractors have been collaborating for some time and we have established production cycles. I do not expect any problems arise, and your chosen piece of jewelry you get on time. The various stages of implementation of orders I will inform you on a regular basis. If you have any doubt to my campaign and your investment or you want to receive additional information about the jewelry produced by me, write and I gladly answer all your questions.

                                                       customercare@ciogio.com



                                                     FULFILLMENT SCHEDULE

1.  Cio Gio's Indiegogo campaign ends and production is launched!
     Production of pendants and chains ( 10 working days ).
 
2.  Receiving ready-made materials and assembling finished jewelry ( 5 working
      days ).

3.  Gilding of jewelry ( 5 working days ). 

4.  Jewelry is packed and shipped ( 4 - 5 working days ).

      You get your Cio Gio jewelry! ( December 2015 )

5.  Online store of Cio Gio is open and you can buy my jewelry at special price for a 
      20% discount.

                                                                        FAQ

WHAT HAPPENS AFTER PLACING THE ORDER AND THE PAYMENT ?
A: I will send you an email after placing an order to confirm your selection and after the deadline campaign on Indiegogo and the end of the fundraiser, you'll receive an email confirming your order and timeliness of shipping date.

HOW DO I PAY FOR SHIPMENT?
A: To pay for it, just add an additional 5 USD or 10 USD to your contribution amount when submitting your order.

HOW MANY I PAY FOR THE SHIPPING IF I BUY MORE THAN ONE THING?
A: No matter how many items you buy, you pay only once for shipping.

CAN I BUY CIO GIO JEWELRY AFTER THE CAMPAIGN ENDS?
A: Yes, if my Indiegogo campaign will be over with a success you still will be able to buy my jewelry on this page ( InDemand ) and also in my online store a few weeks after end of campaign!


                                                            
      VISIT CIO GIO PAGE ON FACEBOOK AND SEE ALL THE CIO GIO's PHOTOS


                                                      Thank you for your support!

Labels according to my design are manufactured with the latest CNC technology, ground and polished in a specialized subcontracting factory. I personally deal with assembly of jewelry in the finished product.                                                                                                            GILDINGJewelry as a whole is covered with galvanic coating of 24 carat yellow gold and on request can be also covered with galvanic coating of 18 carat white gold. It contains gold alloy of the highest quality with the addition of special materials, which increase the resistance for human sweat and atrition. Gilding finished jewelry is done by an experienced and specialized in this direction galvanic plant.                                                             DESIGN                         All jewelry designs are my idea and executed on my own.                                                         FAIR PRICESPrices of jewelry are attractive and reasonable in comparison to a      
 similar due to two factors. The first is that the production and       
gilding takes place in Poland, where production costs are much       
lower than in the UK and the US. The second is that you are buying      
 directly from the manufacturer bypassing intermediaries or online      
 galleries receiving high commissions of designers.                          COMPARE WITH LUXURY BRANDS AND GALLERIES                                                      YOUR REWARDSDeciding to buy PRE - SALE one or more of the models offered here, you invest in my project, and you allow the start of my store. You become one of the first to receive the first of my designs with a large discount at INDIEGOGO SPECIAL PRICE and  additionally receive a permanent discount 20% on all purchases of jewelry in my shop online.                                       WHERE WILL  YOUR CONTRIBUTIONS GO ?The jewelry design and construction of an online store I invested my own money, and effort and time. Now what I need is your full support to my dream could become a reality.Firstly, the payment will be used to purchase necessary materials and elegant packaging, the start of production, gilding finished products and finally send the jewelry to you.Secondly, it allows me to register a company with oficial office in London and will allow me to run an online store where you can buy jewelry with a fixed discount.Thirdly, it allows me to implement further projects and produce more models jewelry and will allow me to organize a professional photo shoot with models for the best presentation of my products in the online store.                                         --------------------   PERKS   --------------------                                                                                                          EARRINGS - OPENWORK HEARTS                                                                            25 USD Made of 24ct yellow gold plated brass or on request of 18ct white gold plated brass.  Hearts 4cm x 4cm,  length of earrings 5,5cm.                                  NECKLACE WITH OPENWORK PENDANT HEART                                                                  35 USD,  39 USD Made of 24ct yellow gold plated brass or on request of 18ct white gold plated brass.  Pendant 4cm x 4cm.                                                                            35 USD Short chain  15" - 17",  38cm - 43cm length ( adjustable to smaller an larger sizes )Medium chain  18" - 20",  46cm - 51cm length ( adjustable to smaller an larger sizes)                                                                           39 USD Long chain  23" - 25",  58cm - 63cm length ( adjustable to smaller an larger sizes )             NECKLACE WITH OPENWORK PENDANT HEART AND SHORT CHAINS                                                                             39 USDMade of 24ct yellow gold plated brass or on request of 18ct white gold plated brass.  Pendant 4cm x 4cm.
