If the campaign is successful on Indiegogo, in few weeks you will be able to buy the online store Cio Gio other models in the collection, and many entirely new projects in a very good retail price.                                                              DELIVERYJewelry will be sent from Scunthorpe / UK via DHL to contributors in European Union  and via UPC to contributors in United States and other countries of the world. The shipping cost is 5 USD in European Union and  10 USD to the United States and other countries.                                                          PACKAGINGJewelry will be packaged in elegant boxes with print and shipped in special packaging with foam bubble in the middle. In each box is a note / card with thanks for your support.                                                    RISKS AND CHALLENGESThe last few months I spent on designing jewelry and the process for its preparation. I have taken every effort to find specialized companies to cooperate to the overall process of making my jewelry stood at the highest level, so you can receive jewelry of the highest quality. Due to the fact that the subcontractors have been collaborating for some time and we have established production cycles. I do not expect any problems arise, and your chosen piece of jewelry you get on time. The various stages of implementation of orders I will inform you on a regular basis. If you have any doubt to my campaign and your investment or you want to receive additional information about the jewelry produced by me, write and I gladly answer all your questions.                                                       customercare@ciogio.com                                                     FULFILLMENT SCHEDULE1.  Cio Gio's Indiegogo campaign ends and production is launched!     Production of pendants and chains ( 10 working days ). 2.  Receiving ready-made materials and assembling finished jewelry ( 5 working       days ).3.  Gilding of jewelry ( 5 working days ).  4.  Jewelry is packed and shipped ( 4 - 5 working days ).      You get your Cio Gio jewelry! ( December 2015 )5.  Online store of Cio Gio is open and you can buy my jewelry at special price for a        20% discount.                                                                        FAQWHAT HAPPENS AFTER PLACING THE ORDER AND THE PAYMENT ?A: I will send you an email after placing an order to confirm your selection and after the deadline campaign on Indiegogo and the end of the fundraiser, you'll receive an email confirming your order and timeliness of shipping date. HOW DO I PAY FOR SHIPMENT?A: To pay for it, just add an additional 5 USD or 10 USD to your contribution amount when submitting your order.HOW MANY I PAY FOR THE SHIPPING IF I BUY MORE THAN ONE THING?A: No matter how many items you buy, you pay only once for shipping. CAN I BUY CIO GIO JEWELRY AFTER THE CAMPAIGN ENDS?A: Yes, if my Indiegogo campaign will be over with a success you still will be able to buy my jewelry on this page ( InDemand ) and also in my online store a few weeks after end of campaign!                                                                   VISIT CIO GIO PAGE ON FACEBOOK AND SEE ALL THE CIO GIO's PHOTOS                                                      Thank you for your support!

story:
LANGUAGE


Why use technology to make frames for glasses in your iPhone protection case?

The frames for glasses need to be super lightweight, ultra-flexible, extremely durable and also stylish – the exact qualities needed for your iPhone protection case.

We use stainless steel metal sheet technology – perfected in the glasses industry – to reinvent iPhone protection cases.

Super flexible stainless steel metal sheet is 10 times harder than plastic, 5 times harder than aluminum alloy, and has a thickness of only 0.5mm.


Meet the ice! bumper 6S


ice! bumper is a super-thin, ultra-light, spring stainless steel bumper with minimal weight and maximum protection. And it’s crafted with style. By using polishing technology we’ve learnt from the eyewear industry, the smooth rounded edges of ice! bumper are cool to the touch. Because the ice! bumper is neither screwed, soldered, or welded, it maintains an element of simplicity, clarity and ingenuity.



Focus on corner protection

Having analyzed more than 1,000 iPhones with broken screens, 92% of the initial cracking points start from the corner of the phone. And that’s precisely why ice! bumper has 0.3mm corner walls to provide full protection for your iPhone.


When placing your iPhone on a surface table, the cornerwalls prevent contact between the screen and the table – so no scratches at all!


Why ice! bumper you say?


  • Lighter and gives you more

The 0.5mm thick ultra-light weight stainless steel makes ice! bumper 75% lighter than other cases on the market. iPhone gets lighter and thinner with each new model – your bumper should be too.




  • Thinner and harder

The hardness of spring stainless steel is 5 times that of aluminum, 10 times stronger than plastic, and it’s only 50% as thick as those materials. Nothing comes close to it – ice! bumper gives better protection for your iPhone.

  • Awesome protection

Specially designed 0.3mm corner walls provide full protection for your iPhone. No matter how the phone gets dropped, it doesn’t come into contact with the ground.



  • No signal drop

The ice! bumper do not cover the antenna area of the iPhone and it will not affect the cellular signal, wifi, and bluetooth reception.


Not the first time we’ve used stainless steel for an iPhone bumper


  • The ice! bumper 5 / 5s in 2013

Back in 2013, when the iPhone 5s was launched, we designed and released the ice! bumper 5 / 5s, our first iPhone bumper. It was great and more than 10,000 units were sold.


  • Better design, better production process, better quality in 2015

Our team spent a year re-designing the ice! bumper after the launch of iPhone 6. The shape has evolved into a simpler form, providing a low-key and reserved style that is more mature and even easier to handle.




Risk & challenges

This is not our first product. We already have many products on the market, so the risks are minimized due to experience.

We have a goal of shipping units in Dec 2015. Your support will help us speed up mass-production, acquire parts and tooling, and hire additional manpower to get units shipping asap.  If we don't meet the funding goal, we will still continue with the project and will bring this revolutionary product to market. We believe in this product concept and will make it happen. We've done this on our own with ice! bumper 5 / 5s, and  other products, but here we are looking to speed things up via crowd-funding. So speed the main risk, which you can help mitigate by contributing today. Help us deliver the product as fast as possible!


ice! bumper 6S

You can get it for free! just share it!

Please spread the word about this product across all of your social media channels and don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

If you send your campaign link to your friends and every 3 of them contribute, we will give you a free ice! bumper 6S

Important: Use the sharing tool on the left hand side of the campaign. Your sharing link is unique -- that's the link you need to send to all friends. That's how we will know how many contributors you have referred. Your link will look something like this:

http://igg.me/at/icebumper/x/12038394

Note: 12038394 is a bogus number, your own number will be different.




เคส iPhone ของคุณตกยุคไปแล้ว?

iPhone รุ่นใหม่ ๆ ที่ทำด้วยโลหะผสมอลูมิเนียมสวยหรูนั้นล้วนบางและเบาลงเรื่อย ๆ

แล้วคุณยังจะใช้เคส iPhone หนาเตอะแบบเมื่อห้าปีที่แล้วอยู่เหรอ

เพื่ออะไรกัน?

ไม่ใช่ความผิดคุณหรอก!

เพราะว่าตัวเครื่องอลูมิเนียมนั้นเป็นรอยง่าย ส่วนหน้าจอก็อาจแตกเอาได้ถ้าคุณเผลอทำโทรศัพท์หล่น

แต่ทำไงได้ล่ะ คุณก็ไม่อยากให้สิ่งเหล่านั้นเกิดขึ้นกับโทรศัพท์ราคาแพงของคุณนี่นา เลยจำใจต้องใช้เคสทั่ว ๆ ไปที่ทั้งหนาและใหญ่เทอะทะ


เชิญพบกับ ice! bumper 6S

ice! bumper คือเคสสแตนเลสที่บางเฉียบ เบาหวิว และยืดหยุ่น ซึ่งช่วยให้โทรศัพท์ของคุณได้รับการปกป้องสูงสุด

มันถูกผลิตมาอย่างมีสไตล์ด้วยเทคโนโลยีการขัดมันแบบเดียวกับที่ใช้ในอุตสาหกรรมแว่นตา ทำให้ได้เคส ice! bumper ที่เรียบเนียนชวนให้น่าสัมผัส

ice! bumper ไม่ต้องการการขันน็อตหรือการเชื่อมใด ๆ ทั้งสิ้น มันจึงดูสวยเฉียบในแบบที่เรียบง่าย



แล้วทำไมถึงต้องเลือก ice! bumper?


  • เบากว่าและให้อะไรมากกว่า

ด้วยเคสสแตนเลสที่บางเพียง 0.5 ม.ม. ทำให้ ice! bumper นั้นเบากว่าเคสเจ้าอื่น ๆ ในตลาดถึง 75% 

iPhone รุ่นใหม่ ๆ ที่เบาและบางลงเรื่อย ๆ นั้นคู่ควรกับเคสที่เบาและบางกว่าเดิมเช่นกัน



  • บางลงแต่ทนทานขึ้น

เคสสแตนเลสนี้มีความทนทานมากกว่าอลูมิเนียม 5 เท่าและมากกว่ากรอบพลาสติกถึง 10 เท่า แต่เคสตัวนี้กลับบางกว่าเคสที่ทำด้วยวัสดุเหล่านั้นถึง 50%

ไม่มีอะไรที่จะดีไปกว่านี้อีกแล้วสำหรับ ice! bumper ตัวนี้ที่ช่วยปกป้อง iPhone ของคุณได้ดีกว่า

  • การปกป้องที่ยอดเยี่ยม

หัวมุมของเคสที่ยกสูงขึ้น 0.3 ม.ม. เป็นพิเศษนั้นช่วยปกป้อง iPhone ของคุณได้อย่างเต็มที่

ไม่ว่าจะทำโทรศัพท์ตกอีท่าไหนก็ตาม หน้าจอก็จะไม่สัมผัสกับพื้นอีกต่อไป



  • สัญญาณไม่ตก

เคส ice! bumper ไม่ได้บดบังบริเวณเสาอากาศของตัว iPhone ทำให้สัญญาณโทรศัพท์ ไวไฟ หรือการเชื่อมต่อบลูทูธนั้นล้วนเป็นไปอย่างปกติ


ทำไมต้องเน้นการปกป้องตรงหัวมุม?

จากการวิเคราะห์การแตกของหน้าจอ iPhone มากกว่า 1,000 เครื่องพบว่ารอยแตกของหน้าจอนั้นมักเริ่มเกิดจากตรงบริเวณหัวมุมของโทรศัพท์ถึง 92%

นั่นคือสาเหตุว่าทำไมหัวมุมของเคส ice! bumper จึงต้องสูงกว่าบริเวณอื่น 0.3 ม.ม. ก็เพื่อที่จะได้ปกป้อง iPhone ของคุณได้อย่างเต็มที่นั่นเอง


เจ้าขอบหัวมุมที่ว่ายังป้องกันไม่ให้หน้าจอสัมผัสกับโต๊ะเมื่อคุณวาง iPhone ไว้บนโต๊ะด้วย ทำให้หน้าจอไม่มีทางเป็นรอยได้อย่างเด็ดขาด!


นี่ไม่ใช่ครั้งแรกที่เราใช้สแตนเลสทำเคส iPhone


  • เคส ice! bumper 5 / 5s ในปี 2013

ย้อนไปเมื่อปี 2013 เมื่อ iPhone 5s ได้เปิดตัวนั้น เราได้ออกแบบและจำหน่าย ice! bumper 5 / 5s ซึ่งคือเคส iPhone ตัวแรกของเรา

และด้วยยอดจำหน่ายที่มากกว่า 10,000 ชิ้นนั้นคือสิ่งยืนยันถึงความยอดเยี่ยมของมัน


  • การออกแบบที่ดีกว่า กระบวนการผลิตที่ดีกว่า คุณภาพที่ดีกว่า ในปี 2015

ทีมของเราใช้เวลาร่วมปีในการพัฒนา ice! bumper หลังจากการเปิดตัวของ iPhone 6 ทำให้ได้เคสใหม่ที่มีรูปร่างเรียบง่ายกว่าเดิมแต่ยังคงไว้ซึ่งสไตล์ที่เฉียบและการใช้งานที่สะดวกกว่าเดิม




ความเสี่ยงและความท้าทาย

นี่ไม่ใช่ผลิตภัณฑ์ตัวแรกของเรา

ประสบการณ์ของเราในการป้อนผลิตภัณฑ์มากมายลงสู่ตลาดนั้น ช่วยลดความเสี่ยงให้อยู่ในระดับน้อยสุดได้

เรามีแผนป้อนผลิตภัณฑ์นี้สู่ตลาดในเดือนธันวาคม 2015 แต่ยอดสั่งซื้อของคุณสามารถช่วยให้เราป้อนผลิตภัณฑ์ได้เร็วกว่านั้นได้ เพราะเราจะนำทุนที่ได้มาเพิ่มความเร็วในการผลิต เสาะหาชิ้นส่วนและเครื่องมือ และจ้างแรงงานเพิ่มเติม

แต่ถึงแม้จะระดมทุนได้ไม่ถึงเป้าก็ตาม เราก็ยังจะเดินหน้าโครงการนี้ต่อไปเพื่อป้อนผลิตภัณฑ์ที่เป็นการปฏิวัติวงการชิ้นนี้สู่ตลาดให้ได้

เราเชื่อมั่นในผลิตภัณฑ์ชิ้นนี้และจะสร้างมันให้สำเร็จ

เราเคยสร้างผลิตภัณฑ์แบบนี้มาแล้วด้วยกำลังผลิตของเราเองกับ ice! bumper 5 / 5s และผลิตภัณฑ์ตัวอื่น ๆ แต่ครั้งนี้เราต้องการระดมทุนเพื่อหวังที่จะสร้างสรรค์ผลงานให้ได้เร็วยิ่งขึ้น

ดังนั้นความเสี่ยงเดียวของผลิตภัณฑ์นี้ก็คือความเร็วในการผลิตนั่นเอง ซึ่งคุณสามารถช่วยลดมันลงได้ด้วยการสนับสนุนเราในวันนี้

มาช่วยให้เราส่งมอบผลิตภัณฑ์ได้เร็วขึ้นกัน!


ice! bumper 6S - จัดส่งฟรีทั่วโลก





มาลุ้นเคสฟรีกัน!
แค่เพียงกดแชร์!

บอกต่อผลิตภัณฑ์ตัวนี้ผ่านทุก ๆ ช่องทางโซเชียลของคุณและอย่าลืมแชร์ผ่าน Indiegogo กันด้วย!

เราจะให้ ice! bumper ฟรีหนึ่งชิ้นต่อ 3 รายการสั่งซื้อ

ที่มาจากการแชร์ลิงก์ของคุณ!

สิ่งสำคัญ: โปรดใช้เครื่องมือการแชร์ที่อยู่ทางด้านซ้ายของโฆษณานี้

ที่จะสร้างลิงก์เฉพาะของคุณไว้สำหรับแชร์ต่อให้เพื่อน ๆ

ลิงก์เฉพาะดังกล่าวทำให้เราทราบได้ว่ามีลูกค้ากี่รายที่อ้างอิงจากการแชร์ของคุณ

ลิงก์ของคุณจะมีลักษณะคล้ายลิงก์ด้านล่างนี้:

http://igg.me/at/icebumper/x/12038394

หมายเหตุ: 12038394 นั้นคือรหัสสมมติสำหรับตัวอย่าง รหัสของคุณจะไม่ใช่ชุดเลขนี้
story_txt:
LANGUAGE











Why use technology to make frames for glasses in your iPhone protection case?


The frames for glasses need to be super lightweight, ultra-flexible, extremely durable and also stylish – the exact qualities needed for your iPhone protection case.
We use stainless steel metal sheet technology – perfected in the glasses industry – to reinvent iPhone protection cases.
Super flexible stainless steel metal sheet is 10 times harder than plastic, 5 times harder than aluminum alloy, and has a thickness of only 0.5mm.




Meet the ice! bumper 6S




ice! bumper is a super-thin, ultra-light, spring stainless steel bumper with minimal weight and maximum protection. And it’s crafted with style. By using polishing technology we’ve learnt from the eyewear industry, the smooth rounded edges of ice! bumper are cool to the touch. Because the ice! bumper is neither screwed, soldered, or welded, it maintains an element of simplicity, clarity and ingenuity.






Focus on corner protection
Having analyzed more than 1,000 iPhones with broken screens, 92% of the initial cracking points start from the corner of the phone. And that’s precisely why ice! bumper has 0.3mm corner walls to provide full protection for your iPhone.





When placing your iPhone on a surface table, the cornerwalls prevent contact between the screen and the table – so no scratches at all!





Why ice! bumper you say?


Lighter and gives you more

The 0.5mm thick ultra-light weight stainless steel makes ice! bumper 75% lighter than other cases on the market. iPhone gets lighter and thinner with each new model – your bumper should be too.









Thinner and harder

The hardness of spring stainless steel is 5 times that of aluminum, 10 times stronger than plastic, and it’s only 50% as thick as those materials. Nothing comes close to it – ice! bumper gives better protection for your iPhone.





Awesome protection

Specially designed 0.3mm corner walls provide full protection for your iPhone. No matter how the phone gets dropped, it doesn’t come into contact with the ground.








No signal drop

The ice! bumper do not cover the antenna area of the iPhone and it will not affect the cellular signal, wifi, and bluetooth reception.




Not the first time we’ve used stainless steel for an iPhone bumper


The ice! bumper 5 / 5s in 2013

Back in 2013, when the iPhone 5s was launched, we designed and released the ice! bumper 5 / 5s, our first iPhone bumper. It was great and more than 10,000 units were sold.





Better design, better production process, better quality in 2015

Our team spent a year re-designing the ice! bumper after the launch of iPhone 6. The shape has evolved into a simpler form, providing a low-key and reserved style that is more mature and even easier to handle.









Risk & challenges
This is not our first product. We already have many products on the market, so the risks are minimized due to experience.
We have a goal of shipping units in Dec 2015. Your support will help us speed up mass-production, acquire parts and tooling, and hire additional manpower to get units shipping asap.  If we don't meet the funding goal, we will still continue with the project and will bring this revolutionary product to market. We believe in this product concept and will make it happen. We've done this on our own with ice! bumper 5 / 5s, and  other products, but here we are looking to speed things up via crowd-funding. So speed the main risk, which you can help mitigate by contributing today. Help us deliver the product as fast as possible!



ice! bumper 6S



















You can get it for free! just share it!
Please spread the word about this product across all of your social media channels and don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!
If you send your campaign link to your friends and every 3 of them contribute, we will give you a free ice! bumper 6S
Important: Use the sharing tool on the left hand side of the campaign. Your sharing link is unique -- that's the link you need to send to all friends. That's how we will know how many contributors you have referred. Your link will look something like this:
http://igg.me/at/icebumper/x/12038394Note: 12038394 is a bogus number, your own number will be different.









เคส iPhone ของคุณตกยุคไปแล้ว?
iPhone รุ่นใหม่ ๆ ที่ทำด้วยโลหะผสมอลูมิเนียมสวยหรูนั้นล้วนบางและเบาลงเรื่อย ๆ
แล้วคุณยังจะใช้เคส iPhone หนาเตอะแบบเมื่อห้าปีที่แล้วอยู่เหรอ
เพื่ออะไรกัน?

ไม่ใช่ความผิดคุณหรอก!
เพราะว่าตัวเครื่องอลูมิเนียมนั้นเป็นรอยง่าย ส่วนหน้าจอก็อาจแตกเอาได้ถ้าคุณเผลอทำโทรศัพท์หล่น
แต่ทำไงได้ล่ะ คุณก็ไม่อยากให้สิ่งเหล่านั้นเกิดขึ้นกับโทรศัพท์ราคาแพงของคุณนี่นา เลยจำใจต้องใช้เคสทั่ว ๆ ไปที่ทั้งหนาและใหญ่เทอะทะ

เชิญพบกับ ice! bumper 6S



ice! bumper คือเคสสแตนเลสที่บางเฉียบ เบาหวิว และยืดหยุ่น ซึ่งช่วยให้โทรศัพท์ของคุณได้รับการปกป้องสูงสุด
มันถูกผลิตมาอย่างมีสไตล์ด้วยเทคโนโลยีการขัดมันแบบเดียวกับที่ใช้ในอุตสาหกรรมแว่นตา ทำให้ได้เคส ice! bumper ที่เรียบเนียนชวนให้น่าสัมผัส
ice! bumper ไม่ต้องการการขันน็อตหรือการเชื่อมใด ๆ ทั้งสิ้น มันจึงดูสวยเฉียบในแบบที่เรียบง่าย





แล้วทำไมถึงต้องเลือก ice! bumper?



เบากว่าและให้อะไรมากกว่า

ด้วยเคสสแตนเลสที่บางเพียง 0.5 ม.ม. ทำให้ ice! bumper นั้นเบากว่าเคสเจ้าอื่น ๆ ในตลาดถึง 75% 
iPhone รุ่นใหม่ ๆ ที่เบาและบางลงเรื่อย ๆ นั้นคู่ควรกับเคสที่เบาและบางกว่าเดิมเช่นกัน





บางลงแต่ทนทานขึ้น

เคสสแตนเลสนี้มีความทนทานมากกว่าอลูมิเนียม 5 เท่าและมากกว่ากรอบพลาสติกถึง 10 เท่า แต่เคสตัวนี้กลับบางกว่าเคสที่ทำด้วยวัสดุเหล่านั้นถึง 50%
ไม่มีอะไรที่จะดีไปกว่านี้อีกแล้วสำหรับ ice! bumper ตัวนี้ที่ช่วยปกป้อง iPhone ของคุณได้ดีกว่า



การปกป้องที่ยอดเยี่ยม

หัวมุมของเคสที่ยกสูงขึ้น 0.3 ม.ม. เป็นพิเศษนั้นช่วยปกป้อง iPhone ของคุณได้อย่างเต็มที่
ไม่ว่าจะทำโทรศัพท์ตกอีท่าไหนก็ตาม หน้าจอก็จะไม่สัมผัสกับพื้นอีกต่อไป







สัญญาณไม่ตก

story:
The perfect pair of pants for every adventure.


Grabbing your crash pad and climbing shoes?  Meeting your friends at the new skate park?  Going camping this weekend?  I know what you'll want to wear. 

I'm Joshua Hildreth, director of Psyched Life® Activewear, and I've made your new favorite pair of jeans.  Go from bouldering to backpacking to a first date with classic style, in a hard-wearing dark-wash denim.  Built tough for any adventure, yet as comfortable as your favorite sweatpants, thanks to the 99% organic cotton, 1% elastic blend.

Available sizes range from standard US sizes 30 to 34. We will ask you to measure yourself after you donate and we'll give you a custom size recommendation. Email us at any time with questions: LetsChat@PsychedLife.com

We ship worldwide.


From one adventurer to another, a key necessity for any romp through the woods or climb up a tree is a reliable outfit. It needs to keep you warm, protected, and let’s face it (its 2016) help you looking good while you're dangling off a cliff. 


24.7 Jeans are built tough: Heavy-weight denim in a hard-wearing dark wash for your most rough-and-tumble adventures. Power-sliding on your longboard? Climbing some rough rock that test your tough hands? Gravity check on your mountain biking adventure? 24.7 Jeans will protect your skin and take a beating. 


24.7 Jeans are surprisingly comfortable: Softness and stretch come from the organic cotton, elastic, natural enzyme wash, and the weaving techniques in the fabric itself. The natural fibers of the organic cotton makes these jeans feel cozy, “like your favorite PJs” right out of the box. All the stretch of sweatpants with only 1% elastic. 

Not sure if they'll fit you? Email us at any time with questions: LetsChat@PsychedLife.com


24.7 Jeans will keep you looking good all day long: Tailored with clean lines and a slim fit for classic style. Go rock-climbing in the morning, skateboard all afternoon, and dust yourself off (maybe a fresh shirt) for date night. 


So you don't have to.

The relationship between an adventurer and their gear is important. Gear must be trustworthy. It must have our back. When all else fails we need to know we can depend on it. 


We've added extra features to your 24.7's to keep you in the game and prepared for whatever’s coming your way.

Engineered & tested for durability, flexibility and functionality:

  • You've got seven belt loops,
  • a heavy duty zipper and fly button,
  • a convenient thigh pocket,
  • and fade-resistant, midnight-blue denim.

We are proud to equip you with dependable jeans that are guaranteed to serve you well. 


Everyone knows: when you do a wide smear and your pants rip—you're in for a bad day. Or worse, when you go up for that waist high foothold and your pants simply can’t make the distance. 

Enjoy your 24.7's strong, yet surprisingly soft and stretchy denim. 

Pull on your 24.7's and get outside and play—run, climb, jump, crouch and scramble to your heart's content. 

Snack time? We got you:



24.7 Jeans are tailored to a slim fit, but cut for comfortable all-day wear.

Here's an easy to follow diagram on how to properly measure yourself. Don't worry, after you donate we'll be in touch to get your measurements and we'll walk you through it. And our 100% satisfaction guarantee means we'll make sure you get the right fit.


1st generation 24.7 Jeans are limited edition—only 120 pairs. Act now to get your pair!

For the next 6 days only, get your 24.7 Jeans by donating $80. This early-bird special only lasts until the 7th. After Wednesday, the price goes back to $100 retail.

Our goal of $12,000 will meet the manufacturer's purchase order, and your 24.7's will go into immediate production. We will begin shipping in October, and we will keep you in the loop with regular updates. 

If all goes well with Generation 1, we want to work with you to design Generation 2, with more options (women's sizes!) and adventure testing on a global scale. 

Get your jeans and browse our selection of other perks: Carabiners, trucker hats, organic bamboo beanies, organic canvas tote bags, and stainless steel thermoses. There's something for everyone:

Join the adventure! Help the Psyched Life® dream come alive.


Quality and attention to detail come first at Psyched Life® Activewear.  Everything we make, from jeans to water bottles, goes through extensive prototype testing and design refinement. 

We stand behind our products with a 100% satisfaction guarantee. You'll walk away with a smile, every time. 



"Every time you spend money, you're casting a vote for the kind of world you want."
                                                                                                    -Anne Lappe

We only have one Earth and I haven’t seen nearly enough of it yet.  Every Psyched Life® product is earth-friendly, whether made from organic fibers or from recycled materials, and has been produced ethically, guaranteeing a fair wage for farmers and workers in the supply chain and no child labor. 

10% of the company's profits are donated to charities that support the children in developing countries.

story:
About Me

Hey guys welcome to my Project "The Affordable Utility Magnet"

My name is Ryan and like most of you guys, I work a full-time job, and spend most of my free time in my shop. I have always been fascinated with CNC machining and was fortunate enough to acquire a few pieces of machinery in the last few years. I am completely self taught, and thanks to the age of the internet and social media I have made great strides in a short amount of time.  I have always been a creative person, and find myself changing from one hobby to another often. It wasn't until I found machining that I finally found something that was challenging enough to keep me coming back for more.  

After purchasing a CNC lathe, I needed to learn how use the thing. So I needed to create something, but what? That's when I realized how often I was searching for tools, and looking for pieces of tape to hold my drawings on the machine. A few years back I was really into salt water aquariums and used N52 (Rare Earth Magnets) to hold Coral Racks inside the tank. That's when I realized I could use that same type of magnet and create a utility magnet, that I could use for a variety of applications. I made a few magnets for myself and friends. They became so popular among my friends and family I decided to go ahead and create this project to share with this community.

At the end of the day, I am just a hard working guy, trying to run a small home based CNC business. We all have dreams, but not all of us get to live those dreams. Without the support from this awesome crowdfunding site, I wouldn't be living mine. So Please take a look at my project and support if you like! 


What is it?




The Affordable Utility Magnet, is truly what it sounds like. It's an affordable utility magnet with a variety of uses around your home or shop. Only your imagination will be it's limit. 
Let's face it, I am not re-inventing the wheel, but with that being said, there is always a little room for different tread patterns. After doing a little research, I realized most of the magnets on the marketplace were either too small or made of some exotic material that drove the price up. Trust me, I love all those materials just as much as the next guy, but personally didn't feel it was right for this application. 
After taking that into consideration I decided I wanted to focus in on a few areas that were lacking on the market, and decided on the 3 areas listed below.



 1. Size and Style 
Length: 1.2"
Diameter .60" - .55"

Most of the magnets on the market are very small. I wanted to create a larger magnet that was easier to grab onto and easy to see.  I also created what I call the "Double Magnet" This versatile Magnet has 2 magnets pressed in giving even more options for applications. You can choose the Single Magnet or the Double Magnet in the Perks Section.
 
2. Materials
Black or White Delrin
Polished C360 Brass

After testing different materials, I decided to go with a material called Delrin, if you have never heard of Delrin before that's ok, I won't bore you with all the technical terms. It's manufactured by Dupont and also called Acetal Resin. It's a very durable light weight crystalline plastic. Quite frankly, it's the perfect application for the Affordable Utility Magnet. 
I also decided to offer the Affordable Utility Magnet in a Polished Brass version, for those looking to add a touch of class to their Affordable Utility Magnet. To keep the cost down, I am only offering this version in the Single Magnet version. 
The magnet is called a N52 (Rare Earth Magnet) it has an approximate pull force of 7.7lbs. I tested different strengths and chose this model for it's versatility. Strong enough to hold wrenches, kitchen utensils and notes for the refrigerator. 
C360 Polished Brass - For those looking for a Magnet that is still affordable, but has an extra touch of class! 


3. Price
"Affordable"

This is where my magnet shines. Take a look at the Perks and you will see how "Affordable" my utility magnet is.
Let's get to the good stuff. Take a Look at the Photo's and video's through out this project for inspiration!


Funding - $500
Yes, I  really only need $500 to get this project going. I want to get as many magnets out there as I can. So I am keeping this part simple. I am asking for $500 dollars. This low funding number should guarantee the project gets funded. I am in a unique position, I own all of my machinery and it's located in my back yard. Once funding is reached, I can purchase the materials needed and start manufacturing the magnets immediately. This will allow me to stay ahead of the game, and get the product shipped on time. I will not be at the mercy of busy machine shops who under quote and over promise quick timelines.
Although this is my first IndieGoGo project, it's not my first crowdfunding project. I am also the creator of the RNG Products Bullet Lanyard Bead Project. That project was successfully funded, completed and shipped on time.

Risks & Challenges

Like everything we do in life this project will have certain risks and challenges. Seeing that I am a perfectionist in every aspect of my life, I have already laid out 95% of the ground work before deciding to launch this campaign.

I truly don't foresee any major issues coming up for this project. I have already created the final project. All the prototyping and re-designs have been completed. The final CAD/CAM files have been loaded into my machines and are ready to begin production. I can literally produce from 1 to 10,000 of these magnets. I have already sourced material and reliable suppliers. 

With anything mechanical there is always the possibility of an unforeseen issue popping up. Having over 10 years experience working in the public works field, I have learned how to adapt and overcome any situation. 

Other Ways You Can Help

In closing I wanted to thank everyone for taking the time to check out my project. I realize not everyone needs a shop utility magnet and that's OK. I simply ask that if you like my project and story if you could just take the time to share my project via Facebook,Twitter, Instagram, e-mail or YouTube etc.. 

I also love to keep my supporters updated. I usually create an update once a week and a couple videos throughout the entire campaign. I want my supporters to feel like they are part of the project and share all the behind the scenes manufacturing process. You can always visit my Instagram Page @rngproducts or personal website www.rngproducts.com 

Thanks for all the support and kind words. It really means allot to me and drives me each and everyday.

story:
Short Summary

Nogo Protection:

  • The concept of Nogo Protection came to be, because as a mother and wife I soon realized that I started to forget my personal belongings without even realizing it in public places.
  • Most of us who forget or lose our valuables, it happens while we are awake from 12pm-9pm. 
  • Soon enough, I started to notice that it was a hassle to get all of my valuables back... like waiting in line at the DMV for hours just to get my picture ID back, or making the claim to get my cell phone back only to be without a phone for a week, or cancel all credit/debit cards, and being tired of dealing with fraudulent charges, etc.
  • The reason we need your support with this campaign is because there are over ten million residents in the United States who go through the same struggles as me on a yearly basis.
  • Can you think of a moment or a time where forgetting something didn't cross your mind?


What We Need & What You Get

Supporting Nogo Protection breakdown:

  • Our goal is to raise $75,000 dollars.
  • We have a team with over 7 years of experience in Prototyping, Electrical Engineering, Web Designing, Video Developing, Production and, Manufacturing. 
  • The funds will allow us to get Nogo Protection in the hands of our supporters. 
  • You will receive a Nogo Smart Watch+Phone case or 1 Hook(Key Chain or credit card sleeve) which ever you prefer. 
  • All Nogo Protection products will be both IOS and Android compatible. 


The Impact

Nogo's first priority is the prevention of forgetting or losing your valuables. 

  • Nogo Smart Watch will communicate with your phone case, credit card sleeve and your key chain (Hooks) within 5-10ft of separation from each other, instantly preventing the loss of your valuables.
  • Nogo Smart Watch will have more than 15+ features, that will make your life easier while you are living the moments that mark your destiny.


Risks & Challenges

  • Since the development of the concept of Nogo Protection all the way to mass production is a challenging task, some of the risks that we may come across are scheduling, software updates, sourcing, obtaining the certifications and approvals.
  • Since the development of Nogo Smart watch, we have limited the risk of its functionality by understanding our biggest challenge in this case, the integration of Nogo Technology into the Smart watch.
  • We are confident that with your support in our campaign, the risks and challenges we may have, would be minimized or eliminated.


Other Ways You Can Help
  • Help us by sharing our campaign to others who have lost valuables.
  • Like and Share our social media pages.
  • We hope you are as exited as we are with the solution that Nogo Protection offers.
  • Do you want a chance to WIN a Nogo Smart watch at no cost? Share with Nogo Protection through Instagram or Twitter, why you like this concept.

story:
Spring is hear! That means flowers blooming, tons of sneezing, and most importantly..... the adorable bunnies start to come out! Now they can be with you, connected on the rings of your keys. These bunnies are better because they are reinforced; can save your life wherever and whenever! Have a pal at the MOST AFFORDABLE PRICE EVER!

 Super comfy to hold, fits all sizes from fat, chubby fingers to skinny, bony fingers! These cuties become so excited when you hold them, they might turn from gentle to barbaric, don't let that happen!

Since its spring, these bunnies change color! Inspired by the rainbow, they can be Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, or Violet, Indigo isn't a creative color >:( !

story:
A boutique customized to your personal preferences and shipped to your door! Sounds amazing? Yes it is! A new way of shopping that removes problems like crowds, digging through racks of things that don’t appeal to you, knowing if things will work with what is in your current closet, and minimizes the time required to get clothes you love! Each time you order a Personal Boutique Box , your Personal Shopper will pick 5 items for you based on your personal clothing preferences and body shape/type. These items will then be boxed up and shipped to your door so you can try them on in the comfort of your home. Each of our Personal Shoppers work on the sales floor in a successful boutique and therefore are very knowledgeable about how things fit, what trends are hot right now, and what items are top sellers because they look amazing on!

 All of our Personal Shoppers work on the sales floor at our boutique as well as create Personalized Boutique Boxes.

Because of this they are incredibly knowledgeable about current trends, how things fit different body shapes/styles, and what items are selling fast! This allows them to pick items for you with a much higher chance of them being perfect for you! It also means that the Personal Shoppers are touching every piece they pack for you and know they are sending quality items you should LOVE! We run a successful boutique that focuses on personal care for every customer we serve. That same personal care is extended to every customer ordering a Personal Boutique Box!

Other Boxes We Offer:

 


Flexible Terms:

We want this subscription to fit your needs so you can always upgrade, downgrade, side-grade, skip a month, double-up a month, cancel...it's all good! It's boutique shopping without any complications. We are Beyond Passionate! We are extremely passionate about fashion and dressing women in clothing that makes them look at feel amazing. We are constantly refining our selection to only include the best quality materials and fits at great price points. Therefore our brand selection will always be changing and evolving! We want you to look amazing in your clothes from Boutique Unboxed, to feel confident wearing them, and for you to constantly get compliments on them when you wear them!

We're ready!

We chose IndieGoGo, to meet people who want the boutique shopping experience in a way that fits into their busy lifestyle. We like the idea of doing things differently and bringing the Boutique to your door. We have over 7 years experience in the fashion industry and our boutique has been open and thriving for over 5 years. We want to hit the ground running and get our boxes headed to people who will love them. So far, we received very positive response from potential Boutique Unboxed members, as well as many notable industry leaders. We’re proud to give this to you first, before anyone else. So, IndieGoGo, we genuinely need and appreciate your help. We have wonderful clothing brands standing by, ready to be apart of the Boutique Unboxed movement. Not only will this make sure you that your membership starts on time, but ensure that you will get the highest possible quality clothing and accessories. Getting to the next stage requires ordering in large volumes, which brings prices down for you, so please share! By backing our IndieGoGo campaign today, you will be one of the first people in the world with a Boutique Unboxed membership. We’re in this for the long haul. We will continue to blaze the trail, fueled with fun, creativity, innovation and most importantly your support to build a community. So, grab your friends, and get some amazing clothes. Let’s do this! From us directly to you, THANKS!

What we will use funding for:

  • Packaging (Boxes, Tape, Stickers...)
  • Website (Our website will be state of the art with personal profiles for each member)
  • Inventory(We want to be able to offer a great variety of quality clothing to fit all kinds of fashion preferences)
  • Advertising (All great new products/businesses need a fair amount of advertising)
  • IndieGoGo Fees 

Our Timeline:

 Risks & Challenges

We've been in the industry for over 7 years so we've got some great experience under our belt on how this industry works.

We also have experience dealing with completely unexpected issues, and we have always dealt with them in a way that leaves our customers happy with their purchase and proud to support our company.

Our existing customers know that we always try to go the extra mile, no matter what. In short, we know what we're doing, and you should be very confident that we will deliver what we say we will, when we say we will. And we solemnly swear that should unforeseen issues come up, we will handle them with the utmost transparency and care for you, our backers. That is our guarantee.

Shipping & Fulfillment: With us already having a boutique we are very connected in the fashion world which allows us to reach out to other brands that carry similar products should a fulfillment issue arise with one of our vendors. Shipping large numbers of packages is a new venture for us and with our hub being in Alaska shipments can be a bit slower. We have researched shipping subscription boxes extensively and added in some padding for time frames because of our location. We feel confident that we will be able to manage any shipping issue that may arise effectively and efficiently.

Scale: From an operations perspective, we've structured our business on scale-able platforms, so we'll be capable of seamless, tiered growth. But because we are a small business, fast exponential growth could be challenging(but definitely a good problem).

As with all businesses, we'll have some interesting and exciting challenges to overcome, but we're confident we have the business experience, foresight, and tools that we need to address these issues, and manage our scheduling appropriately.

Thank you, again, for your consideration and backing! We truly appreciate the outpouring of support we have received from all of our customers, friends, family, and collaborators!

PLEASE SHARE OUR CAMPAIGN WITH EVERYONE YOU KNOW!
story_txt:
A boutique customized to your personal preferences and shipped to your door! Sounds amazing? Yes it is! A new way of shopping that removes problems like crowds, digging through racks of things that don’t appeal to you, knowing if things will work with what is in your current closet, and minimizes the time required to get clothes you love! Each time you order a Personal Boutique Box , your Personal Shopper will pick 5 items for you based on your personal clothing preferences and body shape/type. These items will then be boxed up and shipped to your door so you can try them on in the comfort of your home. Each of our Personal Shoppers work on the sales floor in a successful boutique and therefore are very knowledgeable about how things fit, what trends are hot right now, and what items are top sellers because they look amazing on!
   

 All of our Personal Shoppers work on the sales floor at our boutique as well as create Personalized Boutique Boxes.

Because of this they are incredibly knowledgeable about current trends, how things fit different body shapes/styles, and what items are selling fast! This allows them to pick items for you with a much higher chance of them being perfect for you! It also means that the Personal Shoppers are touching every piece they pack for you and know they are sending quality items you should LOVE! We run a successful boutique that focuses on personal care for every customer we serve. That same personal care is extended to every customer ordering a Personal Boutique Box!




Other Boxes We Offer:



 


Flexible Terms:
We want this subscription to fit your needs so you can always upgrade, downgrade, side-grade, skip a month, double-up a month, cancel...it's all good! It's boutique shopping without any complications. We are Beyond Passionate! We are extremely passionate about fashion and dressing women in clothing that makes them look at feel amazing. We are constantly refining our selection to only include the best quality materials and fits at great price points. Therefore our brand selection will always be changing and evolving! We want you to look amazing in your clothes from Boutique Unboxed, to feel confident wearing them, and for you to constantly get compliments on them when you wear them!
We're ready!
We chose IndieGoGo, to meet people who want the boutique shopping experience in a way that fits into their busy lifestyle. story:
Musttag Short Summary

Marketing and Men are the story of my Life. Both of these topics are hard to manage but achieving it…it’s a triumph you will never forget. Ever since I started my Bachelor Degree in Marketing and Communication I have been promoting ideas, brands and services and I have always been passionate about founding a platform that would  be actually useful to a target group in which  no-one ever before dared to invest properly. When you google about fashion, beauty or journeys you always end up finding a great number of articles or blogs written by people who are not really  involved with this subject. My life is full of Men and I pretty much know that both in business and life “this is a Man's World”. However, Men do not know how to live it in the most stylish, successful, luxurious, worthwhile way. Even if some of them know the secret of being a Man to remember and a role model they do not have a proper “way" to speak it out loud in order for others to follow their lead and become also a legend in their fields. 


Musttag is an online platform that will:
  • Present successful Men in their fields, their stories and "how to".
  • Inform about Men's fashion, grooming, trends.
  • Educate men on how to become stylish in every occasion of their life.
  • Offer Men's advices in order to obtain prosperity, business success and a great social life.
  • Search globally for the best prices for journeys, presents, clothes, accessories, houses, furniture, decorative, trends for Men.
  • Give the chance to worldwide companies with Men as a main target group for their brands-ideas-services to reach them and potentially add them to their client list.

What We Need & What You Get

Musttag needs €10.000 as a budget for:

  • Building a multifunctional global website tha it will be easy to use, follow and 'e-shop' brands, ideas, services, etc.
  • Creating Logo, Business Cards, Social Media.
  • Hiring IT Specialists, Media Consultant, Sales Manager, Stylists, Men Models in order to present articles, brands in the best way, Photographers to get to the point without using words and Back Office Support.
  • Purchasing Hardware/Software that will be required since for online platforms such as Musstag, high digital services and telecommunications are a necessity.
  • Establishing a company.

For all of you that will help our idea to grow and become reality you will be offered great bonuses from brands and  services that will be promoted through our website. 

If we do not reach this ammount we will still support this idea and give our best efforts for its growth. 


The Impact

Musttag will make a difference and  contribute in many ways such as:

  • Providing an opportunity for several companies to target their brands in the optimum way in order to boost their sales, be competitive and become known worldwide. 
  • Creating an idea based in team work which will offer job positions to many people. Musttag is a way for dreams to become reality. Greece is full of ideas and people that are still dreaming and craving for a chance to prove that they worth more than what this crisis has decided for them. We will hire people, we will present men struggling in their fields in order to boost their sales, we will present places in our country that tourists would love to visit. We, Greeks, still believe in dreams and prosperity.

Other Ways You Can Help

Musttag not only needs your financial help but also needs your support

  • It would be great  to get the word out and make some noise about Musttag's campaign.
  • An other way is to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
When growing up, not a day went by where I did not dream of big lights, large crowds of people, and a finished product too grand for my own eyes to believe. I was an artist by nature always ready to create but not just anything. The concepts were rare, grand, and more importantly strategic.

The older I became the smaller my dreams seemed and the less important I became to myself. I was so busy chasing someone else’s dream my vision became blurry and eventually I was lost in a deep gray cloud.

As years passed, I gained experience and education in multiple areas such as public relations, marketing, business management, event planning, photography, and videography. I graduated from S.I. Newhouse School of Public Communications at Syracuse University with a bachelor’s and a master’s degree. I was beyond confident my talents would be a key attribute to a company someday. The more I worked achieving the dreams of others the less appreciation I had for myself. I began to live what Pastor Rick Warren refers to as the 4F Life, “A life filled with frustration, failure, fatigue, and fear.”

My passion for fashion, people, culture, and innovation will have a measurable impact on the world and the people who live in it. So rather than live in gray clouds, I decided to sweep away the dust and shine some light on the beautiful gifts God shaped me with. I decided to be my own boss.

With this being said, I humbly invite you and others to invest in me. All I need is the freedom and the opportunity to make my visions become a reality.

On Saturday, February 27th, 2016. I will be launching my fashion and lifestyle brand called TZB with an art exhibit launch party. The money raised will help pay for the venue called The Bridge Multicultural Project located in Brooklyn, New York. Though I wish the space was free it’s not but it is everything I need.  At the launch I will be presenting various pieces of artwork I’ve created over the years. The pieces are a glimpse of the beauty in my head ranging from fashion to abstract paintings. It’s about time I introduced the world to TZB.

If you cannot make a financial contribution, I ask you spread the word about the event and myself. Tell family, friends, coworkers, your boss, investors, strangers, etc.  No matter how you spread the word it would be a blessing.

My name is Tuso Zippora Boothe and I am everything great and extremely far from average.

story:
i.b.b.i. Collection: Designs for Your Curvy Body

Fashionable, on trend, plus sized knit dresses celebrating you and your curves

There is no more powerful inspiration than identifying a significant void and filling it. The i.b.b.i. Collection understands sophisticated, curvy, plus-size women want to be on trend for fashion, but her desires and needs are being ignored by the fashion industry.




We learned the plus-sized woman is different from her smaller sisters only in size—she wants to celebrate her curves, not disguise them! She represents 67% of the female population and she's being ignored, marginalized, by the fashion industry.  Because her options are so limited and off-trend, we built the i.b.b.i. Collection to deliver what she wants and desires.  We believe there is no reason--business or social--for her not to celebrate her curves in fashion-forward, on trend, sexy, sumptuous dresses!


It’s time to celebrate your curves!

i.b.b.i. Collection believes it's time to celebrate curvy, sexy, confident plus-sized women and give them the attention they deserve, dressing her the way she wants to dress. In body conscious youthful styling, vibrant colors and patterns, in on-trend designs the i.b.b.i. Collection provides her with sophisticated, fashion smart knit dresses she can wear now.

We’ve done our homework

For the sophisticated plus-sized woman today’s fashion marketplace offers few quality, on-trend options appropriate for her lifestyle. Her choices at the high end of the market are limited to shapeless, disguising, bland colored garments. Simply put: most plus-sized fashions are designed to cover up and conceal her curves, rather than celebrate them.

The i.b.b.i. woman doesn't live her life in t-shirts and polyester pull-ons. We're listening to her and giving her fashion, quality and fit.

What makes us different? Why should plus-size women trust us?

We work from a foundation of eight guiding principles honed in the workshop of experience and a desire to bring the i.b.b.i. woman uncompromising quality, consistent fit and cutting edge fashion.

  • One:  Our inspiration comes directly from what plus-sized women tell us they want. Plus-size fashionistas from all around the blogosphere are stating their desires loud and clear in on-going interactive dialogues with their followers and we’re listening.
  • Two: Typically, plus-size garments are graded from a size 6 or 8 and we know from experience these grades do not account for the real life body proportions of a curvy woman! We've re-calibrated  the grading ratios and have very carefully designed our dresses to suit five curvy body types (the Wedge, the Triangle, the Oval, the Rectangle and the Hour-glass). We have engineered creative construction details to solve fitting issues, giving curvy women multiple choices. Bottom line: our garments fit and make women feel good!
  • Three: We’re making it easy to find the right size, style and fit! Not only do we believe in clearly labeling our garments  14/16/18/20/22/24 but we offer a clear how-to-measure her body instruction which will help her make wise choices in her size and style. And we offer key symbols with each dress to further help her consider her options. 
  • Four: We exclusively offer knit garments, created using a luxurious blended yarn with stretch that gives our dresses a fresh look, from morning through to evening. Our dresses are knit to shape, fully fashioned and have a slight compression for a better fit and easy care. The hand touch is smooth, soft and inviting. Our knits feel wonderful on the body and best of all, they move with her—without creep or twist—and pay homage to her curves.
  • Five: We're translators taking trends, color and style direction from the runway and translating them into a plus-size friendly construction, creating garments specifically engineered for the curvy body. The plus-sized woman needs the technical attention we provide to create dresses that caress her curves, highlight her big, beautiful assets, but she also wants the fashion-forward mindset that comes with them.
  • Six: We recognize we’re serving a demographically well-defined marketplace, filled with ethnically diverse women. Through our brand and style, i.b.b.i. Collection acknowledges women who are sophisticated, educated, career driven, fashion savvy, confident and vested in quality when it comes to her wardrobe. We don’t just make clothes: we honor the women who wear them.
  • Seven: i.b.b.i. Collection garments are already in demand! We’ve developed two capsule lines of clothing that have been widely embraced, proving not only our understanding of the women we’re making clothing for, but exemplifying our mission of bringing fashion-forward designs to this niche market.
  • Eight: On a risk/reward scale, i.b.b.i. Collection has the tools to succeed. Our solid experience in the garment industry; longstanding relationship with our factory; success in predicting trends and translating the runway into wear now plus-size garments; and, technical expertise and innovative solutions put us far out front in the vanguard of designers just starting to focus on the needs of the plus-size woman.


Why support us on Indiegogo?

This isn't our first rodeo! i.b.b.i. Collection is evolutionary: it's genesis centered in our nine-year business.  For nearly a decade, we have been offering fashion design and technical support—complete with full manufacturing—to clients in contemporary fashion markets. Our business experience and savvy have prepared us for the launch of the i.b.b.i. Collections.


We have carefully laid out a business plan that defines and supports a clear path to success:

·  We've priced our product to be competitive in its niche in the market while maintaining solid profit margins.

·  We have built a fully functional website in collaboration with a seasoned and experienced team (Ashay Media Group) which serves as a hub for both our capsule collections and our efforts within the fashion industry to positively reinforce plus-size body acceptance.

·  Each month, a capsule collection will rotate onto our website, constantly refreshing available choices in a wear-now mode. Our first and second collections have already launched! We have our third and fourth collections in the works (pending Indiegogo backing).

However, we need your help. If you share our vision, if you are bold, beautiful and irresistible or know someone who is, please support us so we can promote our campaign and spread the word.  Your contribution to our endeavor will boost our promotional efforts and help fund our next collections

We've worked in the fashion industry for many years—50 years combined, in fact. We know that even the best designs can go unnoticed without the right campaign behind them. Glamorous photo shoots, alluring marketing campaigns, prolific social media exposure—all of these things are needed to drive fashion and inspire the acceptance of trends.

We’re coming to Indiegogo to start the conversation about fashion-forward, plus-size attire and we need your help to keep that conversation going all across the fashion industry.

A few final words

You can make a very positive contribution not only to our financing effort but also to spreading the word:  we are giving the plus size woman both a voice and a wardrobe. The time has come for plus-sized women to get the recognition they deserve within the fashion industry and you can make a significant contribution to making that happen through our efforts.

Join us now, tell your friends about i.b.b.i. Collection and help us change the fashion industry for every plus-size woman out there! Please consider donating above. We thank you deeply for your time and generosity!

     front in the vanguard of designers just starting to focus on the needs of
     the plus-size woman.





Why support us on Indiegogo?

This isn't our first rodeo! i.b.b.i.
Collection is evolutionary: it's genesis centered in our nine-year business.  For nearly a decade, we have been
offering fashion design and technical support—complete with full manufacturing—to
clients in contemporary fashion markets. Our business experience and savvy have
prepared us for the launch of the i.b.b.i. Collections.

We have carefully laid out a business plan that defines and
supports a clear path to success:
· 
We've
priced our product to be competitive in its niche in the market while
maintaining solid profit margins. 
· 
We
have built a fully functional website in collaboration with a seasoned and
experienced team (Ashay Media Group) which serves as a hub for both our capsule
collections and our efforts within the fashion industry to positively reinforce
plus-size body acceptance.
· 
Each
month, a capsule collection will rotate onto our website, constantly refreshing
available choices in a wear-now mode. Our first and second collections have
already launched! We have our third and fourth collections in the works
(pending Indiegogo backing).
However, we need your help. If you share our vision, if you are bold, beautiful
and irresistible or know someone who is, please support us so we can promote
our campaign and spread the word. 
Your contribution to our endeavor will boost our promotional efforts and
help fund our next collections 
We've worked in the fashion industry for many years—50 years combined, in
fact. We know that even the best designs can go unnoticed without the right
campaign behind them. Glamorous photo shoots, alluring marketing campaigns,
prolific social media exposure—all of these things are needed to drive fashion
and inspire the acceptance of trends.
We’re coming to Indiegogo to start the conversation about fashion-forward,
plus-size attire and we need your help to keep that conversation going all
across the fashion industry.

A few final words
You can make a very positive contribution not only to our financing effort
but also to spreading the word:  we
are giving the plus size woman both a voice and a wardrobe. The time has come
for plus-sized women to get the recognition they deserve within the fashion
industry and you can make a significant contribution to making that happen
through our efforts. 
Join us now, tell your friends about i.b.b.i. Collection and help us change the fashion industry for every plus-size
woman out there! Please consider donating above. We thank you deeply for your
time and generosity!

story:
Goliath's Gear

My name is Chucky Smiley. I'm a christian, military veteran, philanthropist, and a Defender of the Galaxy, lol.  I'm also the founder of Goliath's Gear. Goliath's Gear was created because I love God, I love clothes, and I love helping those in need. Goliath's Gear is a christian apparel brand that is inspired by the bold faith that David displayed throughout his life, especially in his battle versus the giant, Goliath.

Goliath's Gear is more than just a tshirt company.  We used our apparel to share the word of God and proceeds from our sales goes to a non-profit that I co-founded called the Extraordinary League of Gentlemen (ELOG).  In 2016, ELOG is planning to giveaway 2,000 bookbags at their 7th annual Bright Minds with Bright Futures Bookbag Giveaway.

Picture above is Goliath's Gear founder Chucky Smiley and my oldest son, Jaire.


Why do we need $5,000

We are trying to raise $5,000 because we need this money to help our new company with operating and printing costs. Most of the funds will be spent on printing new shirts and hats.  As previously mentioned, proceeds from the sale of these items will enable us to make a contribution to the nonprofit, ELOG.  We also will be using the funds to maintain our website, advertise, and other business related matters. Your contribution will help us to continue to grow our business so we can make a difference in the lives of others. Depending on the amount you donate you will get a Goliath's Gear wristband, Goliath's Gear T-shirt, or a Goliath's Gear hat.

$5: For supporting our campaign you will receive one (1) Goliath's Gear wristband and one (1) signed thank you note.

$25: For supporting our campaign you will receive one (1) Goliath's Gear T-shirt, one (1) Goliath's Gear wristband, and one (1) signed thank you note.

$60: For supporting our campaign you will receive one (1) Goliath's Gear Sweatshirt, one (1) Goliath's Gear wristband, and one (1) signed thank you note. 

$120: For supporting our campaign you will receive one (1) Goliath's Gear Sweatshirt, one (1) Goliath's T-shirt, one (1) Goliath's Gear snapback, one (1) Goliath's Gear wristband, and one (1) signed thank you note. 

If we do not reach our goal we will utilize the funds that we do raise to support ELOG and to spread the good news of our Lord.  Thank you so much for supporting our ministry. 

Pictured above is the Goliath's Gear Fearless T-shirt.  On the back is the scripture 1 Samuel 17:33, that reads, "For thou art but a youth, and he a man of war from his youth. 

The Impact

The Extraordinary League of Gentlemen (ELOG)

ELOG's annual Bright Minds with Bright Futures Bookbag Giveaway was created to assist disadvantaged families in DC, Delaware, Maryland, & Virginia by providing basic essentials (bookbags & school supplies) for kids heading back to school in September. Additionally, this event allows ELOG the opportunity to mentor to kids and promote the importance of obtaining an education, while also working to close the achievement gap that we noticed in our communities. ELOG believes children in the inner city do not have all the same resources as someone who lives in a suburb might have and this advantage is an achievement gap.

Since we started back in 2010 we have blessed close to 2,700 kids with bookbags. Below is our annual totals from the previous five years.  

Bright Minds with Bright Futures since 2010:

2015 - 1,200 bookbags

2014 - 780 bookbags

2013 - 400 bookbags

2012 - 188 bookbags

2011 - 80 bookbags

2010 - 49 bookbags


Pictured above is a photo from our 2015 BMBF Bookbag Giveaway

Risks & Challenges

With over 10 years in the apparel and fashion industry, I've gained a lot of experience that has translated to success in every business venture that I've been involved in.  A few years ago, I started to design and manufacture clothing with a positive message on them for my family and friends to wear.  I didn't realize it then but these early designs lead me to create the Goliath's Gear christian lifestyle apparel.  

Now, it is time for me to take all of my experience and expertise and put it into my own business so I can share my gift with the world.  I truly believe that the message behind our christian lifestyle apparel will inspire people across the world.  This ideal has proven to be a success and my passion for helping others has made this an enjoyable experience that I plan to continue until the day that I depart this earth.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute financially, but that doesn't mean you can't help us.  Please help us to spread the word about our campaign. We all have a network of people and I'm asking that you will spread the word about Goliath's Gear with your network of family and friends.  To share our campaign use the Indiegogo share tools

Please forward to a friend.

Like our facebook.com/GoliathsGear/ page

Follow us on twitter.com/goliathsgear

or on intagram.com/goliathsgear

http://www.goliathsgear.com


2016 is a year of breakthroughs, a year of abundance.  I'm declaring the year of God's favor. I'm announcing new levels are in your future. Be blessed!

story:
Do you plan to automate your lawn mower? Your tractor? Your UAV? Your car?

 

Ultra precise positioning at low cost and reduced form factor.

 

Who are we?

Drotek is a French-tech start-up mindset company based near Toulouse, birthplace of aerospace industry in Europe.

We are specialised in the development of embedded systems in various fields such as robotics, drones, sports, agriculture, IoT and smart products. 

Drotek is also equipped with a manufacturing unit for production and assembly of electronic boards. 

This allows us to control the quality at every stage of production and makes our customer to  you enjoy a very high reactivity and flexibility throughout the realization of their projects.

 

What is RTK?

Real Time Kinematics technology allows to enhance GNSS positioning in order to go down to centimeter level precision.
 

As pictures talk more than words, we wanted to show you the scope of its performance. We placed a GPS antenna on the top of the extruder of our 3D printer.

We programmed it so it could print Drotek's logo. We logged positions and then had a look at the result : 

Quite impressive! Look at the scale, it is 1 cm. Now let's compare this result (blue) with the ouput of a "classical" GPS (red, same logging period) : 

Astonishing. Now start thinking at all the possibilities brought by this technology...

 

How does it work?

RTK technology is not new but only recently it has become possible to compute this algorithm in real-time. Two GNSS receivers are used instead of one, in order to calculate double differences. A static receiver is motionless and called base. The other receiver is called rover. A datalink is needed between base and rover to send differential data.

Quite a lot of factors affect GNSS signals. First, you have to keep in mind that these signals are extremely weak. They are emitted by satellites at a power of roughly 30 W (that is 30 times lower than the power used by your microwave oven). Additionnally they have to travel 20 000 km before reaching the atmosphere. There, they have to cross ionosphere (which, as its name states, is heavily ionised and ends up refracting and reflecting signals) and troposphere before reaching your receiver. Quite a long trip!

All these factors result in a fair decrease of classical GNSS devices. RTK corrects a lot of the introduced error by using differential data. In the end, it reaches a centimeter accuracy.

 

Why is this product so special?

This is just like comparing computers in the 90's and right now. At that time a whole floor was needed to compute very simple arithmetic. Nowadays we embed dual-core processors in footprints smaller than 1 square centimeter. The logic of this design is to make this technology highly embedabble for a high number of applications.

Older RTK devices are dual frequency receivers, that means they are able to use L1 (1575.42 MHz) and L2 (1227.60 MHz) frequencies. The problem is that hardware capable of demultiplexing L2 signals is very expensive (we are talking of 10+k €). In order to keep it low cost, we deal only with L1 frequency. It has been shown that this does not know decrease the precision of the solution, but only its availability (that means L1/L2 will perform better in complex scenarios, where sky view is highly obstructed, but that is a very specific and rare use case).

As stated before, you need a base in order to provide your rover with differential data. Companies generally sell a monthly subscription in order to get differential data from a network of pre-established bases. The cost of this subscription is about 3k € per year, which is not negligible. We offer you to have your own base, so you can be completely autonomous on all fronts! 

"Drotek's integrated solution makes centimeter-level positioning technology more accessible for applications such as commercial UAVs and robotic guidance systems. As all RTK algorithms are pre-integrated into the u-blox NEO-M8P module, size and weight are significantly reduced compared to existing solutions, and power consumption is five times lower, therefore dramatically cutting costs and improving usability."

 Michael Ammann - VP Platform Partnerships u-blox

What can we achieve with this?

The applications are countless. Here are a few of them :

  • Know exactly where you buried your treasure.
  • Emergency rescue
  • Autonomous vehicle guidance (car, UAV...)
  • Automatic container movement
  • Precise storage tracking
  • Photogrammetry
  • Mapping, geology, surveying
  • Time measurement

Actually anything you can think of that needs positioning repeatability, accuracy and time synchronization.

TINI RTK : Key features

  • Centimeter‑level GNSS positioning for mass market, based on U-Blox M8P
  • Integrated Real Time Kinematics (RTK) for fast time‑to‑market
  • Smallest, lightest, and best energy‑efficient RTK module
  • Receiver type: 72-channel GPS L1 , GLONASS L1, BeiDou B1, GALILEO E1
  • Nav. update rate: up to 8 Hz
  • Position accuracy: 2.5 cm
  • Connectors: SMA, USB, JST-GH
  • Data link: whatever can be connected to a UART : Bluetooth, 433-868-915 MHz radio link, XBee, WiFi...
  • Size: 23.5 x 24.5 mm
  • Weight : 5g

 

 

TINI RTK Drone Edition 

Following a high demand for an integrated solution for UAV users, we jointly achieved with u-blox and PX4 a version specially designed for this purpose : TinyRTK Drone Edition. The boards include patch antennas and a battery-powered base. Base can stream differential data to ground control station through a BLE module. We did not master the availability date of the BLE component in the past, but now know it will be available in October and this is why we decided to include it in our Indiegogo campaign.

TINY RTK Drone Edition : Key Features

  • Centimeter‑level GNSS positioning for mass market, based on U-Blox M8P
  • Integrated Real Time Kinematics (RTK) for fast time‑to‑market
  • Smallest, lightest, and best energy‑efficient RTK module
  • Receiver type: 72-channel GPS L1 , GLONASS L1, BeiDou B1, GALILEO E1
  • Nav. update rate: up to 8 Hz
  • Position accuracy: 2.5 cm
  • MAVLink protocol encapsulation through U-Blox NINA-B1 Bluetooth Low Energy module
  • Connectors: USB, JST-GH
  • Compass : HMC5983
  • Power : LiPo 1S compatible / USB with integrated charger
  • Size: 50 x 50 mm
  • Weight : 24g

Why this architecture?

  • it is small and consumes little energy
  • base can be standalone, wireless, rechargeable and located on a good sky view spot regardless of ground control station's position
  • base is compatible with 1S LiPos, rechargeable by USB with integrated charger
  • rover module is supported by Pixhawk
  • base module : encapsulation within MAVLink protocol is under development (some developers have already got our boards, we will keep sending them to all)
  • rover includes a compass (HMC5983)
  • patch antenna included to avoid additional integration costs

Rewards

The amount raised will allow us to buy components in volumes and permit to maintain INDIEGOGO campaign special price in the future !

 

Stretch goals

For each stretch goal we pass, you get more free stuff. 

60 000€ -> case for free for each module

100 000€ -> case + FSK module for free for each module

 

Project timeline

Risks and challenges

As Drotek possesses its own manufacturing line, risk is fairly under control. We will depend on suppliers for several parts, but we have been working with them a lot so we know how to anticipate demand and delays.

 

How to help us ? 

  •  Email, tweet,facebook, ... your friends to share this Incredible Indiegogo campaign !
  •  Don't forget to use INDIEGOGO sharing tools ;-)

 

FAQ

  • What is the expected accuracy of this device?

You will reach a centimeter level accuracy.

  • Does it work indoor?

No, it needs good GNSS signals in order to perform precise calculations.

  • What datalink should I use?

Th easiest datalink to set up is a 433-868-915 MHz radio link. This will ensure you 1+km range.

  • Over what distance are corrections applicable?

L1 RTK systems can work up to 15 km from the base.

story:
Sometimes the daily demands made on our lives by others, can become overwhelming.  We  become so consumed with commitments to our children, our bosses or bills, that we often forget just how BLESSED we are.  In the worst of storms we must reach within for balance and peace.  Our blessing as human beings is our ability to reach beyond the physical senses, but we often forget to use this precious gift.

Remembering just how blessed we are begins with being a blessing to others.  By doing so we tap directly into the universal laws of reciprocity and receive ten-fold, that which we give. 

Victoria Shaffer Designs is launching a BLESS-IT-FORWARD campaign, with it’s Be a Blessing Bracelet.  This bracelet can be purchased for yourself, however we encourage you buy one for someone else.  Purchase the Be a Blessing Bracelet for a  family member, a friend,  a co-worker or a stranger. Help them remember that they are BLESSED with an internal power that can overcome any challenge they are facing.

Supporting this campaign will empower VICTORIA SHAFFER DESIGNS to create desperately needed employment opportunities, support the education of students seeking a career in design and help us realize the goal of building a socially conscious brand dedicated to doing good; while looking good.

The Be a Blessing Bracelet Options:

The Be a Blessing Bracelet is available in two variations to suit any personality.  The JEWELED option is embellished with rhinestones and the BLOCK option is smooth and clean.  After you order your perk, we will contact you via email or directly to customize your order. It is at that time when you will be able to define how many of each variation you would like. 

If you haven't noticed already, the EARLY BIRD CONTRIBUTORS will be able to receive their bracelets in time for the holidays.  They are packaged beautifully and will be perfect for Stocking Stuffers, team and corporate gifts and of course for anyone you really care about.

JEWELED:

BLOCK:

(BONUS WITH TOP PERKS)

Once you go Maxx you never go back,this beauty is:
maxx length
maxx glamour
maxx versastility ( at home, evening out, excellent for travel, heels or flats)  
maxx sparkle
maxx flowy
maxx hood
maxx softness

Rayon Jersey Knit, pull-over, 4inch crystal rhinestone letters,deep flowy hood, super soft stretch that flows over curves but does'nt cling, figure flattering on most body types.

Sizes: Sm / Med / Lrg / XL / XXL / XXXL

*Black Only for Campaign
story_txt:
Sometimes the daily demands made on our lives by others, can become overwhelming.  We  become so consumed with commitments to our children, our bosses or bills, that we often forget just how BLESSED we are.  In the worst of storms we must reach within for balance and peace.  Our blessing as human beings is our ability to reach beyond the physical senses, but we often forget to use this precious gift.
Remembering just how blessed we are begins with being a blessing to others.  By doing so we tap directly into the universal laws of reciprocity and receive ten-fold, that which we give. 
Victoria Shaffer Designs is launching a BLESS-IT-FORWARD campaign, with it’s Be a Blessing Bracelet.  This bracelet can be purchased for yourself, however we encourage you buy one for someone else.  Purchase the Be a Blessing Bracelet for a  family member, a friend,  a co-worker or a stranger. Help them remember that they are BLESSED with an internal power that can overcome any challenge they are facing.
Supporting this campaign will empower VICTORIA SHAFFER DESIGNS to create desperately needed employment opportunities, support the education of students seeking a career in design and help us realize the goal of building a socially conscious brand dedicated to doing good; while looking good.

The Be a Blessing Bracelet Options:
The Be a Blessing Bracelet is available in two variations to suit any personality.  The JEWELED option is embellished with rhinestones and the BLOCK option is smooth and clean.  After you order your perk, we will contact you via email or directly to customize your order. It is at that time when you will be able to define how many of each variation you would like. 
If you haven't noticed already, the EARLY BIRD CONTRIBUTORS will be able to receive their bracelets in time for the holidays.  They are packaged beautifully and will be perfect for Stocking Stuffers, team and corporate gifts and of course for anyone you really care about.
JEWELED:

BLOCK:



(BONUS WITH TOP PERKS) 
Once you go Maxx you never go back,this beauty is:maxx lengthmaxx glamourmaxx versastility ( at home, evening out, excellent for travel, heels or flats)  maxx sparklemaxx flowymaxx hoodmaxx softness

Sizes: Sm / Med / Lrg / XL / XXL / XXXL
*Black Only for Campaign

story:
Hi, we are Lowskis and Co. We are seeking out 10,000 dollars to help get our company up and running.

What we do is simple. We provide a subscription service to our members of the maternity or family planning population.

Our ideal investors would be those who have experience with subscription box success or subscription type of sales.

There is only a few other companies that do what we do and they have very little market penetration or success. We can do it the right way.

Each month the member receives a package with a tailored style based off of your term of pregnancy or month of age of new-born. There will be different levels of services that you can subscribe under. You can choose to purchase other items off of our site once it launches that will help either the expectant mother relax in the bath or that will help with children's toothaches for incoming teeth. This is a 3 part subscription box. before, during, and after giving birth. This box can range from workout clothing for mammas trying to lose weight after the baby, to essential oils to alleviate pain as well as to new baby clothes and cloth diapers. There is also options to manually select what can go in your box for some extra cost but the idea is to have something to look forward to during each month of stressful carrying, raising, or hiding from that bundle of joy. The mother could also pick out maternity clothes that would fit her size. It's an on-going subscription services that you receive monthly that tailors to where you are in childbirth or child planning. Help us fund a higher quality big brand name subscription service that tailors to an open in-need market of mothers, children, and their growing families.

We are 100% owned with no current financial partners. we are in need of investors to help launch this business into the market. We have no current sales. We are a very fresh and new business but are ready/working to expand and grind to put the time to use. Our business plan is well constructed for growth.
