story:
IBee

Our company, Saintech Ltd based in Bolton, Greater Manchester, UK was founded in 2015. During 2015, a multinational team worked on prototyping a new modular bracelet concept. This brings to us plenty achievements: nowadays Saintech Ltd has submitted for registration 14 patents related to design and electronics parts.

WE can give the world a revolutionary product with endless possibilities of further development.

Our project's aim is to improve the way the world lives today. Our aim is to make your life better, easier, safer.

Join us on our adventure and together we can accomplish something extraordinary!

We will reach the final test phase soon and the production will start afterwards

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

IBee Design

 

IBee system is comprised of:  

  • Smart strap with USB.  
  • 2 modules that are required for operating system:  
    • Battery Module and Notification Module.  
  • The interchangeable modules : Guardian, The Button, Solar Shield, Baby Maker, Moving, GPS, Magic Hand, 128 GB Storage, Travel.

Materials:  

  • Body: High quality metallic alloy plated.  
  • Decorations: High quality polymers, Synthetic leather: Red, Black & Brown. 
  • Bands Synthetic leather: Red, Black & Brown Genuine leather or Silicone Bands: Black, Red, White.    

The modules are available in the following colors :  

 

IBee Modules

 
This section will be updated with new interactions of the modules  with cell phone and other devices.
 
 

 

 

 

IBee Fashion

We managed to combine technology with fashion in such an extraordinary way that we are really proud of. We didn't just create a smart modular bracelet, we created a development system of smart jewelry. 

IBee project came from the desire of creating something beautiful, wearable, extremely intelligent, an everyday jewelry, capable of making your life easier through the special functions tailored on your particular needs.

 

If you want to help us, support our project by sharing it.

Together we can make a difference!

 

 

IBee Modular System

 

 

The modular concept was implemented in the hardware field as well as in software. Both the device and the app are designed this way and they are linked to an open development platform. This platform will give developers the possibility to create innovative hardware and software specifications using our concept and add new functionality to the modular system created by our company.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

If you want to discuss technical details, we hope that this section will clear everything up for you.

 

What is Guardian Module ?  

This is the module that will keep your things safe. Your phone will be difficult to steal, but if such an unfortunate event happens, you will be able to find it even if it is rebooted, if the accounts are deleted, the SIM card removed and if it has no range to an internet connection. Sounds too great to be true but it is now possible. You can connect your phone and a tracker to your guardian modular feature (the tracker can be attached to any object you do not wish to lose and keep safe). You can preset a distance from where you will be alerted if your phone and/or tracker overpasses the safety range of the modular system. The distance can be set from 50 cm to 30 meters. If your phone is stolen you can press the two buttons at the same time. This feature triggers the App Guardian and it does the following: It blocks the phone - the device cannot be shut down, only if the battery is removed, otherwise all of the features from the guardian app will keep working until the battery is empty. An alarm is triggered with the maximum ringtone capacity. A program called Thieves Nightmare will start working. If it is installed and activated, it has the following effect: In case the person who took the device deletes all the accounts, resets the phone and then uses a new SIM card, the program reinstalls itself automatically, recognizes that the SIM card does not belong to its owner and sends a text message with the exact location of the phone, and now pay attention: NO INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED for those features and it also gives you the possibility to communicate with the person that has your device.

Specifications

  • Piezoelectric vibration / haptic notifications / haptic feedback Water and dust classification IP 67*  
  • Bluetooth ® 4.2  
  • ARM Cortex-M4F  
  • 512 kB Flash  
  • 64kB low-leakage RAM  
  • Power from an external battery module (rechargeable battery modules). Notice: No need to wait to charge the battery! Just replace the module and you’re ready to reuse your IBee smart bracelet
  • Operating system compatibility: Android 4.4 KitKat , Lollipop + IOS 8, 9, 10 +
  •  IBee bracelet Size (module) – 22,7 (with connector) x 16,8 x 6.4 mm Usage time – up to 3 month**     

*6 – Protected from dust 7 – waterproof – Protected against the effects of immersion in water to depth between 15 cm and 1 meter .

 ** The duration of use depends on the combination of modules in the bracelet.

 

 

What is The Storage Module ?

The Off-Line Cloud module was designed to increase the storage capacity of your phone by 128 GB and to facilitate the access of data without using internet connection.

If the phone’s memory is full you have an extra 128 GB for your needs. The module can synchronize with the phone through the IBee Off-Line Cloud and can make a backup of the phone’s system. The new files that are created can automatically be saved in the module. All data is AES 128 bit encrypted and you can separately create passwords on the files you want to protect.

The data delivering between the phone and the module is also encrypted. Downloading and uploading the data can be made with the use of the USB belt on the bracelet via of the Notification module. The module has a safety system in case it is lost. It can communicate periodically with the phone app. In the exact moment the connection is lost, the module is blocked.

Every time the module is used in the bracelet’s system you must register a random password generated by the App in order to be initialized. (The system is just like the token system used for Internet banking)

Specifications: 

  • Piezoelectric vibration / haptic notifications / haptic feedback Water and dust classification IP 67*  
  • Bluetooth ® 4.2  
  • ARM Cortex-M4F  
  • 512 kB Flash  
  • 64 kB RAM  
  • 128 GB memory module Power from an external battery module (rechargeable battery modules). Notice: No need to wait to charge the battery! Just replace the battery module and you’re ready to reuse it.
  •  IBee smart bracelet Size (module) – 22,7 (with connector) x 16,8 x 6.4 mm  
  • Usage time – up to 1 month** 
  • Operating system compatibility: Android 4.4 KitKat , Lollipop + IOS 8, 9, 10 +

* 6 – Protected from dust 7 – waterproof – Protected against the effects of immersion in water to depth between 15 cm and 1 meter.

** The duration of use depends on the combination of modules in the bracelet.

 

 

What is the Notificatin Module ?

Notification is a module that is put on the end of the bracelet's belt. Connected through Bluetooth on your phone it can be set to alert you when receiveing a message or a phone call.

Notifications can also be set with your email or any other applications: WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger and Viber. In the near future this will also be available on other apps.

The module is also equipped with NFC (Near Field Communication). You can put in a business card on electronic format. To owners of the IBee bracelet will be able to exchange personal data by a single touch. The module also contains a 100 mAp battery as a secondary power source for the bracelet. It functions only if the main source of power is drained and you do not have the possibility to change it immediately. This system allows a continuous function of the modules.

Specifications:

  • Piezoelectric vibration / haptic notifications / haptic feedback Water and dust classification IP 67*  
  • Bluetooth ® 4.2  
  • ARM Cortex-M4F  
  • 512 kB Flash  
  • 64 kB RAM  
  • Back up battery 100 mAh  
  • NFC  
  • Size (module) – 22,7 (with connector) x 16,8 x 6.4 mm  
  • Usage time – up to 6 month**  
  • Operating system compatibility: Android 4.4 KitKat , Lollipop + IOS 8, 9, 10 +

* 6 – Protected from dust 7 – waterproof – Protected against the effects of immersion in water to depth between 15 cm and 1 meter.

  ** The duration of use depends on the combination of modules in the bracelet.

 

 

What is The Button Module?

It is a digital fingerprint button with 5 programmable interactions for each fingerprint from one hand. The modular feature can record 5 fingerprints and you will be able to set, through the IBee App, one different function for each fingerprint.

Programmable functions:

  • The possibility to send a preset message + GPS location
  • Call a number that has been previously set It 
  • Can turn ON/OFF the music player Ringtone volume  
  • SOS signal in case of danger (it calls 1 preset number and sends the GPS location via text message on 2 other numbers)  
  • You can control other devices through Bluetooth (the door of the garage or of the house and even the house lightning system) IoT  
  • You can call Uber to come and take you home (preset destination is required)  
  • You can control the phone camera It can also check in on Facebook

Specifications

  • Piezoelectric vibration / haptic feedback 
  • Water and dust classification IP 67*  
  • Bluetooth ® 4.2  
  • ARM Cortex-M4F  
  • 512 kB Flash  
  • 64kB low-leakage RAM
  •  Power from an external battery module (rechargeable battery modules). Notice: No need to wait to charge the battery! Just replace the module battery and you’re ready to reuse it.
  • IBee smart bracelet Size (module) – 22,7 (with connector) x 16,8 x 6.4 mm  
  • Usage time – up to 1 month**  
  • Operating system compatibility: Android 4.4 KitKat , Lollipop + IOS 8, 9, 10 +

* 6 – Protected from dust 7 – waterproof – Protected against the effects of immersion in water to depth between 15 cm and 1 meter.  

** The duration of use depends on the combination of modules in the bracelet.

 

 

What is Travel Module ?

The Travel Module is designed for you to travel safely together with all your goods.

The Functions of the Module:

Guardian (see functions on Guardian Module). Alongside the Guardian app you can connect 4 trackers that are attachable on the belongings which you wish to keep safe. Even the kids can have tracker in case you want to make sure they do not go too far from you.  

Off-Line cloud from 128 GB  

Distress message

Notification (see module features)

GPS (the possibility to connect/disconnect with the IBee Travel App)

One of the 4 buttons can be set to trigger the phones’ camera.

RF transmitter. It works at a range of 10km in case of accident. (it sends the GPS location but it has to be charged with a solar battery through the USB connector on the bracelet).

You can check-in on Facebook from one of the buttons without opening the Facebook app. You can also set an automatic message when you check-in.

The modules have 4 buttons for an easier access of the functions.

Specifications :

  • Piezoelectric vibration / haptic notifications/ haptic feedback
  • Water and dust classification IP 67 *
  • Bluetooth ® 4.2
  • ARM Cortex-M4F
  • 8 Mb Flash
  • 256 kB SRAM
  • Power is from an external battery module (rechargeable battery modules). No need to wait to charge the battery. Just replace the module and you’re ready to use your IBee bracelet
  • Memory modul 128 GB
  • High-precision temperature sensor
  • GPS GNSS modul
  • RF modul
  • UVA/UVB senzor
  • Size (module) – 22,7 (with connector) x 16,8 x 6.4 mm
  • Usage time – up to 2 weeks
  • Operating system compatibility:
  • Android 4.4 KitKat , Lollipop + IOS 8, 9, 10 +

* 6 – Protected from dust 7 – waterproof – Protected against the effects of immersion in water to depth between 15 cm and 1 meter.  

** The duration of use depends on the combination of modules in the bracelet.

 

 

What is Battery Module ?  

It is a module with a 150 mAp battery with a wireless charge or the possibility to be charged through the USB belt of the bracelet.

Specifications :

  • Water and dust classification IP 67*  
  • Battery 150 mAh  
  • Size (module) – 19.40 (with connector) x 16,8 x 6.4 mm  
  • Operating system compatibility: Android 4.4 KitKat, Lollipop IOS 8, 9, 10  

* 6 – Protected from dust  7 – waterproof – Protected against the effects of immersion in water to depth between 15 cm and 1 meter.

 

 

Available Soon

These modules are in development and will be available in the next campaign.

 

 

Timeline

 

About Us

 IBee modular jewel concept was born in 2014. During 2015, this smart bracelet idea was developed at the prototype stage. 

Our company, Saintech Ltd based in Bolton, Greater Manchester, UK was founded in 2015.  Saintech Ltd has submitted for registration 14 patents related to design and electronics parts.  

We started developing an open design platform for IBee modules. This way developers and designers can add new functionality to the modular system created by our company.

Saintech Ltd is developing several devices that will come on the market since 2017.

  • IBee Watch – a unisex watch with a classic design and innovative features.
  • Baby Bee – a watch for children that will ensure the safety of children and will be an educational tool.
  • IBee Travel – a travel tracker that makes impossible the loss of baggage wherever you travel the globe.  
  • IBee Woman – a special bracelet designed to meet the needs of every woman

 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We want our entire community to know that the product details may change over the course of the manufacturing process. We want to ensure that we deliver the highest quality product possible. We will keep you updated on any and all changes.

IBee is an innovative product. It's creation was a technical challenge. It took us over a year to find a way to connect this modules and power them. After we succeeded in doing so, we realized we can actually make this happen. We don't claim that we overcame every single obstacle, but together with our supporters we will accomplish our goal: making this state-of-the-art smart wearable jewelry available to the world.

We don't expect for only financial support. Submitting ideas and practical solutions can help us design a better product for you.

We have stated that shipment will commence in the end of June 2017 accounting for as many worst case scenarios as possible. However, it is impossible to account for every scenario due to practicality.

GPS GNSS modul
RF modul
UVA/UVB senzor
Size (module) – 22,7 (with connector) x 16,8 x 6.4 mm
Usage time – up to 2 weeks
Operating system compatibility:
Android 4.4 KitKat , Lollipop + IOS 8, 9, 10 +

* 6 – Protected from dust 7 – waterproof – Protected against the effects of immersion in water to depth between 15 cm and 1 meter.  
** The duration of use depends on the combination of modules in the bracelet.
 

 
What is Battery Module ?  
It is a module with a 150 mAp battery with a wireless charge or the possibility to be charged through the USB belt of the bracelet.
Specifications :

Water and dust classification IP 67*  
Battery 150 mAh  
Size (module) – 19.40 (with connector) x 16,8 x 6.4 mm  
Operating system compatibility: Android 4.4 KitKat, Lollipop IOS 8, 9, 10  

* 6 – Protected from dust  7 – waterproof – Protected against the effects of immersion in water to depth between 15 cm and 1 meter.
 

 
Available Soon
These modules are in development and will be available in the next campaign.

 

 
Timeline


 

About Us
 IBee modular jewel concept was born in 2014. During 2015, this smart bracelet idea was developed at the prototype stage. 
Our company, Saintech Ltd based in Bolton, Greater Manchester, UK was founded in 2015.  Saintech Ltd has submitted for registration 14 patents related to design and electronics parts.  
We started developing an open design platform for IBee modules. This way developers and designers can add new functionality to the modular system created by our company.
Saintech Ltd is developing several devices that will come on the market since 2017.

IBee Watch – a unisex watch with a classic design and innovative features.
Baby Bee – a watch for children that will ensure the safety of children and will be an educational tool.
IBee Travel – a travel tracker that makes impossible the loss of baggage wherever you travel the globe.  
IBee Woman – a special bracelet designed to meet the needs of every woman

 

 
 
 
 

 
Risks & Challenges
We want our entire community to know that the product details may change over the course of the manufacturing process. We want to ensure that we deliver the highest quality product possible. We will keep you updated on any and all changes.
IBee is an innovative product. It's creation was a technical challenge. It took us over a year to find a way to connect this modules and power them. After we succeeded in doing so, we realized we can actually make this happen. We don't claim that we overcame every single obstacle, but together with our supporters we will accomplish our goal: making this state-of-the-art smart wearable jewelry available to the world.
We don't expect for only financial support. Submitting ideas and practical solutions can help us design a better product for you.
We have stated that shipment will commence in the end of June 2017 accounting for as many worst case scenarios as possible. However, it is impossible to account for every scenario due to practicality.

story:
Veteran owned and operated. Fielding only the best gear at affordable prices. Battle tested, warrior approved.

Few words about myself, I joined the U.S. Army in 2009 and went on to serve as an airborne infantryman in Long Range Recon and surveillance until 2016. In 2013 I saw a market I wanted to be a part of one day so I began designing tactical gear and using my position in training and Afghanistan to research everything a warrior on the battlefield would need to sustain successful operations in hostile combat environments around the world, Raptor Tactical LLC was born. Raptor Tactical is a designer and manufacturer of modern tactical equipment for Military, Police, and other Law enforcement units.

Raptor Tactical was founded by US Army veterans with extensive experience in forward combat zones. Our mission is to provide equipment that meets the most stringent requirements of our customers. Exceeding the expectations of our customers in terms of quality and innovation through continuous improvement and attention to detail.

Raptor Tactical gear is designed for the real conditions of the battlefield, made of the most durable materials. We carry out this mission by combining innovation, design, and quality of expert craftsmen within the United States on the basis of our own ideas, collaboration, and customer feedback. We guarantee that our equipment will not fail at a critical moment.

Why we need your help? 

The Retainer Belt is a custom belt that will require a very large minimum order to make this possible. With the sales from this Kickstarter, we want to start our own production. In order to do that, we need to acquire the required machinery and facility. We NEED YOU to support this project and HELP the US make this belt and other laser cut gear a reality! And also keep US Dolar here in the US

 

  • We've to make belts and gear by hand in our small shop in North Carolina the lead time on the belt and laser cut gear are 60-90 days which adds complexity to the project. We intend to get a machinery and materials in during the Kickstarter in order to get the process moving and get belts and gear out to our backers ASAP!

  • The money raised from this campaign will not only get you guys the gear you need but ensure that the company, in and of itself, is COMPLETELY USA built and distributed.

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • We need $50 000, to start full-size production on the bigger scale to meet the demand. Those funds will allow us to purchase necessary machines, equipment, and materials.
  • Currently, our production is small and slow. We outsource most of it because of lack of machines and equipment. We want to have our own production line and keep $$$ in the local area to build the local economy. If we can achieve our goal it will give the people jobs that they can depend on.
  • If we don`t reach our goal the funds go to the project in a form of materials, and other stuff that we still need to move on with the production.

 

Risks & Challenges

If demand is extremely high we will be adding rewards and adjusting the delivery dates to those rewards to assure all belts and gear arrive when promised.

We have our backers best interest in mind and we intend to do everything within our power to follow through on this project.

  • We are always open for new ideas and updates if you have any suggestions let us know.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Folks, please help us to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Please share on Facebook and Instagram.

We are always open for new ideas and updates if you have any suggestions let us know.

Other Ways You Can Help

Folks, please help us to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
Please share on Facebook and Instagram.

story:
INTRO

 

Hi!

My name is Loulou João. I am an illustrator from Belgium with a passion for embroidery. While I'm still pursuing my studies, I run a little company to promote and sell my artwork: longlasting and wearable apparel, accessories and hopefully much more to come!

I hope that one day my business can grow to become a fulltime activity. Your help will get me closer to this dream! By reaching my goal, I'll be able to get some funds back after the purchase of  my own embroidery machine that I will use to expand my brand. You can support me through donations, and in return I offer you amazing rewards!

 

By donating, you are supporting me to continue my practice. It would be really nice to collect €1500, but it is even better to reach more!

The perks I'm offering are items I particularly designed for this crowdfunding. All profit I make out of selling these, goes straight to my little company. I've tried my best to keep my prices as low as possible so everybody would get the opportunity to choose something they really like!

If I don't reach my entire goal, I'll still have some funds to put in to making more products. Every donation helps! Let's take a look at the perks you can get!

 

PERKS

 

1. PATCHES

These patches are the first perk I offer. It's an iron-on patch, making very easy to attach on fabric and give it that something extra. Diameter +/- 6 cm.  

 

 

2. Stamps

Two cute stamps to add to your stationery collection or to get it started. These are offered in two options: the hand design and the leaf design. You can get these separately for €15 (see "stamp" perk) or you can get them both for €25 (see "stamp lover" perk). Diameter +/- 3cm. These two designs are also available as luxurious enamelled metal pins (émaille), see below.

 

3. Pins

In the "pins" perk you can choose two soft enamelled metal pins! If you can't get enough and want all of them then scroll further to the "pin lover" perk and get a discount for your enthusiasm. You can personalize your bag, clothing and much more by pinning these cuties! Diameter 3cm.

 

4. Gymbags

Get that lovely nostalgia feeling with these gym bags. They're made of very strong canvas/cotton so they last years. They have a capacity of 18 liters to take all your daily necessities with you! These are available in three options  "Lady in red", "Lady in blue" and in "Composition".

 

5. Shirts

A basic unisex shirt with a homemade embroidery that you can mix and match with every outfit and still shine out that extra personality. These shirts are available in two colours: grey and dark grey. There are 4 embroidery options: "Lady in red", "Lady in blue", "Purple stripes" and "Coral stripes". See size chart below.

 

6. Sweaters

These soft unisex sweaters are ideal to pair with every outfit, they're lightweight yet warm! They come in 3 colours: Black, Grey and Ruby. And in 4 embroidery options: "Lady in red", "Lady in blue", "Purple stripes" and "Coral stripes". See size chart below.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Don't hesitate to support me by simply sharing this project in your social media circles, or by old-fashioned word-of-mouth advertising. Sharing is caring! I greatly appreciate every help!

story:
Introducing Level1Gamers!

Here's a sample of what we do!

Find more on https://www.etsy.com/shop/level1gamers
 

Why Level1Gamers?

 

Lisa and I started in Artist Alley as little known artists with a desire to go big! We ventured into uncharted territory with Salt Lake Comic Con being our first convention. Armed with a smile and Kinko prints we took on the waves of 100,000 people cramming the aisles for new things to buy. We learned so much from that first show and continued our quest to become better than before! Since then we've sold art at several Comic Cons all across the country and are looking to level up our game by adding t-shirts, onesies and more. 

 

We were originally selling to a part of the market that we felt was lacking gamer related stuff, and that was our littlest gamers, babies! Henceforth, Level1Gamers was born! But we thought, why stop there? Parents need gamer related stuff too, so we created adult sized t-shirts as well! We've covered topics from video gaming to role-playing and everything in-between. 

Our passion has created a loyal fan base online and here is what some of them have to say from Etsy:

Source: https://www.etsy.com/shop/Level1Gamers/reviews?...

 

Your Contributions Will

 

Your help will make a huge difference for a couple of entrepreneurs looking to fulfill their dreams! We even hope to one day getting into screen printing and this will be our stepping stone.

 

 

Let's Talk About Perks!

 

*At the end of the campaign each contributor will get their gift certificate emailed to them with a unique code, which they can use only one time and must be used in a year from the date sent. We'll have a wall of gratitude set up on our website with the names of those who contributed to our success! Either Lisa or myself will reach out to those who have the custom t-shirt or onesie and get the design they want from them. Please give us 2 weeks to get your custom design created, pressed and ready to ship. There is a three color maximum for the custom shirts and onesies. We will also reach out and get information about your original sketch drawing by the talented Lisa Hall. This drawing should also be sent out at the same time as your custom t-shirt.

story:
Arête Chronographs

Instruments de précision. LIMITED TO ONLY 10 AVAILABLE in first perk.

Designed by world champion athletes and hand crafted in the Swiss mountains, Arête watches signify the utmost in style, sophistication and created with adventure in mind.

Who we are: We are athletes who attempt to push the boundaries of adventure, traveling the world seeking new experiences. We are two of the top athletes with over 11 world titles to our names and have enlisted a few of our world champion friends to help test and create our chronographs to support our movement. These timepieces were created initially for our world class athlete friends.


This campaign is important to us as it will allow us as athletes to create something that is truly designed for our passion.

We are committed to a very limited manufacture process where quality far out weighs quantity allowing us to create the ultimate in luxury, bespoke timepieces. 

By helping this movement you will allow us to create something truly significant in the world of adventure timepieces, a very limited edition chronograph that is completely unique. This is the beginning of a movement that will support athletes and make products created and designed by the best adventure athletes in the world. A great deal of time and research has gone into creating a world class timepiece. The Ascent is stainless steel encased in military grade PVD black coating, the watch has a chronograph, start/stop, date and precise second timing. The Ascent features a durable synthetic/leather band, unique logo and chrono code on rear, simple, functional and most importantly aesthetically pleasing.

The sheer magnitude of producing a product of this quality has taken countless hours of research and development.

What We Need & What You Get

This funding will allow us to manufacturer the complete level of the Ascent chronograph, a precision crafted piece. This will allow the team to make the Ascent available to the public on a very limited basis and help us support our world champion athletes team and friends who are out there pushing the boundaries each and every day. Flying, Climbing, Biking, Paddling, Motorsports, you name it, this team is one of the most amazing group of athletes created and we would like your support. You will get one of the most unique crafted watches available for the adventure lifestyle, created by true world champions.

The Watch

  • Swiss movements
  • Water Resistant 10 ATM / 100metres / 330ft
  • Military grade Black PVD coating
  • Mineral Glass
  • Encased in stainless steel
  • Tachymeter
  • 42mm face
  • Date
  • Unique durable leather/synthetic band

Quality rather than quantity, the ascent is born with adventure in mind. This Swiss made chronograph time-piece is encased in hardened stainless steel which is ready for your ascent to your personal next peak. At no time should you second guess yourself as you reach your first ascent.

Each timepiece comes in deluxe box and has a 2 year world wide warranty.

Risks & Challenges

We have numerous challenges which we have already overcome, firstly creating a timepiece in the mountains of Switzerland that we can stand behind. This has required many months of testing and creating something functional yet attractive. Starting this from scratch has required a great deal of investment and we hope by putting in countless hours of research, testing and proving our products in the outdoors that you will assist us in this movement.

Other Ways You Can Help

We hope that you will share and let your friends know about these fantastic chronographs, without your help we won't get off the ground. Any support, even as small as sharing our movement via social media is huge to us.

A greener planet

For every watch that we create we will plant one tree as part of our commitment to the environment.

Thank you very much for your time, we hope you enjoy your unique Arête timepiece.

story:
THE PROJECT

Achilles are the future of sporting footwear. They are able to really help the prevention of sprains during sporting activity.

Achilles are designed for basketball and volleyball, that are both sports in which is very easy for the athlete to land badly and to get an ankle sprain, that can make you unable to play for quite a long time.

Functioning

Achilles use a patent pending hydraulic system partially full of water activated by a wrong pressure of the foot on the ground, that can lead to a sprain. Our system is composed by an intern part, an extern part and a connection tube. All those part are connected, and the water contained in it can go from one part to other ones. The quantity of water isn't neither too low nor too high, giving to the system the needed flexibility.

When the foot presses the ground with the external part of the shoe the extern part of the hydraulic system is pressed and pushes the water contained in it into the internal part, through the connection tube. The internal part is now completely full of water and becomes rigid, preventing the ankle from making a wrong movement.

 

Design and Performances

We didn't concentrate only on the sprain preventing system, we paid a lot of attention also to the design of the shoes and to their perfomances. They are crafted with the best and lighter available materials, according to the experts that helped us.

During our studies we found out that volleyball and basketball shoes are almost identical in their structure, so we designed a model that can be used in both sports, asking for help to some podiatrists, some physiotherapists and some shoes-crafters.

Achilles will be available in four different colour versions, as you can see in the following picture:

 

Team

Our team is composed by people of different ages and abilities, but we all play or used to play volleyball or basketball. We know what a pair of shoes is for an athlete, it's his armor, and it must suit him perfectly. It must be lightweight, flexible, rightly cushioned and comfortable.

 

What YOU can do for us

We have already done all the researches, all the projects, and 3D models, so we are sure about the functioning of Achilles, but we don't have enough funds to physically produce a prototype of the shoes.

So that's why we're here, we need funds just tocraft a prototype of the shoes, to test it, and to realize it in great numbers. 

It's very difficult to define the production time of the shoes from the end of the campaign, because it will depend on the producer, but we estimated a time of 3 months from the ending of the crowdfunding campaign.

Thank you for your attention, it would be great if you like our project and decide to become part of it by buying one pair of our first edition Achilles

It must be lightweight, flexible, rightly cushioned and comfortable. What YOU can do for usWe have already done all the researches, all the projects, and 3D models, so we are sure about the functioning of Achilles, but we don't have enough funds to physically produce a prototype of the shoes.So that's why we're here, we need funds just tocraft a prototype of the shoes, to test it, and to realize it in great numbers. It's very difficult to define the production time of the shoes from the end of the campaign, because it will depend on the producer, but we estimated a time of 3 months from the ending of the crowdfunding campaign.Thank you for your attention, it would be great if you like our project and decide to become part of it by buying one pair of our first edition Achilles

story:
Becoming a fashion designer has always been my dream, and as a senior at my dream school, Savannah College of Art and Design, I'm so close to fulfilling my dreams. My Senior collection was inspired by Literature, because I waned to choose take inspiration from something that has shaped my life. As someone from a small town in the Midwest I've always turned to reading as my escape. 

The money raised in this campaign will go directly into making my final garments for my Senior Thesis collection. As thesis a Fall/Winter collection I will be using a large amount of fabric. My designs will be mostly made out of Duchess Satin, Organza, Lace, and (if budget allows) Wool. My collection will be in various shades of jewel tones along with custom embroidery and screen printing that will be hand done by my collaborator and I.

My current fabric estimate is $2,000. I'm hoping to bring the cost down by ordering only the exact amount of fabric and mixing in cheaper trims. If I do not reach my goal I will still put all the money into my fabric budget. This campaign is purely for my materials. 

Your contribution will help determine my ability to follow through with my original concept or if I will have to change the entire thing and just give everyone booty shorts and call it a day. Your contribution will truly shape how I graduate college, I love my concept, I love my designs, and I want to make them to the best of my ability.

If you cannot contribute please share my campaign with as many loving and wonderful humans as you can!

story:
It's time to change the story on assault and violence.

The G|B Defender by Guardian Band is getting fear off your mind by putting safety in your hands. 

The G|B Defender is the only smartwatch on the market that streams live video, audio, and GPS location via a 4G cellular network with just a touch of the SOS button. When every second counts, there’s no need to fumble through apps, scroll through screens, or even pull out your phone. Pressing the easily accessible SOS button alerts your Guardian Network of your GPS location and starts streaming live video that can help identify your attacker. Best of all, the G|B Defender isn’t Bluetooth dependent. With its own SIM card and number, it doesn’t need a nearby cell phone to operate. 

The annual statistics of assault and violence around the world are staggering: 

  • Every 92 seconds, an American is sexually assaulted. (1) 
  • The FBI filed 424,066 missing-children reports in 2018. (2) 
  • 20% ER visits by senior adults are due to assault or neglect. One-fourth of serious nursing home cases of abuse are not reported to police. (3) 
  • 482 cases of sexual assault from a ride-share driver have been reported since 2014. (4) One ride-share company received 7 different lawsuits for sexual assault in JUST ONE DAY.  (5) 
  • 23% of female and 5% of male undergraduates experience rape or sexual assault during their college tenure. (6) 

It is time to change these statistics. It's time to stop living in fear. It's time for the G|B Defender.

Our Campaign and Goals

Guardian Band's campaign goal is to raise $500,000. With these funds we can:

  • Continue to hone the G|B Defender's interface and software to ensure it will always be both cutting-edge and user friendly. 
  • Continue researching and developing a child-specific version of the G|B Defender to address the safety concerns that affect our kids. 
  • Keep up with design and style trends so that wearing the G|B Defender will not only keep you safe, you'll look good while doing it.

The Impact

We have all become aware of the threats that worry college students walking at night, parents dropping kids at the mall, people entering a ride share, elderly people in nursing homes, real estate agents meeting potential clients, and even hotel workers entering a guest’s room. But consequences for rapists and assailants are still discouragingly low. Only 6% of rapists will ever spend a day in jail, and 15 out of 16 rapist will walk free. (7)

The G|B Defender works to change these statistics in three ways: 

1. Prevention. Studies in criminology show that attacks are much less likely to occur if the assailants know they are being filmed. 

2. Rescue. A quick touch of the SOS fires off your GPS location and begins streaming live video/audio alerting your Guardian Network that you need help. You don't even have to say a word. 

3. Evidence. Once activated, your Guardian Network captures video, audio, and your GPS location on their GB Defender app, which can be handed over to authorities to help incriminate and prosecute your assailant. 

In addition, Guardian Band is partnering with A Call to Men and NO MORE, two non-profit organizations working tirelessly to change the worldwide culture of assault and violence. With each G|B Defender sold, Guardian Band will donate 2.5% of the proceeds to each of these organizations. 

By contributing to our campaign, you are changing the outcomes of assault and violence for victims all over the world. 

Fashionably Fearless

The G|B Defender is a heavyweight in technology, but it’s lightweight on your arm while tracking your daily steps. With the G|B Defender, you can make and receive calls, take photos, count your steps, monitor your heartbeat and more. Its sleek, streamlined design looks great as you count your steps from the laundry room to the boardroom to the taproom. The G|B Defender comes in 3 color choices and is packaged with a backup quick-charge battery small enough to attach to your keychain. In addition, Guardian Band is partnering with name-brand designers to create a range of custom and limited edition watchband styles so you can change up your look as easily as you change your plans. 

Our Background

Guardian Band started on a treadmill at the gym. Sweating through a workout, Lisa Geyer recognized a friend being interviewed on the overhead TV. That's how Lisa found out one of her friends had been sexually assaulted by a rideshare driver. What was worse, the assailant was never identified. Angry and frustrated, Lisa channeled her energy into developing the most powerful wearable safety device on the market today.  

With 20 years experience in setting up and running national and international businesses and non-profit organizations, Lisa was uniquely situated to recruit the best engineers and technology experts from all over the world. Countless hours of research and development have resulted in the brand-new powerful technology only offered by the G|B Defender. 

Our Future

We realize how quickly technology changes and evolves. Since we began developing the G|B Defender, we have already been able to improve the efficiency of our technology in ways we could never dream of two years ago. Our engineers are dedicated to the Guardian Band goals  and continue to research and develop improvements to ensure we deliver the most reliable, current, and cutting-edge product to our customers. 

The cultural impact of streaming video has unlimited possibilities. Our goal is to partner with communities all over the country to help vulnerable populations feel safe, protected, and empowered.

Be a Part of the Solution  

We want you to join us! Together, we can stop violence and ensure victims get the justice they deserve. In addition to contributing to our campaign, you can also help by:

  • Spreading the word! Tell your friends and family about the G|B Defender, the only smartwatch that is working in your community to change the story of violence and assault.
  • Getting social! Follow us on Instagram  @gbdefender, Twitter @gbdefender, or the social media channel you like best. 

 

(1)https://www.rainn.org/statistics/victims-sexual-violence

(2)http://www.missingkids.com/footer/media/keyfacts

(3)https://oig.hhs.gov/oas/reports/region1/11600509.asp

(4)https://www.vice.com/en_us/article/vb5ed8/lyft-has-been-flooded-with-sexual-assault-lawsuits  

(5)https://www.vice.com/en_us/article/vb5ed8/lyft-has-been-flooded-with-sexual-assault-lawsuits  https://ridesafeworld.com/database 

(6)https://www.aau.edu/key-issues/aau-climate-survey-sexual-assault-and-sexual-misconduct-2015?id=16525

(7)https://cmsac.org/facts-and-statistics/

story:
EART [pronounced ART] automatic watches are crafted with recyclable silicone straps, 316L stainless steel, and high-grade naturally growing Sapphire crystal. Assembled with scrupulous detail, our watches are designed with a sleek and minimalist approach advocating our planet by backing three purposeful causes; cleaning our oceans, saving our rainforest and to stopping climate change.
 

Every component and element is designed, developed and produced with inspiration and respect for Mother Earth.

45mm and 42mm Elegance

EART watches feature a meticulous craft of matte black and rose gold design with a wide, stylish, 45mm and 42mm faceplate packaged in a recycled paper-made gift box. 

Automatic Movement

Miyota 8N24 automatic movement, used by many reputable watch makers, provides Japanese precision and high functionality with a power reserve over 40 hours, twenty-one jewel three-hand and -20 ~+40 second accuracy per day.

Recyclable Silicone

Heat resistant, durable, stable and with an arsenal of numerous uses, EART watch straps are made up of a comfortable silicone material. This material repels water, high tear strength and holds the ability to be reused in many other fashions after its life as a watch strap.

Sapphire Crystal

EART watches are fitted with high-grade sapphire crystal, one of the most resistant materials there is. This crystal is naturally grown and the second hardest matter on our planet. Selected to ensure durability to coincide with our quality product.​

 

316L stainless steel

One reason EART uses 316L stainless steel is the lower carbon content. This material is highly resistant to corrosion and provides endurance in high temperatures.

THE CAUSES

EART & CO. is a reflection of our love for creating beautiful accessories and our respect for Mother Earth. In that, we have made it our mission to advocate causes that protect our planet supporting causes in relation to our oceans, rainforest and climate. 

10% of all proceeds go to the cause of watch that you select.

 

     

    CLEANING OUR OCEANS 

    EART & Co. supports The Ocean Cleanup which develops advanced technologies to rid the world’s oceans of plastic. A full-scale deployment of their systems is estimated to clean up 50% of the Great Pacific Garbage Patch in 5 years.

    The Ocean Cleanup thinks outside of the box against conventional methods which would take a significant amount of time, energy and money. They’re developing passive systems that allow more efficient systems to accomplish the goal that EART believes in with cleaning our oceans. 10% of all proceeds towards our Ocean Watches will be directed to this cause

    SAVING OUR RAINFOREST 

    In respect to our Rainforrestrest design, EART & Co. back One Tree Planted which oak with amazing Reforestation Organizations around the world that have been planting trees with a proven track record. Every dollar donated plants one tree.

    They plant in four regions around the world - North America, Latin America, Asia and Africa. With further support there is no reason their geographical coverage cannot grow. 10% of all proceeds towards our Rainforest watches will be directed to this cause.

    STOP GLOBAL WARMING 

    Uniform Concerned Scientist and engineers develop ad implement innovative, practical solutions to some of our planet’s most pressing problems, including Climate Change. They rely on individuals like you for ending and we at EART & Co. dedicate our Climate Watch Design toward this cause.

    There are many ways to contribute daily on our own to improve our current conditions and we see this as just one more opportunity to make a difference. 10% of all proceeds towards our Climate watches will be directed to this cause.

     

    Unisex Lava Stone Bracelets of 3 causes

     

    45 mm | Black | Oceans | Rainforest | Global

    42 mm | Rose Gold | Oceans | Rainforest | Global

    MADE WITH LOVE

     

    Risks & Challenges

    With your help we are able to officially submit our automatic watches into production. With this first major order, we estimate 3 months to deliver after the campaign is complete and it is our promise to fulfill your purchase as fast as possible without hindering our intent to produce a high quality product. Thank you for your patience and belief in Eart.

    For any questions regarding your reservation and order please do not hesitate to contact the Eart team.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you believe in our story and mission yet are unable to make a purchase, that is okay! We would greatly appreciate you sharing EART to friends and family whether personally or through social media. This is the first step to a fantastic journey to make a difference while creating a beautiful product.

    Also, visit our website www.EartCo.com and click the "Things we can do TODAY" tab for ideas how to be more environmentally conscience. 

     

    E-mail eart4cause@gmail.com if you order a package deal to specify which watches/causes you want or for any questions!

Thank you for your patience and belief in Eart.
For any questions regarding your reservation and order please do not hesitate to contact the Eart team.

Other Ways You Can Help
If you believe in our story and mission yet are unable to make a purchase, that is okay! We would greatly appreciate you sharing EART to friends and family whether personally or through social media. This is the first step to a fantastic journey to make a difference while creating a beautiful product.
Also, visit our website www.EartCo.com and click the "Things we can do TODAY" tab for ideas how to be more environmentally conscience. 
 
E-mail eart4cause@gmail.com if you order a package deal to specify which watches/causes you want or for any questions!

story:
Mawu Eyewear came about when two friends who had their own unique outlooks on life, shared the same desire to live audaciously and on their own terms. Greg, borderline reckless, challenged the conventional norm, and started a skate brand called Peg. Marsh, a bit more cautious, started flying helicopters in Africa. So starting a global sunglasses business would be easy. Not really, but they did it anyway.

Today Mawu has 4 warehouses located across the globe in the USA, UK, Australia and South Africa.

Mawu sunglasses are handcrafted with acetate; a natural plant based material – the highest quality material for eyeglasses. This material is comfortable to wear, feels good and looks even better. 

Acetate is strong, lightweight and highly flexible, which means the shades can be shaped and reshaped for the perfect fit. Oh, and it’s also made from renewable materials. Our metal frames are electroplated stainless steel, made to withstand life on the go. Nobody wants flimsy shades when they're living audaciously.

Check out our video on how to reshape your Mawu sunglasses - because every face is unique.

Our CR39 Polarized lenses provide 400 UVA + UVB protection, enhancing visibility, reducing sun glare and blocking out harmful UV rays from the sun.

We create eyewear for the audacious. But who are the audacious? It’s those people who are willing to tell their story their way, through living a life of epic experiences.

From hitch hiking through Africa, cliff jumping in the Philippines, kayaking with whales in Alaska to shredding the streets on your board or creating art in your city – Mawu wants to experience these moments with you. Mawu provides you with supreme quality polarized sunglasses, which enhance the colors and details of your surroundings, allowing you to live audaciously.

We've created a whole range of different styles to suit all kinds of audacious lifestyles and personalities. While anyone can enjoy the supreme quality and unique style of Mawu eyewear, wearers can enjoy a distinctive product that is not owned by everyone on the street. Because not everyone is unique.

We are offering you outrageous prices on our current range, which is warehoused and ready to ship across 5 locations around the globe. 

We've done all the hard work, but now we need you...

We're almost there...

We don’t want to be like other luxury sunglasses brands, or even try and appeal to everyone like them. We only want to live alongside the audacious.

We've done everything we can to build an epic product — now we need you to join us in the next chapter of our journey.

How can you help?

Back us by supporting our Indiegogo campaign and choosing a style of our epic shades at a smashing once off offer. We'll deliver your shades before Christmas free of charge.

Sign up for our Influencer Program

Help us get the word out there by sharing our story and tagging @mawu_eyewear in your posts. If you're one of those people who loves to over hashtag, we've got some for you: #mawueyewear #liveaudacious #indiegogo #livelessboring 

Content Creators

Mawu has gone on to collaborate with worldwide designers, photographers, videographers and influencers – helping them to create their own destiny and step out of the ordinary.

Share your Mawu moments with us.

 

SHARE LINKS

story:
Meet Prisca Nnko

She is a self-taught Tanzanian designer who learned her craft by watching online tutorial videos and improving her artistry one bag at a time. She started out on a very old second-hand sewing machine and quickly learned different techniques to handle the kitenge (African printed textile) and turn it into colourful and affordable bags for everyday use. Prisca is the only designer in her family. This means that she makes decisions about her craft alone. She invests what she earns to improve her infrastructure and to steadily grow her range of products. She has accumulated significant tacit knowledge over the past years and is looking forward to exchange her experience with other designers. 

 

Mini cross-body bag

 

What is Prislo?

Prislo is Prisca’s line of beautiful handbags. After 2 years in the making, Prislo now includes 8 types of bags for everyday life. From her signature colourful backpack to her functional double-sided tote, Prisca dedicates long hours to manufacturing each bag herself. 

Prislo is handmade, simple and functional. The prints are carefully selected and there is a conscious intention behind the colours and textures of each bag.

Her bags have so far been sold to clients at various venues and events in Dar es Salaam, as well as in Germany and Canada.

 

Ipad sleeves

 

What do we want to achieve?

With your support, we want Prisca to gain more experience making bags with other designers in Europe. We want her to travel to Germany for 2 months to visit bag companies, look at their infrastructure, and exchange with other designers and manufacturers. She will also share with the European designers her sensibility for colour and patterns. It’s important that Prisca learns more about quality control early on and identifies the machinery that will help her work more efficiently.

Your help will contribute to 2 main goals:

  • Goal 1 >>> To improve Prisca’s technical skills and influence her design with new ideas, and patterns while in Germany
  • Goal 2 >>> To gain new entrepreneurial skills that will help her grow her business in Tanzania.
  • Goal 3 >>> Networking: To establish relationships and grow her clientele internationally while she consolidates and grows her business in Tanzania

 

What we need

We need €3,500 to allow Prisca to travel to Germany for 2 months (mid-June through mid August 2018). This amount will be used to purchase her roundtrip flights and to cover all related expenses such as visa and health insurance. This sum also includes the cost associated with her stay in Germany such as accommodation, local transportation and food allowance. Prisca will self-fund 10% of the total amount donated. She has already invested in her line of products, your contribution will boost her effort and help her gain more experience locally and abroad.

 

What you get 

You get our heartfelt gratitude and some selected perks described on the right.

  1. Decide which perk you like and click on it
  2. Fill in your shipment description
  3. The estimated delivery is between June and July while Prisca is in Europe

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot support Prisca monetarily, then please help us spread the word. Maybe someone you know might be interested in meeting Prisca, introduce her to other designers, suggest visiting an interesting store, etc...? We encourage you to use the Indiegogo share tools as well.

story:
Summary

3rd World Wide is an organization that was created to empower the small artisans of Guatemala. We have a goal of alleviating poverty through sustainable means. We will search out talented artisans in third-world countries and help them scale their businesses, increase revenue, and create safe and desirable jobs. A portion of 3WW's profits will be donated to a fund supporting even more local entrepreneurs.  We will start the venture in beautiful Guatemala with a team of talented Jade and Silver artisans.

What We Need & What You Get

This is only phase one of many to come. With this initial round of funding we plan on funding travel and business expenses. We will connect with our contacts in Guatemala and help them set up a sustainable product channel from Guatemala to the rest of the world. In exchange for your much-needed support, we will send you beautiful, hand-crafted jewelry made by our partners in Guatemala

The Impact

Contributing to this project is huge. You will be helpings hundreds if not thousands of impoverished families by giving them something sustainable. The artisans will be able to greatly increase the income needed to support their families. Safe, sustainable jobs will be created, and together we can strengthen these impoverished communities from the inside-out. 

Risks & Challenges

There are always risks involved. Getting products from third world areas can be difficult, but we are willing to do what it takes. Why? Because we believe that every little bit counts. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate to the cause or purchase our beautiful, hand-crafted goods, help spread the word! Share our story on social media, tell your mom, heck even tell your grandma! Everyone deserves to be apart of this!

story:
Civvies is an apparel brand with a purpose and mission to give back to our veterans - one piece of clothing at a time.  

My biggest fans

Mission

Our mission is to honor our veterans by bringing their service uniforms to the front and center of our designs. We believe military uniforms are priceless and something to be treasured. Each uniform has a different story, but all have been worn by individuals with the same core values of honor, courage and commitment. Civvies offers a unique opportunity to wear high-quality apparel, designed with a piece of history while supporting our veterans. Our apparel is designed with military uniforms actually worn by men and women during their service to our great nation. 10% of each sale is donated to benefit our Veterans.    

Our message is a call for everyone to recognize and thank our heroes and their families for their sacrifices. Help us give back a little to those who gave us a lot.

Upcycling uniforms on pocket tees

Who We Are

We are average Americans who appreciate the sacrifices and enjoy the freedom made possible by our men and women in uniform. We are not veterans but this doesn’t stop us from doing our part to support those who wore the uniforms. We understand that the privilege to wear a uniform must be earned, and that’s why we pay homage to each member of the service who wore the uniform. We are not attempting to allow those who have not served to be imposters. We deeply respect every service member’s sacrifice and have taken great care to ensure each piece is selected to pay tribute to military service, not replicate it. Our mission is to get everyone involved, give back and support our veterans while looking stylish doing it.

Why we do it

Simply, because we care. We believe it is a great way to connect with our veterans by reusing their uniforms on high-quality apparel. It's our way of giving back.

Steve Vargas, a Veteran, twice elected council member, and congressional candidate, donated his uniform.

How we will do it

• Create a community: We want to hear from our veterans. We will work on connecting with our veterans, ask them to share their stories and/or send us their uniforms to be used for our apparel.

• Collect uniforms: We found out that a lot of used uniforms sadly end up where they don’t belong - thrown away, in the bottom of closets, collecting dust in the garage, etc. These uniforms and who wore them need to be recognized for their service.

• Upcycle and design: We will start with tees and hats and subsequently begin to develop our brand through further designs and apparel offerings. The uniforms will be the front and center of our brand.

• Give back: This is most important and the reason we want to do this. We are committed to the health, safety and welfare of all veterans, so 10% of all sales will be donated to support veterans. Each month we will select one of our heroes' story to publish and showcase it with every purchase. Ten percent of sales for that month will go to his or her choice of charity (a list of the leading service provider organizations that will be determined once our brand is funded).

Thus far

We have received enormous support from veterans and are excited about the future. To date, we’ve produced t-shirts and trucker hats. We have already tested materials, designs and suppliers and we’ve developed a website to start our mission. We have a good start but we still have a long way to go.

Below are the reward styles:

Styles For Him

Honor Pocket Tee

Freedom Flag Tee

Heritage Flag Tee

Styles For Her

Honor Pocket Tee

Freedom Flag Tee

Heritage Flag Tee

Pledge Tank

 

Legacy Trucker Hat

for Him & Her

 

Going forward 

The funds will be used for: 

  • Producing our initial collection line of tees and hats 
  • Developing our brand through further designs and apparel offerings 
  • Developing a professional website for our community, including e-commerce 
  • Deploying our online marketing strategy

Note: The 10% is built in to our business model. Your backing will indirectly support our veterans by allowing us to build a larger platform to make this 10% have a great future impact.

Risks and challenges

If we can meet our goal, we can quickly scale the message and shirts through our online advertising strategy. Civvies relies on small suppliers and craftsmen, so if we receive a lot of orders we could experience a slight slowdown in order to scale up the production process. Also, our production might be limited as each shirt is made with reused uniforms, so each shirt ordered is custom-made and will vary based on materials/uniforms available.

Thank you for checking out our campaign! This is a leap of faith for us, but we are confident in the potential impact and are excited for the opportunity to embark on this journey with you all. Check out our rewards for ways to support our movement. We appreciate you taking the time and hope you leave this page inspired to give back a little to those who gave us a lot!

story:
Who am I?

 

I am Andrei Diaconu, the founder and owner of Armilla Watch Bands Ltd. Originally from a small town in Romania called Clinceni, I moved to England in the autumn of 2016 at the age of 21. My journey in England began with a backpack,  £250 in my wallet and all kinds of odd jobs such as forklift driver, warehouse operative, cleaner and working night shifts at a supermarket until eventually becoming Hub Delivery Manager at a DIY store. Why the U.K.?  Because I love the country, I love the culture and I consider it the right place for my two passions: entrepreneurship and watches.

 

The Aero-Ballistic collection

 

The Aero-Ballistic collection is inspired by aviation and the G10's original use in the British Army. As a homage to the environment, we chose nature-inspired colour themes.

  

 

Technical Specifications:

 

The Armilla G10 NATO watch straps feature a luxurious look and feel while maintaining the extreme durability and performance of a military type watch band. We use high-quality nylon with a soft and silk-like feel for improved comfort on the wrist and premium hardware made of 316L stainless steel with a flying keeper for optimal adjustment. We chose round holes for our straps in order to prevent the fabric from fraying and we cut the sizing holes and the ends of the straps using lasers; this helps to create a much smoother finish. The total length of the strap is 325mm, making it the perfect size for any wrist. With a thickness of 1.4mm, the strap can be easily tucked under any type of watch case thanks to the softness and flexibility of the material. It is available for 18mm, 20mm, 22mm, and 24mm lug width. And lastly, we use Ballistic weave. Ballistic nylon was developed by the DuPont corporation as a material for flak jackets to be worn by World War II airmen. The term ballistic nylon originates in the fabric's intended function, protecting its wearers from flying debris and fragmentation caused by bullet and artillery-shell impacts.

 

  • Premium hardware
  • Soft & silk-like nylon for improved comfort
  • Laser-cutting technology for the sizing holes & ends
  • Flying keeper for a perfect adjustment
  • Ballistic weave for extreme durability
  • Length: 325mm - perfect for any wrist size
  • Thickness: 1.4mm
  • Width: 18mm, 20mm, 22mm and 24mm

 

 

Why Your Support Is Important & What Is Next

 

By supporting our project you will help us to create high-quality watch straps and to develop new products based on your feedback. You will also contribute to the local economy by supporting not just our business but also the partners we collaborate with. 

We are set on starting our own manufacturing in the United Kingdom using high-quality British nylon and special types of cotton and linen materials that are fully certified to ISO 9001:2008. We are also in the process of developing a new kind of clasp system for this type of straps. Our aim is to revolutionise the whole concept of a G10 NATO watch band. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

We are ready to start full production, everything is set. All that is left is you and for that, we have tailored great perks available only for the duration of the campaign.

 

 

Additional questions? 

Contact us at sales@armillawatchbands.com 

Facebook and Instagram @ArmillaStraps

story:
Inspiration

The founder of Isla Footwear was inspired by her late Grandmother who had a pair or shoes for every occasion -  Red and Green for Christmas, Watermelon Print for a Picnic, Stars and Stripes for Fourth of July...


The founder worked with a Footwear Design Team featuring Product Design Experts from University of Washington Design School to develop the perfect sandal - all Isla Footwear sandals have the classic eco-friendly natural Mexican leather soles, only the tops are available for customization and interchangeability. 

Isla Footwear Advantages

-Perfectly Customizable

-Interchangeable 

-Ethically Sourced

story:
Sustainable Glam 15in1 Leave-in Conditioner Hair Mask Detangler

To purchase visit Sustainableglam.com | Amazon.com

Certified Organic Ingredients | Vegan | Cruelty Free | Recyclable & Sustainable Bottles Made From Sugarcane

Amazing leave-in mask detangler for the thickest to even the finest hair [For all hair types]. Our carefully selected active ingredients work together to give soft, smooth, frizz free hair.

At Sustainable Glam we make every decision thinking what is best for our customers as well as this world we live in.  When we began crafting Sustainable Glam we set out to not only look for the best ingredients worldwide but to also look for the best available sustainable packaging that would work with our product.

We are a boutique family-owned luxury hair care company and it is our hope that with our 18 years of expertise in the professional hair care industry we can play a part and inspire needed change within our industry.

 

INTRODUCING 15in1 BENEFITS LEAVE-IN MASK DETANGLER

 

 

If you are looking for a great leave-in mask detangler from the thickest to even the finest hair, look no further than 15in1 Benefits Leave-in Spray Mask Detangler. Most leave-ins are heavy and weigh hair down. You no longer have to sacrifice volume to get the conditioning benefits of a leave-in mask detangler. Our carefully selected active ingredients work together to give soft, smooth, frizz-free hair with tons of body and shine!

The first product launching in our brand shows why we are unique. It will not only showcase our carefully selected certified organic ingredients, amazing luxurious fragrance and the performance this product brings the moment you spray it on your hair, but also our recyclable sustainable bottle made of sugarcane bioplastic.

​Back our product and help us get it to market! You will not only get it at an incredible price, but you will be one of the first to try it.

 

INGREDIENTS

 

 

Our goal when crafting our product formula is to not only use top certified organic ingredients but also use ingredients that do not sacrifice product performance but rather enhance it. 

This is why we took great care when selecting our ingredients with the help of some of the top hair care formulators in Italy.  Since our product is made in Italy, it also conforms with stricter cosmetic standards of the European Community.

No Petrolatum | No Phthalates | No Mineral Oil | No Parabens | No Colorants | No Palm Oil | No Sulfates | No Lanolin | No Gluten | No GMO | Cruelty Free | Vegan

 

SUSTAINABLE BOTTLES MADE FROM SUGARCANE

 

 

Sugarcane is an example of a versatile and renewable crop that can be used as a clean source of energy and as a raw material for production of multiple products. Cultivation of sugarcane utilized in the production of sugarcane polyethylene captures carbon dioxide (CO2) and releases oxygen (O2). From a life-cycle perspective, every ton of sugarcane bioplastic used in the production of Sustainable Glam packaging equates to 3.09 tons of CO2 captured from the atmosphere. In comparison, traditional polyethylene uses fossil  fuel sourced raw materials such as oil or natural gas.

By using bottles made with bioplastic made from ethanol, a renewable and sustainable raw material produced from sugarcane, we are able to deliver improved sustainability and reduce our overall carbon footprint.

 

 

In addition, sugarcane bioplastic is fully recyclable through post-consumer recycling channels of traditional plastics.

This is part of our broader commitment to a more circular economy as well as more sustainable solutions for society as a whole.

 

 

FRAGRANCE

We challenged one of the top perfume house in France to formulate a fragrance that could captivate and lift the senses and emotions the moment you spray it on your hair. Our unique fragrance notes are shown above.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Join us to make a change together and help us bring Sustainable Glam to market.

The funds will go into final production and shipping. 

 

The Impact

At Sustainable Glam we truly believe sustainability is an evolving journey as well as an ultimate goal. We also believe you should not sacrifice performance for certified organic ingredients and sustainability. They should all be together as one to create a Sustainable Glam beauty brand that not only reflects our lifestyle but also our values.

It is a delicate and hard-to-achieve balance between performance, cost, environmental responsibility, and most importantly consumer support. Join us in this evolving journey to be at the forefront of a new Sustainable Glam world!

For more info visit our website: SustainableGlam.com

 

Risks & Challenges

With our team’s vast experience with producing professional hair care products and with our experienced manufacturing partner, it makes us confident in our production schedule for Sustainable Glam 15in1 Benefits Leave-in Mask Detangler.

To avoid potential delays, we have already confirmed with our manufacturing partner the production schedule.  Delays with shipping and customs can occur. However, we have already started to plan with our freight forwarder so everything is well coordinated and avoid any possible delays.

If any unexpected problem arise we will keep our backers updated and informed about how we are solving the issue. We are excited to bring Sustainable Glam to the world and we truly thank you for your support!

Updates

Please check our updates section to get all our updates on our product production timeline. Latest update March 11, 2020 filled bottles are coming out of production line... 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Help us spread the word in social media! Help us reach our goal so we can bring to market a better option in beauty hair care that will not only leave your hair feeling amazing, but will also be good for you and the planet.

 

Website: SustainableGlam.com

Follow us and share on:  Instagram | Facebook | Twitter | TikTok | Pinterest

Canada Shipments see FAQ's
