Certified Organic Ingredients | Vegan | Cruelty Free | Recyclable & Sustainable Bottles Made From Sugarcane
Amazing leave-in mask detangler for the thickest to even the finest hair [For all hair types]. Our carefully selected active ingredients work together to give soft, smooth, frizz free hair.
At Sustainable Glam we make every decision thinking what is best for our customers as well as this world we live in.  When we began crafting Sustainable Glam we set out to not only look for the best ingredients worldwide but to also look for the best available sustainable packaging that would work with our product.
We are a boutique family-owned luxury hair care company and it is our hope that with our 18 years of expertise in the professional hair care industry we can play a part and inspire needed change within our industry.
 
INTRODUCING 15in1 BENEFITS LEAVE-IN MASK DETANGLER
 

 
If you are looking for a great leave-in mask detangler from the thickest to even the finest hair, look no further than 15in1 Benefits Leave-in Spray Mask Detangler. Most leave-ins are heavy and weigh hair down. You no longer have to sacrifice volume to get the conditioning benefits of a leave-in mask detangler. Our carefully selected active ingredients work together to give soft, smooth, frizz-free hair with tons of body and shine!
The first product launching in our brand shows why we are unique. It will not only showcase our carefully selected certified organic ingredients, amazing luxurious fragrance and the performance this product brings the moment you spray it on your hair, but also our recyclable sustainable bottle made of sugarcane bioplastic.
​Back our product and help us get it to market! You will not only get it at an incredible price, but you will be one of the first to try it.
 
INGREDIENTS
 

 
Our goal when crafting our product formula is to not only use top certified organic ingredients but also use ingredients that do not sacrifice product performance but rather enhance it. 
This is why we took great care when selecting our ingredients with the help of some of the top hair care formulators in Italy.  Since our product is made in Italy, it also conforms with stricter cosmetic standards of the European Community.
No Petrolatum | No Phthalates | No Mineral Oil | No Parabens | No Colorants | No Palm Oil | No Sulfates | No Lanolin | No Gluten | No GMO | Cruelty Free | Vegan
 
SUSTAINABLE BOTTLES MADE FROM SUGARCANE
 

 
Sugarcane is an example of a versatile and renewable crop that can be used as a clean source of energy and as a raw material for production of multiple products. Cultivation of sugarcane utilized in the production of sugarcane polyethylene captures carbon dioxide (CO2) and releases oxygen (O2). From a life-cycle perspective, every ton of sugarcane bioplastic used in the production of Sustainable Glam packaging equates to 3.09 tons of CO2 captured from the atmosphere. In comparison, traditional polyethylene uses fossil  fuel sourced raw materials such as oil or natural gas.
By using bottles made with bioplastic made from ethanol, a renewable and sustainable raw material produced from sugarcane, we are able to deliver improved sustainability and reduce our overall carbon footprint.
 

 
In addition, sugarcane bioplastic is fully recyclable through post-consumer recycling channels of traditional plastics.
This is part of our broader commitment to a more circular economy as well as more sustainable solutions for society as a whole.
 
 
FRAGRANCE

We challenged one of the top perfume house in France to formulate a fragrance that could captivate and lift the senses and emotions the moment you spray it on your hair. Our unique fragrance notes are shown above.
 

What We Need & What You Get
Join us to make a change together and help us bring Sustainable Glam to market.
The funds will go into final production and shipping. 
 

The Impact
At Sustainable Glam we truly believe sustainability is an evolving journey as well as an ultimate goal. We also believe you should not sacrifice performance for certified organic ingredients and sustainability. They should all be together as one to create a Sustainable Glam beauty brand that not only reflects our lifestyle but also our values.
It is a delicate and hard-to-achieve balance between performance, cost, environmental responsibility, and most importantly consumer support. Join us in this evolving journey to be at the forefront of a new Sustainable Glam world!
For more info visit our website: SustainableGlam.com
 

Risks & Challenges
With our team’s vast experience with producing professional hair care products and with our experienced manufacturing partner, it makes us confident in our production schedule for Sustainable Glam 15in1 Benefits Leave-in Mask Detangler.
To avoid potential delays, we have already confirmed with our manufacturing partner the production schedule.  Delays with shipping and customs can occur. However, we have already started to plan with our freight forwarder so everything is well coordinated and avoid any possible delays.
If any unexpected problem arise we will keep our backers updated and informed about how we are solving the issue. We are excited to bring Sustainable Glam to the world and we truly thank you for your support!
Updates
Please check our updates section to get all our updates on our product production timeline. Latest update March 11, 2020 filled bottles are coming out of production line... 



 


Other Ways You Can Help

Help us spread the word in social media! Help us reach our goal so we can bring to market a better option in beauty hair care that will not only leave your hair feeling amazing, but will also be good for you and the planet.
 
Website: SustainableGlam.com
Follow us and share on:  Instagram | Facebook | Twitter | TikTok | Pinterest
Canada Shipments see FAQ's

story:
Why choose between fashion vs function?

Traveling doesn’t have to mean pulling out the cargo shorts from the back of your drawer or wearing that bulky jacket you bought 10 years ago that you only use for international flights.

Own the jacket that’s not only great for travel...but one you’d want to wear year-round. 

 

No matter how you travel, be the alpha.

Alpha Jacket is perfect for the forgetful traveler, the chic business exec, or the wandering nomad. 

Durable, fashionable, and with convenient pockets designed for everyday use.

The fashionable travel jacket built not just for a comfortable flight, but a comfortable adventure.

You don’t want 100 features that lead to awkward bulges and bulky pockets.

You just want what you need.

  •  Reduce your stress: Sleep better in transit with our comfortable (and detachable) memory foam neck pillow. The jacket will keep you cozy and warm on those cold long flights.
 
  •  Turn heads on the tarmac instead of turning into a fashion-disaster: Fashion-forward, utilitarian, and high-quality materials. Detachable hood turns the jacket into a bomber perfect for everyday city use.
  •  Have everything you need that’s essential to a fun trip - keep your wallet handy, your passport safe, and your AirPods at the ready for those loud talkers (and heavy snorers).

For everyday commuting & long extended trips

Exactly what you need for a great adventure.

 
  •  Detachable hood & ergonomic memory foam neck pillow- Easily remove the pillow after sleeping. Detach the entire hood to transform the jacket into a bomber.
     
  •  Secure pockets - Stop fretting about losing the thing that’s hardest to replace
  •  Power Bank Pocket - Keep your phone charged and never miss another perfect moment.
  •  Slim-view water bladder - For hikes, biking, or long walks down the riviera
  •  Secure keys pocket - Don’t get locked out of your rental
     

Three EASY steps to support this project

1. Choose the perk that best fits your needs.

2. Complete Payment Information.

3. CONGRATS! You're done for now. All details like colors, sizes, shipping information and add-on specifics will be collected via survey after this campaign has ended. 

The highest quality, the best design

We are excited to offer 5 stylish colors!

 

We spent months testing and sourcing the most durable and high-quality materials we could find — all while keeping the jacket at a great price. 

  • Waterproof and wind-resistant to keep you dry and warm
  • Reflective piping for safety and visibility.
  • Ergonomic, integrated neck pillow made with advanced memory foam or beads. Your choice. :)
     
  • Detachable hood to transform the jacket into a bomber.
  • Concealed, waterproof, and highly durable YKK zippers that won’t easily fall off track.
     

PinFin has partnered with one of the top apparel manufacturers in Vietnam. Along with sourcing our fabric, embellishments, and zippers directly from the suppliers. No middlemen! We have dialed in our lead time and are excited to start our first production run. 

The inspiration behind the jacket

Dan, the founder of PinFin, travels a lot with his wife.  

On their first trip together she forgot her neck pillow.

It made it hard to sleep and they both arrived unrested and exhausted, unable to enjoy the day.

It didn’t help that current travel neck pillows are big, bulky and are a pain to carry around. They are the pinnacle of “useful yet ugly” products.

So Dan thought - why don’t we come up with a way to easily sleep and look good on the trip? 

The idea quickly evolved, focusing in on the key principles of design as simple and beautiful.

Pinfin was created, centered around our vision to create innovative, useful, and fashionable wear that has infinite uses. 

 

Dan and his wife Linh have spent the last two years building the Alpha jacket. Sourcing every component directly from every source. They have partnered with one of the top apparel manufacturers in Vietnam. A passionate couple, eager to deliver you the best travel jacket on the market, promises to maintain a consistent and transparent line of communication to their loyal backers.

Support their project today and be one of the first to travel like an Alpha. 

Press ⌘C to copy

Save

story:
Meet ALGARA.

The missing piece of your stylish wardrobe, but not for long.

Tired of finding jewelry to match your outfit? ALGARA is where fashion meets creativity, right in the palm of your hands. Wireless, wearable and a palette of whimsical colors to match. Now you can wear any color you want, any look of the season, ALGARA has got you covered.

What is ALGARA?

This is THE new-generation of wearable, smart jewelry you’ve been waiting for!

ALGARA is a high-fashion jewelry brand with a visionary interchangeable concept that gives every fashion-loving woman, the endless possibility to mix and match jewelry with everyday looks for every season.

The Core Concept

The heart of this smart jewelry concept begins with the iconic ALGARA core, made of the highest-quality White Jade stone and encased in an 18K gold plated O-Mount. Inside the stone core, our patent pending wireless technology syncs with our Mobile App to charge up your smart jewelry, change the core’s color to match your dress or beat to the rhythm of music playing. Become your own fashion designer, all in the palm of your hands.

Coordinate Your Outfit

Everywhere you look, color plays a vital role in fashion. From your outfit, shoes, bags to the jewelry you wear, all because colors define your style at the first impression and even your mood. What if ALGARA gives you the creative palette to define what colors your jewelry should be in just a few seconds?


Color Match Your Jewelry 

All you have to do is take a photo with the ALGARA Mobile App on your smartphone device. Define the color you love (in the photo) and the stone core changes to that exact color in real-time. 


Infinite Possibilities, Powerful Customizations

Fashion is creativity, and the creativity of ALGARA is inspired by you. This is why unlike any other wearable technology out there, we’ve customized ALGARA to become your personal reflection of style.

Taking photos on a smartphone is such an integral part of our lifestyle today, so why not change the way you look with each photo you take?

In just a few seconds, the color of the White Jade core can be customized by syncing it to any color from a photo or outfit. What’s left is to pick the right jewelry accessory to “swap and snap” to the smart stone core. 


How to wear your ALGARA

Step 1 

Launch the ALGARA app.

Take a photo of what you’re going to wear for the day or an object with the color you love.

Step 2

In a few simple clicks, change the color of your ALGARA stone core with the same pixel-perfect color selected from the photo taken.

Step 3

Swap or snap on the designer accessory (i.e. bracelet band, hairpin or necklace) to the ALGARA core, and you’re all set!


Infinite Possibilities

The perfect way to customize your look.

We have plans to expand the collection of ALGARA accessories (in the second quarter of 2015), so make space in your jewelry dresser!

If there’s an accessory you must have with your ALGARA, join our growing community of jewelry designers and share your idea with us today.

Fashion Forward

When you’re hard at work, looking good shouldn’t become a task too. Take the fuss out of being fashionable with this new generation of smart jewelry. Packed with awesome features to color sync your ALGARA core to any color you fancy, stay tuned to more surprises and improvements in store on the ALGARA collection. It’s the smartest choice you’ll have to make in the name of fashion. 

Truly Smart

With Bluetooth 4.0 connectivity, ALGARA is simply the most advanced fashion jewelry you can show off today. ALGARA is so smart, it can be set to change with the time, ambient noise, your body movements or by ambient light. Readily integrated with your iPhone and Android devices, ALGARA is truly the smart jewelry you’ve been waiting for!

The Structure of the Algara with 3D drawing

Wireless Power Charging

Forget about messing around with cables when you can enjoy the ease of wirelessly charging anytime, anywhere and automatically via Bluetooth. Every ALGARA system comes with its own wireless power charger and USB cable. Simply connect the charger to a power source, pop out the stone core from the O-Mount casing and place it on the inductive charger. The stone core will be fully charged overnight or if you prefer, set your ALGARA to charge wirelessly while still wearing it. 

Structure of the charging pad

Demo of How to charge Algara

Perks

Certifications

ALGARA is designed for all Bluetooth Low Energy v4.0 mobile devices. The system will initially have the following certifications while we continue to increase more capabilities of the unit.

  1. FCC Part 15
  2. CE Radio Frequency
  3. Bluetooth 


BUT WAIT, THERE’S EVEN MORE…


Apple Watch

To view features right from your wristwatch, we’ve been working hard to seamlessly integrate the ALGARA Mobile App interface with Apple Watch. More announcements will be made once this app feature is ready. To stay informed, please visit our website at myalgara.com and sign up for timely updates. 



Quality, Style & Patent Technology



Dimension


Tech Specs

Dimensions

Moon Stone Core

 Dimension: 35 mm x 35mm x 19mm
 Weight: around 100.00 ct.

System Requirements

Supporting operating systems

iOS 7/8

Android 4.4 to 5.1

Compatibility

iOS and Android devices

Certification

FCC Part 15
CE Radio Frequency
Bluetooth 4.0

Wireless power charger

DC 5V 1A by USB

Connections

Bluetooth Low Energy version 4.0

Temperature range

0 to 40 degree Celsius

Battery type

Built-in Rechargeable Lithium-Ion

Warranty

1 year standard

For more information, please refer to the service manual of your ALGARA package

Algara's Smart Journey

From design to prototypes and now testing, we have certainly come a long way. With your help, we’re excited to lead this next evolution in electronic fashion jewelry design.

Where We Stand

After more than 12 months of hard work, we have finally completed the design phase and are in the process of completing all technical testing requirements. Since ALGARA is packed with so many features we can’t wait to include, we’re taking the time to test more features out before handing the specs over to our manufacturer. We are definitely proud of the progress we’ve made this year and can’t wait to get the ALGARA to you by the scheduled delivery timeline of April 2015. 

Help Make Fashion History

We are turning to the Indiegogo community for your participation in making fashion history. We are asking this awesome international community to support ALGARA because we have designed it just for you. We want to listen to your feedback, suggestions and source for more ideas because we believe this is all part of the creative process. Besides your help in realizing the contribution goal, any other ideas or input will be greatly appreciated to accelerate and bring this groundbreaking product into mass production.

From drawings to realization, we have partnered up with the best manufacturers in mobile electronic and fashion jewelry, so let’s make history together!

Let’s Work Together

We have spent a great deal of time in research and development, as well as designing the look and feel of the brand. With your help, we aim to provide a better user experience by integrating the app, user interface and develop more features on the ALGARA Mobile App. With more resources for R&D, we can improve and integrate better applications and services to the ALGARA core and collection of designer accessories. We are always open to creative ideas, so please contact us at support@jewelectric.comand tell us how you’ll love to use your ALGARA. 

Meet The Team

The ALGARA team is comprised of jewelry designers with decades of experience, passionate engineers, app developers and marketing professionals. We don’t mean to brag, but if you add up all our years of experience, that comes up to be an impressive century of development experience in gemstone jewelry and consumer electronic design. We mean business when it comes to bringing an evolution of wearable smart jewelry to fashionistas around the world.

  • Oskar Wong, Founder
  • Johnny Chan, Development & Operations
  • Winnie, Jewelry Design
  • Norman Ying, Creative Design

Risks & Challenges

After more than a year, we are now getting ALGARA ready for commercial production.

Extensive testing and experience has prepared the team for challenges during the transfer process. We have plans to mitigate all these risks and have enlisted a brilliant team on our board to provide the essential expertise.

Manufacturing

The most time-consuming step will be tooling. This process is complex and requires time. Most of the budget from contributions will be spent on this stage. With enough resources, complications that emerge can be quickly resolved and prevent delays to the production schedule. To mitigate these risks, we've collaborated with a prolific technical manufacturing partner, who will work closely with the design team throughout the manufacturing process.

Software Application


We still have work to do building all the features we want to include in the ALGARA ecosystem. Software development can be tricky when ideas go wild and we’re trying to pack all these awesome features into a central application system. It’s taking a longer time than expected and that’s why we need your help, alongside our very capable team of software developers. There are risks, but we’ve been managing well, keeping challenges to a minimal level and are on track with our plans.

Change Algara color with Music


New way to social with Algara

Not only changing color

Our winning team is here to make the best product for you and deliver on schedule in October 2015.

FAQ

Here are some quick answers to questions most frequently asked about ALGARA.

We’ll love to hear from you, so please feel free to leave a comment or email us at support@jewelectric.com

What smartphone operating systems, phones and devices will work with ALGARA?

ALGARA is designed to work with both Apple iOS and Google Android operating systems. The system will be fully compatible with all Bluetooth Low Energy compatible smart devices. The ALGARA web application can be accessed via a web browser on a smartphone, tablet, or computer. The ALGARA system also works in unison with Apple Watch and any iOS device to deliver an even better user experience.

What type of battery powers the ALGARA stone core?

A charger truly worthy of your dresser, use the ALGARA wireless power charger to recharge the core’s battery unit anytime, anywhere. The stone core can recharge when placed on this USB power charger unit, or when you wear your ALGARA. 

Is GPS available on the ALGARA System?

Yes, the ALGARA App will tag your location information and sync this to your smartphone.

Are there any countries in which ALGARA will not operate?

The ALGARA System will have all the certifications required by law to operate in the following countries covering:

·  USA (FCC Part 15)

·  Europe (CE)

Am I supposed to manually add shipping and tax?

No, we have taken away the hassle for this by providing FREE international shipping around the world. All taxes are included in the contribution when you back this project.

Where do I input my shipping address?

You will be prompted to enter a shipping address when backing any of the product perks through Indiegogo. We will also contact all backers prior to shipping with an email confirmation of your mailing address in-case you forgot to update us on any changes. If your address will change before we ship your ALGARA jewelry set, please let us know by emailing support@jewelectric.com

I have more questions, how do I get in touch?

We love hearing from you! Please leave a comment on the COMMENT tab at the top of the page, or email us at support@jewelectric.com and we’ll be in touch as soon as we can!

For more information visit:

www.myalgara.com

Work Together

in research and development, as well as designing the look and feel of the
brand. With your help, we aim to provide a better user experience by
integrating the app, user interface and develop more features on the ALGARA
Mobile App. With more resources for R&D, we can improve and integrate
better applications and services to the ALGARA core and collection of designer
accessories. We are always open to creative ideas, so please contact us at support@jewelectric.comand tell us how you’ll love to use your
ALGARA. 
Meet The Team
The ALGARA team is comprised of jewelry designers with
decades of experience, passionate engineers, app developers and marketing
professionals. We don’t mean to brag, but if you add up all our years of
experience, that comes up to be an impressive century of development experience
in gemstone jewelry and consumer electronic design. We mean business when it
comes to bringing an evolution of wearable smart jewelry to fashionistas around
the world.




Oskar Wong, Founder


Johnny Chan, Development & Operations


Winnie, Jewelry Design


Norman Ying, Creative Design


Risks & Challenges
After more than a year, we are now getting ALGARA ready for
commercial production. 
Extensive testing and experience has prepared the team for
challenges during the transfer process. We have plans to mitigate all these
risks and have enlisted a brilliant team on our board to provide the essential
expertise. 
Manufacturing 
The most time-consuming step will be tooling. This process
is complex and requires time. Most of the budget from contributions will be
spent on this stage. With enough resources, complications that emerge can be
quickly resolved and prevent delays to the production schedule. To mitigate
these risks, we've collaborated with a prolific technical manufacturing
partner, who will work closely with the design team throughout the
manufacturing process.
Software Application 




We still have work to do building all the features we want
to include in the ALGARA ecosystem. Software development can be tricky when
ideas go wild and we’re trying to pack all these awesome features into a
central application system. It’s taking a longer time than expected and that’s
why we need your help, alongside our very capable team of software developers.
There are risks, but we’ve been managing well, keeping challenges to a minimal
level and are on track with our plans. 

Change Algara color with Music




New way to social with Algara
Not only changing color


Our winning team is here to make the best product for you
and deliver on schedule in October 2015.FAQ

Here are some quick answers to questions most frequently
asked about ALGARA. 
We’ll love to hear from you, so please feel free to leave a
comment or email us at support@jewelectric.com 
What smartphone operating systems, phones and devices will
work with ALGARA?
ALGARA is designed to work with both Apple iOS and Google
Android operating systems. The system will be fully compatible with all
Bluetooth Low Energy compatible smart devices. The ALGARA web application can
be accessed via a web browser on a smartphone, tablet, or computer. The ALGARA
system also works in unison with Apple Watch and any iOS device to deliver an
even better user experience. 
What type of battery powers the ALGARA stone core?
A charger truly worthy of your dresser, use the ALGARA
wireless power charger to recharge the core’s battery unit anytime, anywhere.
The stone core can recharge when placed on this USB power charger unit, or when
you wear your ALGARA.  
Is GPS available on the ALGARA System?
Yes, the ALGARA App will tag your location information and
sync this to your smartphone.
Are there any countries in which ALGARA will not operate?
The ALGARA System will have all the certifications required
by law to operate in the following countries covering:
·  USA (FCC Part
15)
·  Europe (CE)
Am I supposed to manually add shipping and tax?
No, we have taken away the hassle for this by providing FREE
international shipping around the world. All taxes are included in the
contribution when you back this project. 
Where do I input my shipping address?
You will be prompted to enter a shipping address when
backing any of the product perks through Indiegogo. We will also contact all
backers prior to shipping with an email confirmation of your mailing address
in-case you forgot to update us on any changes. If your address will change
before we ship your ALGARA jewelry set, please let us know by emailing
support@jewelectric.com 
I have more questions, how do I get in touch?
We love hearing from you! Please leave a comment on the
COMMENT tab at the top of the page, or email us at support@jewelectric.com and
we’ll be in touch as soon as we can! 
For more information visit:
www.myalgara.com

story:
MONTAGE is a professionally made, stylish and innovatively designed bag that is made of premium Portuguese cork.  Plenty of pockets, super comfortable straps, and protective metal feet, make this vegan bag and ideal commuting companion. 

Each of our bags sustainably handcrafted one of a kind pieces!  

 

MONTAGE matches with any lifestyle in an on the go world. Whether you are at the office or discovering new destinations, this will be your new favorite bag!

Montage is cleverly constructed for you to be able to hang it over your shoulders as a backpack or carry it around like a handbag or tote bag. In just a matter of seconds, you can easily adjust the bag straps to suit your own lifestyle, effortlessly!  

MONTAGE bag will adapt to your everyday lifestyle with its cleverly located pockets and stylish design. We spent 14 months, designing and redesigning the perfect bag with women in mind first. Whether you are a professional or a student, an adventurer or a traveler, a commuter or a freelancer Montage Bag was made for you. 

Thoughtfully designed interior details will allow you to organize your treasures and access them easily.

Montage bag is super lightweight! It only weights 1.1kg / 2.4lbs. 

Check out this hands-on review of montage with LoWithoutLimits.

it’s a stylish bag that looks beautiful on the outside with quick access pockets. However, we all know that it’s what’s inside that counts. Open the bag’s double zipper pulls to find multiple compartments, interior pockets and specially designed slots for all of your essentials. Slip in your laptop, secure your water bottle and safely store your passport while keeping all your belongings well-organized. No more digging through a bag! 

 

 STRETCH GOAL UNLOCKED:

We heard you loud and clear - Introducing the Montage Wallet, the perfect match for your montage bag. It was designed to carry your phone, keys, cards, cash, and more when you are on the go! 

It will be an add-on of $40 that we will process after the campaign is done through a provided link!

First time backing on Kickstarter? We recorded the video below to make it easier for you.  

Organic cork material in our backpack is as strong, durable and resistant to outside elements as leather is but with the additional advantage of being three times lighter than leather. 

We combine the highest quality materials and the craftsmanship to make our bags so you can proudly carry it around for many years. Montage bags are made to last.

Premium Portuguese cork that we use for our bags, is highly water resistant so it can be worn in the rain with confidence. 

 
 

 We use premium Portuguese cork that is completely organic and ethically harvested. Our vegan leather is about 3 times lighter than leather while it is as durable & resistant as leather. Harvesting the bark from cork tree does not harm the tree (no trees are cut down during the harvesting process), in fact it lets the tree breathe and release more oxygen so it can grow healthier!

After each harvest the Cork tree fully regenerates within 7 to 9 years after harvest. The process extends the life of the tree by 200 years. This wonderful material is completely organic, sustainable, vegan, and eco friendly. 

For every bag you pledge, a tree will be planted through our partner, Kijani Forestry. And we will share every step of this planting progress with our Kickstarter updates.

Organic cork material in our backpack is as strong, durable and resistant to outside elements as leather is but with the additional advantage of being three times lighter than leather. 
We combine the highest quality materials and the craftsmanship to make our bags so you can proudly carry it around for many years. Montage bags are made to last.


Premium Portuguese cork that we use for our bags, is highly water resistant so it can be worn in the rain with confidence. 
  
 We use premium Portuguese cork that is completely organic and ethically harvested. Our vegan leather is about 3 times lighter than leather while it is as durable & resistant as leather. Harvesting the bark from cork tree does not harm the tree (no trees are cut down during the harvesting process), in fact it lets the tree breathe and release more oxygen so it can grow healthier!
Available in three eye-catching colors.
After each harvest the Cork tree fully regenerates within 7 to 9 years after harvest. The process extends the life of the tree by 200 years. This wonderful material is completely organic, sustainable, vegan, and eco friendly. 

For every bag you pledge, a tree will be planted through our partner, Kijani Forestry. And we will share every step of this planting progress with our Kickstarter updates. 

 This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.

story:
Hey there, we're Noire Velvet.

This is our story: the creator has a friend who often complained to her how difficult it was for her to get into regular store and buy a single top or even pants since she wears XL. One day, she decided to go shopping  to get that friend a birthday gift, and even after doing several stores in a very well reknown place in PARIS (CHATELET LES HALLES), she couldn't find any top, dress or even pants that was over L size. She felt desperate and through this event understood and decided to do something about it, and change the way plus size women are left aside by big brands.

As women, we've noticed that it's often difficult to find our size with major clothing brands. As soon as you're considered "plus size", you have to get to a different shop. That's not normal. Women shouldn't be ostracized because of their size. We want all women to have access to the same products, no matter their build.

 

Our garment are not only in wax clothes, we will make regular clothing such as Jeans, velvet fabric, plaine cotton fabric, mix and match items.

What we're offering is a wider sizing chart than the usual ones, from 10 to 22 for the UK and 4 to 18 for the US.


Bonjour ! Nous sommes Noire Velvet.

Voici notre histoire; Djouka a une amie très proche qui lui confiait souvent sa difficulté de trouver un vêtement dans les grands magasins, que ce soit un top fantaisie, une robe ou un pantalon. Lorsqu'elle a voulu acheter un vêtement pour amie qui fait du XL que la créatrice s'est aperçu de la difficulté pour les femmes qui portent des tailles au-delà des tailles L qu'elle a décidé de changer la donne.

En tant que femmes, nous avons remarqué qu'il est souvent difficile de trouver nos tailles parmi les vêtements des plus grandes marques. Dès que nous sommes vues comme "plus size", nous devons en général acheter nos vêtements en ligne ou en magasins spécialisés. Ce n'est pas normal. Les femmes ne devraient pas être "oubliées" par les marques, peu importe leur gabarit.

Nous ne fabriquons pas seulement des vêtemenst en wax, nous proposerons aussi des vêtements dans des tissus en Jeans, velour, tissus unis en coton, et des articles "ensemble" à assortir.

Ce que propose Noire Velvet, c'est une grille de tailles plus large que la plupart, proposant les mêmes vêtements du 36 au 50.

How will we use the money ?

The money we're gonna get through this campain will be used to :

  • Lauch a larger production for our first collection
  • Launch the online store
  • Guarantee a safe storage unit
  • A percentage of the funds will be used for the counterparties

 

  • A quoi servira l'argent ?

L'argent récolté lors de cette campagne servira à :

  • Lancer la production des vêtements en plus grande quantité
  • Créer la plateforme de vente en ligne
  • Garantir un espace de stockage sûr
  • Un pourcentage de la somme récolté sera utilisé pour fabriquer les contreparties.

 

 Quelles contreparties pour vous ?

 

If we don't get what we hoped for...

If, sadly, we can't obtain the whole amount we will have to cut our fundings as following

If we gain 10k: we could  launch half of the production, but the counterparties will be equally dispatched between this amount, we'll launch our product through free online support such as Facebook/instagram.

If we get 17K then you'll help us secure an online specialized web site

If we gain 26k you'd help us in a tremendous way so we can  secure a small local, to stock our products.

In any case, we thank you for your help, love and support, what ever donation you can make will help us make this project come to life.

 

 

Si nous n'atteignons pas notre objectif...

Si par malheur nous n'arrivons pas à atteindre l'objectif voulu, nous nous verrons dans l'obligation de couper nos frais selon le montant:

Si nous obtenons 10k: Nous pourrons lancer la moitié des quantités de la production, les contreparties seront également incluses. Nous utiliserons des plateformes gratuites pour la mise en marché de nos produits tel Facebook et instagram

Si nous obtenons 17k, vous nous aiderez à sécuriser nos ventes par le biais d'un site web marchant professionnelle.

Si nous obtenons 26k, votre aide nous sera des plus précieuses car elle nous permettra de stocker nos produits dans un local sûre, assurée contre les vols et dégradations.

Dans tous les cas, nous vous remercions pour votre aide, votre support et toutes vos paroles d'encouragement, peu importe la somme que vous donnerez, sachez que nous ferons tout en sorte afin que ce projet puisse voir le jour.

 

What impact ?

We're hoping this project will have a true impact on the fashion industry if we manage to reach our goals. The industry keeps discriminating women who don't fit in their mold. Our goal is to break said mold. To allow these women to dress as they want without being guilted or ashamed because another retail store may have sent them in a specific "plus size" area of the shop.

No matter our sizes, it is time to stop this hypocrisy and to accept our shapes, every shapes, without making any difference.

 

Quel impact ?

Nous espérons que ce projet aura un réel impact dans le monde de la mode si nous parvenons à atteindre nos objectifs. Le monde de la monde continue à discriminer les femmes qui ne rentrent pas dans le "moule standardisé". Notre but est de briser ce moule. Permettre à ces femmes de se faire plaisir sans ressentir de culpabilité, de gêne ou de honte car une grande chaîne les aurait habituellement invitées à aller voir le rayon "grande taille", séparé des autres.

Peu importe nos tailles, il est temps de cesser cette hypocrisie et d'accepter nos formes, toutes les formes, sans émettre de distinctions.

Risks and challenges

Our biggest challenge -which also becomes our biggest obstacle- is to manage to convince women that this project was made for them.
We're taught from a very young age that categorizing women by size is normal. It's not always easy to detach from this point of view. A lot of them don't think this change would be useful and won't see the point of projects like ours.

Another risk we're taking is to see our concept taken over by larger brands.

Our major strenghts are the bond we have with our community, and the body positive values we try to spread. We're looking to represent today's women; the ones who know every body is beautiful, and to help them express themselves through their clothing. This project wants to bring a wind of change into the fashion industry, and we actually think we can make it.

We feel up to the challenge because this project is made for women, by women. We've stopped waiting for the industry to make changes to be more adapted to us.

Since this actually has an influence on our lives, we've decided to directly do something instead of waiting for them to listen to us.
We have a skilled team, are surrounded by professionals, all of them competent in their own fields of expertise; whether it's fashion, modeling, production, marketing... They helped us solve problems in the past, and will continue to do so in the future.

 

Risques et défis

Notre plus grand défi -qui devient aussi notre plus grand obstacle- est de parvenir à convaincre les femmes que ce projet est avant tout pour elles.

On nous apprend très tôt qu'il est normal que les femmes soient catégorisées par tailles de vêtements dans les magasins, et il n'est pas toujours facile de se défaire de cette vision des choses. Beaucoup n'estiment pas ce changement nécessaire et ne verront pas forcément l'intérêt de projets comme le nôtre.
Un autre risque existant est celui de revoir notre concept repris par ces mêmes magasins.
Nos forces sont notre proximité avec notre communauté et les valeurs bodypositives qui nous tiennent à coeur.  Nous souhaitons représenter les femmes d'aujourd'hui, celles qui savent que tous les corps sont beaux, et les aider à les mettre en valeur. Ce projet a pour but d'aider à amener un changement dans le monde de la mode, et nous pensons pouvoir y parvenir.

Nous nous sentons à la hauteur des défis qui nous attendent car ce projet est porté par des femmes, pour des femmes. Nous ne devons plus attendre de l'industrie du textile qu'elle prennent en compte nos besoins et nous impose ses standards sans jamais nous consulter. Faire semblant d'être pour nous tout en agissant contre nous ne peut pas marcher bien longtemps.

Etant les premières concernées par cette problématique, nous avons décidé de la prendre à bras le corps et de trouver une solution nous-mêmes.

Nous avons une équipe compétente et sommes entourées de professionnelles, toutes expertes en leur domaine, que ce soit en modélisme, en production ou en marketing. Elles prêtent une attention toute particulière aux problématiques déjà rencontrées et auxquelles nous allons faire face dans le futur.

Who are we ?

Djouka, creator :

She knew early on that she wanted to work in fashion. That's why she started studying as soon as she was able to. She's been working as a production assistant and has been a garment quality controler for 7 years in a small parisian agency.

Anna, community manager :

She heard of the project via Twitter, and was immediatly interested in joining the team. Since she's worked as a CM for several start ups before, her rôle in the company was quickly decided. She's also been working as a screenwriter for 2 years.

 

Qui sommes-nous?

Djouka, la créatrice :
Après le collège, Djouka a toujours su qu'elle souhaitait evoluer dans la mode. C'est pourquoi elle s'est orienté très tôt dans son parcours scolaire dans le monde du textile. Cela fait maintenant 7 ans qu'elle travaille en tant qu'assistante de production et est maintenant responsable qualité dans une petite agence parisienne.

Anna, community manager :

Ayant eu des expériences en community management par le passé, Anna a entendu parler du projet Noire Velvet via twitter, et a rapidement été motivée pour le rejoindre. Elle travaille à côté en tant que scénariste.


    Other ways to help

Even if you can't help us financially, there are other ways to help us get where we want !

  • Share ! We are on twitter (@NoireVelvet), facebook, snapchat and instagram.

 

D'autres façons d'aider

Même si vous ne pouvez pas participer financièrement, il y a d'autres façons de nous aider à atteindre nos objectifs !

  • Partagez ! Nous sommes présentes sur twitter (@NoireVelvet), facebook, snapchat et instagram.

Elles prêtent une attention toute particulière aux problématiques déjà rencontrées et auxquelles nous allons faire face dans le futur.Who are we ?Djouka, creator :She knew early on that she wanted to work in fashion. That's why she started studying as soon as she was able to. She's been working as a production assistant and has been a garment quality controler for 7 years in a small parisian agency.Anna, community manager :She heard of the project via Twitter, and was immediatly interested in joining the team. Since she's worked as a CM for several start ups before, her rôle in the company was quickly decided. She's also been working as a screenwriter for 2 years. Qui sommes-nous?Djouka, la créatrice :Après le collège, Djouka a toujours su qu'elle souhaitait evoluer dans la mode. C'est pourquoi elle s'est orienté très tôt dans son parcours scolaire dans le monde du textile. Cela fait maintenant 7 ans qu'elle travaille en tant qu'assistante de production et est maintenant responsable qualité dans une petite agence parisienne.Anna, community manager :Ayant eu des expériences en community management par le passé, Anna a entendu parler du projet Noire Velvet via twitter, et a rapidement été motivée pour le rejoindre. Elle travaille à côté en tant que scénariste.    Other ways to help
Even if you can't help us financially, there are other ways to help us get where we want !
Share ! We are on twitter (@NoireVelvet), facebook, snapchat and instagram.
 
D'autres façons d'aider
Même si vous ne pouvez pas participer financièrement, il y a d'autres façons de nous aider à atteindre nos objectifs !
Partagez ! Nous sommes présentes sur twitter (@NoireVelvet), facebook, snapchat et instagram.

story:
Our Website has more stuff! www.RebelLoveClothing.com

Every $5 contributed to our campaign will also count towards 1 ticket towards our big thank you prize draw gift pack of 1 skirt, 1 dress and 1 swimsuit, draw takes place live on camera April 15

Welcome to our campaign!

Thanks for visiting our crowd funding campaign, with this campaign we hope to raise funds for launching our Spring Summer collection at the Viva Las Vegas 20 Fashion show and Car booth. These funds will cover the cost of:

1. Flights to Las Vegas

2. Fashion Show Fee

3. Vendor Booth Fee

4. Hotel 

What You Get!

1. Pre-order a selection from of our Spring/Summer Collection (See Below)

2. If you do not see something you love from our pre-orders, but want to support us, all donations made beyond our listed perks will be held as store credit in your name, to be used on any of our items in Spring Summer, or in future collections

ALL PRE-ORDERS ARE LISTED BELOW, AND THEIR "PERKS" ARE LISTED ON THE RIGHT WITH PRODUCT DESCRIPTIONS. PLEASE LET US KNOW IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS

WHOLESALE PRE-ORDERS EMAIL REBELLOVECLOTHING@GMAIL.COM

 Magic Moment Skirts Sizes S-2XL 

(SHIP DATES APRIL 2017) All sizes adjustable by +1 or -1 inch with button, Waist's Measure. S=27", M=29", L=31", XL=33", 2X=35"

Artis Candy Wild https://www.facebook.com/candywild/

Wrangler of Love Print by Candy Weil $87.00CAD(regular price $97.00)

 

Babes of Space Print by Candy Weil $87.00CAD (regular price $97.00)

Tiki Goddess Print by Candy Weil $87.00USD (regular price $97.00)

Snakebite Pants in Black $74.00CAN (regular price $84.00) 

Ship Date will be after Easter Weekend

 

SWIMSUITS! True to size, but fitted to hold you in. Email us with fit questions, RebelLoveClothing@Gmail.com

torso length best for women under 5' 7". Double Sheath front with gather, single fabric back, halter strap, twisted bust detail.

Wrangler of Love Swim Suit Print in Pink by Candy Weil $74.00CAN(regular price $84.00)

See photo at top of campaign in photo carousel 

Spider Web Print Swimsuit $74.00CAN (regular price $85.00)

See photo at top of campaign in photo carousel

Tiger Print Swimsuit $74.00CAN (regular price $84.00)

See photo at top of campaign in photo carousel

Boomerang Print Swimsuit $74.00CAN (regular price $84.00)

See photo at top of campaign in photo carousel

Tiki Goddess Swim Suit Print in Pink by Candy Weil $74.00CAN(regular price $84.00)

See photo at top of campaign in photo carousel

The Flutter Dress S-XL Pre-order $85 CAD reg $95 CAD 

The Flutter Dress is available from S-XL, size chart in campaign story. The flutter dress is starting a buzz! Made of soft and stretchy curve hugging bengaline (Cotton65%/Nylon30%/Elastane5%) Available in Black, the bottom hem features Yellow piping (also in bengaline) and Brooch embellishments on each lapel (removable) with a deep V neckline and center back zipper. please see mock up sample photo in campaign photos at the top of the page

That's it for our selected pre-orders, more items will be available when we launch our collection in April. If you need any additional info, please contact us! RebelLoveClothing@Gmail.com

Can't contribute financially but want to support the brand? it takes only 10 seconds to share this campaign on your facebook page, we promise we are worth it! 

You can also follow us on Facebook: www.Facebook.com/RebelLoveClothing 

And on Instagram! @RebelLoveClothing 

Fall/Winter 2016-17 Items available on our Etsy:

 https://www.etsy.com/ca/shop/rebelloveshop?ref=...

story:
Have you ever thought, what are your clothes made from?

Many materials in your clothes and other household products are not natural. They don't bring you true warmth, comfort, and do not perform their functions. You can't count on them when you need them the most. And during the entire time they bring you only disappointment. Why do you stand it? You deserve the best!

You should wear natural clothes. We believe that it is very important!

We offer only handmade down-filled products, natural from Orenburg down.

Garments and accessories from the wool of the Orenburg goats are made from natural and ecologically clean raw materials grown without the use of chemicals. During their production does not use technologies that pollute the environment and harm human health. The dyes are made only from natural ingredients.

Our mission is that you discover clothes made from natural raw Orenburg materials, and they must be warm and beautiful. 

We want to show you that the distance which divides us, is not a reason to deny yourself in clothing from natural raw materials.

NATURAL. MADE WITH LOVE.

Products from natural Orenburg fluff are the embodiment of tenderness and comfort. They absorbed the warmth of the hands and the kindness of the needlewoman, the softness of our rivers and power of mountains.

Orenburg area has always been famous for knitting shawls from the wool. It is an ancient craft, which originated in the Orenburg region about 250 years ago.

Orenburg goats fluff is the thinnest in the world. Therefore, products made of Orenburg fluff especially gentle and soft. That is why the Orenburg fluff is called “a soft gold”.

However, the fluff is very strong - stronger than wool.

 Orenburg downy goats are unique. On formation of the valuable wool has affected the climate of our region. Winters are strong with winds and hard frosts (fluff to – 400F) and summers are very hot (1040F). This difference of extreme temperatures and climate formed a long, solid, very thin, extremely soft and silky fluff.

Why the clothes from the wool of these unique goats are not spread everywhere?

The problem is that the process of creating this handmade shawl is not fast and difficult.

For the month a knitter can link two webs of medium size or three tippets. The manufacturing of large size scarf or kerchief with pattern or inscription takes a month or more.

The creation process of down products.

We scratch fluff from goats in early February and then in March repeat the procedure with the help of special combs.

Then fluff carefully washed, cleaned and dried, and in the summer all the fluff additionally washed in the waters of the cold mountain river. The water in it is very soft and it gives our fluff even more tenderness.

We knit shawl from a specially-prepared yarn: first, the fluff is scratched and spun a thin, strong thread made of goat down, and then cheat on strings of silk that held its shape. Really warm and lightweight shawl will work only from the correct thread.

And only after that you can start tinkering and bring to life your fantasies.

The final stage is a drying process of down products. For this we use special wooden frames. On the frame put a wet handkerchief, gently stretching the cloth, and left to dry at room temperature. This is one of the most important steps, because if the product does not pull, it is deformed and reduced in size.

Shawl (or scarf) at first doesn't look fluffy. Products start getting fluffy after some time.

Each scarf is an original artwork, which required a lot of creative work and patience. Such scarf  will suite you for years.

The tradition of wholesale we pass from mother to daughter, from generation to generation.

We work with the inspiration, invested in this business all skills and good thoughts.

A natural palette of down — all shades from white, beige, grey to black. But now we have learned how to create products that are not only natural colors but also colored the garments. For this we use special paint for the fluff that won't hurt it.

Our products are for people, who prefer an active way of life in the city. For people who appreciate comfort and convenience. Our customers want to stand out from the crowd and attract the looks. They know that you have a sense of style and charm.

Give a real fluffy shawl to a friend, and that will be his/her most expensive gift.

The product of down could be taken with you to the journey. You should not be afraid of cold evenings. The product does not take up much space in your suitcase but it can really help out. On average, shawl weighs about 200-300 grams, and the tippet weighs less than 100 grams.

 

The garments and celebrities.

Owners of these Orenburg down products are global celebrities, including Fergie. She came on the scene in a white Orenburg shawl during her tour in Moscow.

Another star, which was presented the legendary Orenburg souvenir Madonna.

Hollywood actress Sean Young was also lucky enough to receive this legendary product as a gift.

Montserrat Caballe also has an Orenburg shawl.

A famous French actress Annie Girardot on her anniversary received as a gift an Orenburg shawl.

In England there is a factory, making the knitted goods. Since the beginning of the 20th century they are focused on the Orenburg tradition. In 2013, the newborn Prince George was presented to the people, wrapped in lace shawl, donated by representatives of this company. In the same handkerchief there was wrapped Prince William.

Many celebrities already "walking out" Orenburg downy products and items on their basis for various social and cultural events. Famous supermodel Sasha Pivovarova appeared at fashion Week in Paris, dressed I effectively complemented white cobweb.

How to wear the garments?

Many women would like to purchase a shawl but not all know how beautiful it can be tied. It is believed that the Orenburg shawl is bought exclusively for heat and can only be worn under the coat or coat.

However, we will show how to tie this beautiful warm accessory to catch admiring glances. For example, take openwork Orenburg cobweb.

Orenburg shawl designers offer to wear as a turban (a reference to the Eastern way).

Young fashionistas couturiers give the nod to tie a scarf around the hips over jeans. The perfect solution – warm fabric of the scarf will warm the lower back and abdomen, and the colors will add an exotic look.

This shawl will suit to dresses and business suits without a pattern. Scarf will enliven extreme little black and a little grey dress.

As a headdress, a scarf is ideal for coat or down jacket. The combination of a scarf and mittens stand out from the gray mass and warm in the cold winter.

Health and femininity now in fashion!

 

The fees will be spent at:

Purchase of equipment for combing.

If we managed to get rid of the need to engage in the production of feather yarn, it would allow us to concentrate on the knitting process, increased creative component.

The purchase of supplies.

Your financial contribution will help us to attract to our business some more knitters. This will allow us to expand the range of products, to increase production.

Developing an online store in the USA and Europe. This online store will work initially in English, German and French but then we plan to adapt the website and on other languages. Write to us, please, what languages, in your opinion, are needed in our website. With the opening of an online store, your purchase will be easy and pleasant, and you will be able to order natural product made of Orenburg down.

 

Other ways how you can help us:

If you cannot help us financially, that does not mean that You can't help us!!!

- My dear! You can help us by simply spreading the word about our business through your Facebook page, Twitter and Instagram.

It is very necessary to us! Believe me! Each click or repost can help us raise the required amount.

- Already quite a few months left before Christmas! It will come as usual fast! But You can prepare in advance Christmas gifts to all that hassle. You can give your family and friends garments that You buy, helping us in our business.

Thank you from all my heart for your generosity, love and support!

We really need Your help. We'll be very grateful for any help.

Be bright! Be in trend! And don't worry! It won’t harm the environment.

 

 

FAQ:

Is it possible to learn how to knit Orenburg shawls in America?

In America, in Colorado, it is possible to visit even offline study on know to knit Orenburg shawls: http://www.skaska.com/workshops.html.

What if the scarf is itchy?

If your new shawl prickly — it is not a problem! This fact, only direct indication of a completely natural origin of the handkerchief from live goats, and painstaking manual work knitters. Barb, a new scarf with the needles is a natural phenomenon, which is eliminated in a natural way — it is necessary to start using it. All guard hairs will fall out, due to its severity and lack of good adhesion with feather yarn. If you use a handkerchief, it will become softer and softer. The spine is fully gone in the process of wearing or intensive mechanical impact on the handkerchief.

 

How to wash a duvet product?

Wash the garments only manually, in warm water (+ 86оF……104оF), with mild detergent (shampoo or liquid soap). Drying should be at room temperature, away from batteries and other sources of heat. More information we will attach to the product when shipping. Or we can send it to You via e-mail.

Does the fluff causes allergy?

The fluff of Orenburg goats contains lanolin in greater numbers. Lanolin is included in all anti-allergic and anti-inflammatory drugs, promotes healing of wounds and fractures, so the goat can't actually cause allergies, and so it can be used for newborn kids.

 

How to store a duvet product?

Down things are perfectly stored in packages made of natural fibers. Therefore, it is best to sew or buy fabric bags and envelopes in which to pack a shawl and other products. More information we attach to the product when shipping. Or we can send it to You via e-mail.

When we send You a reward?

The rewards for October-November are ready. The products for December 2016 –January 2017 – we can send before, as they will be manufactured.

 

What should I do if I don't like downy product?

If this happened, what you did not like our downy product, you can return it within 14 days after receipt, paying transport costs. We will refund you the cost of the product.

 

Whether we knit for men and children?

Yes. For men - gloves, socks, vests. For children – mittens, socks.

 

 

In order not to lose this project – do repost and save it on your page.

 

PERKS:

story:
The brand

Cotton Canary is a brand featuring limited edition, easy-care collections that celebrate femininity while creating a polished look. Think: dressed up, not buttoned up, day-to-date wear, with a price point you can afford. Plus, it’s made in the USA and is designed with and for women, to encourage women, and to support women.

Make each day a little more inspired, a little easier, and much more emboldened.

 

The vision

When I launched Cotton Canary, I had two goals in mind: to design clothing that dresses the every-day woman as the modern superwoman that she is, and gives women more of a say in fashion.

While the world has changed to bring more equality and empowerment to women, fashion in the workplace is still very stifled. We default to suits or been-there, done-that pants with button-down shirts.

I say it’s time to celebrate femininity while maintaining the girl boss edge and have a polished look that transitions seamlessly from boardroom to bar.

It’s also time to bring the woman’s voice into the design process. Let’s make the evolution of our personal style a bit more, well…evolved. You should participate in how collections are put together and weigh in on the fit, color, and style you need and want.

This concept is virtually non-existent in the fashion industry, and yet it offers so many advantages. By selling directly to you and sidestepping the retailers, we are able to balance quality with affordability and offer collections at a below-market price. A $100 dress purchased through Cotton Canary would cost you almost double at a retail shop, because we have cut out the middle man. 

We have also cut out the waste. Not carrying an inventory means we relieve the pressure of producing as cheaply as possible and the practice of trying to offload products that don't sell. Our model is demand-driven, and it allows us to focus more on the quality of each piece to bring you a limited edition design. 

All of these ambitions come to life in Cotton Canary. I have bootstrapped the development of this clothing line with my own savings and business background until now. But like any ambitious undertaking, the brand needs more resources.

It typically takes at least two seasons to build a following strong enough to give a fashion brand its wings. I have set a goal of $46,500 to help fuel Cotton Canary to launch and maintain sustainability. With your support, we will reach and surpass that goal so that we can continue to ramp up operations and deliver more of the clothes you’ll love.

 

Breakdown of how the money will be spent

You work hard for your money, and it’s important you know exactly how your donation will be used:

  • 100% of your donation will be used to fuel the brand and operations.
  • Zero percent of your gift will be used to pay a salary for me.

More specifically:

  • You--Front and Center (Creating a Platform To Hear All Your Ideas For Design): $6,000
  • The Fun Part (Garment Design, Pattern Making, Perfecting the Fit): $12,500
  • No Emperor’s New Clothes Here (Fabric Sourcing and Perfecting the Fit): $5,000
  • Seeing is Believing (Photo Shoot, plus Web Design, UX Testing): $8,500
  • How You’ll Hear About Us (Marketing): $10,000
  • Bow On Top (Packaging): $4,500

Whatever you can give is appreciated and so very helpful. 

 

You and Cotton Canary

You care about this because…

  • …fashion, like other industries, needs to be more democratic, and more fine-tuned to what women, like you, need. Cotton Canary wants to give the choice of fashion back into rightful hands -- yours.
  • …you refuse to struggle with the office wear dilemma: professional but stiff and unfeminine; quality but at an unaffordable price; inexpensively made and barely lasts a season; not cute enough for post-work play; and the list goes on!
  • …you’d rather not spend a fortune on dry cleaning.
  • …we want to make our collections with you. Your voice is the most important element – let’s design together.

…And we have ambitions outside of ourselves as well. From day one, Cotton Canary will provide a portion of its proceeds to provide financial assistance to families seeking to adopt kids and to help break women and children out of human trafficking.

 

Timeline and the fun stuff

BRAND

With your support, we are excited to celebrate these milestones together:

  • September 15: Our fundraising goes live and you good folks donate!
  • October 6: We close our fundraising shop and shift gears to...
  • October 10: The inaugural collection launch (yay!). 

PERKS

We are impatient to give you perks for your good deed of the day. Once the fundraising has ended, we will contact you to claim your prize! Stay tuned for updates towards the end of the campaign and continue passing on the word about Cotton Canary.

 

THANK YOU!

THANK YOU for your support, your encouragement, and your participation. It really does mean the world to us. We are grateful to have you join our movement.

Once you have donated, share your new donor title (see more in Perks) on social media and inspire others to join your ranks. (If only being Beyonce can be this easy!)

Sharing is caring! If you can’t donate, share this page, chat with us on Instagram, shout out on Twitter or follow on Facebook. 

 

With endless appreciation,

Jen
story_txt:
The brandCotton Canary is a brand featuring limited edition, easy-care collections that celebrate femininity while creating a polished look. Think: dressed up, not buttoned up, day-to-date wear, with a price point you can afford. Plus, it’s made in the USA and is designed with and for women, to encourage women, and to support women.Make each day a little more inspired, a little easier, and much more emboldened. The visionWhen I launched Cotton Canary, I had two goals in mind: to design clothing that dresses the every-day woman as the modern superwoman that she is, and gives women more of a say in fashion.While the world has changed to bring more equality and empowerment to women, fashion in the workplace is still very stifled. We default to suits or been-there, done-that pants with button-down shirts.I say it’s time to celebrate femininity while maintaining the girl boss edge and have a polished look that transitions seamlessly from boardroom to bar.It’s also time to bring the woman’s voice into the design process. Let’s make the evolution of our personal style a bit more, well…evolved. You should participate in how collections are put together and weigh in on the fit, color, and style you need and want.This concept is virtually non-existent in the fashion industry, and yet it offers so many advantages. By selling directly to you and sidestepping the retailers, we are able to balance quality with affordability and offer collections at a below-market price. story:
*Flash sale price for Early bird customers

 

 

iProbe is a young team of enthusiastic men and women that made it’s goal to invent beautiful and technically perfect products for our customers all over the world in different areas of everyday life.

Our latest idea is called Lil Rose, it’s a perfectly looking traveling suitcase. The main goal that we tried to achieve in it’s design is influenced by the wish of perfect look and style. Every girl/woman in the world wish to be a princess and with Lil Rose suitcase this wish will come true. Changing the world and making it a little bit prettier is one of the goals we wish to achieve with this project.

 

 

Despite it’s beauty, Lil Rose is also a great present for your couple that will surely make him/her smile on Valentine's day or any other celebration event. This suitcase will surely attract lots of attention being unique and colorful among grey mass of other suitcases.

 

 

 

Making a suitcase is a very hard work and it needs a lot of resources:

Fur – we use synthetic-hypoallergenic toy fur, since we care about your health, animals and our planet.

Suitcase case – we use strongest materials that are available on the market to make your suitcase survive any airport personal

Telescopic handle – It’s lightweight, comfortable and still very durable.

 

 

Zips and inner blocks – are made with German quality and are said to be the best in the world, approximate lasting time is 10 years or 1000000000 zips

 

 

Outer handles – in case you need to lift your luggage there are nicely done outer handles

Wheels – we made a test and it gave us the results that it can roll for about 100000 miles without showing any signs of destruction.

 

 

Since there are so many small parts that normal person wouldn’t even think that they are inside the suitcase and they are sold in big amounts only, we need to make a big batch to keep the price fairly low for our bakers. That’s why we set our funding goal.

 

 

Most suitcases you can find on the market are just copying each other and look alike, but with Lil Rose suitcase you can be 100% sure your luggage will never get lost in the airport or any other place, since it drags so much attention that you can’t just pass it by without noticing how unique it is.

 

 

We plan to produce Lil Rose suitcase and beauty case in 5 different colors from the start: Pink, Yellow, Orange, Blue, and Black.

 

*Flash sale price for Early bird customers

 

 

To fulfill your complete look we also designed a set of beauty cases that you can order from us as separately as part of the suitcase + beauty case set. In situations when you are not traveling and don’t need so much room with you, but still want to be unique and colorful among gray mass of other people. You can get a small beauty case with you and use it as your everyday storage for all your small things you carry every day.

*Flash sale price for Early bird customers

 

Our suitcase and beauty bags pass the hand luggage dimensions restrictions for any air company out there on the market, so you won’t have troubles while passing the boarding desk and can register on any flight online freely.

 

Inside our Lil Rose is a fully functional compartment that will allow you to sort any types of clothes and other things you may carry with you on your travel. Our research team made a huge work on it and it’s well organized.

 

 

 

 

 

 

At current stage, we have contacted all the suppliers and made preparations to just pay for the materials and start working on realization.

We have found the best suitcase crafting studio you can image, they have numerous amount of awards and that’s where we made the samples for the photo shoot you can see above. If all materials are in hand time for making one suitcase was 3 and a half hours so we’ll have enough time to make any amount of suitcases for everyone, since studio or maybe we better call it factory has about 100 employees and they will surely help us on our way to success since we have a signed contract with them already.

 

 

 

 

Feel free to spread a word about our project and if you need high definition photos or even an interview for your blog, please contact us by lilrosesuitcases@gmail.com, we’ll surely provide you with all the necessary materials.

 

Life is travel, travel with style!
