story:
The Boots on the Ground in Detroit

Our team of designers, artists, engineers, organizers, and entrepreneurs are working together to hire and train veterans to become boot makers in Detroit. We started Pingree Mfg., a worker-owned company, with the primary objective of employing veterans to make and sell durable, sustainable, versatile boots and gear as rugged and resilient as the city they are forged in. 

We have outgrown the basements we are working out of in Detroit and are ready to get our veteran crafters trained and working full-time.We have acquired the majority of our materials and a portion of equipment necessary to get fully up and running and have secured a production location in Detroit that needs minimal renovations.  All we need now is this initial funding. 

The Motor City hasn't made footwear since the 50's.

Be the reason we bring boot making back to Detroit.

THE "DETROIT CLASSIC" BOOT 

As part of the "Boots on the Ground" line we bring you the Detroit Classic(pictured above). This unisex urban utility boot straps together the ruggedness of goodyear welt construction with fashion and versatility for all occasions and all seasons. Get Yours with a $300 Pledge.   

The Detroit Boot Features:

  • All-weather full grain-leather water resistant upper
  • Rugged urban utility rubber Lug sole by Vibram
  • Designed and prototyped in Detroit
  • Side-saddle strap provides increased support and comfort
  • All military-grade materials made in the USA
  • Hand-made in Michigan in collaboration with world-class footwear company Bates 
  • Durable Goodyear welt construction

Color: Black on Black

Women's Sizes: 9, 9.5, 10, 10.5, 11, 11.5, 12, 12.5, 13, 13.5, 14, 15, 16

Men's Sizes: 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 10.5, 11, 11.5, 12, 13, 14

Because of limited tooling on this 1st run we apologize for being unable to offer a wider range of sizes for length and/or width. We aim to offer a greater range in the future to meet the needs of our supporters. If we don't have your size, please sign up for updates here so we can let you know when expanded sizing options and new production runs are available and please elevate our mission by helping us spread the word!

We will email you for your sizing information at the end of the campaign. Estimated Shipping by Spring 2017

THE "RESURGET RECONDO" BOOT 

This all-terrain boot Is equipped with the same sole and technology used in boots made for special forces. Ideal for moving fast over unforgiving terrain, the Resurget Recondo boot(pictured above) provides breathability and durability with a combination of a leather upper and ripstop nylon Cordura, while the Vibram® Mutant outsole provides grip on mud, rock, and nearly any surface in its way. Get Yours with a $279 Pledge.   

  • Direct-attach construction
  • Full-grain leather upper
  • Lace entry
  • Screened medial and lateral ventilation perforations
  • Textile lining

Color: Black

Women's Sizes: 9, 9.5, 10, 10.5, 11, 11.5, 12, 12.5, 13, 13.5, 14, 15, 16

Men's Sizes: 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 10.5, 11, 11.5, 12, 13, 14

Because of limited tooling on this 1st run we apologize for being unable to offer a wider range of sizes for length or width. We aim to offer a greater range in the future to meet the needs of our supporters. If we don't have your size, please sign up for updates here so we can let you know when expanded sizing options and new production runs are available and please elevate our mission by helping us spread the word! We will email you for your sizing information at the end of the campaign if you made a pledge over $279. 

All profit generated from the sales of these boots go towards getting veterans to work building boots in Detroit. Estimated Shipping by Spring 2017

HERE IS WHERE YOU COME IN

Every dollar will amplify our ability to transform the lives of veterans in Detroit. Funds from this crowd funding campaign will enable us to produce this limited 1st run of 500 unisex pairs of both our Detroit Classic boot & the Resurget Recondo boot made in Michigan. This capital will also quicken our pace for hiring and training our full team of veteran crafters and getting our operation fully functional.

We believe anything is possible & if you see a better way, find a way to make it happen. With your support, we see an opportunity in Detroit to make high-quality, veteran-made footwear & gear that redefines sustainability and maximizes the health and well being of our workforce, our neighbors, and our customers.

COMFORT & FIT

Pingree boots fit true to size. For example, if you measure as an 9 on a Brannock device (those metal devices used at nearly every shoe store), we suggest you purchase an 9. We recommend a snug fit as the leather and midsole will stretch and conform to your foot. All widths are D, which accommodates most feet. Because of limited tooling for the 1st run we are able to offer limited sizing options. We apologize if we don't have your size. We will work to produce a much wider range of shoe sizes including less common widths in future runs. 

If you don't know your size and you don't feel like swinging by a shoe store, this printable version of the Brannock device will work.

Still ordered the wrong size? No worries. Simply send the boots back and let us take care of the shipping & handling. Note: we can only afford to make this offer for unused shoes, so try to decide if they fit or not before you go on a month-long motorcycle trip or decide to hike the Appalachian Trail.

We will email you at the end of the campaign to collect your size information. 

WHY BOOTS? 

No one knows boots like veterans do. With no capital, yet a clear idea of the kind of impact we wanted to make, we set out two years ago exploring ideas of what we could have our future veteran crafters hand-build sustainably and locally. We asked the questions, what could embody the rugged resilience of Detroiters, could employ veterans across Metro Detroit who want to work but don’t have an opportunity, and has no carbon “footprint”? Our answer; build boots for the region as tough as the workers who make them!

WHY VETERANS?

Every company or organization could benefit from the discipline and mission driven nature of those who have served. Our focus on a veteran workforce took shape two years ago when our co-founder Jarret A. Schlaff met Mike, a young Marine veteran on Woodward avenue in downtown, who asked him for change to cover busfare so he could get home. This veteran had been out dropping off resumes and going from business to business all day and for months. He had been in and out of stable work for the previous three years. His home was his car at the time. After this connection Jarret spent weeks sitting down and talking with a number of veterans' organizations across Metro Detroit. He learned there was an unacceptable gap in gainful employment opportunities for veterans. So instead of waiting for someone else to do something about it, he decided to be part of the solution and started Project Boots on the Ground that has since grown into Pingree Mfg. 

WHY THE NAME?

Hazen S. Pingree, trailblazer of progressive social reform, fought for the city of Detroit as a brilliant bootmaker, businessman and Republican mayor, after his service in the Civil War. In his time as Mayor, following exemplary Union service and the establishment of his boot company, Pingree and Smith, he exposed corporate corruption and made more food, transportation, and electricity publicly accessible in one of the city’s greatest times of need. The name embodies the kind of service, leadership, and action humanity needs at this time on the clock of the world.   

THE IMPACT

Pingree Mfg is a worker-owned enterprise with a 501C3 non-profit and a L3C low-profit social impact arm to maximize the difference we make.

Having encountered countless highly qualified, educated, motivated yet still homeless vets, we founded Pingree Mfg on the idea that veterans are best suited to relate to and help other veterans achieve employment and stability.

We are creating transitional part-time work for 20-35 veterans with our street team and full-time employment and housing for 8-12 crafters who are on path to become co-owners of this enterprise over the next two years. Our team-based support systems house and create the context for our workers to heal from their trauma, to have a regained sense of purpose, and to contribute to a mission as large as ours. This creates a huge impact on local neighborhoods and families, and on their ability to be powerful messengers of the transformative potential of local resiliency.  

Full-time employees start at $15/hr and the initial 8-12 veterans we employ as crafters are put on path to worker-ownership, connected with stable and affordable housing, provided with 4-6 hours of paid leadership development & financial literacy classes weekly, and supplemental health care.

SUSTAINABILITY

It makes sense to localize production and source our materials and labor locally to support American jobs, limit the costs and instability associated with global markets, and make a positive impact on our surrounding environment. We see opportunities moving forward to maximize well being while meeting the emerging demands of millions, by creating footwear and gear that are carbon neutral and toxic free.

We can’t depend on our government to get us to where we need to be, so we have the duty to create the localized resiliency and alternatives we seek.     

WHAT WE'VE DONE

Since the 1st crowd-funding campaign in 2015 where we raised $15k we have:

  • Supported pre-production operations for 1 year
  • Employed 3 veterans part-time
  • Produced & market tested 3 generations of prototypes
  • Team members dedicated 1,400+ hours to research, product testing, and development
  • Acquired 30% of our production equipment
  • Obtained a majority of the materials necessary for production
  • Secured a production facility and have a storage facility for our reclaimed leather
  • Fostered partnerships with a footwear manufacturer in Michigan to mentor our team and co-produce 1st run of boots
  • Partnered with LEAR to reclaim their “scrap” leather and put it to good use
  • Created logo and branding for Pingree Mfg
  • Created our new website
  • Hosted & co-facilitated art therapy event in Detroit for 5 veterans
  • Finalist in the Pitch Detroit competition
  • Finalist in the Motor City Match Program

Risks & Challenges

Quantity: The minimum run at our factory is 400 pairs per style. While we anticipate selling out in the first two weeks, if we don’t meet that threshold we may have to delay production for a short period until that quantity is reached.

Scale: Our social impact low profit business model has made it challenging to acquire traditional financing and investment. We are committed to maintaining the triple bottom-line focus of our enterprise without sacrificing the integrity or resiliency of our organization. This requires continued creativity, strong relationships, and perseverance to gain the necessary capital and expertise to scale our operations and remain profitable.  

Proven Leadership: Since 2007, our CEO has co-founded four non-profit organizations, all currently making a difference in economic, food, climate, and environmental justice across Metro Detroit. Our team has personally established regional relationships to garner in-kind donations of materials, equipment, services, and technical assistance for our boots organization valued over $250,000.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!
  • Share this with 3 friends using the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Put us on the radar of other groups, individuals, and organizations doing great work in the veteran community and beyond! Who should we be talking to?
  • Amplify our campaign by sharing on social media and following us on Facebook, Twitter, & Instagram
  • Find another veteran non-profit or social impact organization and volunteer with them. We’re all in this together!

Men's Sizes: 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 10.5, 11, 11.5, 12, 13, 14
Because of limited tooling on this 1st run we apologize for being unable to offer a wider range of sizes for length or width. We aim to offer a greater range in the future to meet the needs of our supporters. If we don't have your size, please sign up for updates here so we can let you know when expanded sizing options and new production runs are available and please elevate our mission by helping us spread the word! We will email you for your sizing information at the end of the campaign if you made a pledge over $279. 
All profit generated from the sales of these boots go towards getting veterans to work building boots in Detroit. Estimated Shipping by Spring 2017
HERE IS WHERE YOU COME IN
Every dollar will amplify our ability to transform the lives of veterans in Detroit. Funds from this crowd funding campaign will enable us to produce this limited 1st run of 500 unisex pairs of both our Detroit Classic boot & the Resurget Recondo boot made in Michigan. This capital will also quicken our pace for hiring and training our full team of veteran crafters and getting our operation fully functional.
We believe anything is possible & if you see a better way, find a way to make it happen. With your support, we see an opportunity in Detroit to make high-quality, veteran-made footwear & gear that redefines sustainability and maximizes the health and well being of our workforce, our neighbors, and our customers.
COMFORT & FIT
Pingree boots fit true to size. For example, if you measure as an 9 on a Brannock device (those metal devices used at nearly every shoe store), we suggest you purchase an 9. We recommend a snug fit as the leather and midsole will stretch and conform to your foot. All widths are D, which accommodates most feet. Because of limited tooling for the 1st run we are able to offer limited sizing options. We apologize if we don't have your size. We will work to produce a much wider range of shoe sizes including less common widths in future runs. 
If you don't know your size and you don't feel like swinging by a shoe store, this printable version of the Brannock device will work.
Still ordered the wrong size? No worries. Simply send the boots back and let us take care of the shipping & handling. Note: we can only afford to make this offer for unused shoes, so try to decide if they fit or not before you go on a month-long motorcycle trip or decide to hike the Appalachian Trail.
We will email you at the end of the campaign to collect your size information. 

WHY BOOTS? 
No one knows boots like veterans do. With no capital, yet a clear idea of the kind of impact we wanted to make, we set out two years ago exploring ideas of what we could have our future veteran crafters hand-build sustainably and locally. We asked the questions, what could embody the rugged resilience of Detroiters, could employ veterans across Metro Detroit who want to work but don’t have an opportunity, and has no carbon “footprint”? Our answer; build boots for the region as tough as the workers who make them!
WHY VETERANS?
Every company or organization could benefit from the discipline and mission driven nature of those who have served. Our focus on a veteran workforce took shape two years ago when our co-founder Jarret A. Schlaff met Mike, a young Marine veteran on Woodward avenue in downtown, who asked him for change to cover busfare so he could get home. This veteran had been out dropping off resumes and going from business to business all day and for months. He had been in and out of stable work for the previous three years. His home was his car at the time. After this connection Jarret spent weeks sitting down and talking with a number of veterans' organizations across Metro Detroit. He learned there was an unacceptable gap in gainful employment opportunities for veterans. So instead of waiting for someone else to do something about it, he decided to be part of the solution and started Project Boots on the Ground that has since grown into Pingree Mfg. 
WHY THE NAME?
Hazen S. Pingree, trailblazer of progressive social reform, fought for the city of Detroit as a brilliant bootmaker, businessman and Republican mayor, after his service in the Civil War. In his time as Mayor, following exemplary Union service and the establishment of his boot company, Pingree and Smith, he exposed corporate corruption and made more food, transportation, and electricity publicly accessible in one of the city’s greatest times of need. The name embodies the kind of service, leadership, and action humanity needs at this time on the clock of the world.   

THE IMPACT
Pingree Mfg is a worker-owned enterprise with a 501C3 non-profit and a L3C low-profit social impact arm to maximize the difference we make.
Having encountered countless highly qualified, educated, motivated yet still homeless vets, we founded Pingree Mfg on the idea that veterans are best suited to relate to and help other veterans achieve employment and stability.
We are creating transitional part-time work for 20-35 veterans with our street team and full-time employment and housing for 8-12 crafters who are on path to become co-owners of this enterprise over the next two years. Our team-based support systems house and create the context for our workers to heal from their trauma, to have a regained sense of purpose, and to contribute to a mission as large as ours. This creates a huge impact on local neighborhoods and families, and on their ability to be powerful messengers of the transformative potential of local resiliency.  
Full-time employees start at $15/hr and the initial 8-12 veterans we employ as crafters are put on path to worker-ownership, connected with stable and affordable housing, provided with 4-6 hours of paid leadership development & financial literacy classes weekly, and supplemental health care.
SUSTAINABILITY
It makes sense to localize production and source our materials and labor locally to support American jobs, limit the costs and instability associated with global markets, and make a positive impact on our surrounding environment. We see opportunities moving forward to maximize well being while meeting the emerging demands of millions, by creating footwear and gear that are carbon neutral and toxic free.
We can’t depend on our government to get us to where we need to be, so we have the duty to create the localized resiliency and alternatives we seek.     
WHAT WE'VE DONE
Since the 1st crowd-funding campaign in 2015 where we raised $15k we have:

Supported pre-production operations for 1 year
Employed 3 veterans part-time
Produced & market tested 3 generations of prototypes
Team members dedicated 1,400+ hours to research, product testing, and development
Acquired 30% of our production equipment
Obtained a majority of the materials necessary for production
Secured a production facility and have a storage facility for our reclaimed leather
Fostered partnerships with a footwear manufacturer in Michigan to mentor our team and co-produce 1st run of boots
Partnered with LEAR to reclaim their “scrap” leather and put it to good use
Created logo and branding for Pingree Mfg
Created our new website
Hosted & co-facilitated art therapy event in Detroit for 5 veterans
Finalist in the Pitch Detroit competition
Finalist in the Motor City Match Program

Risks & Challenges
Quantity: The minimum run at our factory is 400 pairs per style. While we anticipate selling out in the first two weeks, if we don’t meet that threshold we may have to delay production for a short period until that quantity is reached.
Scale: Our social impact low profit business model has made it challenging to acquire traditional financing and investment. We are committed to maintaining the triple bottom-line focus of our enterprise without sacrificing the integrity or resiliency of our organization. This requires continued creativity, strong relationships, and perseverance to gain the necessary capital and expertise to scale our operations and remain profitable.  
Proven Leadership: Since 2007, our CEO has co-founded four non-profit organizations, all currently making a difference in economic, food, climate, and environmental justice across Metro Detroit. Our team has personally established regional relationships to garner in-kind donations of materials, equipment, services, and technical assistance for our boots organization valued over $250,000.
Other Ways You Can Help

Help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign!
Share this with 3 friends using the Indiegogo share tools!
Put us on the radar of other groups, individuals, and organizations doing great work in the veteran community and beyond! Who should we be talking to?
Amplify our campaign by sharing on social media and following us on Facebook, Twitter, & Instagram
Find another veteran non-profit or social impact organization and volunteer with them. We’re all in this together!

story:
Introducing Xcape

Xcape is the exceptional folding e-scooter you can take everywhere to navigate the urban environment. It folds up in just ONE second and is extremely portable, environmentally friendly and fun. Why hang with the crowd, when you can Xcape the crowd?

 

X-shape design folds up in 1 second!

Xcape's brilliant designers were able to invent an exclusive,state-of-the-art X-shape that allows the frame, seat and footrests to all fold up (or unfold) simultaneously...and in only one second!  

Xcape lets you travel effortlessly and silently at up to 15 mph for a range of 25 miles, and the battery fully recharges in about 5 hours.

 

Easy to pull and store

Once folded, Xcape rolls like a piece of luggage. You can easily take it with you onto an elevator, a train or bus. And when you park it at work, at home or in a coffee shop, its footprint is just over one square foot. And there’s no need for a kickstand.

Xcape only weighs about 40 pounds but can carry up to 330 pounds. And it takes you almost  anywhere! 

 

Travel in comfort and safety

Don’t let the small size fool you. Brilliantly engineered and crafted of aircraft-grade aluminum, Xcape is surprisingly comfortable – even for riders 6 ½ tall and over 300 pounds. 

It’s also very safe -  even on tight corners - thanks to its state-of-the-art independent dual rear wheel suspension.

Another advanced safety feature is Xcape’s dual braking system, featuring a front wheel e-brake and rear wheel mechanical brake that enable you to stop on a proverbial dime under virtually any conditions.

Xcape's front and rear suspension work together to isolate the rider from shocks and vibrations.

 

Great for the environment

Xcape is 100% electric –powered, which means:
. No gasoline
. No air pollution
. No noise pollution
 
Its UL-approved, customized Sanyo battery delivers a range of around 25 miles, and fully recharges in about 5 hours.

 

Bluetooth GPS app for street smarts

Xcape comes with its own Bluetooth app that you can download to your smart phone. The app gives you GPS information, lets you adjust the speed setting to 6, 10 or 15 miles per hour, and even serves as virtual key to turn Xcape on or off.

 

The Product of Advanced Design

 

Perks

$99-Reserve now／pay later

Reserve now/pay later (non-refundable) - SAVE UP TO 40% off the MSRP $1,499 by reserving your Xcape now to lock in the campaign pricing. You will have the ability to pay the balance of your purchase by the end of the campaign Indiegogo price : 99 USD

$799-Xcape Indiegogo early bird

SAVE UP TO 50% off the MSRP/$1,499 by being the first in your office, apartment or neighborhood to Xcape the crowd!Xcape is available in Matte Black, Metallic Red,Arctic White and Bright Sliver; Xcape comes with a UL-approved 36V 10.4ah, customized Sanyo battery,a 300w motor,25 miles range,15 mph speed, Xcape APP gives you GPS info, lets you adjust the speed setting to 6, 10 or 15 mph, and serves as virtual key to turn Xcape on/off.

$899-Xcape Indiegogo Special

SAVE UP TO 40% off the MSRP/$1,499 by being being the first in your office, apartment or neighborhood to Xcape the crowd!Xcape is available in Matte Black, Metallic Red,Arctic White and Bright Sliver;  Xcape comes with a UL-approved 36V 10.4ah, customized Sanyo battery,a 300w motor,25 miles range,15 mph speed, Xcape APP gives you GPS info, lets you adjust the speed setting to 6, 10 or 15 mph, and serves as virtual key to turn Xcape on/off.

$99-XcapeKit Indiegogo Special

SAVE UP TO 50% off the MSRP/$198  by being “ “x-ceptionally” with us.

included in XcapeKIT:Xcape bag,Xcape pulling rope,Xcape T-shirt,Xcape Cap.

$1798-"Xcapers"package-Buy 2x Xcape and get 2x XcapeKit for FREE!

SAVE UP TO 40% off the MSRP/$2,798 for you and your friend or partner; Cruising around is more fun with company!Xcape is available in Matte Black, Metallic Red,Arctic White and Bright Sliver;  Xcape comes with a UL-approved 36V 10.4ah, customized Sanyo battery,a 300w motor,25 miles range,15 mph speed, Xcape APP gives you GPS info, lets you adjust the speed setting to 6, 10 or 15 mph, and serves as virtual key to turn Xcape on/off.

And get 2x XcapeKit for Free!

 

Timeline

 

Xcape Team

After 18 months of intense research and development and 12 months of comprehensive testing in other countries, we are ready – and stoked –   to introduce Xcape through this Indiegogo campaign.

Our shared passion for vehicle and industry design has brought us together. As designers, we are proud of our unyielding commitment to delivering a better "last mile" solution by creating a quick, compact, comfortable, safe and environmentally friendly means of transportation.

Be the first in your office or neighborhood to Xcape the crowd!

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Q:How long does it take to fully charge the battery?

A:Approximately 4 hours with our standard charger if the battery pack is completely empty.

Q: Do I need a licence to ride Xcape?

A: No. Xcapes is 100% street legal.

Q: What kind of warranty do you offer?  

A: We offer an one (1) year limited warranty on all Xcape purchases on all parts for "normal use." This means any parts that break or become defective or any other manufacturing defects are covered. Our California-based customer support will help you take care of any problems. Note that this does not include rider injury.

Q: How much weight can Xcape handle? 

A: Xcape is made of aircraft-grade aluminum and can handle up to 330 pounds.

Q: Xcape looks small. Does it come in a bigger size?

A: Don’t let the small size fool you.  Brilliantly engineered and crafted of aircraft-grade aluminum, Xcape is surprisingly comfortable – even for riders up to 6 ½ tall and 330 pounds. 

Q:Where and how can I charge my Xcape scooter?

A: You can charge your Xcape scooter anywhere there's a conventional electrical outlet.

Q:Will the charger work in my country, and internationally?

A:We will offer your a customized charger according the country you from.

Q:How do I know when the battery is low?

A:Check the battery charge indicator on Xcape,or the main page of Xcape APP.

 

Why hang with the crowd. . . 

 

. . . when you can Xcape the crowd?

story:
Something Incredible 

  • Project that based on the true story of a real life experience.
  • We don't want people who are in love to miss each other so badly anymore!
  • We are planning to make a professional video for our ring to express all the feelings that you feel of our love gadget.
  • We need funds to make our project real and begin to show it to the whole world and even start selling them!


  • Mind Blowing 
  • We need minimally  $20.000 to begin our project. There're many challenging facing us in the future. We would be marvelously glad if we can overcome our price goal!
  • Our Perks are made for people who want our project. Special discounts, limited editions of ring, events and many interesting stuff involved.
  • Every single $ will go to develop and create our project. To complete the design, to bring our ring nearer to the absolute delightful excellence.

Why Do You Need This Ring?

  • You have a love of your life that you can't see every day, every hour, every minute? Ring will not bring your love to you, but it will bring you much closer to it.
  • Absolutely ideal present for Valentine's day. Your Girlfriend/Wife, Boyfriend or Husband will lose their mind of such a wonderful present that represents what we call: "The Pure Love."
  • Different ways of use. You may not have a partner. But you thankfully have you Mother or Father who we love more than everything in the world. If you're an adult, you probably live separately from you family. Make your family to be connected to you by their feelings and emotions.
  • Just a valued person for you. You can use this ring just with somebody who's important for you and believe me. This person will appreciate that.

How To Use?

  • There's small button on the ring that looks like Heart. When you press the button, Heart begins to glow and pulsate. Don't worry to accidentally hit the button it's pretty tough to do it, so it will avoid you to do it accidentally.
  • When the button was pressed, it sends the signal to the second ring. There's HeartBeat Line which begins to pulsate and glow in circles. It imitates the rapid pulse of the person who thinks about you.
  • HeartBeat Line is hidden in passive mode. In order not to annoy you and for your ring to be a very personal thing, we decided to hide the HeartBeat Line so you can see it only when it glows.
  • As the ring  has only one function, it very thin what makes it absolutely convenient to wear it every single day!
  • It's also waterproof! 
  • No chargers and Wires! There's a solar battery that keeps the ring alive. Be together forever!
  • The entire design was made as minimalistic. So it looks marvelous and there's not a single thing that would annoy you or make any discomfort!
  • So instruction! Press the button and wait for the mental super impact of the energy that flights from your love towards you!


Psychological Implication

  • Our long  research says that ring has a very important psychological reflection on our mind while in use.
  • When You Press the small Heart-Button on the ring, the Heart begin to pulsate with color. It automatically makes you feel about your partner with your heart and soul.
  • When you press the button, other ring(the one your partner wears) begin to vibrate and heartbeat line begin to glow in circles simultaneously. It imitates the rapid pulse of the person who pressed the button. It looks amazingly beautifully and colorful. But the actual thing which involves psychology is that you brain automatically begin to think about the person who made your ring to glow. 
  • Eventually, what happens? Both of your brains and bodies begin to produce unbelievable amount of mental energy and signals that run into each other with the supersonic speed and the most interesting and intrigue thing happens. Both of you psychologically begin to feel each other wherever you are even if you are thousands of miles away from each other. That is a Science, That is a Human! 



Support Us!

  • If you are interested in our project but you cannot contribute for any reason. Make some noise! Tell your friends about  our ring! Tell you family, your partner
  • Use IndieGoGo Tools to share our project on Facebook; Twitter or any other media resources! This is significantly important for us!

Special Thanks for Every Single person Who support us with any different thing.

We love you So Much!

Love Ring 2015(c)

All Rights Reserved!

story:
ImaWash is your portable, palm-sized washing machine that you can take and use anywhere.  It's gentle on clothes, but tough on dirt with its sonic power, and is super easy to use: just put your clothes in a basin, add water, laundry detergent, put ImaWash in, and your clothes will be clean in 30 minutes!



Press


 “I have to say, I really like it – it’s convenient, quick, and for a busy mom like me, it works great for those unexpected spills I get ."   

                                                                                            -----"TECHMalak"

Real portability 

Is your laundry tied to your washing machine and a power outlet?
ImaWash can run off a Power bank. Thus it's easy to use anywhere when you are travelling or at home and is suitable for all fabrics. 

With ImaWash's real portability, you can now bring a washing machine anywhere with you, whether you are on the go for business trips or out in the wild enjoying outdoor adventures.



Gentle on the clothes

You will love ImaWash if you already wash some of your clothing by hand.

ImaWash's sonic solution makes sure it's gentle on all your delicate and expensive clothing that cannot be thrown into a washing machine. It is also great for small load of clothing.



Anything with handwash labels can now be handled by ImaWash. If your hands are sensitive to detergents, ImaWash is the solution. Just switch it on and come back for it later.  



Switch it on and relax

ImaWash will turn itself off after the wash cycle of 30 minutes and be ready to used again after 5 minutes.  When the washing cycle is completed, rinse off the detergent from your clothes with clean water,  and then dry your clothes.




What you can clean with ImaWash

ImaWash can be used for your delicate pieces like silk/tie/sweater/children clothes or toys/ swim wear.
Furthermore, you can clean fruit/vegetable/porcelain and more with ImaWash!

ImaWash also cleans other items you are reluctant to put in the washer like caps/hats, pet supplies, or mop. Because you either destroy your hat or ruin your washer with germs from your pet.



How does ImaWash clean?

Sonic waves will vibrate through the water and push out the dirt and other particles.  This has been implemented in many industries which requires safe and clean solutions.  So this is not a new invention but a new application of the technology that will fit in the palm of your hand.



Specification


Perks


How people talked about us

"Something to take with you when travelling, Seems to do the required job. so, yea I'd buy it."                     
                                                                                                          ------- Mandy and Nick S.
"It's so helpful to wash underwear. I had to wash them by hand because I share my washer with 3 other roommates."
                                                                                                        -------  Jillian A,
    

Secret gifts unlocked!

7/13: Announcing secret GIFTS for our backers:

All backers will receive a travel pouch and two travel hangers with their ImaWash! The travel set will be added in every ImaWash.



Timeline



Team Behind the Product


Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)


     1. How much clothes can I put in water?

The load should be less than 1.5kg each time so items can freely float in the basin.  This will allow the sonic vibrations to work.


     2. Have you tested it, will it really work?

Please see our videos on Youtube.   You can see that it cleans after 10 minutes.  Sonic cleaning is nothing new – it has been around for a long time and now used in the most stringent cleaning requirements for medical.


     3. Can ImaWash replace my automatic washing machine?

No. Imawash is not a full cycle washing machine, it does the washing/cleaning portion only. It will also not be effective for big loads of laundry and for large/heavy pieces such as bed linen, towels, jeans etc. ImaWash is meant to complement your washing machine to deal with small volumes of delicate items that require a sensitive wash and could be ruined in the machine.   It is also for travelling when you do not have access to a washing machine.


     4. Do I need laundry detergent to wash with ImaWash?

Yes, you do. ImaWash needs to have detergent to work.


     5. What kind of detergent is recommended to wash with ImaWash?

Any kind of detergent will work. In an urgent situation, you can use soap/shampoo. But do note that it does not clean as well as detergent.


     6. What's about rinsing and drying?

Imawash performs  the washing/cleaning portion only, you'll have to rinse and dry manually. 


     7. What's the working voltage and where can I use it?

ImaWash was designed for travellers. You can use it anywhere with power supply and even your power bank!


     8. What else do I need to make ImaWash work?

You need your ImaWash device, a waterproof container (plastic bag), detergent, and a power source.

We’ll be happy to answer your specific questions about ImaWash and its technology, just email us contact@imawash.com.

      9. When can I get my ImaWash?

Thank you for your patient, we are ready for mass production and expect to deliver the products within 30 days after the crowdfunding on Indiegogo. So you might expect to receive it around AUGUST 2016.
story_txt:
ImaWash is your portable, palm-sized washing machine that you can take and use anywhere.  It's gentle on clothes, but tough on dirt with its sonic power, and is super easy to use: just put your clothes in a basin, add water, laundry detergent, put ImaWash in, and your clothes will be clean in 30 minutes!
Press


 “I have to say, I really like it – it’s convenient, quick, and for a busy mom like me, it works great for those unexpected spills I get ."   
                                                                                            -----"TECHMalak"Real portability Is your laundry tied to your washing machine and a power outlet?
ImaWash can run off a Power bank. Thus it's easy to use anywhere when you are travelling or at home and is suitable for all fabrics. 


With ImaWash's real portability, you can now bring a washing machine anywhere with you, whether you are on the go for business trips or out in the wild enjoying outdoor adventures.





Gentle on the clothes
You will love ImaWash if you already wash some of your clothing by hand.
ImaWash's sonic solution makes sure it's gentle on all your delicate and expensive clothing that cannot be thrown into a washing machine. It is also great for small load of clothing.






Anything with handwash labels can now be handled by ImaWash. If your hands are sensitive to detergents, ImaWash is the solution. Just switch it on and come back for it later.  





Switch it on and relax
ImaWash will turn itself off after the wash cycle of 30 minutes and be ready to used again after 5 minutes.  When the washing cycle is completed, rinse off the detergent from your clothes with clean water,  and then dry your clothes.






What you can clean with ImaWashImaWash can be used for your delicate pieces like silk/tie/sweater/children clothes or toys/ swim wear.Furthermore, you can clean fruit/vegetable/porcelain and more with ImaWash!

ImaWash also cleans other items you are reluctant to put in the washer like caps/hats, pet supplies, or mop. Because you either destroy your hat or ruin your washer with germs from your pet.



How does ImaWash clean?

Sonic waves will vibrate through the water and push out the dirt and other particles.  This has been implemented in many industries which requires safe and clean solutions.  So this is not a new invention but a new application of the technology that will fit in the palm of your hand.

story:
Short Summary

 

I believe most parents have at one point had to deal with their child leaving home with a jacket and not coming back with one. Children of all ages don’t want to carry, wear, or stuff a jacket into to their backpack in the compartment where the books and papers are. This makes it easy for them to lose or leave the jacket behind.

We as parents want the best for our children and look out for them best we can, high school and college are no exception. One day after talking to some other parents, we agreed, that we want the security of knowing our children has their jacket on hand if they need it, in case the weather or temperature changes while they are away from home. That is what led me to invent this stylish 2 in 1 backpack. A backpack that comes with and attached, detachable jacket stored in its own compartment on the backside of the backpack.

This would also be so convenient for people with disabilities. Having a disability myself, I’m familiar with not wanting to carry anything extra, but needing to keep up with what I do carry with me. This clever backpack gives us two important items used by many when they leave the house, a jacket and backpack together. 

This campaign is important to my family, friends, and I because so much was sacrificed and we believe in the good it will be for students, hikers, couriers, people who walk, ride bikes, travel by city buses, and more. I am fortunate to be able to now devote the time and energy needed to pursue our dreams of seeing the Jacket and Backpack Assembly on the market.

  • With your contributions I will be able to get a prototype, some samples made, and attend at least one trade show. I will use any money left for any other business expenses.


What We Need & What You Get

  • The funding of $30,000 will secure a manufacture to make a quality jacket and backpack Assembly and samples. It will also pay for me attending at least on trade show, and other business expenses.
  • Though all donations in any amount are greatly appreciated, a sample of the Jacket and Backpack Assembly will be given to anyone who donates $150.00 or more. 
  • If we do not reach our goal we will start with what comes first, and that is securing a manufacturer that can have a prototype and samples made. Next get a business plan finished to go pitch to investors. We will proceed from there stretching the dollars as far as possible.

The Impact

  • The Jacket and Backpack Assembly is valuable to anyone who knows what it is like to want to have a jacket on hand but don't want to wear, carry, or stuff it in your backpack, taking up valuable room in the main compartment. Together we will finally solve a problem that has troubled backpack wearers for years.

Risks & Challenges

Some things that will help me over come risks and obstacles I may face on the way to achieving my goal:

  • The patent will give me some security with getting it out. 
  • Being counseled helps keep me stay on track, provides me with important information, and gives me support. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help. I know what it is like to want to help but you just are not financially equipped. There are other ways that you can help:

  • I will greatly appreciate you spreading the word and asking people for their support, remember the sooner this gets on the market the sooner it will help so many.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word.
  • Also like us on Facebook and feel free to leave comments on how you feel about the Jacket and Backpack Assembly and share the page with all of your friends.
  • If you feel that you would be interested in being an investor please let me know and I will contact you with more information.

Thank you in advance for donating, sharing the campaign, and for your overall support of the Jacket and Backpack Assembly!

story:
Hey folks,

A Thanks a heap for stopping by - have a look around and get to grips wit the hysterical reality of parenthood.


Story behind the cards

A few months before the birth our boy (Noah), my wife and I were given a pack of Landmark Moment Cards. We flicked through them in anticipation of what parenthood had in store for us - we were delighted - parenting seemed dandy.

Now we have Noah (he's the crying baby in the video) and we love him to bits but, as you can see, he can be a bit of a butthead. And speaking to parent-friends of ours... it turns out that their babies could be too.

After the weeks and months went on, we wrote down all the situations Noah dumped us into; and that's when Honest Landmark Moments was born... as painful and unglamorous as it was.


Features

Each pack is made up of 38 cards.

The cards track all sorts of baby landmarks; from sleep deprivation to sharting and all sorts in-between.

The cards measure 15cm X 19cm.

They are gender neutral and make hilariously embarrassing keep-sakes.

Each of the 38 cards were conceived & written by Reid Leigh; and illustrated by  Eva M Steiner.


Why 10K?

It sounds like a lot, and it is. But the £10,000 will be put to good use:

  • Production of the cards (getting them printed, packaged and sent off around the world).
  • Getting an online store up and running.
  • PR and advertising to help spread the word.
  • Development of new editions.


What if we get over 10K?

  • New editions will go into production.


What's next?

Honest Landmark Moments: Pregnancy Edition
Honest Landmark Moments: Toddler Edition
Honest Landmark Moments: Pet Edition
Honest Landmark Moments: Husband Edition
Honest Landmark Moments: The app

Keep up to date with the campaign here:  https://www.facebook.com/HonestLandmarkMoments/

Fight the good fight,
R L

story:
Hey y'all! We are Savannah and Casey and we are co-owners of the Nashville-based brand, Hey Wanderer. We have been offered a vendor spot at Firefly Music Festival from June 16-19. This is the biggest opportunity we have ever had to expose our brand and we need your help to make this happen! The biggest need is the inventory we have to take with us! With the money we raise on Indiegogo, we will be able to get to the festival, to pay for our booth fee, and we will be able to pay multiple people to help us produce more of our hand-dyed kimonos and tees in enough time for the festival. The festival is for 4 days and 90,000 people attend each year, so we need to make A LOT of stuff. The more we raise, the more we can produce!


Perks

You buy perks, we get to go to Firefly! All details listed below.
NEW!! Rock Ladies Uni-sex Distressed Tee, $40 ($32 for early birds!) // This tee has been released exclusively on Indiegogo. The Rock Ladies tee is designed and printed in Nashville, TN and features four names in the shape of a lightning bolt. It is printed on an acid wash tee, so it's fits and looks like your favorite vintage tee.

Uni-sex Tees, $32 ($25 for early birds!) // These tees are all designed and printed in Nashville, TN. There are four options- Guitars, Cadillacs, What Would Willie Do, Go Your Own Way and Mama Tried.

Florence Kimono, $72 ($60 for early birds!) //Our tie-dye kimonos are one-size and are designed to fit anyone. Each kimono is hand-dyed one by one, so each kimono has it's own look. We try our best to make sure the coloring is almost identical, but each kimono will vary. This makes each kimono one of a kind!

Ladies Brunch hosted by HW at McGavock Manor- $25 ($75 VIP) // We will be hosting a ladies brunch at our home, also know as McGavock Manor. The event will take place on June 4, 2016 at 11 AM and will be hosted on the new deck in the backyard. More details/surprises will be provided to attendees and VIP guests will receive a really great swag bag!

Manifesto

Hey Wanderer is a call to those who are dreamers, thinkers, adventurers and believers. It’s a call to be better. We are all wanderers. We are all looking for something off the beaten path that will quench our thirst for knowledge, for being ahead, for being the best, and for living out dreams. Hey Wanderer is asking you not to settle, not to compromise, and to accept the struggle.

Behind Hey Wanderer, you can rest assured that you will find honesty, transparency and mistakes. We hope to inspire you to create, to dream, to lead, to follow, to think, to act and to embrace your path.

The truth is, we all fall on our faces, not finding what we are seeking because we are trapped by our choices to do what is easy, instead of what is right. But what is right is simple. What is right is gratifying. What is right can change the world. So, let’s the change the world together!

Risks & Challenges

As in any case, there are always risks where production times and shipping times are concerned. We have provided you with as accurate of an estimate as we can possibly give. However, production times can vary based on the amount of folks who support our campaign and on 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word! If you have supported our campaign monetarily, feel free to share that you have supported us. And if you can't give money, you can still share our campaign with others. Share on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Tumblr, E-mail, Text, Phone Call, or Word of mouth. Everything is helpful!

About our Name

The name Hey Wanderer emerged from a text conversation between Savannah and Casey as they weighed the merits of different ideas. While tossing ideas back and forth, the partners realized that they both love the classic hymn, “Come Thou Fount of Every Blessing.” The song contains the phrase "prone to wander” – a sentiment that both women could relate to and that they believed others would, as well. But, as further lines in the song reveal, God binds his heart to us, no matter where we wander. To the company’s owners, the name Hey Wanderer is a soothing reminder to all who stray. You are understood. And you are safe here. 

Brand Story

Hey Wanderer is a company founded on friendship and creativity. Owners Casey Freeman and Savannah McNeill met in 2011, waiting tables at a downtown Nashville restaurant. Savannah, a native Texan, was a former art student, new to town; Casey, who hails from Tennessee, was in nursing school.

They quickly became close, bonding over their pursuit of beauty and truth. Those two touchstones marked their first creative co-venture: a blog called Oh So Pretty the Diaries, featuring beauty tutorials, fashion posts, DIY craft tips and recipes. Savannah and Casey’s posts received broad exposure on Pinterest; at the height of Oh So Pretty’s popularity, their instructional videos were getting as many as 200,000 page views a day.

The year 2014 brought change. With the goal of assuming a more mature voice and broadening their coverage, they agreed to call the blog Hey Wanderer. Charged with putting together a DIY post, Savannah sewed a simple but luxurious kimono, which she then hand-dyed. They knew they had something special. Savannah’s design instructions never made it online. Hey Wanderer had become a fashion business.

Savannah got to work making more kimonos, which they sold at pop-up sales. When the time came to expand their production, they did so ethically, by employing members of Nashville’s large refugee community.

They expanded their reach to festivals, and continued to build their brand through the rest of 2014 and into 2015. Early that year, the launch of a Hey Wanderer Kickstarter campaign brought a new round of customers and press recognition to Hey Wanderer. Sales continued to grow. They began to explore wholesale.

Today, the women operate Hey Wanderer out of the home they share in East Nashville. Last year, their house became part of their operation: Savannah and Casey live and work on the first floor, while the second is devoted to McGavock Manor, a popular AirBNB rental that has been featured in Apartment Therapy and Domino.

Savannah sewed a simple but luxurious kimono, which she then hand-dyed. They knew
they had something special. Savannah’s design instructions never made it online.
Hey Wanderer had become a fashion business.
Savannah got to work making
more kimonos, which they sold at pop-up sales. When the time came to expand
their production, they did so ethically, by employing members of Nashville’s
large refugee community.
They expanded their reach to
festivals, and continued to build their brand through the rest of 2014 and into
2015. Early that year, the launch of a Hey Wanderer Kickstarter campaign brought
a new round of customers and press recognition to Hey Wanderer. Sales continued
to grow. They began to explore wholesale.
Today, the women operate Hey
Wanderer out of the home they share in East Nashville. Last year, their house became
part of their operation: Savannah and Casey live and work on the first floor,
while the second is devoted to McGavock Manor, a popular AirBNB rental that has
been featured in Apartment Therapy and Domino.

story:
Excerpt from "The things my mother taught me" about the creators Imani + Carolyn Quinn

When we started Swaje a year ago we were sending material, patterns and full pieces back and forth between Oregon and California and when I have the chance, I sew with her in Oregon as well. It’s truly a gift to be able to work with my mother. And that is why the vision of this company is womanhood, woman empowerment and passing gifts and lessons down from generation to generation. 

Here at Swaje it is our mission to cultivate a multicultural lifestyle, where a little bit of everyone is seen. We are heavily influenced by the afro textiles due to Imani’s background, but it is our duty to give a place for everyone to be a part of, to build a more open, all encompassing community. at Swaje we hope to enrich those moments bringing a multicultural look at fashion as our world today is evolving and blending. Clothes are a part of us, they are a part of our story, and they are our introduction to the world before a word is uttered. Swaje wants to be a part of the world that embraces many in a collective consciousness to bring connection. To give people a clothing line that intentionally builds self-empowerment through the designs.

With the money funded we plan to begin production based in Los Angeles this July. Thus far we have samples made for the collection of men's and women's clothing and intend on purchasing textile sourced from West Africa . With this projection it is our goal to have the afro-inspired collection available for purchase in the month of August, with preorder set for July. 

Please help us in the journey to inspire others through our vision and designs, be a part of the SWAJE community. 

xoxo,

The Quinn Women

story:
Our Story...

Portier Jewelers was born 40 years ago with Edilberto Portilla in a small town in Colombia, Southamerica. Portier means "Portilla - Hermanos" in english Portilla Brothers.

We have being working in the US since 2005, we opened our booth in a flea market in 2011 since then we have being improving our jewelry skills and quality, performing jewelry and watch repair services.

In order to grow our business, We decided to create a jewelry line, we wanted to create something able to bond with people, able to enclose emotions, and we did it. We created our first Photo Charm our lovely heart.

Now we want to add new shapes to our Photo Charms Line, so we just designed new shapes, introducing our Expressive Flower, Life Circle & Time Square. It's all about carrying your favorite pictures in a high quality jewelry design.

 

What we need...

 

In order to reach our business goals, we need $10.000, with this money we are going to massively produce our new shapes to low our costs, also we want to create an APP so or customers can customize our charms in simple steps from the phone.

 

What you get...

If you support our project, you're helping us to reach our dream also you'll get to choose one of our charms and customize it with your own photo.

 

Risks & Challenges..

In case that we get to over sale and we have to produce hundreds of charms above our possibilities, we will be able to hire a massive manufacturer with our own quality standards.
 

Another great way to help us...

You can also share our project with your family and friends on your personal social media.

story:
English Français

Translate with Google... Thank you Google ! Traduit à l'aide de Google. Merci Google ! :p :p

Hello the world ! Salut la Terre !

I am Zach, PR officer, 30 years old. Nice to meet you ! Je suis Zach, Consultant en RP, j'ai 30 ans. Enchanté !

I launched a few months ago a think tank with the objective to provide innovative solutions for a sustainable world. As I am Franco-Moroccan, I have an extraordinary opportunity... I have the privilege of hosting two successive COP ! The COP21 was held in Paris ( France ) and the COP22 to be held in November in Marrakech ( Morocco ).

J'ai lancé il y a quelques mois un think tant dans le but de proposer des solutions innovantes pour batir un monde durable. Je suis franco-marocain. Comme tous les franco-marocains, j'ai le privilège de recevoir 2 COP successives !! La COP21 a eu lieu à Paris (France) et la COP22 aura lieu à Marrakech (Maroc) en novembre prochain !

I would like to take this opportunity to offer you to participate in a project history : I propose to produce a new symbol for sustainable development : the smart torch « Light Us ». Designed and produced by ordinary citizens of the world , she will educate humanity on the issue of global warming that threatens our future.

J'aimerais saisir cette opportunité pour vous proposer de participer à un projet historique: je propose de produire un nouveau symbole pour le développement durable : la Torche intelligente "Light Us" ! Conçue et produite par d'ordinaires citoyens du monde, elle permettra de sensibiliser l'humanité sur la question de réchauffement climatique qui menace notre avenir.

To present this torch, we will forward it from Paris to Marrakech in electric vehicle  during a single event : The Light Us Sustainable Relay. This will allow us to demonstrate that we can design to travel differently , in the interest of all.

Pour présenter cette torche, nous l'acheminerons de Paris à Marrakech en véhicule électrique dans le cadre d'un événement unique : Le Relais Durable "Light us". Cela démontrera que nous pouvons concevoir de voyager autrement, dans l'intérêt de tous.

From the COP22 , the states receiving the COP will pass the torch as in an Olympic relay. If we can defeat global warming, then we are all gold medalists . We have offered a future for our children .

À partir de la COP22, les Etats qui recevront la COP se transmettront la torche comme lors d'un relais Olympique. Si nous parvenons à endiguer le réchauffement climatique, alors nous serons tous médaillés d'or !!! Nous aurons offert un avenir à nos enfants. 

We of course first contacted the organizers of COP21 and COP22 .

Nous avons, bien sur, d'abord contacté les organisateurs des COP21 et COP22.

We have submitted the project to the scientific committee of the COP22 , which was evaluated positively , and we will send the Official COP22 Label for our side event . We thank the organizing committee of the COP22 and the Minister of Environment of Morocco , Mrs. Hakima El Haite , who testified his support on Facebook !

Nous avons soumis le projet au Comité Scientifique de la COP22, qui l'a évalué positivement, et nous enverra dans les jours à venir le Label Officiel de la COP22 pour notre événement !Nous remercions le Comité d'Organisation de la COP22, et la Ministre de l'Environnement du Maroc, Madame  Hakima El Haite, qui nous a témoigné son soutien sur Facebook !

We also discuss with private partners , we hope to see many around this event. Of course we will keep you informed of our progress during the campaign. Nous discutons également avec des partenaires privés. Nous espérons les voir nombreux à cet événement. 

Let's discover below the 17 Sustainable Development Goals. Découvrez ci-dessous les 17 Objecifs de Développement Durable

Before getting into the thick of it , I invite you to discover the actors in this great initiative in the photo gallery !

Avant d'entrer dans le vif du sujet, je vous invite à découvrir les acteurs de cette belle initiative dans la gallerie photo !

WHY WE HAVE LAUNCHED THIS PROJECT

POURQUOI NOUS AVONS LANCÉ​ CE PROJET 

We were talking about environment with members. The conclusion seemed clear and shared by all: the earth is sick. Very sick. And if we continue to pollute as we do, without thinking about the consequences, we will leave our children a planet virtually uninhabitable. Why give us much trouble to access the progress, and continue to write the history of humanity, if it is to destroy nature, that which gives us life, feeds us and protect us? What if interest to work hard to reach with comfort and technology if, at the same time, you set fire to your house?

Nous parlions d'environnement avec des membres de l'association. Le constat semblait clair et partagé par tous : la Terre est malade. Très malade. Et si nous continuons à la polluer comme nous le faisons, sans penser aux conséquences, nous laisserons à nos enfants une planète quasi-invivable. Pourquoi nous donner tant de mal pour accéder au progrès, et continuer d'écrire l'Histoire de l'humanité, si c'est pour détruire la nature, celle qui nous donne la vie, nous nourrit, et nous protège ? Quel intérêt de travailler dur pour accéder au confort et à la technologie si, dans le même temps, vous mettez le feu à votre maison ?​

What is amazing is that, until around us, and despite the immense media coverage of the COP21, very few people know what global warming. Too few people are aware of the disasters that await us.

Ce qui est étonnant, c'est que, jusqu'autour de nous, et malgré l'immense couverture médiatique dont à bénéficié la COP21, très peu de gens savent ce qu'est le réchauffement climatique. Trop peu de gens sont conscients des catastrophes qui nous guettent​

We then had the idea to design a new symbol to endorse the fight against climate change and hold high the banner of the 17 sustainable development goals. Our model? The Olympic torch. No introduction of, and I think she has all our sympathy. Whoever we are, wherever we are, there are high chances may have been heard.  When she passes in a place, she unleashes the crowds. But instead of fire, we chose to consecrate the light...

Nous avons alors eu l'idée de concevoir un nouveau symbole pour incarner la lutte contre le changement climatique et porter haut l'étendard des 17 objectifs de développement durable. Notre modèle ? La torche olympique. On ne la présente plus, et je pense qu'elle a toute notre sympathie. Qui que l'on soit, où que l'on soit, il y a  de grande chances qu'on en ait entendu parler. A son passage, elle déchaîne les foules. Sauf qu'à la place du feu, nous voulons consacrer la lumière...

THE LIGHT US SUSTAINABLE TORCH

LA TORCHE DURABLE "LIGHT US" 

CHARACTERISTICS OF THE LIGHT US TORCH:

CARACTERISTIQUES DE LA TORCHE LIGHT US:

  • Luminous and photovoltaic, it lights and reloads thanks to sunrays. Lumineuse et photovoltaïque : elle produira de la lumière et se rechargera grâce aux rayons du soleil

  • Ecological and biodegradable, it is manufactured with 100% biodegradable materials to promote a ‘clean product’. Ecologique et Biodégradable : elle sera façonnée dans des matériaux 100% biodégradables pour promouvoir le « produire propre ».
  • Smart and connected, to favor interaction between the torch and the public. Intelligente et connectée : pour permettre la création d’interactions entre la torche et le public.

 

THE SYMBOLISM OF LIGHT :

LA SYMBOLIQUE DE LA LUMIÈRE 

LIGHT : SOURCE OF LIFE  La lumière aux origines de la vie.

The light has always represented life. It would even be its origin. Some 3 billion years ago there was an innovation that revolutionized life. Some cells developed the capability to transform the solar energy into chemical power, thus creating photosynthesis, which is essential for life on Earth. Thanks to it vegetal species generate oxygen, grow cereals, fruits and vegetables we feed upon and that feed our animals.

La lumière représente la vie depuis toujours. Elle en serait même à l’origine. Il y a environ 3 milliards d’années apparut une innovation qui allait révolutionner la vie. Certaines cellules développèrent la faculté de transformer l’énergie du rayonnement solaire en énergie chimique, créant ainsi la photosynthèse. Cette dernière est essentielle à la vie sur Terre : à travers elle, les espèces végétales nous fournissent de l’oxygène, et produisent les céréales, les fruits et les légumes dont nous nous nourrissons, et avec lesquels nous alimentons nos bêtes.

THANKS TO THOMAS EDISON, THE ELECTRIC BULB, AN EVOLUTION FOR EVERYDAY LIFE ​Grâce à Thomas Edison, l’ampoule électrique révolution de la vie quotidienne

As a major element in comfort and modernity lighting is part of the things that enable the well being in our societies. Until the 19th century, fire was the main source of light, principally using torches or candles. Candles were mostly used because they were easy to use and cheap to buy.

Élément majeur dans le confort et la modernité, l’éclairage fait partie des choses qui assurent le bon fonctionnement de nos sociétés. Jusqu’au 19è siècle, le feu a été la principale source de lumière, notamment par l’utilisation de torches, de chandelles ou de bougies. Les bougies étaient les plus utilisées, pour leur facilité de fonctionnement et leur faible coût qui les rendait accessibles.

On Oct.22 1879, a brilliant engineer invented electric lighting. After numerous attempts, tha American Thomas Edison managed to produce a lasting lighting, he got current through a carbon filament in a vaccum bulb. Its use has drastically changed the everyday life of man. Nowadays electric lighting represents one of the most spread sources of energy in the world.

Le 22 octobre 1879, un ingénieur génial invente l'éclairage électrique. Après d'innombrables essais, l'Américain Thomas Edison réussit à produire un éclairage durable en faisant passer du courant à travers un filament de carbone dans une ampoule sous vide. Son usage a bouleversé la vie quotidienne des individus. De nos jours, l’éclairage électrique représente l’une des sources de lumière les plus répandues au monde.

TOWARD A NEW ENLIGHTENMENT Vers un nouveau Siècle des Lumières ?

The Age of the Enlightenment traditionally took place during the 18th century. The Enlightenment is a European philosiphical and literary movement of the 18th century, based on reason which allows, according to those philosophers,to break the barriers of prejudices and intolerance to lead mankind toward happiness, freedom and knowledge.

Le Siècle des Lumières désigne traditionnellement le 18è siècle. Les Lumières sont un mouvement philosophique et littéraire européen du 18è siècle fondé sur la raison qui permet, selon les philosophes des lumières, de sortir des préjugés et de l’intolérance, et de faire progresser les hommes vers le bonheur, la liberté et le savoir.

Thanks to ‘Light Us’ everybody will be able to get tools to preserve life, to light their path toward a brighter future.

A travers « Light Us », chacun pourra disposer d’outils pour préserver la vie, éclairer son quotidien et illuminer les chemins de l’avenir.

 

TRAVELLING POLLUTION

LA POLLUTION EN VOYAGE

Every year more than 2.5 million Moroccans living abroad come back home to visit their relatives and get some holidays, to go back to their roots and keep in touch with their mother country.

Chaque année, plus de 2,5 millions de marocains résidents hors des frontières du Royaume rentrent au pays pour rendre visite à leurs familles et profiter des vacances pour se ressourcer et maintenir le lien qui unit les marocains du monde à leur patrie.

That mass migration takes place in summer between June and September, essentially by car, as most of the Moroccans living abroad are settled in Western Europe.

So during the summer 2015 2,474,348 Moroccans living abroad went back to Morocco ; a figure steadily rising (+4.56%) compared to the same period in 2014. (cf Department in charge of Moroccans living abroad and migration).

Cette migration massive, qui a lieu lors des mois d’été, entre juin et septembre, se fait essentiellement par la route, l’immense majorité des marocains du monde habitant l’Europe de l’ouest.

Ainsi, au cours de l’été 2015, 2.474.348 Marocains résidant à l'étranger (MRE) ont regagné le Maroc, un chiffre en une hausse de 4,56 % par rapport à la même période de l'année précédente (cf. ministère chargé des Marocains résidant à l'étranger et des Affaires de la migration).

These transits are made easier by the Fundation Mohammed V for Solidarity under the patronage of His Majesty King Mohammed VI and by the ‘Operation Marhaba’, whose objective is to welcome during summer Moroccans living abroad. The 2015 edition was a real success especially thanks to the constant cooperation between the Moroccan and Spanish authorities and thank to the implication of many partners (private companies, associations,…)

Ces transits sont facilités par la mise en place par la Fondation Mohammed V pour la Solidarité, et sous le Haut Patronage de Sa Majesté le Roi Mohamed VI, de « l’Opération Marhaba », dont l’objectif est de faciliter l'accueil des Marocains résidant à l'étranger (MRE) au cours des périodes estivales.

L’édition 2015 a connu un grand succès, notamment grâce à la coordination permanente entre les autorités marocaines et espagnoles et à l’implication de nombreux intervenants (entreprises privées, associations etc.).

According to the figures we have the road through Spain is still the most important European way for Moroccan travelers. The massive summer migration of Moroccans from Europe may be a cause of pollution and increase the CO2 greenhouse gas emissions in that era of the world at a period when the temperatures are higher. We also have to add the incivilities travelers may be responsible for on the road (garbage, damage,…). Those behaviors are of course common to every nation, they are not specific to Moroccans.

Au regard des chiffres dont nous disposons, l’accès par l’Espagne constitue donc le plus important dans l’itinéraire européen des voyageurs marocains.

La migration estivale massive des marocains d’Europe peut constituer un vecteur de pollution et une source d’accroissement de l’émission des gaz à effet de serre non négligeable dans cette région du monde, au moment de l’année où les températures y sont les plus élevées. A cela s’ajoutent les incivilités dont peuvent se monter coupables ceux qui voyagent par la route (déchets, dégradations etc.). Ces comportements sont bien entendu inhérents à tous les peuples, et ne se limitent pas seulement aux voyageurs marocains.

EVENT : THE LIGHT US SUSTAINABLE RELAY

​ÉVÉNEMENT : LE RELAIS DURABLE "LIGHT US"

So we're going from Paris , and repeat the route we take from childhood to go to Morocco , but this time in the electric vehicle, proudly wearing the new symbol of the fight against global warming : Torch Light Us !

Nous partirons donc de Paris, et prendrons la route comme nous le faisons depuis notre plus tendre enfance pour rejoindre le Maroc. Mais cette fois-ci, nous le ferons en véhicule électrique, portant fièrement le nouveau Symbole de la lutte contre le Changement Climatique : La Torche "Light us" !

The trip will be broadcast live and uninterrupted on the internet, and all the chains that agree to disseminate us. Animations will enhance the trip, during which we expect three shows : in Paris, in Madrid and Marrakech.

Le voyage sera diffusé en direct et sans interruption sur internet, et sur toutes les chaînes qui accepteraient de nous diffuser. Des animations viendront agrémenter le voyage, durant lequel nous avons prévu d'organiser trois grands spectacles : à Paris pour le départ, à Madrid, et à l'arrivée à Marrakech.

 

THE LIGHT US WEB PLATFORM

A web platform dedicated to the Light Us Project would be created. It would be composed of a web site and of an application that would allow :

Une plateforme web dédiée au projet Light Us verrait le jour. Elle serait composée d’un site internet et d’une application qui permettraient :

  • To get multilingual information for citizens about sustainable development. D’informer, dans plusieurs langues, les citoyens sur les questions de développement durable
  • To promote programs and initiatives linked to the 17 SDGS for the COP. De promouvoir les programmes et initiatives en lien avec les 17 ODD ou la COP
  • To raise funds for projects (crowdfunding) and attract volunteers to take part into sustainable projects. De permettre aux porteurs de projet de lever des fonds (financement participatif) et d’attirer des bénévoles dans le but de réaliser des projets de développement durable
  • To create an online hub dedicated to sustainable development (written and audiovisual media).De créer une plateforme en ligne dédiée au développement durable (média écrit et audiovisuel)
  • To inform on the standards and labels concerning sustainable development.D’informer sur les normes et labels en vigueur en matière de DD
  • To gather and spread the right ecological practices observed in the world.De répertorier et diffuser les bonnes pratiques écologiques observées de par le monde
  • To actively take part to the rise of a culture of sustainable development, sponsored by international, national, regional and local authorities. De participer activement à l’émergence d’une culture du développement durable, en partenariat avec les autorités internationales, nationales, régionales et locales

​

 

STATE OF PLAY

ETAT DES LIEUX

We are in the heart of the project. We designed the torch, established specifications, and print 3D models . We now need you to finance the production of the torch, the organization of the event and the realization of the web platform that will be the Light Us Project Center. 

Nous sommes dans le coeur du projet. Nous avons conçu la torche, établi le cahier des charges et imprimé le modèle miniature en 3D. Nous avons maintenant besoin de vous pour financer la production de la torche, l'organisation de l’événement et le développement de la plateforme web qui constituera le coeur du projet Light Us.

I thank already all good souls who have joined the project, including our friends from the company Discovery 3D , which produced the 3D miniature model of the torch.

Je remercie d'ores et déjà toutes les bonnes âmes qui soutiennent le projet, parmi lesquels nos amis de la société Discovery 3D, qui a produit la torche miniature en 3D !

Here they are !! Go guess who is Zach and who is Ayoub..?  We worked hard all summer, no time to rest, our faces are pale, but let's be the best for our planet  !!!

Les voicies !!! D'ailleurs, devinez qui est Zach et qui est Ayoub...? Nous avons travaillé dur tout l'été, pas le temps de dormir, nos visages sont pâles, mais nous sommes prêts à lutter pour préserver pour notre planète !

BUDGET

With 50 000 €, we can go with my friend Ayoub and six other persons, aboard 2 TESLA , equipped with the torch. But seeing the biggest things...

Avec 50 000€, nous pouvons faire le voyage avec mon ami Ayoub et 6 autres personnes, à bord de 2 véhicules TESLA, équipés de la torche. Mais si nous voyons plus grand...

If we can gather 1 MILLION €, 120 people from around the world will swell our caravan towards Marrakech and COP22 !

Si nous pouvons réunir 1 million €, 120 personnes, venues des quatre coins du monde, nous accompagneront à Marrakech pour vivre la COP22 !!!

FIRST LEVEL BUDGET

BUDGET MINIMALISTE

LAST LEVEL BUDGET 

BUDGET ESPÉRÉ​ 

If we reach this level, we will create the event! Let's cruise together towards the COP22!
If we can gather 1 million €, 120 people from around the worlds accompany us for a historic journey!

Si nous pouvons atteindre cet objectif, nous créerons l’événement !! En route pour la COP22 ! Si nous réunissons 1 million d'euros, 120 personnes venues du monde entier nous accompagneront pour un voyage historique !

It seems impossible? We are 7 billion on Earth, and more than 3 billion to use the internet. If everyone gave € 1 ...

Ca vous semble impossible ? Nous sommes 7 milliards sur Terre, dont plus de 3 milliards d'internautes. Si chacun met 1€...

WE NEED YOU TO SUCCEED !

NOUS AVONS BESOIN DE VOUS POUR REUSSIR !

I can already see the arrival of the caravan to Marrakech, which mark the end of one journey and the beginning of a beautiful adventure citizen !

Je vois déjà l'arrivée de la caravane à Marrakech, qui marquera la fin d'un voyage et le début d'une magnifique aventure citoyenne !

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT !

MERCI POUR VOTRE SOUTIEN !

And see you in Marrakech...

Et RDV à Marrakech...
