Conçue et produite par d'ordinaires citoyens du monde, elle permettra de sensibiliser l'humanité sur la question de réchauffement climatique qui menace notre avenir.To present this torch, we will forward it from Paris to Marrakech in electric vehicle  during a single event : The Light Us Sustainable Relay. This will allow us to demonstrate that we can design to travel differently , in the interest of all.Pour présenter cette torche, nous l'acheminerons de Paris à Marrakech en véhicule électrique dans le cadre d'un événement unique : Le Relais Durable "Light us". Cela démontrera que nous pouvons concevoir de voyager autrement, dans l'intérêt de tous.From the COP22 , the states receiving the COP will pass the torch as in an Olympic relay. If we can defeat global warming, then we are all gold medalists . We have offered a future for our children .À partir de la COP22, les Etats qui recevront la COP se transmettront la torche comme lors d'un relais Olympique. Si nous parvenons à endiguer le réchauffement climatique, alors nous serons tous médaillés d'or !!! Nous aurons offert un avenir à nos enfants. We of course first contacted the organizers of COP21 and COP22 . Nous avons, bien sur, d'abord contacté les organisateurs des COP21 et COP22.We have submitted the project to the scientific committee of the COP22 , which was evaluated positively , and we will send the Official COP22 Label for our side event . We thank the organizing committee of the COP22 and the Minister of Environment of Morocco , Mrs. Hakima El Haite , who testified his support on Facebook !Nous avons soumis le projet au Comité Scientifique de la COP22, qui l'a évalué positivement, et nous enverra dans les jours à venir le Label Officiel de la COP22 pour notre événement !Nous remercions le Comité d'Organisation de la COP22, et la Ministre de l'Environnement du Maroc, Madame  Hakima El Haite, qui nous a témoigné son soutien sur Facebook !We also discuss with private partners , we hope to see many around this event. Of course we will keep you informed of our progress during the campaign. Nous discutons également avec des partenaires privés. Nous espérons les voir nombreux à cet événement. Let's discover below the 17 Sustainable Development Goals. Découvrez ci-dessous les 17 Objecifs de Développement Durable Before getting into the thick of it , I invite you to discover the actors in this great initiative in the photo gallery !Avant d'entrer dans le vif du sujet, je vous invite à découvrir les acteurs de cette belle initiative dans la gallerie photo !WHY WE HAVE LAUNCHED THIS PROJECTPOURQUOI NOUS AVONS LANCÉ​ CE PROJET We were talking about environment with members. The conclusion seemed clear and shared by all: the earth is sick. Very sick. And if we continue to pollute as we do, without thinking about the consequences, we will leave our children a planet virtually uninhabitable. Why give us much trouble to access the progress, and continue to write the history of humanity, if it is to destroy nature, that which gives us life, feeds us and protect us? What if interest to work hard to reach with comfort and technology if, at the same time, you set fire to your house?Nous parlions d'environnement avec des membres de l'association. Le constat semblait clair et partagé par tous : la Terre est malade. Très malade. Et si nous continuons à la polluer comme nous le faisons, sans penser aux conséquences, nous laisserons à nos enfants une planète quasi-invivable. Pourquoi nous donner tant de mal pour accéder au progrès, et continuer d'écrire l'Histoire de l'humanité, si c'est pour détruire la nature, celle qui nous donne la vie, nous nourrit, et nous protège ? Quel intérêt de travailler dur pour accéder au confort et à la technologie si, dans le même temps, vous mettez le feu à votre maison ?​What is amazing is that, until around us, and despite the immense media coverage of the COP21, very few people know what global warming. Too few people are aware of the disasters that await us.Ce qui est étonnant, c'est que, jusqu'autour de nous, et malgré l'immense couverture médiatique dont à bénéficié la COP21, très peu de gens savent ce qu'est le réchauffement climatique. Trop peu de gens sont conscients des catastrophes qui nous guettent​We then had the idea to design a new symbol to endorse the fight against climate change and hold high the banner of the 17 sustainable development goals. Our model? The Olympic torch. No introduction of, and I think she has all our sympathy. Whoever we are, wherever we are, there are high chances may have been heard.  When she passes in a place, she unleashes the crowds. But instead of fire, we chose to consecrate the light...Nous avons alors eu l'idée de concevoir un nouveau symbole pour incarner la lutte contre le changement climatique et porter haut l'étendard des 17 objectifs de développement durable. Notre modèle ? La torche olympique. On ne la présente plus, et je pense qu'elle a toute notre sympathie. Qui que l'on soit, où que l'on soit, il y a  de grande chances qu'on en ait entendu parler. A son passage, elle déchaîne les foules. Sauf qu'à la place du feu, nous voulons consacrer la lumière...THE LIGHT US SUSTAINABLE TORCHLA TORCHE DURABLE "LIGHT US" CHARACTERISTICS OF THE LIGHT US TORCH:CARACTERISTIQUES DE LA TORCHE LIGHT US:
Luminous and photovoltaic, it lights and reloads thanks to sunrays. Lumineuse et photovoltaïque : elle produira de la lumière et se rechargera grâce aux rayons du soleil

Ecological and biodegradable, it is manufactured with 100% biodegradable materials to promote a ‘clean product’. Ecologique et Biodégradable : elle sera façonnée dans des matériaux 100% biodégradables pour promouvoir le « produire propre ».


Smart and connected, to favor interaction between the torch and the public. Intelligente et connectée : pour permettre la création d’interactions entre la torche et le public.

 THE SYMBOLISM OF LIGHT :LA SYMBOLIQUE DE LA LUMIÈRE LIGHT : SOURCE OF LIFE  La lumière aux origines de la vie. The light has always represented life. It would even be its origin. Some 3 billion years ago there was an innovation that revolutionized life. Some cells developed the capability to transform the solar energy into chemical power, thus creating photosynthesis, which is essential for life on Earth. Thanks to it vegetal species generate oxygen, grow cereals, fruits and vegetables we feed upon and that feed our animals.La lumière représente la vie depuis toujours. Elle en serait même à l’origine. Il y a environ 3 milliards d’années apparut une innovation qui allait révolutionner la vie. Certaines cellules développèrent la faculté de transformer l’énergie du rayonnement solaire en énergie chimique, créant ainsi la photosynthèse. Cette dernière est essentielle à la vie sur Terre : à travers elle, les espèces végétales nous fournissent de l’oxygène, et produisent les céréales, les fruits et les légumes dont nous nous nourrissons, et avec lesquels nous alimentons nos bêtes.THANKS TO THOMAS EDISON, THE ELECTRIC BULB, AN EVOLUTION FOR EVERYDAY LIFE ​Grâce à Thomas Edison, l’ampoule électrique révolution de la vie quotidienneAs a major element in comfort and modernity lighting is part of the things that enable the well being in our societies. Until the 19th century, fire was the main source of light, principally using torches or candles. Candles were mostly used because they were easy to use and cheap to buy.Élément majeur dans le confort et la modernité, l’éclairage fait partie des choses qui assurent le bon fonctionnement de nos sociétés. Jusqu’au 19è siècle, le feu a été la principale source de lumière, notamment par l’utilisation de torches, de chandelles ou de bougies. Les bougies étaient les plus utilisées, pour leur facilité de fonctionnement et leur faible coût qui les rendait accessibles.On Oct.22 1879, a brilliant engineer invented electric lighting. After numerous attempts, tha American Thomas Edison managed to produce a lasting lighting, he got current through a carbon filament in a vaccum bulb. Its use has drastically changed the everyday life of man. Nowadays electric lighting represents one of the most spread sources of energy in the world.Le 22 octobre 1879, un ingénieur génial invente l'éclairage électrique. Après d'innombrables essais, l'Américain Thomas Edison réussit à produire un éclairage durable en faisant passer du courant à travers un filament de carbone dans une ampoule sous vide. Son usage a bouleversé la vie quotidienne des individus. De nos jours, l’éclairage électrique représente l’une des sources de lumière les plus répandues au monde.TOWARD A NEW ENLIGHTENMENT Vers un nouveau Siècle des Lumières ?The Age of the Enlightenment traditionally took place during the 18th century. The Enlightenment is a European philosiphical and literary movement of the 18th century, based on reason which allows, according to those philosophers,to break the barriers of prejudices and intolerance to lead mankind toward happiness, freedom and knowledge.Le Siècle des Lumières désigne traditionnellement le 18è siècle. Les Lumières sont un mouvement philosophique et littéraire européen du 18è siècle fondé sur la raison qui permet, selon les philosophes des lumières, de sortir des préjugés et de l’intolérance, et de faire progresser les hommes vers le bonheur, la liberté et le savoir.Thanks to ‘Light Us’ everybody will be able to get tools to preserve life, to light their path toward a brighter future.A travers « Light Us », chacun pourra disposer d’outils pour préserver la vie, éclairer son quotidien et illuminer les chemins de l’avenir. TRAVELLING POLLUTIONLA POLLUTION EN VOYAGEEvery year more than 2.5 million Moroccans living abroad come back home to visit their relatives and get some holidays, to go back to their roots and keep in touch with their mother country.Chaque année, plus de 2,5 millions de marocains résidents hors des frontières du Royaume rentrent au pays pour rendre visite à leurs familles et profiter des vacances pour se ressourcer et maintenir le lien qui unit les marocains du monde à leur patrie.That mass migration takes place in summer between June and September, essentially by car, as most of the Moroccans living abroad are settled in Western Europe.So during the summer 2015 2,474,348 Moroccans living abroad went back to Morocco ; a figure steadily rising (+4.56%) compared to the same period in 2014. (cf Department in charge of Moroccans living abroad and migration).Cette migration massive, qui a lieu lors des mois d’été, entre juin et septembre, se fait essentiellement par la route, l’immense majorité des marocains du monde habitant l’Europe de l’ouest.Ainsi, au cours de l’été 2015, 2.474.348 Marocains résidant à l'étranger (MRE) ont regagné le Maroc, un chiffre en une hausse de 4,56 % par rapport à la même période de l'année précédente (cf. ministère chargé des Marocains résidant à l'étranger et des Affaires de la migration).These transits are made easier by the Fundation Mohammed V for Solidarity under the patronage of His Majesty King Mohammed VI and by the ‘Operation Marhaba’, whose objective is to welcome during summer Moroccans living abroad. The 2015 edition was a real success especially thanks to the constant cooperation between the Moroccan and Spanish authorities and thank to the implication of many partners (private companies, associations,…)Ces transits sont facilités par la mise en place par la Fondation Mohammed V pour la Solidarité, et sous le Haut Patronage de Sa Majesté le Roi Mohamed VI, de « l’Opération Marhaba », dont l’objectif est de faciliter l'accueil des Marocains résidant à l'étranger (MRE) au cours des périodes estivales.L’édition 2015 a connu un grand succès, notamment grâce à la coordination permanente entre les autorités marocaines et espagnoles et à l’implication de nombreux intervenants (entreprises privées, associations etc.).According to the figures we have the road through Spain is still the most important European way for Moroccan travelers. The massive summer migration of Moroccans from Europe may be a cause of pollution and increase the CO2 greenhouse gas emissions in that era of the world at a period when the temperatures are higher. We also have to add the incivilities travelers may be responsible for on the road (garbage, damage,…). Those behaviors are of course common to every nation, they are not specific to Moroccans.Au regard des chiffres dont nous disposons, l’accès par l’Espagne constitue donc le plus important dans l’itinéraire européen des voyageurs marocains.La migration estivale massive des marocains d’Europe peut constituer un vecteur de pollution et une source d’accroissement de l’émission des gaz à effet de serre non négligeable dans cette région du monde, au moment de l’année où les températures y sont les plus élevées. A cela s’ajoutent les incivilités dont peuvent se monter coupables ceux qui voyagent par la route (déchets, dégradations etc.). Ces comportements sont bien entendu inhérents à tous les peuples, et ne se limitent pas seulement aux voyageurs marocains.EVENT : THE LIGHT US SUSTAINABLE RELAY​ÉVÉNEMENT : LE RELAIS DURABLE "LIGHT US"So we're going from Paris , and repeat the route we take from childhood to go to Morocco , but this time in the electric vehicle, proudly wearing the new symbol of the fight against global warming : Torch Light Us !Nous partirons donc de Paris, et prendrons la route comme nous le faisons depuis notre plus tendre enfance pour rejoindre le Maroc. Mais cette fois-ci, nous le ferons en véhicule électrique, portant fièrement le nouveau Symbole de la lutte contre le Changement Climatique : La Torche "Light us" !The trip will be broadcast live and uninterrupted on the internet, and all the chains that agree to disseminate us. Animations will enhance the trip, during which we expect three shows : in Paris, in Madrid and Marrakech.Le voyage sera diffusé en direct et sans interruption sur internet, et sur toutes les chaînes qui accepteraient de nous diffuser. Des animations viendront agrémenter le voyage, durant lequel nous avons prévu d'organiser trois grands spectacles : à Paris pour le départ, à Madrid, et à l'arrivée à Marrakech. THE LIGHT US WEB PLATFORMA web platform dedicated to the Light Us Project would be created. It would be composed of a web site and of an application that would allow :Une plateforme web dédiée au projet Light Us verrait le jour. Elle serait composée d’un site internet et d’une application qui permettraient :

To get multilingual information for citizens about sustainable development. D’informer, dans plusieurs langues, les citoyens sur les questions de développement durable


To promote programs and initiatives linked to the 17 SDGS for the COP. De promouvoir les programmes et initiatives en lien avec les 17 ODD ou la COP


To raise funds for projects (crowdfunding) and attract volunteers to take part into sustainable projects. De permettre aux porteurs de projet de lever des fonds (financement participatif) et d’attirer des bénévoles dans le but de réaliser des projets de développement durable


To create an online hub dedicated to sustainable development (written and audiovisual media).De créer une plateforme en ligne dédiée au développement durable (média écrit et audiovisuel)


To inform on the standards and labels concerning sustainable development.D’informer sur les normes et labels en vigueur en matière de DD


To gather and spread the right ecological practices observed in the world.De répertorier et diffuser les bonnes pratiques écologiques observées de par le monde


To actively take part to the rise of a culture of sustainable development, sponsored by international, national, regional and local authorities. De participer activement à l’émergence d’une culture du développement durable, en partenariat avec les autorités internationales, nationales, régionales et locales

​ STATE OF PLAYETAT DES LIEUXWe are in the heart of the project. We designed the torch, established specifications, and print 3D models . We now need you to finance the production of the torch, the organization of the event and the realization of the web platform that will be the Light Us Project Center. Nous sommes dans le coeur du projet. Nous avons conçu la torche, établi le cahier des charges et imprimé le modèle miniature en 3D. Nous avons maintenant besoin de vous pour financer la production de la torche, l'organisation de l’événement et le développement de la plateforme web qui constituera le coeur du projet Light Us.I thank already all good souls who have joined the project, including our friends from the company Discovery 3D , which produced the 3D miniature model of the torch.Je remercie d'ores et déjà toutes les bonnes âmes qui soutiennent le projet, parmi lesquels nos amis de la société Discovery 3D, qui a produit la torche miniature en 3D !Here they are !! Go guess who is Zach and who is Ayoub..?  We worked hard all summer, no time to rest, our faces are pale, but let's be the best for our planet  !!!Les voicies !!! D'ailleurs, devinez qui est Zach et qui est Ayoub...? Nous avons travaillé dur tout l'été, pas le temps de dormir, nos visages sont pâles, mais nous sommes prêts à lutter pour préserver pour notre planète !BUDGETWith 50 000 €, we can go with my friend Ayoub and six other persons, aboard 2 TESLA , equipped with the torch. But seeing the biggest things...Avec 50 000€, nous pouvons faire le voyage avec mon ami Ayoub et 6 autres personnes, à bord de 2 véhicules TESLA, équipés de la torche. Mais si nous voyons plus grand...If we can gather 1 MILLION €, 120 people from around the world will swell our caravan towards Marrakech and COP22 !Si nous pouvons réunir 1 million €, 120 personnes, venues des quatre coins du monde, nous accompagneront à Marrakech pour vivre la COP22 !!!FIRST LEVEL BUDGETBUDGET MINIMALISTELAST LEVEL BUDGET BUDGET ESPÉRÉ​ If we reach this level, we will create the event! Let's cruise together towards the COP22!If we can gather 1 million €, 120 people from around the worlds accompany us for a historic journey!Si nous pouvons atteindre cet objectif, nous créerons l’événement !! En route pour la COP22 ! Si nous réunissons 1 million d'euros, 120 personnes venues du monde entier nous accompagneront pour un voyage historique !It seems impossible? We are 7 billion on Earth, and more than 3 billion to use the internet. If everyone gave € 1 ...Ca vous semble impossible ? Nous sommes 7 milliards sur Terre, dont plus de 3 milliards d'internautes. Si chacun met 1€...WE NEED YOU TO SUCCEED !NOUS AVONS BESOIN DE VOUS POUR REUSSIR !I can already see the arrival of the caravan to Marrakech, which mark the end of one journey and the beginning of a beautiful adventure citizen !Je vois déjà l'arrivée de la caravane à Marrakech, qui marquera la fin d'un voyage et le début d'une magnifique aventure citoyenne !THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT !MERCI POUR VOTRE SOUTIEN !And see you in Marrakech...Et RDV à Marrakech...

story:
At GRACILL, we craft truly handmade, top quality men’s dress shoes at half the price with the aim of making luxury accessible to everyone. Selling directly to the customer enables us to keep the price low & provide absolute value.

Gracil is a Spanish word that translates to “Graceful” Each and every day in our small workshop, with utmost patience, persistence and their absolute genius, our master leather artisans and last makers turn leather into works of pure hand crafted artistry.


Gracill creations carry a soul of their own. Whether it’s an understated Brogue, a rakish Tassel Loafer or the audacious Monkstrap, finest leather, exquisite craftsmanship & purity of design is always the foundation.

A pair of well kept brogues speaks volumes about its wearer. A cocktail of authority, poise & sartorial perfection, these Full Brogues will stay with you for years to come. They will transition effortlessly from boardroom to a swanky dinner. Crafted almost entirely with hand, these  are made from the most luxurious calf leather, are hand-welted to enable resoling, have a hand-finished leather out-sole & lined with the softest of calf leathers to maximize the comfort.

The oxfords are probably the best business shoes you can buy. No other shoe will give you the confidence to close that deal than a pair of well-kept oxfords. Crafted almost entirely with hand, these  are made from the most luxurious calf leather, are hand-welted to enable resoling, have a hand-finished leather out-sole & lined with the softest of calf leathers to maximize the comfort.

If you’re looking to stand out, we would definitely recommend a pair Monkstrap shoes. Pair these with a rakish 3-piece suit or a slim pair of dark jeans. Crafted almost entirely with hand, these  are made from the most luxurious calf leather, are hand-welted to enable resoling, have a hand-finished leather out-sole & lined with the softest of calf leathers to maximize the comfort.

The loafer is an absolute essential to get your summer style on point. We have taken the more rakish way on the classic tassel loafers. We recommend pairing these with a slim navy suit or chinos. Crafted almost entirely with hand, these  are made from the most luxurious calf leather, are hand-welted to enable resoling, have a hand-finished leather out-sole & lined with the softest of calf leathers to maximize the comfort.

A well made Chukka or Chelsea Boot can transform any mundane outfit into a Rockstar! Pair these with a slim suit or dark jeans & you’ll be busy collecting compliments all day! Crafted almost entirely with hand, these  are made from the most luxurious calf leather, are hand-welted to enable resoling, have a hand-finished leather out-sole & lined with the softest of calf suedes to maximize the comfort.

We want to make sure that along the way we keep on providing the highest possible value to you. As we cross different funding levels we will be adding top quality calf-leather accessories to go with your pair! :)

           

We hold our shoes to the highest level of quality & exquisite craftsmanship. We use the best of materials to make sure that our customers get a shoe that’s long lasting, comfortable & looks great! We use:

·  The finest of top-grain calf leather for the shoe uppers

·  All our shoes are hand-welted, which enables resoling & long life

·  Our shoes come with cushioned leather insoles to ensure maximum comfort

·  Our shoes are fully lined with the softest calf leather to further enhance the            comfort

·  Top quality hardware and buckles

·  Hand-finished leather outsoles

·  Exquisite craftsmanship, hand-dyed patina & attention to detail to ensure an          aesthetically pleasing shoe.

 

We are offering shoe sizes ranging from US 7-14 and UK 6-13. Half size are currently not available. We offer a medium/standard width.

SHIPPING IS FREE for ALL the orders WORLDWIDE :) Kindly do note that if a pair needs to be exchanged, we’ll gladly do it but the shipping cost for the exchange will need to be charged both ways because kindly consider we’re working with very small margins for this Indiegogo campaign. Kindly also note that the taxes and import duties are not included in the perk amount since they are charged by the destination country & cannot be calculated by us.

                                                         

·  Top Notch Quality: We hold our shoes to the highest standards of quality. We ensure to use the finest of leathers & materials to make sure that you get a shoe that stays with you for ages.

·  Exquisite Craftsmanship & Design: Each and every day in our small workshop, with utmost patience, persistence and their absolute genius, our master leather artisans and last makers turn leather into works of pure handcrafted artistry.

·  Affordability & Great Value: By selling directly to the customer we are able to remove the middlemen & cut out the huge retail margins charged by most well-known brands. That allows us to bring you top quality shoes at half the price of a traditional handmade shoe that you’ll be able to enjoy season after season.

YOU are the pillar of our success! We need your push to help us get up & running. Help us by spreading the word & sharing our campaign with your friends & families. Should you have any questions, queries or require assistance you can ALWAYS talk to us at service@gracill.com You can also visit our website www.gracill.com or connect with us through Facebook, Twitter and Instagram. We look forward to seeing you!


Impact:

Our artisans put their heart & soul into creating shoes that are nothing less than handmade artistry. Your backing will help us to scale our operations & breath life into our vision of making true luxury available to everyone.

Risks & Challenges:

We have years of experience in the menswear industry. Our manufacturing, sourcing & logistics are aligned perfectly and we absolutely intend to deliver each & every pair on time & in top-notch quality. The biggest challenge always in manufacturing is production delay.  Although we’re on schedule & in top shape to deliver on time but there’s always a rare possibility of a slight delay. That being said, we will always be forthright and keep you updated through every stage. 

FAQs:

·  How to order the desired size and style?

   A survey will be sent at the end of the campaign to confirm your size & style                preference.

·  What are the shipping charges?

    Shipping is FREE WORLDWIDE! :)

·  What if I want to exchange?

   Should there be a need for exchange, we will gladly facilitate it but kindly do note        that the shipping cost for the exchange will need to be charged both ways since          we’re working with very small margins for this Indiegogo campaign.

·  How will the import/custom duties be handled?

   Kindly note that import/custom duties or taxes/VAT is not included in the perk          amount and has to be paid by the backer. Since the duties and taxes are levied by      the destination country it is not possible for us to calculate such charges.

·  How can I contact GRACILL? 

   Should you have any questions or require assistance, you can get in touch with us    at service@gracill.com

We are offering shoe sizes ranging from US 7-14 and UK 6-13. Half size are currently not available. We offer a medium/standard width.





SHIPPING IS FREE for ALL the
orders WORLDWIDE :) Kindly do note that if a pair needs to be exchanged, we’ll gladly do it
but the shipping cost for the exchange will need to be charged both ways because kindly consider we’re working with very small margins for this Indiegogo campaign. Kindly also
note that the taxes and import duties are not included in the perk amount since they are charged
by the destination country & cannot be calculated by us.

                                                         
· 
Top Notch
Quality: We hold our shoes to the highest standards of quality. We ensure
to use the finest of leathers & materials to make sure that you get a shoe
that stays with you for ages.
· 
Exquisite
Craftsmanship & Design: Each and every day in our small workshop, with
utmost patience, persistence and their absolute genius, our master leather
artisans and last makers turn leather into works of pure handcrafted artistry.
· 
Affordability
& Great Value: By selling directly to the customer we are able to
remove the middlemen & cut out the
huge retail margins charged by most well-known brands. That allows us to
bring you top quality shoes at half the price of a traditional
handmade shoe that you’ll be able to enjoy season after season.




YOU are the pillar of our success! We need your push to help us get up & running.
Help us by spreading the word & sharing our campaign with your friends
& families. Should you have any questions, queries or require assistance you can ALWAYS talk to us at service@gracill.com You can also visit our website www.gracill.com or connect with us through Facebook, Twitter and Instagram. We look forward to seeing you!




































Impact:
Our artisans put their heart & soul into creating shoes that are nothing less than handmade artistry. Your backing will help us to scale our operations & breath life into our vision of making true luxury available to everyone.
Risks & Challenges:

We
have years of experience in the menswear industry. Our manufacturing, sourcing &
logistics are aligned perfectly and we absolutely intend to deliver each &
every pair on time & in
top-notch quality. The biggest challenge always in manufacturing is production
delay.  Although we’re on schedule & in top shape to deliver on time but
there’s always a rare possibility of a slight delay. That being said, we will
always be forthright and keep you updated through every stage. 
FAQs:

· 
How to order the desired size and style?
   A survey will be sent at the end of the campaign to confirm your size
& style                preference.
· 
What are
the shipping charges?
    Shipping is FREE WORLDWIDE! :)
· 
What if I
want to exchange?
   Should there be a need for exchange, we will gladly facilitate it but kindly
do note        that the shipping cost for the exchange will need to be charged both
ways since          we’re working with very small margins for this Indiegogo campaign.
· 
How
will the import/custom duties be handled?
   Kindly note that import/custom duties or taxes/VAT is not included in the perk          amount and has to be paid by the backer. Since the duties and taxes are levied by      the destination country it is not possible for us to calculate such charges.
· 
How can I
contact GRACILL?    Should you have any questions or require
assistance, you can get in touch with us    at service@gracill.com

story:
Living in New Zealand, but born in Canada, Shalane Hopkins is a self-taught artist who has had a love affair with beads for as long as she can remember. Developing her skills and techniques over the years, she has sold her pieces worldwide, but it is only in recent months that Shalane has had the opportunity to create a full-time business out of her work. However, in order to successfully take the leap of faith needed to make her jewellery a complete success, she needs your support to kick things off. 

Each piece of jewellery Shalane Hopkins creates is one of a kind (OOAK) and is meticulously handcrafted, providing quality to last for years to come. Shalane Hopkins uses a wide-range of beadweaving stitches and bead styles, but primarily focuses on glass seed beads that are either size 11/0 or 15/0. Maintaining her goal for a quality product, pieces are generally finished with either sterling silver or gold-filled components. 

Shalane Hopkins creates pieces that celebrate the individuality of the women who will one day wear them. Her jewellery is about empowering women around the world to be true to who they are. Her pieces are sold online, in retail shops and through galleries. As well, Shalane Hopkins does commission work for anyone with a particular idea they want made into reality. 


As any artist knows, the balance between taking a risk to push ahead or choosing financial stability is an art form in itself. Knowing that in order to take her jewellery to the next level, Shalane Hopkins needs the time and energy to create pieces, get them out to stockists and exhibitions all the while connecting with customers and continually spreading the word. But by choosing this, Shalane Hopkins gives up the financial stability that a regular job can provide. And it is the regular job that would provide the funds needed achieve what she envisions with her jewellery.

Shalane Hopkins strongly believes that the local community, her customers and worldwide supporters are the foundation she needs to make her dream of being a full time artist a reality. It is these people that bring Shalane Hopkins to the wonderful world of crowdfunding in order to gain the support she needs to move forward, while also giving back to those who invest in her overall goal.


Curious what the money will be used for? The following are all critical aspects of supporting Shalane Hopkins to make her dream of being a full-time artist a reality. This is about taking her jewellery to the next level, enabling Shalane Hopkins to not only produce quality pieces, but also a quality representation of her work. 

What happens if the goal is already reached? Should Shalane Hopkins exceed her goal of $10000 AUD, the following is what she would put the additional money towards, simply furthering her dream of becoming a full-time artist in making jewellery.

  • Beadweaving Masterclass Books | $30 each | These are brilliant resources for any beadweaver to use reference and inspiration to all beadweaving techniques
  • Tripod | $100 | This would enable Shalane Hopkins further flexibility in how she is able to take product photography
  • Lightcase Pro | $100 | As seen at http://photolightcase.com/, Shalane Hopkins already uses the smaller version for product photos, but the larger version would make it easier to shoot larger pieces of jewellery, therefore minimizing editing time of the photos
  • Camera Lens - Standard | $1000 | Shalane Hopkins is in desperate need of a replacement lens to the one she has been using that came with her camera years ago. By getting a replacement, Shalane Hopkins will be able to better take photographs that do not require a macro. These could be of the studio, exhibition work or otherwise, enabling Shalane to better document and market her work
  • Canva for Work | $155/year | This is an online graphic design program that Shalane Hopkins regularly uses to create graphics for branding and marketing (such as the graphics in this campaign). Signing up to Canva for Work means better access to graphics, better organisation of them and overall ease of use which will cut down on time Shalane Hopkins spends designing and free her up for more time spent making jewellery
  • Online Marketing | Any cost | Whether one talks of social media, Google Adwords or otherwise - online marketing is a way to boost ones presence quickly and internationally
  • Print Marketing | Any cost | Promoting her work through magazines, newspapers, posters, flyers and other print media will only further expand Shalane Hopkins' ability to spread the word about her work, upcoming exhibitions and otherwise
  • Living Costs - April-June, 2016 | $3600 | Again - food and rent is always ideal

Supporting Shalane Hopkins to reach her financial goal is more than simply handing over a bit of money. By helping her reach her goal of $10000 AUD, you are saying that the dream Shalane Hopkins has is entirely possible - that you believe in her becoming a full-time artist as much as she does. You are enabling her to be all she can be. 

Above this, you are becoming part of the bigger picture of empowering women worldwide. Shalane's dream goes beyond making jewellery out of beads as she hopes to build up her business so she can give back to the community and empower women on a greater scale. By helping Shalane Hopkins now, you are supporting her to do the following in the future:

There is always a certain amount of risk when supporting a small business in early developmental stages, but this is more than simply making a business idea a successful venture. This is the core of who Shalane Hopkins is and this is a dream she has always hoped to make a reality. Previously working over 10 years in the non-profit industry has taught Shalane Hopkins that anything is possible if you put your mind to it and that there is always a way to make something happen, even if the first door you knock on doesn't open. Should Shalane Hopkins not reach her goal of $10000 AUD, the money will still go towards helping Shalane continue on her venture of achieving her dream - it may just take a little longer than initially planned for.

Want to help, but are unable to fork over cash to this campaign? 

  • Help spread the word to everyone you know! Social media is a great resource and such an easy way to share news and stories of things you care about. So if you believe in what Shalane Hopkins is trying to achieve, please share how people you know can get involved. Use the share tools here on Indiegogo, or simply copy and paste the URL link to wherever you wish to post
  • Snag one of her OOAK pieces of jewellery for yourself or as a gift for a loved one. This could be any of the available pieces online (www.shalanehopkins.com) or perhaps you would prefer to commission Shalane Hopkins to make that special piece you have in mind
  • Contact Shalane Hopkins to stock her work in your shop, display pieces in your gallery or simply pitch another idea to her about where you'd love to see her work

story:
Innovative underwear with proven beneficial effects on health

Gold Medal “New Time” at the International Salon of Inventions and New Technologies in 2013 PATENT: PCT / BA 2013000006 PUBLISHED 06/05/2014. No: WO2014 / 082139

It Works

It protects my urinary tract. Keeps my body temperature in a safe range. Does not allow the existence of viruses, bacteria and dust mites. It improves urinary urgency and regulates a slow and intermittent flow of urine. Also, it has a very positive effect on sexual life. Doesn't this sounds fantastic? The best part is... IT WORKS!!!


The Impact

Just imagine, you could help yourself or somebody you care about reduce the number of "sorry I have to go to the toilet" moments. Especially for someone who goes to the toilet 15, 16 or 17 times a day. Just count lost minutes and missed important moments in your life. We can help reduce it by using Sheepa underwear. Our promise is that you will go to toilet but as often anymore. We are talking about improving your health the 100 % natural way, our unique pad is made of 100% wool and covered with cotton, to prevent health problems and save your life moments for things that you like to do.

Just imagine, how many smiles and happy moments we can give to each other.

  • Sheepa Woman's collection ready for shipment


                                

  • Sheepa Man's collection ready for shipment 


                       

About Us

I love life! And like you I appreciate many moments and I am not scared to share. Our life stories are different, but each of us has similar important things in our lives. Usually we define those thing as something we value enough to be worth standing for. Quality of our lives depends on many things, but one is essential, our health. How many times have you heard that health is priceless? We all agree on that fact. Prevention of problems is the first step to a happy healthy life.

At one point we have all been faced with challenges, and our team has put our knowledge, experience and energy into innovation. After two years of exploring, testing and failures we have reached our goal. Very unique and functional underwear for both men and women was created.

Our innovation is based on A 100 % wool insert, covered with the finest cotton. With a stylish and ergonomic design, it is comfortable to wear. The basic wool ingredient is wool grease or lanolin. Thanks to its antibacterial and anti-allergic effect, lanolin prevents the survival of viruses, bacteria and mites.

Composition: underwear for man and woman

Shell: Cotton 95%, Elastine 5% 

Insert: Wool 100%


SHEEPA MAN (men’s underwear) is produced in such way that inserts of natural wool are covered by cotton and placed at the bottom of the crotch. This kind of lining will have a beneficial effect on the genital parts for men of all ages.

SHEEPA WOMAN (woman’s underwear), with inserts of natural wool covered by cotton, placed in the upper abdomen and bottom of the crotch will have a beneficial effect on the  woman’s genitals.

Protect the reproductive and urinary systems, preventing the inflammatory process caused by the cold that causes acute and chronic infertility, which has been confirmed by specialists, urologists and gynecologists.

Instructions for care:

Machine wash, maximal temperature 40*C. Ironing at a temperature defined for wool. Tumble dry low. Do not use bleach.

Our mission is to improve the quality of everyday life. How many times were you faced with a situation where you have missed important moments in your life just because you had to go to the toilet. The reason: your urinary tract is starting to get weak. I had the same problem, looking for toilets at sport events, meetings and social events. "Sorry I have to go to toilet", became part of my everyday life.

As innovators we have a responsibility to make our invention available to anyone who wants to protect their health and improve the quality of their lives. At this moment we need your help to make it happen.

What We Need & What You Get

For the start we need $16,950 to invest in production process and further product development. 

You will get exclusive underwear to protect your health. Once you have tried our products and experiences the extreme difference for yourself, we are positive you will love them and - you will spread the story with a lot of enthusiasm. We promise, you will tell every person you know about Sheepa. 

Timeline:

December first 200 products available and ready for shipment, Christmas and New Year limited collection. 

January production 200 products, Valentine's Day limited edition.

February and March production and shipment. 

You can be a part of this unique story and get exclusive products for you and the people you love.  You will talk with your loved ones and show them  how they can protect themselves and prevent health problems the natural way.

Exclusive, unique and improves urinary urgency while regulating the flow of urine to a slow and intermittent stream. Also, they have a very positive effect on sexual life. Prevents further complications and more serious physical and psychological issues.

It takes time to make one of our unique underwear for you from the 

sketch

 

and tailoring

To the ideal present for someone you care about or simply to indulge yourself by doing the right thing for your health.

Sheepa Exclusive Men's Box

Sheepa Exclusive Women's Box


We never stop developing: New from our design studio for next season 2016.


 

Risks & Challenges

As Innovators we are ready for challenges and risks. After two years of preparation and initial semi-automatized production we finally have a picture. Our main challenge is a lack of budget to get the word out. But that is where you can help! We know that we have to make a noise about our products. We hope, you will help us to make this noise.

Other Ways You Can Help

Dear Backers, we are talking about human products, about everyday life. We are talking about common values. Please make a noise and be one of those who care by sharing our campaign with your friends and family. Thank you!

Sheepa Exclusive Men's Box

story:
The idea for Radix Board Co. came about last year.  I was trying to come up with a practical Christmas present for my son. I work at a recycled timber yard and joinery. I found a long, wide , thin piece of timber and my mind started ticking. So, I tried to make some plywood, it worked. I shaped it and sanded it. One of my friends, a very talented artist, PAW, asked if he could paint the deck. It all came about so freely, the result speaks for itself. I can make a deck a week, PAW is able to paint a deck in 3 days, that includes drying time. I have more artists wanting to come on board. So, I want to setup a workshop for crafting these boards and collaborating with artists, all under one roof.

Here's what I need:
-a bandsaw, to cut out those gnarly shapes. 
-a thicknesser, to make those boards nice and flat before gluing up
-a belt sander, to shape those boards and
-a stash of hardware ie: trucks, wheels, bearings, to set up those decks ready for riding.

I'm really passionate about our environment and our community

-I only use recycled or reclaimed timber. All the glues and finishes are low VOC, the most friendly for the environment and our bodies.

-I love to support the local arts community. Radix Board Co. decks are hand painted and the custom paint fee I add on goes to the artist. 

 -I only use quality trucks, wheels, bearings and hardware for all of our setups and only buy from Australian skate shops. 


Thanks for taking the time to read about my campaign. If you can't contribute that's all good, please share it on Facebook and follow us on Instagram @radixboardco.

story:
Are you passionate about fashion?

So are we. And that is why we want to connect fashion fans and fashion designers worldwide. At Guedias.com, we aim to build an online platform were the best designers and manufacturers can showcase their products to buyers and fans around the world. We seek to promote only quality creations that are original.

Our dream is to be unlike any other shop you’ve ever seen: what you’ll see at Guedias, you won’t find anywhere else.

For fashion lovers: all in one place

At Guedias, we’ve always admired luxury shops that offer a wide range of goods and brands all in one place. So we thought “how great would it be to create a recognized launchpad that could give up-and-coming manufacturers throughout the world the same chance?”

However, more than luxury, the Guedias culture is based on high-end originality, authenticity, topnotch innovation and honesty. We want the buyers to have an unforgettable experience each time they come by, with fresh and surprising discoveries every time.

For designers: an amazing opportunity

But, most of all, we want to give an opportunity to budding designers to show their point of view. We believe talents should be nourished by audiences, not locked in nine-to-five jobs somewhere.

Culture can have a big influence on a designer’s aesthetic. And that is why we want to recruit all over the world - and not just in a few countries! We’re looking for truly 100% original, 100% unique, 100% exclusive creations.

Additionally, we know it can be hard for designers coming from less fortunate countries to have their voices heard. And, more than anything, we want to tackle that. We want to give an opportunity to everyone’s talent, regardless of their nationality, country of origin, sexual orientation, gender identification, ethnicity or race.

We hope Guedias.com will establish itself has a launchpad for all those who share our dream of growing in fashion.

How can you be sure of the quality?

Because we want to assure that each product sold through Guedias.com has the highest quality standards, we make sure each of our vendors can guarantee good raw materials, exceptional manufacturing and careful attention to every detail.

When we first created our partnership with our first vendor, Le Beau Paysan, we verified if the factories could build true leather goods that would pass the test of time. Then, we worked closely with the product designers to understand the whole process and how leather can be suitable for an iPhone case and, in fact, complement the high-end design that characterizes Apple.


Why do we need the money?

To expand our platform, we have to invest our own time in finding new vendors and creative minds. If you want to help us by promoting our platform, you will be welcomed.

However, if you can, help us improve our platform by funding this project. We want to take every possible step to assure the platform will function without considerable downtimes and without a huge load time for those of us living in the most remote places. We also intend to purchase the most efficient software to assure the security of our payments and the privacy of each of the vendors and each of the buyers.

And while you might find us dreamy and idealistic, we are well-aware of the real-world marketing trends. We know that traffic coming from mobile phones is almost as much as the coming originating in desktops or laptops - which leads us to another goal of ours, developing a app for mobile phones. With the Guedias app, everyone will be able to check our latest trends in the wink of an eye.


We also know that good will and kind-hearted share will not be enough to support and launch our platform. Unfortunately, it is impossible to compete with well-established internet retailers without putting a considerable amount of money in digital marketing campaigns.

Finally, a small percentage of the money will be used to cover shipments, so as to offer competitive prices to both vendors and customers and permeate the market.

story:
WHAT YOU WILL GET IN RETURN FOR YOUR CONTRIBUTION

We’ve set up various perks as a thank you for your contributions which will help make our IFS installation a reality. We’ve asked the children at Tawasol to sign each individual flower they’ve made - And we are offering to send a flower for each $20 contribution. Tawasol are also making us handmade keychain Egyptian folklore dolls, which we will send for every $25 donation. 

SabryMarouf have created limited edition Scarab pendants available in Gold-plated brass, Black Gunmetal, and Sterling Silver, for every $125, $150, and $300 contribution, respectively. Scroll down for more pictures!


A CONTEMPORARY REBIRTH

For the first time Egypt is participating at the IFS -International Fashion Showcase in association with London Fashion Week, Feb 19 – 23, 2016. For Egypt’s growing fashion industry, this installation ‘Contemporary Rebirth’ celebrating Fashion Utopias, is a chance to define the new, post-revolution Egyptian identity. 

The following designers were endorsed to showcase by the British Council, British Fashion Council and a panel of industry experts to represent Egypt among 25 nations: Ahmed Sabry and Daki Marouf - SabryMarouf, Maram Abouleinen - Maram Paris, Nour Omar- Marsouma, Reem Jano - Reem Jano Jewelry, Sarah El Mofty - Saya.

ABOUT THE TEAM

The project is headed by Susan Sabet, Publisher & Editor-in-chief of Pashion magazine, as project curator, who in 2014 and 2015 has been voted by Business Of Fashion as one of 500 most influential people in the fashion industry. It is overseen by Daki Marouf as project manager, who is a London based strategist completing his masters degree at the London college of Fashion, and Exhibition designer Hedayat Taymour of JamSpace and founding partner of award winning design firm Eklego. The project is also made possible through a unique collaboration with Tawasol, a Cairo based NGO founded and run by Yasmina About Youssef, producing part of the installation. 

The project is a collective effort, and is being made possible by donations from individuals like you and from our kind sponsors. While we have so far raised just over $6000 to cover the cost of hiring our space, we still urgently need to raise another $9000 to fully fund the project. 

WHERE'S THE MONEY GOING?

Here's a break down of the costs we are incurring in producing the installation: 

  • Professional on-site installation of 700 paper lotus flowers  - $1,750
  • Freestanding custom made multi-panel mirror - $1,200
  • Hiring 3 Mannequins - $750
  • Hiring Plinths & Pedestals for Mannequins & Accessories - $200
  • Materials for the designers to work on the commissions for the IFS - $2500
  • Housing & Transportation for the designers in London - $1600
  • Marketing fees $1,00

WHY'S IT IMPORTANT?

It is important for our emerging designers to be part of the IFS because it serves as a stepping stone for them to the more commercial international trade shows down the road. Their exposure to industry professionals and competition allows designers to get live feedback on their product on things like price points, margins, how to adapt their collections to fit different needs. It also helps them understand their own unique selling point within the wider landscape. Remember - Investing in today's emerging designers will help reinvigorate the huge value chain in Egypt's creative industries.

story:
When does a garment turn from a simple thing into a sentimental object? When do we begin to love what we wear? Each of us has a favorite garment, in most cases even this is a T-shirt Usually the favorite garment is the one that looks well on us, brings a memory created by carrying it or has its own history and may be a symbol of something or someone valuable to us, perhaps even helps us to express ourselves. It's good when the garment influences, when it's not just stuff when it has a meaning. That was how the idea of Roilly was born - a cause, a message, an emotion in a T-shirt.


Who are we?

Our team consists of two people - Robert and Iliyana, hence the name of the brand. We define ourselves as young entrepreneurs, ambassadors of children's art, sometimes dreamers, but rather a team with a cause, willing to put our energy into the garment we wear and make you smile by wearing it.


Our idea and how it was born:

Our idea is to create T-shirts with children's drawings. Not just any drawings, but those containing the children inside us (we believe that it is not lost :)), drawings that have a message, that set a good mood, that add color to our gray everyday life, drawings creating emotion. The Little Prince by Antoine de Saint-Exupery drew a snake that swallowed an elefant that was visible to adults only as hat. It is a great example of the simple beauty of the children‘s art.

 

Who is involved in the process?

Of course the children, little artists who are willing to show their work to anyone. Our involvement is in the selection and distribution of the provided drawings. At this stage, we do not own the copyrights of these works. All rights belong to the legal owner. The use of these works is not intended to commit an intellectual property offense.

At a later stage, we have the desire to organize prize competitions for children's drawings so that we can offer a wider catalog of drawing choices. We will provide brief information for each drawing, including the age and name of the little artist, a description of the painting or the message it carries. We believe that when we know what it means and we can express that meaning through the art of the youngest, we build an emotional connection.


Why are we doing this?

Getting the children's art out of the drawing sheets.

We believe that children draw pictures with meaning, recreate the way they perceive the world and that deserves attention and appreciation. We believe that the endless mind of a child can create drawings capable of reaching your soul..

 

Our goal

Our T-shirt - your favorite garment!

Our goal is to introduce children's drawings into everyday life and a lot of emotions for those who have decided to get a T-shirt Roilly. Hopefully it will be the reason for many smiles and a source of pride for the little artists.

 

What is the contribution to society - social responsibility?

We want to engage the society towards the young ones.  We want to give everyone the opportunity to appreciate how children draw dreams, thoughts, memories, and the surrounding environment. Provide the opportunity for society to see the world through the pure eyes of a child, a world recreated through the child consciousness and imagination.


Starting point, where are we now and where do we want to go?

At this stage, we start with children's drawings printed on white T-shirts, and later on we intend to add other colors of T-shirts. The print is digital with high quality, eco-friendly paint. The print is resistant to washing, stretching and it does not crack. In this way, we achieve the durability of colors in long-term wear and washing. We have different fits for each gender and variety of sizes. The fabric is made of 100% high quality cotton to make our T-shirt comfortable and soft.

 

The funds raised by this campaign will be invested in launching our brand, organizing contests for children's drawings, launching a web store, and covering the cost of online advertising.

Thank you for your support! :)

story:
Over 35 years ago, Kali Basi met with Madhu Keshwar, the editor of the indian feminist magazine 'Manishi'. This encounter changed her perspective on life. So began her journey to fulfill a dream that would take many years to bring to fruition. 

In 2015, Kali approached the organization Free the Slaves in Washington, D.C. and received a contact for the Director of Southeast Asia based in New Delhi, India. Kali's meetings with Free the Slaves in India subsequently lead her to Shakti Samuha, a center in Katmandu, Nepal. Shakti Samuha is the first organization on the globe run by survivors of the sex trade. Shakti Samuha's mission is to raise awareness and protect and empower trafficking survivors. 

After an initial meeting, Kali proposed a plan in which she would bring her resources and talents to help teach and mentor young women who had been freed and were preparing to re-enter the world. Since that time, she has been training and mentoring young women in the arts of Nuno felting and textile design. 

On her return home, Kali founded the organization Conscious by Kali in order to continue to support that dream. Many girls who have been rescued are still rejected by society and even their families, making it difficult to return to a stable life. Conscious by Kali is an  avenue that assists young survivors to receive artistic training and materials to earn a middle class wage. This is a big step towards transforming a life of despair to one filled with achievable hopes and dreams. 

Kali is alo involved with Yes, Helping Hands, and organization in Nepal started by Dinesh Thapa. Yes, Helping Hands supports and provides jobs for the deaf, blind, and physically challenged. Conscious by Kali is now the sole distributor for Yes, Helping Hands in the USA. 

We need $60,000 to continue our mission this year. The money will be spent on supplies and training for the girls, and to start searching for a second shelter for survivors of sex trafficking. 

 

IN THE PRESS

http://www.thurstontalk.com/2017/04/05/kali-bas...

 

Narrative from Survivors: In Search of Self Reliance 

 

My Past is Like a Nightmare

Written by:  Sabina Tamang

It is upsetting whenever I think about my past. The kind of life I lived in Mumbai brothel and the kind of work I had to do, was a nightmare.... In 1996, when the Indian Police raided the brothels in Mumbai, I was among one of them to be rescued... But, then I think again I was lucky to get a second chance. Many of my friends died in the same hell. These days I am extremely busy and happy. I want to be an artist in the future, but only the future will tell if I will be successful in fulfilling my dream.

story:
Who I am

 I am Olivier PAIRON, founder and CEO of Ultimate Driver Corporation , based in Las Vegas - Nevada ,  and President of a Childhood Foundation, ACARDEMY.

Great fan of the US and owner of a Ford Mustang Shelby which I use as a daily driver , and expert in clothing industry, I have naturally decided that my brand Ultimate Driver clothing would be 100% American.

  • Ultimate Driver Corporation in US
  • Design in the US
  • Made in the US
  • Trade in the US and through the World from our website in the US
  • Creation of jobs and career opportunities in the United States at local and national level



This adventure begins with you , I will have an Ultimate US Tour  in November for promoting Ultimate Driver Clothes.
Of course, I will drive my favorite legendary car , the "Ultimate Driver" limited edition Ford Mustang .

Now, your support is important for "Ultimate Driver" and will give you the opportunity to come onboard with me and be part of this fabulous adventure ...


A 100% New Clothing US brand, Ultimate Driver

From the scratch, our brand Ultimate Driver is MADE IN the US.
It is designed in the US
It is Made in the US, by american clothes industries.
It is traded in the US (and through the world via our US Website), Ultimate Driver Corporation is based in Las Vegas - Nevada .

Ultimate Driver colors are inspired from the American Flag, and after its first collection US Tour Ultimate, we will develop different other models.

It is TOP QUALITY clothes, made in the US with Preshrunk, polyester, cotton and Bamboo


You are involved in Ultimate Driver success

As contributor 
you will be the first to get your Clothes from Ultimate Driver at a special discount price, and all the specials offers for early birds.
  1. 20% discount price on your Ultimate US Tour clothes
  2. Having lifetime 20% discount for Ultimate Driver Clothes
  3. Daily news and special offers from Ultimate Driver
  4. Monthly newsletter
  5. As a dealer, you save 49% OFF the retail price
  6. We are helping Childhood Foundations 
As an official dealer you can develop your own business with our clothes and our marketing experience.

IT IS TIME TO CONTRIBUTE NOW ...
August:  End of crowdfunding and investment

September/october:  Release to the international press, fabrication of US Tour Ultimate Driver clothes

November/December:  Las Vegas SEMA SHOW and international media - Ultimate US Tour, 12000 miles and 30 Days - Worldwide order and expedition to our first customers


YOU LOVE AMERICA ? THESE PERKS ARE FOR YOU !!!


……………………………………………………………………………………..……………………………………

Ultimate US Tour , the best way to promote and launch the New US Clothing Brand "Ultimate Driver" to the world

Because traveling through US is one of the American Dream for million of people in the world, we know that millions of people will keep connected with us in media and social networks. And you will be a privileged one of them as contributor.

The Ultimate US Tour road trip is made to promote Ultimate Driver brand across the US to the local, national and international media.


After a presentation to the international press at the SEMA SHOW Las Vegas from 2015 November 2nd to 9th , I will go the Ultimate US Tour November 10th.

I will drive through the 48 states of America , starting and ending in Las Vegas where is based Ultimate Driver Corporation.

It will last 30 days for 12,000 miles.

A team of cameraman and photographer  will follow me during this journey to relay daily some news of our  Ultimate US Tour to the local , national and international media as well as our own internet social networks.

AS CONTRIBUTOR YOU WILL HAVE A DAILY REPORT AND SPECIAL PICTURES FOR YOURSELF.


Few Key Number for US Tour Ultimate

The cost of a such project is more than $400 000 including: 

Vehicle, truck, maintenance, gasoline, staff, hotel and food, marketing, employers

  • Crowdfunding 40 %
  • Sponsoring 10 %
  • Ultimate Driver Corporation  50 %

Money from the crowdfunding will be used for:

  • US Tour: Gasoline, maintenance, hotel & food
  • Ultimate Driver Corporation: Creation of employment for managing orders and expeditions of your perks 
  • Childhood Foundation: $1 of your perk goes for Foundation


Experience, back ground

Road Rally

I had made ​​a similar journey in Europe 4 years ago in the winter , from Paris to Saint Tropez (French Riviera) via the arctic circle (12000 Ultimate , 12,000 km - 20 Countries  -14 days ) , so I have the experience to carry although this road trip in US.


Business Clothing experience
I have already set up in Europe a website with few models of Ultimate Driver clothes relating to my partnerships and few ideas of creation, but it appears my customers ask for American Style, as they dream of America.

www.ultimate-driver.com 


Mustang cars event organizer 

I also organise one of the biggest Ford Mustang event in Europe, in April, Mustang Birthday European Celebration. I have more than 10 000 Fans on this page.

I am well known in the European Ford Mustang scene & Fan of America Club , and a very got network for selling some American clothes.

Now, I guess the big thing is coming to the US ….


$1 from your perk goes for Childhood Foundation !

Part of the profit realized on the US Tour Ultimate will be used to help US Childhood Foundation .
We ask you therefore to suggest an association that is important as contributor. With my team , at the end of the Ultimate US Tour  , we will select those with which we can be helpful.
Thank you very much in advance for believing in our project and for our futur partnership .


Join us, be part of the Ultimate Driver Corporation adventure

As contributor you will enjoyed to be a privileged partner and get involved in a such project while you are supporting a new US American Clothing Brand and Ultimate US Tour.

  1. 20% discount price on your Ultimate US Tour clothes
  2. Having lifetime 20% discount for Ultimate Driver Clothes
  3. Daily news and  special offers from Ultimate Driver
  4. Monthly newsletter
  5. As a dealer, you save 49% OFF the retail price
  6. We are helping Childhood Foundations 

Join the adventure, choose your perk now … and keep connected with us :)

And do not forget to share on social media your adventure !!!
story_txt:
Who
I am
 I am Olivier PAIRON, founder and CEO of Ultimate Driver Corporation , based in Las Vegas - Nevada ,  and President of a Childhood Foundation, ACARDEMY.Great fan of the US and owner of a Ford Mustang Shelby which I use as a daily driver , and expert in clothing industry, I have naturally decided that my brand Ultimate Driver clothing would be 100% American.
Ultimate Driver Corporation in US
Design in the US
Made in the US
Trade in the US and through the World from our website in the US
Creation of jobs and career opportunities in the United States at local and national level

This adventure begins with you , I will have an Ultimate US Tour  in November for promoting Ultimate Driver Clothes.Of course, I will drive my favorite legendary car , the "Ultimate Driver" limited edition Ford Mustang .
Now, your support is important for "Ultimate Driver" and will give you the opportunity to come onboard with me and be part of this fabulous adventure ...A 100% New Clothing US brand, Ultimate DriverFrom the scratch, our brand Ultimate Driver is MADE IN the US.It is designed in the USIt is Made in the US, by american clothes industries.It is traded in the US (and through the world via our US Website), Ultimate Driver Corporation is based in Las Vegas - Nevada .Ultimate Driver colors are inspired from the American Flag, and after its first collection US Tour Ultimate, we will develop different other models.It is TOP QUALITY clothes, made in the US with Preshrunk, polyester, cotton and Bamboo












You are involved in Ultimate Driver success


As contributor you will be the first to get your Clothes from Ultimate Driver at a special discount price, and all the specials offers for early birds.

20% discount price on your Ultimate US Tour clothes
Having lifetime 20% discount for Ultimate Driver Clothes
Daily news and special offers from Ultimate Driver
Monthly newsletter
As a dealer, you save 49% OFF the retail price
We are helping Childhood Foundations 
As an official dealer you can develop your own business with our clothes and our marketing experience.
IT IS TIME TO CONTRIBUTE NOW ...August:  End of crowdfunding and investment
September/october:  Release to the international press, fabrication of US Tour Ultimate Driver clothes
November/December:  Las Vegas SEMA SHOW and international media - Ultimate US Tour, 12000 miles and 30 Days - Worldwide order and expedition to our first customers


YOU LOVE AMERICA ? THESE PERKS ARE FOR YOU !!!




……………………………………………………………………………………..……………………………………
Ultimate US Tour , the best way to promote and launch the New US Clothing Brand "Ultimate Driver" to the world


Because traveling through US is one of the American Dream for million of people in the world, we know that millions of people will keep connected with us in media and social networks. And you will be a privileged one of them as contributor.
The Ultimate US Tour road trip is made to promote Ultimate Driver brand across the US to the local, national and international media.





After a presentation to the international press at the SEMA SHOW Las Vegas from 2015 November 2nd to 9th , I will go the Ultimate US Tour November 10th.I will drive through the 48 states of America , starting and ending in Las Vegas where is based Ultimate Driver Corporation.It will last 30 days for 12,000 miles.A team of cameraman and photographer  will follow me during this journey to relay daily some news of our  Ultimate US Tour to the local , national and international media as well as our own internet social networks.


AS CONTRIBUTOR YOU WILL HAVE A DAILY REPORT AND SPECIAL PICTURES FOR YOURSELF.


Few Key Number for US Tour Ultimate
The cost of a such project is more than $400 000 including: 
Vehicle, truck, maintenance, gasoline, staff, hotel and food, marketing, employers



Crowdfunding 40 %


Sponsoring 10 %

Ultimate Driver Corporation  50 %

Money from the crowdfunding will be used for:



US Tour: Gasoline, maintenance, hotel & food


Ultimate Driver Corporation: Creation of employment for managing orders and expeditions of your perks 


Childhood Foundation: $1 of your perk goes for Foundation



Experience,
back ground
Road Rally


I
had made ​​a similar journey in Europe 4 years ago in the winter
, from Paris to Saint Tropez (French Riviera) via the arctic circle (12000 Ultimate ,
12,000 km - 20 Countries  -14 days ) , so I have the experience to carry
although this road trip in US.





Business Clothing experience
I have already set up in Europe a website with few models of Ultimate Driver clothes relating to my partnerships and few ideas of creation, but it appears my customers ask for American Style, as they dream of America.www.ultimate-driver.com 




Mustang cars event organizer 
I
also organise one of the biggest Ford Mustang event in Europe, in
April, Mustang Birthday European Celebration. I have more than 10 000 Fans on
this page.
I am well known in the European Ford Mustang scene & Fan of America Club , and a very got network for selling some American clothes.Now, I guess the big thing is coming to the US ….


$1 from your perk goes for Childhood Foundation !



Part of the profit realized on the US Tour Ultimate will be used to help US Childhood Foundation .
We ask you therefore to suggest an association that is important as contributor. With my team , at the end of the Ultimate US Tour  , we will select those with which we can be helpful.

Thank you very much in advance for believing in our project and for our futur partnership .





Join us, be part of the Ultimate Driver Corporation adventure
As contributor you will enjoyed to be a privileged partner and get involved in a such project while you are supporting a new US American Clothing Brand and Ultimate US Tour.
20% discount price on your Ultimate US Tour clothes
Having lifetime 20% discount for Ultimate Driver Clothes
Daily news and  special offers from Ultimate Driver
Monthly newsletter
As a dealer, you save 49% OFF the retail price
We are helping Childhood Foundations 

Join the adventure, choose your perk now … and keep connected with us :)
And
do not forget to share on social media your adventure !!!

story:
OUR STORY, THAT JUST KEEPS ON GETTING BETTER

 The man who gave the world rock n roll, gave us the idea for AEGAON. Just a mear glimpse at Elvis's huge wrist watch in the video "Always On My Mind", was enough to spark the idea. That was in 2012. Two years later, the "Peacemaker 65" was released. It became a success on Indiegogo. Estonian media was impressed, for it was also the first watch made in Estonia, ever. More than 75 000 followers on Aegaon Watches Facebook page. We had done something right. Now, a year later, we are honored to be back on Indiegogo with our great new  design – "Tabula Rasa".


"AEGA ON" is what we say for "take your time"...

We come from a small European country named Estonia – the home of Skype, TransfereWise, Ewert And The Two Dragons, the great sumo wrestler Baruto Kaido Höövelson along with other great names. Estonia is known for combining innovation with high technology and that´s just what we have done with AEGAON.



SECOND DESIGN "TABULA RASA"

The design is named after a classical music composition “Tabula Rasa” by Estonia’s world famous composer Mr. Arvo Pärt, who celebrated his 80th birthday this year. "Tabula Rasa"  is a Latin phrase often translated as "blank slate" or the idea, that individuals are born without built-in mental content and therefore all knowledge comes from experience or perception. A perfect match for our watch.

Tabula Rasa automatic black with black bracelet

Tabula Rasa stainless steel quartz with brown leather strap

We designed it to be comfortable to wear by placing the crown under an angle. Be modern with an electronic quartz movement or go old school with a mechanical automatic movement, that winds itself as you wear it on your wrist. Make your choice between a black and stainless steel casing, quartz or mechanical movement.

Specifications

  • Case Dimensions: 44MM x 10.5MM
  • Case Material: 316L brushed stainless steel
  • Optics: sapphire crystal 
  • Water Resistant: 328 feet / 100 meters (10 ATM)
  • Strap: black or brown genuine leather band / black or stainless steel bracelet
    P.S Please note that we will personally verify your choice of strap right after the campaign!
  • Choice of movements:
  •  Swiss "Ronda 713" electronic quartz
  •  Japan "Miyota 9015" mechanical automatic
  •  Warranty: 2 years

TWO DESIGNS & TWO MOVEMENTS

Be modern with an electronic quartz movement, that runs on battery or go old school with a self-winding, mechanical automatic movement. Both are available for each design.

What is the difference between the two movements?

A quartz movement is the most abundant type of watch movement you see today. They are electronic devices that use battery current to pulse a quartz crystal, measuring its vibration and calculating time based on that. A combination of extremely low cost and high stability makes it a common choice for other high-quality watch manufacturers.

An automatic movement is a mechanical watch movement with a self-winding device. Mechanical watch movements pre-date quartz movements, and are the old, traditional way of watchmaking. They are entirely gear-driven devices that are powered by the tension of a wound spring. The expression "wind a watch" comes from these designs. The key improvement of an Automatic is that if you wear the watch regularly, you seldom ever need to wind it. A weighted rotor in the back is designed to swing with your body movement and wind it for you. The other benefit is that mechanical watches have heirloom potential, when periodically serviced, a mechanical movement can potentially last many generations longer than quartz. This is why you see 100 year old pocket watches that still tick.

We use Swiss made "Ronda 713" movement:
Type: Electronic quartz movement
Description: A high quality Swiss made electronic movement with five jewel seatings. Uses a 371 style battery.
Reason to choose: The excellent value and low cost of a quartz movement cannot be beat. Though there is the undeniable charm of owning a mechanical watch, with quartz you get dependable timekeeping, a low hassle experience, and a level of quality synonymous with Swiss Made.
Specifications: 

  • 60 month battery life
  • Serviceable design
  • 5 jewels
Origin: Switzerland 

We use Japan made "Miyota 9015" movement:
Type: Mechanical/automatic movement
Description: The Miyota 9000 series is a relative newcomer from Japan meant to compete with higher end Swiss movements.
Reason to choose: The „new kid“ among movements. Japan quality, excellent balanced design. The pricier option, but a string overall value.
Specifications:
  • Automatic (self-winding)
  • 24 jewels
  • 28,800 beats per hour
  • 40 hour power reserve
  • Hack lever
Origin: Japan


Your perk will get us going!

We are eager to turn this dream of ours into everyday reality. You can make it happen. Your perk helps us to invest in essential equipment, that will enhance our production and hopefully result in the independence of Aegaon Watches.
Aegaon is still a rather small business, therefor we can make a maximum 100 watches per month. This means, that only the first hundred perkers will have their watches delivered in December. 

We are going to do everything we can to spread the word in a variety of ways.  Hoping, that through the use of social media and blogs we can drive enough outside traffic to our page which will result in reaching our funding goal.  If you could do something as simple as tweeting about our page, or just liking our Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/aegaon, it can really go a long way. Simply click the Facebook and Twitter tabs at the top  of the page, right below the video.


Risks & Challenges

We have learned a lot from our first campaign and minimised all risks in the line of producing the watches. As previously mentioned, we are able to produce max. 100 watches per month which we can deliver in December. The rest will be delivered as fast as they come. Aegaon delivered all the watches of the previous campaign and shall do it this time as well.
