story:
Samsung Gear S Wrist Fashion

Due date there is a vast majority of smartwatches, but just a few of them can get the job done. Samsung Gear S is one of those wearables that can replace your smartphone and save your pocket space, which is consumed by large smartphones and your everyday carry essentials.

As you know, there is always a fly in the ointment, Gear S wasn't an exception. creating an outstanding gadget Samsung for some reason gave it a strap that can definitely spoil the feel of this tech.

As an owner of this smartwatch I also faced this problem and decided to fix it.

Here's what we have for you guys, we've designed and created leather straps that would be an ideal fit for your Gear S smartwatch.

As you know the fitting of the smartwatch is really out of this world (not in a good sense), that's why we had to wrack our heads over this. 

In spite of everything we've made Gear S sit tightly inside the leather strap, the same way it rests in the standard silicone strap.


So, Silicone or Leather?

All materials have their own pluses and minuses, we'd like to show you the benefits of a leather strap comparing to the standard one.

SILICONE

LEATHER

  • Silicone looks quite shabby after long wear.

  • Shabby leather looks even more sexy (ask any girl, she will prove it).

  • In summer your hand feels really sweaty under silicone strap.

  • Leather inevitably absorbs your skin oils and sweat, still your hand feels well under leather strap.

  • Silicone is an artificial material, not recommended for allergic people.

  • Natural material, best for allergic people.

  • Best for sports and outdoor activities, is not a good option for your white shirt.

  • Fits casual, dress and outdoor wear, definitely a good accent for your shirt, and jacket.

  • Cold air hardens silicone.

  • Cold air does not affect natural leather at all.

  • Can be cleaned easily, but the scratches still remain.

  • If soiled leather strap can be cleaned with soap, and covered with castor oil.
As you can see leather strap really "pulls off the winner's blanket", and becomes a big plus to your style.

So What We've Got Here for You?

Depending on your taste, you can choose among several leather colors, even though black is preferable we can make it look the way you want it:

  • choose among six basic colors: black, white, dark/light brown, olive and red.

Depending on your style and accessories you wear, we can add number of dingles to your strap, those include:

  • buckles;
  • buttons;
  • spikes;
  • rivets;
  • etc.


What We Need & What You Get?

We've invested time, money and efforts to design Gear S bracelet concepts. We've made friends with leather experts who helped us develop bracelet with the best specifications that are needed to keep your Gear S safe on your wrist.


Please note! The cradle snaps easily to the Gear S hosted within leather bracelet.


Now we are ready to manufacture and deliver the Gear S leather bracelets and we need your help to raise the funds needed for the following steps:

  • We've selected premium quality cow skin, that would look really awesome on your wrist.
  • We need to purchase tens of square meters of leather, thousands items of accessories, supplies (including thread, needs) and package materials.
  • We need to cover the costs of production of the bracelets.
NB! By backing our campaign you are guaranteed to get the strap you opt for.

Don't forget to measure your wrist, we need to know if it's too big or too small. If you have an average sized wrist the strap for sure will be a perfect fit for you.


The Lowdown.

We’ve put careful consideration into the leather selected to create the Gear S bracelet. We thought that Gear S users don't need "another plastic thing" on their wrist. 

We wanted to make our bracelets to be as 'hand-friendly' as possible. That's why plastic and silicon were out of the question (even though we’ve made several samples out of these materials). Eventually we’ve reached the leather. Being a beautiful, strong and durable material it feels really natural when touches the skin. 

If you care about your wrist than choosing leather when wearing the Gear S is the best possible decision.


Other Ways You Can Help.

Probably there is a number of reasons why you can't help us and back our campaign. Either you're wearing some other smartwatch, or there is something you don't like. 

Anyways you can help! 

Social media sharing matters a lot, probably one of your friends is a Gear S owner who's looking for some cool leather bracelet.

  • Please share our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Pinterest, Instagram, tumblr or any other social network you're using.
  • Forward the link and the information by email to your friends and acquaintance and ask them to do the same.
  • Tell us about blogs or other media channels that could be interested in writing or talking about the Gear S leather bracelet. We’ll be happy to reach out and provide them with everything they need to spread the word.

P.S. In case you own some other Gear smartwatch or Pebble Steel (or any other) and you like what you see here, contact us cause we'll definitely be able to serve you.

story:
Gloria's workshop is located near Kenyatta market in the Kibera division of Nairobi, Kenya.  Kibera covers 5 acres and it is home to more than 500,000 people.  There are high rates of unemployment/underemployment (more than 50%) so people have to be very entrepreneurial. 

Gloria is one of these entrepreneurs: She started making shoes from the scraps of other tailors and discovered that there is a market for her creations.  She is now ready to grow and needs your contribution to:

  • Develop an online order and fulfillment system.
  • Equipment for improved production capacity and quality
  • Training and payroll during the start-up phase
  • Starting inventory
  • Legal and administrative

With a $100 contribution, you will receive a limited edition, custom shoe.  Each shoe is handmade and designed to order. 

Half of all shoe profits are shared with the Kibera Community Empowerment Organization (KCEO), which was founded in 2008 by local Kibera residents who volunteer to provide community services that include:

  • Recycling and Upcycling Activities
  • Vocational Training & Entrepreneurship
  • Student Scholarships
  • Female Empowerment Programs
  • Urban Farming and Nutrition

Learn more by watching our video or visiting our website: http://www.gloriasfootwear.com

References:

Entrepreneurship in Kibera

Kibera Community Empowerment Organization

story:
Note: if you are on a mobile device, touch "CONTRIBUTE NOW", then choose to add a perk (your favorite bag) and proceed to check out. You can also contribute with any amount if you don't want to buy one.


Smart phone, smart app, smart home, smart car.. The smart is everywhere, why not have a smart bag?

What if you want to leave your house without worrying about charging the phones or laptops? What if you want to go camping? Will trees provide electricity? Can you store photos and files on the leaves? I didn't think so.

Meet Naipack. The first smart bag to offer both casual and business people the ability to have their usual storage space with hi-tech coherence. Naipack is a smart bag with the following:















NAIPACK PERSONAL



NAIPACK BUSINESS


Current project status

We are now done planning. It's time to go for production. 

We are 100% sure that almost everyone needs a Naipack that's why we will go straight to the factory once this campaign is over. We came to you because we know you value your time, and we want you to enjoy it. Thanks for being a part of this.


What can you do

A lot of things: buy a Naipack at a great discount rate to enjoy the product and show your support (compare all models and prices: here) , or you can add a perk or a contribution without buying anything or you can do a little bit of both. Your action is very much appreciated. Share the word on Twitter and Facebook.  


This campaign

We will release updates to the campaign as we go. Even after the deadline, we will let you know of the latest innovations and upgrades to the project.  


Who we are

A group of enthusiastic people. We call ourselves artists, you call us entrepreneurs, but hey! It all leads to one awesome fact: we deliver brilliant ideas :-) 

Our whereabouts

We are located in LA, California, USA. 

Visit our website for full contact info.

Have questions? Send them to naipack@naisol.com
story_txt:
Note: if you are on a mobile device, touch "CONTRIBUTE NOW", then choose to add a perk (your favorite bag) and proceed to check out. You can also contribute with any amount if you don't want to buy one.
Smart phone, smart app, smart home, smart car.. The smart is everywhere, why not have a smart bag?
What if you want to leave your house without worrying about charging the phones or laptops? What if you want to go camping? Will trees provide electricity? Can you store photos and files on the leaves? I didn't think so.Meet Naipack. The first smart bag to offer both casual and business people the ability to have their usual storage space with hi-tech coherence. Naipack is a smart bag with the following:

NAIPACK PERSONAL


NAIPACK BUSINESS



Current project statusWe are now done planning. It's time to go for production. We are 100% sure that almost everyone needs a Naipack that's why we will go straight to the factory once this campaign is over. We came to you because we know you value your time, and we want you to enjoy it. Thanks for being a part of this.
What can you doA lot of things: buy a Naipack at a great discount rate to enjoy the product and show your support (compare all models and prices: here) , or you can add a perk or a contribution without buying anything or you can do a little bit of both. Your action is very much appreciated. Share the word on Twitter and Facebook.  

This campaignWe will release updates to the campaign as we go. Even after the deadline, we will let you know of the latest innovations and upgrades to the project.  

Who we areA group of enthusiastic people. We call ourselves artists, you call us entrepreneurs, but hey! It all leads to one awesome fact: we deliver brilliant ideas :-) 
Our whereabouts
We are located in LA, California, USA. 
Visit our website for full contact info.
Have questions? Send them to naipack@naisol.com

story:
First of all thank you for taking the time to view our campaign and video, we're grateful for your interest in furthering parkour in Northern Ireland.

Because of the rapidly evolving parkour scene in NI we feel like there is a need for a specific training facility here. We will have various classes and workshops and professional qualified coaches to train people of all skill levels. We aim to hold annual events to showcase the local talent and their achievements in the sport.

Where the money is going

We will use the funding for premises, custom built equipment like bar setup, various obstacles, mats and other safety equipment.

What's in it for me

The best thing about contributing now is the incredible membership discount voucher you will receive for your chosen membership.

Our mission is to raise £30,000 but the more we raise the more awesome awesome stuff we can have in the gym.

Not only will you be receiving perks , you will help us create a bigger, safer, more professional facility that everyone can enjoy.

Everyone that contributes will have their name on our special honour wall in the gym(this will be exclusively for contributors ).

I have no money but I want to help

No money ? No problem ! Here's what you can do

You can share this link to others that you think might benefit from contributing or be interested in this campaign.

You can help us by spreading the word about JustMoveNI and our aims of inspiring people to get healthy and get back into movement. We want to change lives, give people healthy goals and a sense of achievement.

Thank you again for checking out our campaign and look forward to seeing you at JustMoveNI

story:
Bienvenidos a Qul 3D Printing!

La primera comunidad de 3D Printing en Colombia. Este es un espacio para diseñar y construir lo pensado e inimaginable, un espacio para aprender, para innovar y para revolucionar el mundo. Solo imaginen lo que es posible.

Nuestro sueño es llevar esta increíble tecnología a todos los rincones de Colombia, a los niños, adultos y profesionales para que transformen su pensamiento y educación de lo que es posible y contribuir con el futuro de nuestro país y nuestra sociedad.

Nuestro propósito si llegamos a Cumplir la meta de los $6.500 USD, es adquirir un kit de impresora y scanner "portable" algo un poco más pequeño de lo que tenemos, para realizar demostraciones y dar a conocer más esta nueva y magnífica tecnología. Nuestra idea es llegar  a escuelas públicas de municipios cercanos a Bogotá, lugares cercanos a universidades entre otros y hacer talleres de innovación utilizando la tecnología del 3D printing. Para lograr esto, tenemos en mente una impresora que nos permite imprimir en dos materiales (PLA - ABS)  también nos permite imprimir en dos colores simultáneamente. Creemos que es un buen punto de partida. Actualmente existen impresoras muy sofisticadas que pueden llegar a imprimir prótesis de muy alta calidad a unos costos súper bajos (ESTA ES LA META MAS ADELANTE). Es increíble que hoy existan impresoras que imprimen comida, oro, plata, cerámica y hasta células humanas. Por ahora empezaremos con las de PLA.

Creemos de corazón que es un proyecto que puede llegar a jugar un papel importante en nuestro País, pues esto permitirá mucha innovación y muchos caminos por explorar especialmente con todos los niños cuya creatividad es infinita.

Para lograr nuestra meta hemos creado 5 recompensas diferentes por cada donación. Estas son las recompensas:

  • $10: Gracias! Como todo en la vida, un paso a la vez se llega a lugares inimaginables. Recibirás una carta digital personalizada con mucho cariño y dedicación. Gracias por tu granito de arena. 
  • $25: TuNombre Por Siempre 3D - Tu nombre quedará por siempre en los libros de Qul 3D Printing. Recibirás tu nombre impreso en 5 x 5 cm con una tarjeta personalizada que tendrá la información técnica de tu impresión. Paso a paso llegaremos a la meta...
  • $50: Con Paso de Elefante - Como un elefante con determinación y fuerza llegaremos lejos. Recibirás un elefante articulable inspirado en su fuerza y potencial. Gracias por estos pasos de gigante.
  • $100: Atlas Sosteniendo el Mundo - Atlas no puede sostener el mundo pero tal vez tu celular si :) Con esta inmensurable fuerza seguro lo lograremos. Recibirás un increíble porta celulares para que utilices en tu casa u oficina.
  • $250: Casi vemos la luz! - Podemos ver la luz al final del túnel. Gracias por tu magnífica ayuda. Recibirás una pequeña lámpara  con diseño muy especial.
  • $500: X siempre en nuestro corazón - Te agradecemos de corazón por ayudar a que este sueño se haga realidad. Recibirás el corazón de Qul 3D Printing.

Cualquiera que sea la donación que escojas te lo agradecemos de corazón y creénos que nos servirá mucho. Esperamos te gusten las recompensas!

Queremos compartir un caso de éxito y lo que podemos lograr con esta magnífica tecnología. Estuvimos con un Ing. Mecatrónico a quien conocerán en el video, es un increíble proyecto. Él diseño un brazo inteligente para ayudar a personas con problemas de parálisis facial. Hubiese sido muy difícil lograrlo puesto que hacerlo tenía un costo muy elevado. Sin embargo con nuestra ayuda su proyecto se convirtió en realidad y con seguridad podrá llegar a cambiar la vida de muchas personas. Podrás tener más información sobre este proyecto en el video.

Esperamos seguir adelante con este increíble proyecto con tu ayuda. Una gran forma de ayudarnos es difundiendo nuestro mensaje con todas las personas que puedas.

Hagamos juntos parte de esta nueva revolución.

Visita nuestra página web www.qul3dprinting.com y síguenos en nuestras redes sociales.

GRACIAS!

story:
What is the Leash Tamer?

The Leash-Tamer is the only leash you’ll ever need! It incorporates the elements of many single-function leashes but it performs each of those functions BETTER!  ...and it never tangles.. ever!  The Leash Tamer replaces 5 basic products and  outperforms them all.  It is also the best jogging or biking leash available, hands down.


What makes this leash different?

A custom elastomer band allows the leash both to extend easily, and to remain extremely strong when fully extended.  The elastomer is protected by a rip-stop nylon sleeve that is the same ultra-strong material used to make sails for racing sailboats.

The Leash Tamer extends to a full 10 feet with nearly zero tension or resistance, then retracts quickly and automatically to 2 feet.   So it never tangles even when fully extended on small dogs - your dog/pet will really like that too!

The Leash Tamer comes in a small dog (25lbs or under) and larger dog (over 25lbs) construction or sizes. 

NOTE: If you're unsure about size your dog would need go with the larger leash, which has heavier weight/gauge clasps and hardware as well. And not to worry, the outer nylon sheath is super tough and strong for active dogs!



Here are some features:

  1. The clip system and hyper-stretchy elastomer allows you to set the leash at a maximum or 3, 6, or 10 feet for adjustable control and freedom for your dog.

     

  2. The handle has been designed to help it stay on your wrist even when you are not grabbing the leash. 

  3. An extra clip on the handle allows you to easily attach the leash around your waist, use it as a temporary tether, or even walk two dogs at once.


  4. The optional carry bag can also be clipped onto the handle to help you keep your hands free while you walk your dog  



Color Choices:

We will be producing 4  colors of each LeashTamer. 
Small LeashTamer:
Red
Blue 
Neon Green
Black
Large LeashTamer:
Red
Black 
Metal/Silver 
Blue


The Inspiration

We love our dogs. Years of walking them and being frustrated by the available leash options inspired us to invent something new. Our challenge was to find the right combination of design and materials to provide a versatile, simple, non-mechanical leash, which lets you and your dog enjoy a hands-free walk together - where you manage your dog not the leash!


Who are we?

I am Mark Noonan, inventor, lover of physics and all around professional. My job is to make everyday life simpler but creating simple, intuitive and functional products. Nootools consists of me and Engineer Stephen Fog, we have over 50 years of experience designing, developing and branding new products.

Before launching Nootools, I designed and developed products for some of the world’s leading companies - with many US and international awards and recognitions (including Time Magazine's Best Inventions for our Snow Wolf). Together my partner and I have over 30 patents and have started and built several brands from early inception which are now available at retailers around the world.


Please help up fund the

Leash Tamer

We are here on IndieGogo since it is such a great way to bring new products to market.  We've already completed a successful Kickstarter project, but we wanted to offer a similar discount to IndieGogo folks. 

Your generous pledge will go directly towards helping us fund the costs of engineering and tooling for the injection-mold, purchasing raw materials, final packaging design, shipping, and the first production run.

Our strongest skill sets overall is bringing well-made products to market. With your help we can bring the Leash Tamer to market. We are already working with  several manufacturing partners to ensure the production process will go smoothly.


Risks and challenges

While the fabrics and hardware component suppliers have already been sourced, there is always some possibility that once we deliver the final engineering designs for the injection molding, the company doing our tool building may have slightly longer backlogs and lead times which could delay our production. Similarly, while we have built in what we think is prudent scheduling with our final fabricator/assembler, other projects by the manufacturer could possibly delay final production and delivery.

Nonetheless, anticipating ,planning for, and managing the minor production issues is a major focus for us and one that we are committed to delivering a timely and high quality product to our supporters and customers.

story:
Let me ask you, what is the most horrbile thing, you really do not like on headphones?

  • Interlaced headphones
  • Low power
  • Earache
  • Size of headphones

With our headphones you get rid of these uncomfortable problems. Let us introduce you our concept of new headphones, which are unique for their great material and very high sound quality.

What is LIBERTY

LIBERTY are modern and unique for their original construction, that we inveted first.

Benefits of LIBERTY:

  • easy to wear
  • easy keepable
  • the most modern speakers
  • contain neodymium magnets
  • comfortable to wear for the whole day
  • decorative, smart accessory to your outfit




Construction

LIBERTY are made of a flexible memory plastic material and because of this material a SPIRAL is the main form of our headphones. This form is meant to be used on your hand, bag or backpack. When you strech them out, they look like the letter „C“. This form is meant to be worn on your head, when you want to listen the music. They hold very good on your head and they are adaptable for all head types.


Technology

Inside LIBERTY there are two the most modern neodymium speakers  with sensitivity of  115dB, which provide high-quality, clear and spatial sound. Li-lon battery has the capacity of 1500mAh, that means about 16 hours of listening the music and it is charged by a Micro-USB. The gadget  can communicate with Android system usingthe aplication bluetooth 4.1, whose reach is 15 metres.


Comparison chart


Where do the funds go ?


Basic edition models

Limited edition models

Premium edition model


PERKS


What we need

We need your financial support of minimal 150,000$ to pay all the things, we need to start producing our technology, certificates for business trade and the following progress. Money, you grant us, will be used for production, packing and expedition of the product. Every dollar will be used for production of these head phones.

For gathered money you will get the most modern and styled head phones as we are able to produce.

Impact

Who we are?  We are a new young company, but our members are very creative – Filip Augustín and Lukáš Gono. Without your help, we can´t afford to pay off all the expenses.  Please support our revolution plan, we will be thankfull for every dolar. Thanks for your contribution.

Music was, music is and music will be...

story:
The story of two friends with one idea

We are a team of young italian yacht enthusiasts with a common dream: design the most ecologic boats ever, with an uncompromised design. And, of course, be the very firsts starting up a yacht design studio with a crowdfounding operation.



Dharma Yachts is the direct consequence of a strong friendship born on Instagram over one year ago, when the founder, Jacopo, and Fedor, the co-founder, began sharing their passion for yachting.

We started working everyday, imagine the most ecologic super yacht ever. As the team grew up, we designed ONE, a 30 meters long motor concept-yacht, but she was still really far from our vision. 


We focussed on a smaller boat and we managed to design this boat all around eco-friendly technologies. Other yacht brands offer hybrid yachts of course, but they are generally just a version in the range. Instead, we wanted our boat to be standardly ecologic: we designed a boat all around the best green technologies available nowadays, and not viceversa, creating a boat then trying to fill her with ecologic stuff. 

That's why we created Dharma 99.


Dharma 99 is a 9.9 meters motor daycruiser made with strong and sporty lines and designed to be made at least 30% of recycled materials.

Dharma 99 is designed for those who want to experience the sea or the lake for a one day or a weekend-long trip, to escape the city and to relax with friends or family. 

Dharma 99 is available in two versions: a four-bedded and a single bedroom one. All the interiors are made with the best recycled woods and composite materials, not only to reduce weight but also to reduce the impact on environment. Moving the kitchen outside, hidding it in a locker just behind the passenger seat allowed us to improve the usability of the space under the deck. The bathroom is just under the driver's helm and it's really confortable.

Dharma 99 is also incredibly low fuel consumption, due to two gasoline Volvo Penta D6 330 engines and to the special shape of her hull. Maximum speed is around 38 Kts (extimated). 

In Italy there are famous and expert shipyards: that's the reason why Dharma 99 will be built in the Belpaese - a nice way to call our country - and delivered worldwide, with a very competitive launch price: from 239,000 Euros  + VAT, depending on the shipyard.


We have a very important chance now

This May, we are officially invited to Capri Island, Italy, for the world première of Dharma 99 during the famous Rolex Sailing Week.

But we need also your help to make it real.

We planned to spend around 20,000 Euros to start-up and set our world première in Capri, but every little help makes the difference. 

First of all, we'd like to have a nice corner during the event and it has a huge cost. Secondly, we want the best scale models ever built. Since Dharma hasn't launched any boat yet, at least we would like to make our possible customers dream on our Dharma 99 models!

We also want to have a strong communication campaign, and we really would like to film every day there and take tons and tons of pictures of our event in a such amazing place. Not only you will se us working and promoting the company you supported, but you will be also with us, like a member of our team.

And if we don't reach our goal, we will still keep our dream alive by using the money for further initiatives and events.

We are everybody under 30, our journey has just begun!


What's next?

We are quite optimistic. We really believe in our project and this is basically the reason why we planned our steps as following, if we overtake our primary 20k Euro goal:

  1. 35.000 Euro: massive communication. In case we reach this important goal, we'd invest this extra money for a strong brand communication, to find our first customer. Communication is the key for a successful selling.
  2. 50.000 Euro: hybrid version of Dharma 99. With this huge amount of extra money, our team will be finally able to achieve an important goal we decided for our company: make our first full-hybrid yacht. Since we believe that Dharma 99 would be perfect for this aim, we'd really love to use Dharma 99 platform to go hybrid. Don't let this be just a dream! 

Different ways to support us

We know it, not everyone can invest money, especially in strange projects like this! But there's no problem with that, because there are several ways to make our dream come true. First of all, you can share our project with all your friends! The best way to promote us, infact, is not just to give us money, but is to spread our name - Dharma Yachts - and the name of our first commercial product - Dharma 99 - as much as you can.

Secondly, another very important way to support us and to push us to go on is to ask us. To ask us about everything you want concerning our boat, our project and our dream. We really want not only to be just economically supported, but also to feel ourselves in the mind of the people.

And third, you can push our social networks. You can follow us on Instagram, Twitter, Facebook... wherever you want to follow us, we will be waiting for your precious help!

Thank for supporting us!
story_txt:
The story of two friends with one idea We are a team of young italian yacht enthusiasts with a common dream: design the most ecologic boats ever, with an uncompromised design. And, of course, be the very firsts starting up a yacht design studio with a crowdfounding operation.






Dharma Yachts is the direct consequence of a strong friendship born on Instagram over one year ago, when the founder, Jacopo, and Fedor, the co-founder, began sharing their passion for yachting.
We started working everyday, imagine the most ecologic super yacht ever. As the team grew up, we designed ONE, a 30 meters long motor concept-yacht, but she was still really far from our vision. 



We focussed on a smaller boat and we managed to design this boat all around eco-friendly technologies. Other yacht brands offer hybrid yachts of course, but they are generally just a version in the range. Instead, we wanted our boat to be standardly ecologic: we designed a boat all around the best green technologies available nowadays, and not viceversa, creating a boat then trying to fill her with ecologic stuff. 
That's why we created Dharma 99.



Dharma 99 is a 9.9 meters motor daycruiser made with strong and sporty lines and designed to be made at least 30% of recycled materials.

Dharma 99 is designed for those who want to experience the sea or the lake for a one day or a weekend-long trip, to escape the city and to relax with friends or family. 
Dharma 99 is available in two versions: a four-bedded and a single bedroom one. All the interiors are made with the best recycled woods and composite materials, not only to reduce weight but also to reduce the impact on environment. Moving the kitchen outside, hidding it in a locker just behind the passenger seat allowed us to improve the usability of the space under the deck. The bathroom is just under the driver's helm and it's really confortable.
Dharma 99 is also incredibly low fuel consumption, due to two gasoline Volvo Penta D6 330 engines and to the special shape of her hull. Maximum speed is around 38 Kts (extimated). 







In Italy there are famous and expert shipyards: that's the reason why Dharma 99 will be built in the Belpaese - a nice way to call our country - and delivered worldwide, with a very competitive launch price: from 239,000 Euros  + VAT, depending on the shipyard.




We have a very important chance now
 This May, we are officially invited to Capri Island, Italy, for the world première of Dharma 99 during the famous Rolex Sailing Week.




But we need also your help to make it real.
We planned to spend around 20,000 Euros to start-up and set our world première in Capri, but every little help makes the difference. 
First of all, we'd like to have a nice corner during the event and it has a huge cost. Secondly, we want the best scale models ever built. Since Dharma hasn't launched any boat yet, at least we would like to make our possible customers dream on our Dharma 99 models!
We also want to have a strong communication campaign, and we really would like to film every day there and take tons and tons of pictures of our event in a such amazing place. Not only you will se us working and promoting the company you supported, but you will be also with us, like a member of our team.
And if we don't reach our goal, we will still keep our dream alive by using the money for further initiatives and events.
We are everybody under 30, our journey has just begun!







What's next?

We are quite optimistic. We really believe in our project and this is basically the reason why we planned our steps as following, if we overtake our primary 20k Euro goal:



35.000 Euro: massive communication. In case we reach this important goal, we'd invest this extra money for a strong brand communication, to find our first customer. Communication is the key for a successful selling.


50.000 Euro: hybrid version of Dharma 99. With this huge amount of extra money, our team will be finally able to achieve an important goal we decided for our company: make our first full-hybrid yacht. Since we believe that Dharma 99 would be perfect for this aim, we'd really love to use Dharma 99 platform to go hybrid. Don't let this be just a dream! 


Different ways to support us
 We know it, not everyone can invest money, especially in strange projects like this! But there's no problem with that, because there are several ways to make our dream come true. First of all, you can share our project with all your friends! The best way to promote us, infact, is not just to give us money, but is to spread our name - Dharma Yachts - and the name of our first commercial product - Dharma 99 - as much as you can.
Secondly, another very important way to support us and to push us to go on is to ask us. To ask us about everything you want concerning our boat, our project and our dream. We really want not only to be just economically supported, but also to feel ourselves in the mind of the people.
And third, you can push our social networks. You can follow us on Instagram, Twitter, Facebook... wherever you want to follow us, we will be waiting for your precious help!
Thank for supporting us!

story:
Vietnamese Student Association of Minnesota (VSAM) is currently producing their annual Tet Show and needs your support! Tet is the Vietnamese New Year and VSAM celebrates with a highly entertaining production that features dance, singing, fashion shows, and more! The show will be Saturday, February 6, 2016 at the Northrop Auditorium at the University of Minnesota Twin Cities where we expect over 1000 attendees.

VSAM's Tet Show is an opportunity to share our voices, experiences, and Vietnamese culture with the University of Minnesota community and Vietnamese community. In order to commence the Year of the Monkey with wonderful stories and fantastic performances, beautiful costumes are necessary. This year, the Fashion Show Committee is fundraising so that they can create costumes for the Tet Show actors and dancers. The cost of producing 15 historical Vietnamese outfits for one of the shows will be $620. Another $150 is needed to go towards costumes for the Ballroom dancers. With our goal of $770, we will need your help. Each donation amount has its own perk, all you have to do is choose one.

If you are unable to make a donation, please share the word about our crowdfunding and please attend our event, which is free and open to the public!

For more information, check out VSAM's website at http://www.vsaminnesota.org/ or you can visit the event website here and visit our VSAM Tet Show LIKE page 


Photo by Kao-wei Chen
Designs by Kimyen Nguyen

story:
How it Started

It all started when a guy name, Nuzli Hakiim realized that cigar accessories are getting boring. The ones that look amazing and unique, will cost thousands. So he decides that he will design his own cigar accessories. Being a designer and photographer, Nuzli had experience working in the fashion industry and was highly influenced by designers like Alexander McQueen, Emilio Pucci and so on.

After tons of prototypes and designs, he decided to release 3 designs, Draekon(the dragon), Shinikami(the god of death), and lastly a collab with a cigar company called Jas Sum Kral(the smoking lion). 

The stands were carefully designed and were made sure that they are small enough to fit in any bags and also heavy enough so that they won't fly off by strong winds. The top curve, the rest, was carefully designed so it fits any ring gauge of cigars.

From a sketch to 3d design to 3d printed to actual prototype

_____________________________________________________

 

Draekon Cigar Stand | 1000pcs only

Greatly inspired by Emilio Pucci and Games of Thrones, the stand is made of a dragon spiral around the stand.

  • Limited to 1000pcs only
  • Stainless steel
  • 18k Gold plated
  • Details were handcrafted from a basic mould and hand polished
  • Comes with foam padded box with a cloth pouch
  • Estimated delivery: Sep-Oct 2018

 

Shinikami Cigar Stand | 1000pcs only

Greatly inspired by Alexander McQueen and Thomassabo, the stand is made of a skull being ripped apart, hence Shinikami or shinigami(死神, “god of death” or “death spirit”) are gods or supernatural spirits that invite humans toward death and can be seen to be present or interpreted to be present in certain aspects of Japanese religion and culture. Yes the hands are shinigami and not the skull.

  • Limited to 1000pcs only
  • Stainless steel
  • 18k Gold plated
  • Details were handcrafted from a basic mould and hand polished
  • Comes with foam padded box with a cloth pouch
  • Estimated delivery: Sep-Oct 2018

 

Jas Sum Kral x Dark Regal Cigar Stand | 500pcs only

Jas Sum Kral or JSK or 'I am King' in Macedonian, is a cigar company that blends amazing cigars. They are the first cigar label that Nuzli has designed. He also ended up designing an illustration of a smoking lion for their brand's t-shirt. And that inspired him to do a collaboration with JSK and designed a smoking lion cigar stand. 

  • Limited to 500pcs only
  • Stainless steel
  • 18k Gold plated
  • Details were handcrafted from a basic mould and hand polished
  • Comes with foam padded box with a cloth pouch
  • Estimated delivery: Sep-Oct 2018

_______________________________________________________

 

 

THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR YOUR SUPPORT!!

story:
To pre-order your sunglasses, select one of the pledge levels on the right. 

(Each pair of sunglasses comes with a bamboo case and microfiber cloth on the house). Nice.

 

SUNGLASSES FIT FOR YOUR LIFESTYLE.

The Perfect Frames :: One size fits all, feather-like light weight hand made from 100% bamboo wood: a highly sustainable, eco-friendly, durable, buoyant (floats on water / water resistant) and hard material with natural anti-fungal and anti-bacterial properties. Also, according to the natural wood grains, every pair is one-of-a-kind just like you. It doesn’t get much better than that.

Highly Protective Lenses :: Extreme protection made from impact resistant polycarbonate lenses: 100% UVA / UVB filtering, polarized, inside anti-reflection layer, and scratch resistant layers on the front and back of the lenses for extra durability.

Our Guarantee :: We take pride in our work and will fix any manufacturing flaws free of charge

Epicstoke is a US based outdoor brand that creates high quality one-of-a-kind products from sustainable and recycled materials with a mission to insure that every single product has quite the story to tell that not only fits its new owner, but lives with and elevates who you are.

If you are unfamiliar with us, we previously had a successful Kickstarter campaign  that put us on the spotlight of a few top blogs like Gear Junkie, Korduroy, Thrillist, Heavy.com, Touch of Modern, 350.org, etc. As well, if you're a bit unsure about how we work, please just read the comments section of our Kickstarter and then feel free to read comment sections of other Kickstarters.

Launching a startup in today's world is not an easy thing to do with the take over of brands by large corporations and people forgetting that some brands like ours is run by two dudes and this is our life. As a result, we not only really care about our products and customers, but you're getting direct access to the creators for what you pay for. We might not be as cheap, but we're real. In a society as connected as we are today, personal touch seems to get disconnected. We're here to put a personality and story behind what you purchase once again. By buying a pair of these, you're not just buying a pair of sunglasses, but helping us spread the stoke and fund the future of human potential.

story:
Welcome Friends...

In case you were wondering, "Folow" is Wolof spelled backwards. Wolof is the majority of the many dialects and ethnic groups that make up the rich diversity of Senegal.

The beautiful handbags and totes featured in this campaign are a wonderful representation of color and innovation in materials. We pride ourselves on bringing you the very best product that you cannot find anywhere else.

Please enjoy your stay and thank you in advance for your support.

Folow Bags Campaign..

The bags featured in this campaign are meticulously handcrafted by artisans in Senegal using innovative materials that are extremely durable and vibrant. The versatility of the bags make them perfect for any occasion. I guarantee that they will last you a lifetime.

The purpose of this campaign is to increase the marketing and production of the handbags and totes.

The proceeds from this crowdfunding campaign would specifically be used for:

---registration and participating in apparel and accessories trade shows like MAGIC and TexWorld USA

---improving bag production facilities and capacity for expansion

---building and maintaining an online presence  

The Folow Team...

I have been friends with Jean Pierre (upper right in photo) ever since I landed in Senegal as a Peace Corps volunteer about 17 years ago. During my time in the country, we worked together to identify grassroots level business management and education projects that helped small business owners, artisans and youth groups.  All these years later, Jean Pierre and I continue to collaborate on projects that help promote the prosperity of Senegalese families and communities. 

The Folow Campaign is our latest collaboration. While Jean Pierre works closely with the artisans to ensure quality and maintain timelines, I do the design work for the bags. 

Campaign Timeline...

Perks for Backers...

The Hampton Deluxe Tote is a beautifully appointed bag with lots of style. It features a silk inner liner that protects the contents and helps with organization. There is also an interior pocket to hold cash, cards and/or change. The exterior of the bag features silk ribbon guided through silver eyelets and finished with a bow. Fabric trim also lines the bag opening for a nice finishing touch.

The Emory Tote is sweet simplicity. It is the "classic" Folow tote available in many colors and designs.The exterior of the bag features a closure of matching material. This style can be customized with a pocket. The innovative materials used to make the bag is easy to clean and holds up to any environment. 

The Charlotte Tote is a slightly different take on the Emory tote. This is a smaller bag that features fabric trim and does not include a closure. This style can be customized with a pocket. The innovative materials used to make the bag is easy to clean and holds up to any environment. 

Gone in 60 Days...

This campaign only runs for 60 days so act fast and get this beautiful bag for yourself, family and friends.

Risks and Challenges

As with any campaign there are risks and challenges involved. Every step of this process has to be managed precisely to ensure the timely delivery of our promise to you. We take our commitment to the Senegalese artisans and IndieGoGo backers very seriously. With that being said, our rewards are ready to be produced and shipped upon the completion of this campaign. There are no prototypes to be produced or complex manufacturing schemes to implement. We are 100% committed to your satisfaction.

Thank You in Advance for Your Support.

story:
Alice Riot is launching its first collection of women’s professional garments that serve as the canvases for prints of original, contemporary art! This is a fantastic opportunity for professional women to acquire a first-edition garment and provide us with valuable input on the brand and customer experience. 

Through classic styles, wrinkle-free fabrics, an inclusive size range and limited-edition prints, Alice Riot encourages women at work to celebrate female contemporary artists, while at the same time celebrating their own style and power. Each collection will feature new individual artists from around the globe, released twice annually. Customers also have the option to invest in each collection’s original works of art.

Model: Robyne Robinson: Consulting director at Arts @ MSP and Alliance Architects, arts consultant at fiveXfive, designer at Rox Jewelry // Photo: Sarah White

The inaugural collection of garments showcases three original paintings by contemporary artist Kate Iverson - co-founder, curator and chief creative officer (CCO) of Alice Riot.

About the Artist:

Kate Iverson's art was the initial inspiration that brought Kate and Kelly together as business partners, and Alice Riot's first collection is a literal reflection of that. Kate is a painter and mixed media artist living and working in Minneapolis, MN. She has exhibited locally and nationally, often focusing on the parallels between nature and design. Kate’s work tells vibrant yet thoughtful color stories that move between flat and dimensional objects. See more of Kate's work at www.kateiversonart.com.

Details: Indiegogo campaign 

This Indiegogo campaign raises capital (net after production costs for the perks) that will help Alice Riot establish operating space and inventory management for future collections. It also provides women with the opportunity to:

  • own a first-issue, limited-edition collection garment at a 20% discount off retail price;
  • provide the co-founders with feedback on product features, packaging and shipping, out of box experience, and ideal delivery windows for future orders; and 
  • help the co-founders build an ideal sales and inventory model for future collections.

The typical working woman spends on average $3,000 each year on her professional wardrobe. By backing this campaign, you'll be dedicating a small portion of your annual spend on clothes for work - and in return:

  • You'll own a beautiful, well constructed, limited-edition piece that stands out, no matter where you wear it; 
  • You'll be helping a woman-owned startup stand up its business; and
  • You will directly support a business that has a clear purpose: to encourage women to lift other women!

An Alice Riot dress, skirt or scarf is a limited-edition print and a wise investment that helps women #WearTheGallery – to bring that creative spark with them, no matter the role they play or where they work. Join us and help us build a global brand that celebrates women at work and women in art! 

Model: Heather Cmiel: marketing communications strategist, 3M Health Care // Photo: Sarah White

Garment specifications

This inaugural collection features four garments, all made in a midweight, all-seasonal, wrinkle free blend of 90% poly, 10% spandex:

Pencil skirt

Midi skirt

Sleeveless sheath dress

¾ sleeve sheath dress

The collection also features two sizes of scarves, in 100% silk:

40”x40” square

40”x70” rectangle

Size chart

The size chart for Alice Riot garments strives to ensure accessible fashion for a wide range of body sizes and shapes:

XS (U.S. size 2-4)

S (U.S. size 6-8)

M (U.S. size 10-12)

L (U.S. size 14-16)

XL (U.S. size 18-20)

2XL (U.S. size 22-24)

3XL (U.S. size 26-28)

Model: Vanessa McDuffie: Educator, stylist and blogger, NessaBess.com // Photo: Sarah White

Product features

High quality, high-pigment art prints – works with the fabric stretch with no print distortion

Classic styles – appropriate for dress-code work environments

Wrinkle-free fabric – moderate stretch

Travel friendly – roll it in a ball or shove it in a bag, and it’ll still look fantastic

Traditional cuts – below-knee length, tailored but not too tight

Comfortable fit – arm gussets, necklines, waist and hips that fit well and move with your body

Inclusive size options – XS to 3XL

Care instructions

Garments: Wash delicate cold; line dry – or dry clean, if you’re fancy

Scarves: dry clean only

Model: Nausheena Hussain: executive director, Reviving the Islamic Sisterhood for Empowerment (RISE) / Photo: Sarah White

Customer persona

Alice Riot is a solid investment for the professional working woman who appreciates classic professional styles, and wants to add a piece or two to her collection that adds dimension to her style and speaks to her creative personality. Our customer archetype is a leader in her work – whether in corporate, arts, entertainment, government or nonprofit sectors.

Price point and category comparisons

Alice Riot prides itself on providing women an accessible option to original works of art at a price point comparable with mass-retail women’s apparel brands.

 

The Story of Alice Riot - Kelly Groehler, co-founder and CEO

It started one morning with a simple statement that flew out of my mouth like an expletive:

“I want that as a skirt!”

It was March 17, 2015. Perched on my couch, I was shopping online and trying to decide what to wear to job interviews. My entire wardrobe was a study in monochromatic, classic styles that I loved: suits, pencil skirts, sheath dresses. But I wanted to add a piece or two that added dimension to my style and spoke to my creative personality. None of the options I found that morning inspired me. I was resigned to invest in yet-another black suit.

Then my phone pinged as Kate Iverson, the brilliant contemporary artist, posted one of her latest gorgeous paintings on Instagram. I looked at it, and the idea hit me: I wanted to support my friend’s incredible, striking art – so why not wear it to work?

And that was the beginning of Alice Riot.

Model: Amanda Brinkman – chief brand and communications officer, Deluxe; series host and executive producer, The Small Business Revolution - Main Street  // Photo: Sarah White

Alice Riot speaks to the creative spark that drives our work as women. Through simple, classic cuts, wrinkle-free fabrics, and limited-edition prints, we encourage women at work to celebrate contemporary women artists. We also provide the option for women to invest in the artists’ original works. I'm thrilled that our first collection features "Riot No. 2" - the very painting that started Kate and I on this journey together. 

The name Alice Riot holds special meaning for both Kate and myself. Alice is Kate’s young niece. Alyce is my beloved, late great aunt. Alice Riot honors both the girl and the woman: the encouragement to disrupt tradition, to support each other as women, to embrace creativity and authentically chase our dreams.

For centuries, women have driven culture (despite lack of credit) through breakthrough advances in math, science, business and the arts. Today, women are finally making real gains in leadership roles, and we have so much to offer with a more creative, inspired approach each day to our work – including how we dress.

An Alice Riot dress, skirt or scarf is a limited-edition print and a wise investment that brings that creative spark with you, no matter the role you play or where you work. We have girls to inspire, women to raise up with us, and a world to change for the better.

Let’s get dressed, ladies.

Kate & Kelly

#WearTheGallery

Co-Founders, Kelly Groehler (L) and Kate Iverson (R) / Photo by Denny Park

SPECIAL THANKS: Studio Six & Flyover Films (video), Sarah White Photography (lookbook)
story_txt:
Alice Riot is launching its first collection of women’s professional garments that serve as the canvases for prints of original, contemporary art! This is a fantastic opportunity for professional women to acquire a first-edition garment and provide us with valuable input on the brand and customer experience. Through classic styles, wrinkle-free fabrics, an inclusive size range and limited-edition prints, Alice Riot encourages women at work to celebrate female contemporary artists, while at the same time celebrating their own style and power. Each collection will feature new individual artists from around the globe, released twice annually. Customers also have the option to invest in each collection’s original works of art.Model: Robyne Robinson: Consulting director at Arts @ MSP and Alliance Architects, arts consultant at fiveXfive, designer at Rox Jewelry // Photo: Sarah WhiteThe inaugural collection of garments showcases three original paintings by contemporary artist Kate Iverson - co-founder, curator and chief creative officer (CCO) of Alice Riot.About the Artist:Kate Iverson's art was the initial inspiration that brought Kate and Kelly together as business partners, and Alice Riot's first collection is a literal reflection of that. Kate is a painter and mixed media artist living and working in Minneapolis, MN. She has exhibited locally and nationally, often focusing on the parallels between nature and design. Kate’s work tells vibrant yet thoughtful color stories that move between flat and dimensional objects. See more of Kate's work at www.kateiversonart.com.Details: Indiegogo campaign This Indiegogo campaign raises capital (net after production costs for the perks) that will help Alice Riot establish operating space and inventory management for future collections. It also provides women with the opportunity to:
own a first-issue, limited-edition collection garment at a 20% discount off retail price;
provide the co-founders with feedback on product features, packaging and shipping, out of box experience, and ideal delivery windows for future orders; and 
help the co-founders build an ideal sales and inventory model for future collections.
The typical working woman spends on average $3,000 each year on her professional wardrobe. By backing this campaign, you'll be dedicating a small portion of your annual spend on clothes for work - and in return:
You'll own a beautiful, well constructed, limited-edition piece that stands out, no matter where you wear it; 
You'll be helping a woman-owned startup stand up its business; and
You will directly support a business that has a clear purpose: to encourage women to lift other women!
An Alice Riot dress, skirt or scarf is a limited-edition print and a wise investment that helps women #WearTheGallery – to bring that creative spark with them, no matter the role they play or where they work. Join us and help us build a global brand that celebrates women at work and women in art! Model: Heather Cmiel: marketing communications strategist, 3M Health Care // Photo: Sarah WhiteGarment specificationsThis inaugural collection features four garments, all made in a midweight, all-seasonal, wrinkle free blend of 90% poly, 10% spandex:Pencil skirtMidi skirtSleeveless sheath dress¾ sleeve sheath dressThe collection also features two sizes of scarves, in 100% silk:40”x40” square40”x70” rectangleSize chartThe size chart for Alice Riot garments strives to ensure accessible fashion for a wide range of body sizes and shapes:XS (U.S. size 2-4)S (U.S. size 6-8)M (U.S. size 10-12)L (U.S. size 14-16)XL (U.S. size 18-20)2XL (U.S. size 22-24)3XL (U.S. size 26-28)Model: Vanessa McDuffie: Educator, stylist and blogger, NessaBess.com // Photo: Sarah WhiteProduct featuresHigh quality, high-pigment art prints – works with the fabric stretch with no print distortionClassic styles – appropriate for dress-code work environmentsWrinkle-free fabric – moderate stretchTravel friendly – roll it in a ball or shove it in a bag, and it’ll still look fantasticTraditional cuts – below-knee length, tailored but not too tightComfortable fit – arm gussets, necklines, waist and hips that fit well and move with your bodyInclusive size options – XS to 3XLCare instructionsGarments: Wash delicate cold; line dry – or dry clean, if you’re fancyScarves: dry clean onlyModel: Nausheena Hussain: executive director, Reviving the Islamic Sisterhood for Empowerment (RISE) / Photo: Sarah WhiteCustomer personaAlice Riot is a solid investment for the professional working woman who appreciates classic professional styles, and wants to add a piece or two to her collection that adds dimension to her style and speaks to her creative personality. Our customer archetype is a leader in her work – whether in corporate, arts, entertainment, government or nonprofit sectors.Price point and category comparisonsAlice Riot prides itself on providing women an accessible option to original works of art at a price point comparable with mass-retail women’s apparel brands. The Story of Alice Riot - Kelly Groehler, co-founder and CEOIt started one morning with a simple statement that flew out of my mouth like an expletive:“I want that as a skirt!”It was March 17, 2015. Perched on my couch, I was shopping online and trying to decide what to wear to job interviews. My entire wardrobe was a study in monochromatic, classic styles that I loved: suits, pencil skirts, sheath dresses. But I wanted to add a piece or two that added dimension to my style and spoke to my creative personality. None of the options I found that morning inspired me. I was resigned to invest in yet-another black suit.Then my phone pinged as Kate Iverson, the brilliant contemporary artist, posted one of her latest gorgeous paintings on Instagram. I looked at it, and the idea hit me: I wanted to support my friend’s incredible, striking art – so why not wear it to work?And that was the beginning of Alice Riot.Model: Amanda Brinkman – chief brand and communications officer, Deluxe; series host and executive producer, The Small Business Revolution - Main Street  // Photo: Sarah WhiteAlice Riot speaks to the creative spark that drives our work as women. Through simple, classic cuts, wrinkle-free fabrics, and limited-edition prints, we encourage women at work to celebrate contemporary women artists. We also provide the option for women to invest in the artists’ original works. I'm thrilled that our first collection features "Riot No. 2" - the very painting that started Kate and I on this journey together. The name Alice Riot holds special meaning for both Kate and myself. Alice is Kate’s young niece. Alyce is my beloved, late great aunt. Alice Riot honors both the girl and the woman: the encouragement to disrupt tradition, to support each other as women, to embrace creativity and authentically chase our dreams.For centuries, women have driven culture (despite lack of credit) through breakthrough advances in math, science, business and the arts. Today, women are finally making real gains in leadership roles, and we have so much to offer with a more creative, inspired approach each day to our work – including how we dress.An Alice Riot dress, skirt or scarf is a limited-edition print and a wise investment that brings that creative spark with you, no matter the role you play or where you work. We have girls to inspire, women to raise up with us, and a world to change for the better.Let’s get dressed, ladies.Kate & Kelly#WearTheGalleryCo-Founders, Kelly Groehler (L) and Kate Iverson (R) / Photo by Denny ParkSPECIAL THANKS: Studio Six & Flyover Films (video), Sarah White Photography (lookbook)

story:
About this Project:

As an active sportswear designer for big name brands since the early 90’s, our founder has always had an eye for creating functional outdoor fashion.

Living in the northern hemisphere where long and dark define winter months, it was her 10 year-old who made her aware of how un-aware most kids are when it comes to being seen on the street. She soon recognized a gap in the market for reflective gear that would light up dull days while keeping kids visible. So why not make the essentials practical, stylish and incognito?

Thinking long and hard about this brilliant idea, it was an unusual jolt of light that sparked the name: 

In the summer of 2016 while working high atop a mountain, Scarlet’s husband Kris was literally zapped by lightning …and the brand was born. (He walked away with a few stitches and a fear of lighting, but no super powers).

ZAPPED offers urban styled essentials that kids need to wear every day.  The added bonus: when skies go dark and your kids are running from music lessons to soccer practice, they will still be visible in high traffic zones.  

We have taken the styles that kids love to wear every day and made them super cool, durable, water-proof and functional, using an all-over tonal reflective street-wear inspired fabric.

We wanted to start off with what every kid needs, but the costs of meeting minimum orders and holding inventory was outside our budget.  We realized if we could pre-sell the back pack and the ball cap, we could cover the deposit required to finish the remaining 3 styles.

That's why we need you!

What We Need & What You Get

We need 10K to help cover costs of logistics, import taxes and final production payment for our first 2 styles, as well as the deposit to launch the rest of the collection.  

We are hoping to make it easy by offering items on Indiegogo that don't require sizing. We've arranged with our factories to push through a limited number of these styles so you can get them quickly. If you order now you will be first in line WITH A DISCOUNT off the retail price.  We are also offering the ball cap FREE with the first 50 back-pack orders!

We're also gauging interest in the shoes and jacket that will round out the launch collection. Check out these styles on our website at zappedoutfitters.com  and pre-order your size for delivery in November.

The Impact

We want to take this idea to the next level by 2018.  Our goal, with your support, is to round out the collection for back to school 2018 by adding  jeans, joggers, puffys, hoodies, boots, shoes and everything you need to play hard and be seen. 

What about the bigger picture?

Our true goal is to add more light and lightness to the world, in small and big ways. 

Zooming in on reflective essentials means less wastefulness on unnecessary clothing, and more intention on practical stuff. 

We want to expose our kids to being truly seen and to see others in a brighter light.

As we grow, conversations are underway to partner with organizations whose purpose is to give light to those in need around the globe. Through your connection to us, we hope to Give Light together as part of our commitment to social responsibility…literally lighting up the way for future generations.

We're just getting started and believe in creating an awesome, edgy, practical, fun and sustainable brand.  

We welcome your needs, ideas and feedback at tellmemore@zappedoutfitters.com

Risks & Challenges

We have been in this business long enough to know that there are numerous hurdles to over-come.  In fact, we have already jumped over dozens of them getting us this far.  We have an incredible team of friends, professionals and industry leaders that are helping us navigate through uncertain terrain,  always finding solutions.   

Our main concern and biggest risk in a project like this is late production delivery. Being in this industry for 20 years, it’s seems to be a constant challenge no matter how big your brand is.  We have successfully produced a small run of quality samples for testing and marketing, which acts as a “mini-production run”. We learned a lot along the way, and ironed out some kinks for what we hope will be a smooth run. 

We promise to keep you posted!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if this isn’t a product for you, think of your grandkids, nieces, nephews and friends!

Even if you just think this is a rad idea, please share this campaign with people who will dig it!  

And, if you believe in the product as much as we do, we would love to send you a minty fresh air freshener and quality zapped sticker with a minimum pledge just because.  

Curious about what else we're up to? Check out our website for details about up-and-coming products at zappedoutfitters.com.

Details of the campaign products:

THE BACKPACK

An everyday durable backpack for school, the street or the skatepark.

⚡️ Expected delivery October 2017 ⚡️

  • Be seen and keep your stuff dry with reflective, water resistant fabric and abrasion resistant base and front flap
  • Comfy carrying with padded shoulder straps, adjustable chest strap and top handle
  • Stuff it full thanks to a wide opening, 2-way zippers, front stuff-it pocket and secondary zip pocket
  • Internal sleeves for essentials like laptop, smart-phone and cord escape
  • Thirsty? Side water bottle storage 
  • Be seen and heard with a built in whistle on chest strap
  • Dimensions:  17.5" height X 12.5" width X 5" depth  (44.5cm height X 32 cm width X 12 cm depth)

 

THE BALL CAP

BOOM!  Flat bill, mesh-backed ball cap

⚡️ Expected delivery October 2017 ⚡️

  • Light up your noggin with reflective front panel
  • Fit any head with flat bill, mesh-backed snap adjustment
  • 3D embroidered Zapped logo is on there for life
  • Inside circumference measure:  22.5" / 57cm  on relaxed snap setting
  • Brim measure: 3" / 8cm

story:
Comments from people that have seen Evolux up close. 

 

Introducing Evolux - Changing the Future of Sneakers... 

 

 

A fresh sneaker style and the limitless design options featured on our durable and flexible LED display allow you to get up, stand up and make your statement to the crowd and on the streets.

Whether you want to:

Promote your brand

Make a statement

Share your beat

Build your own style

...With Evolux the only limit is your creativity.

 

We wanted our sneaker game to be fresh and on point all the time without the financial and environmental burden of buying new sneakers every two weeks.

But Evolux had to be more than just the perfect E-Sneaker we also wanted to make the best sneaker on the market.

 

In addition to the limitless next level customization of our LED display, our sneakers include:

  • EQ sync with your music to display the beats on your sneaker
  • A waterproof seal for the battery to withstand all weather conditions
  • Shockproof and extended playback of over 8 hours
  • The most comfortable insole guaranteed to make you feel like you never want to take Evolux off
  • An anti-skid sole for perfect grip
  • Odor control and flexible, breathable and lightweight materials throughout

 

Our flexible LED Display embedded into the sneaker will be the billboard of your creativity and personality.

  • Glowing size：190*48mm
  • Pixel: 16*64 dots
  • Language: multi-language
  • Input: DC 5V
  • Battery capacity: 800Mah
  • DC Charging time: 4-5hrs
  • Charging: Micro-USB
  • Working time: Over 8+hrs

The LED display supports:

  • Unique graphics and patterns
  • Personalized written text and emojis 
  • A cool range of functions like editing letters, adjusting speeds, brightness and music interaction, and incoming call notifications.

Whether you want to inspire, promote, make a statement or just have fun the LED display will shine your message to the world.

 

When we set out to build the most customizable and durable e-sneaker for the next generations we wanted to make sure there were no limits to our customers’ creativity.

Why not show off your style and personality with:

  • custom text and symbols
  • text emojis
  • patterns
  • custom drawing via the app
  • music EQ level display perfect for your next gig

And when you feel like mixing it up, just tap on the sneaker or click in the app and make a change.

You can even easily adjust the brightness of the LED display, making sure you fit the mood no matter where you go.

 

Do you want to jump to a beat or prefer to sit down while listening to music?

No matter your preference the EQ levels sync functions can display the music on your sneaker and is certain to impress everyone around you.

The call notification can alert you to incoming calls by displaying a set icon right on the sneakers. 

 

Exolux was built for comfort that lasts, from the inside out. Our insole fits like a glove so that once you have it on, you won’t want to take it off.

Made of breathable and highly sweat absorbent polyester, the dynamic fit protects your ankles and the silver ion technology prevents odors.

Evolux provides the perfect fusion of style and comfort. The kicks are insulated with soft cushioning that will fit so snug you'll fall in love. 

 

We believe in a strong grip that ensures you won’t slip. The PU decompression sole and its anti-skid properties will keep you going, even while moonwalking in the rain.

Fresh design also needs to leave you feeling fresh.

Our insoles are made with silver ion technology, a well-well-documented additive for cloth treatment that prevents odor-causing germs.

Also, the carbon layer can absorb bad odors for longer-lasting freshness. 

The Evolux sneaker also makes you feel light on your feet. Thanks to our lightweight materials we will not exceed a total sneaker weight of 56 ounces.

Our non-woven fabric allows your feet to breath in the sneaker. Whether you are dancing in the crowd or skating at the park, your feet stay fresh and keep you doing what you do best.

 

We took our time when sourcing and creating the perfect blend of materials that go into the sneakers. All materials used in the production of the Evolux sneaker have been carefully selected to allow for maximum flexibility on your feet.

 

 

Evolux was built to last. High-quality design, materials as well as a high-level stitching and manufacturing process guarantee that the sneakers keep running as long as you are. 

Never get bored or lose a beat on a long day again. Our sneaker can handle over 8 hours of continued display action.

Built for the urban jungle Evolux is shockproof and made to withstand anything you will throw at it whether you will be out skateboarding all day or shooting jumpy music videos on your phone.

Every single electronic component in our e-sneaker is sealed, waterproof and protected against the harsh environment of wild parties or other urban adventures. 

Our sleek design fits both casual and formal settings and the LED display can be turned off and on in a second.

----

Our team member talked about E-Sneakers:

 

----

We have prepared our rewards with you, our backers in mind.

Pledge now for exclusive early access to everything Evolux.

Get your sneakers by taking advantage of a massive price reduction compared to future retail pricing. Evolux will never be available at this price point again.

----

Our dedicated sizing chart along with our guide to personal measurements will make certain that the right size of sneaker is shipped to you. 

To know your correct size first take your measurements and then refer to the correct sizes from the chart above.

Measure Your Feet:

Step 1

Stand up straight on a hard surface with your heel against the wall and put a piece of white paper taped to the floor that you will stand on for gathering your foot length.

Step 2

Mark the longest part of your foot (this is your heel-to-toe length) on the paper with a pen (Do this also with the other foot to ensure accuracy).

Step 3

Use a ruler or measuring tape to measure the heel-to-toe length from your marks on each foot. Refer to the sizing chart above to select the appropriate sneaker size.

We're a team of artists, designers, and fashion footwear engineers with over ten years of industry experience in footwear and electronics and LED development. We are passionate about bringing Evolux to as many people as possible as we want to save the world from boring sneakers. 

Our design and development process for Evolux has been over two years in the making. We have put a lot of work into this product and know that we have created the best E-Sneaker around.

Supports: 

  • Custom Design: Text, Patterns, Custom Designs
  • Supports editing letters, adjusting display brightness and music interaction
  • Battery capacity: 800Mah
  • DC Charging time: 4-5hrs
  • Working time: 8 hrs+ 

Join our campaign now and together we can make Evolux the must-have e-sneaker for the next generation.

--

Evolux Supporting Partners: 

Help us spread the word about Evolux with friends in your network and get a special offer on Kickbooster. Learn more by clicking the banner above.

Evolux will never be available at this price point again.----Our dedicated sizing chart along with our guide to personal measurements will make certain that the right size of sneaker is shipped to you. To know your correct size first take your measurements and then refer to the correct sizes from the chart above.Measure Your Feet:Step 1Stand up straight on a hard surface with your heel against the wall and put a piece of white paper taped to the floor that you will stand on for gathering your foot length.Step 2Mark the longest part of your foot (this is your heel-to-toe length) on the paper with a pen (Do this also with the other foot to ensure accuracy).Step 3Use a ruler or measuring tape to measure the heel-to-toe length from your marks on each foot. Refer to the sizing chart above to select the appropriate sneaker size.We're a team of artists, designers, and fashion footwear engineers with over ten years of industry experience in footwear and electronics and LED development. We are passionate about bringing Evolux to as many people as possible as we want to save the world from boring sneakers. Our design and development process for Evolux has been over two years in the making. We have put a lot of work into this product and know that we have created the best E-Sneaker around.Supports: 
Custom Design: Text, Patterns, Custom Designs
Supports editing letters, adjusting display brightness and music interaction
Battery capacity: 800Mah
DC Charging time: 4-5hrs
Working time: 8 hrs+ 
Join our campaign now and together we can make Evolux the must-have e-sneaker for the next generation.--Evolux Supporting Partners: Help us spread the word about Evolux with friends in your network and get a special offer on Kickbooster. Learn more by clicking the banner above.

story:
The Tick Toke 4:20 Wristwatch

Is it 4:20 yet?

If you or someone you admire is apt to ask this question, the Tick Toke 4:20 is the wristwatch for you. It’s a high quality custom-made stainless steel-case beauty sporting reliable performant Japanese quartz and automatic movements. Beyond 4:20 am and pm, this timeless timepiece displays all times of day and night as they happen, offering true chronographic versatility.

No mere pipe dream, the Tick Toke 4:20 has been meticulously designed by a proven watch-development team to manifest the natural synergy between Cannabis Culture and wristwatch enthusiasts. With its durable sapphire crystal, single hand and complement of stylish bands, the Tick Toke will be yours to enjoy for a lifetime — and to bequeath to a worthy heir.

Though less than a decade old, Svalbard Watches, Ltd. has already produced some of the world's finest reasonably priced 24-hour and single-hand watches. They’ve helped us refine the watch’s design, and all Tick Toke 4:20s will be expertly crafted in their dedicated production facility.

What We Need & What You Get

Tick Toke watches is starting this campaign to begin the process of normalizing Cannabis culture in a post-prohibition world. We want to establish a company that resonates with both collectors of unusual wristwatches and those who enjoy and benefit from Cannabis use. 

Watch production is a long, expensive process. This campaign will help us recover the raw materials and production costs to create the first of many annual series of Tick Toke watches.

We have focused on creating watches that are affordable, practical and of high quality for the price. All of our materials and production will be managed by a known, established manufacturer in a biannual production process starting this Autumn, so we need to get some contributions to get our new company rolling. We are looking to fund 50% of the full production and distribution costs of the watches through this campaign and to keep margins and markups low as possible. We all have full-time jobs, so this is a hobby! We don't need or want to make a fortune, we just want people to have these cool watches!

By helping us fund these watches, you will help our company start and grow - and own a unique and special timepiece that is a great conversation starter and a fabulous gift.

Backers will get - your choice of automatic or two styles of quartz watches. Our automatic watch comes in at a comfortable 42mm stainless steel case with a 22mm lug width. For bargain conscious watch collectors, we also offer a 42mm quartz version and slim quartz version that is a 40.5mm x 9mm thin and fashionable case.

With your pledge you will also get your choice of band and an opportunity to purchase add-on bands as well!

Tick Toke Special Edition

The Tick Toke Special Edition is limited to TEN WATCHES. Each will have a custom display/storage box, an alligator-style leather deployant band, and your choice of an additional extra band at no cost. The Tick Toke special edition will have custom hands and a unique serial number. These usually go fast!

The Impact

The decriminalization and legalization of Cannabis products has been a major step forward in combatting a racist and classist bias against people who use mild, generally beneficial elements of the Cannabis plant. After almost a century of failed prohibition, the world is again waking to the benefits of the Cannabis plant - not just from a medical standpoint, but also from an industrial standpoint.

Hemp, which is made from non-psychoactive members of the Cannabis family, may help restore balance to the Earth by consuming massive amounts of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere and locking it up in the cellulose and other organic polymers that make this fast growing plant. Hemp plants require little water and practically no fertilizer and produce far more paper than the equivalent acreage of tree and far more cloth than the equivalent acreage of cotton.

Risks & Challenges

Cannabis is still illegal in most states and in many countries, but watches like the Tick Toke are perfectly legal. Nonetheless we are pressing on with our campaign to try and overcome these hurdles. Our goal is to remove this stigma by having high quality fashion accessories for people to show they support legalization and legal medical and recreational use of Cannabis without any kind of stigma.

Also a concern is that this is a joke watch! This is not a joke! It's a damn good watch and you will never need to know how far away 4:20 is. Who could ask for anything more?

Other Ways You Can Help

If you love the watch, but it is not in your budget there are still ways you can help!

  • Get the word out! Share our Instagram pictures and posts! Make some noise!
  • Check our our Facebook page and like and share!
