story:
Mastectomies save lives but leave visible and invisible scars on women. Lack of confidence, low self esteem and a terrible perspective on their own body image are common feelings among women that go through the process of losing a breast. No surprise that putting a bikini and going to the beach becomes such a challenge.

But it doesn't need to be that way!

One of Us was created for this reason: for those women who want a fun, safe, easy-to-wear, eco-friendly and chic swimwear that does not define them as breast cancer survivors or patients.

Our mission is to make these women feel " One of Us". Dealing with such a scary prognosis can feel easily overwhelming, but we acknowledge how fashion can be a powerful tool to empower confidence on women of all ages.

 

One of Us

One of Us is an initiative of swimwear brand AURAI SWIMWEAR, in collaboration with Karin Horen. AURAI SWIMWEAR is an eco & ethical swimwear brand created by italo-brazilian designer Natalia Bertolo. AURAI SWIMWEAR is based in Auckland and made in Natalia's hometown in southern Brazil. 

Karin Horen, twice breast cancer survivor, NZ Starboard ambassador and co-founder of Paddle For Hope, was looking for a mastectomy-friendly swimwear that would suit her lifestyle, age and figure, but she couldn't find what she was looking for.

Very often, swimwear designed especially for women that had mastectomy is not stylish or elegant, and the fit is big and usually representative of an older target audience.  According to the NZ Breast Cancer Foundation, while breast cancer is less common in women under the age of 40, women in their 20s and 30s can get it too (approximately 6% of cases are in this age group). Karin is an example of that, her first breast cancer (and partial mastectomy) happened when she was only 26!

 

THE COLLECTION

Functionality is one of the key elements for eco-friendly fashion, so offering innovative and inclusive products is part of AURAI's ethos.

Inspired by Karin's story, Natalia started to research the best way to convert her new collection into mastectomy-friendly designs, without compromising style and silhouette.  AURAI's tops are already fully lined and include removable padding, which makes the project very easy.

Based on the design of a post-mastectomy bra, an extra layer and a small change in the shape of the lining will allow breast cancer survivors to replace the padding with their prosthesis. Simple as that! 

"Design is a dream that will come true". M. Cobanli

And more!

10% of our profit will be donated to Paddle for Hope, Karin's programme which is focused in cancer rehabilitation. Know more about PfH here.

Comparing a post-mastectomy bra with our current Biarritz top

Converting the Biarritz top into a mastectomy-friendly design

 

SNEAK PEAK

To better represent the project, we added pink* to our colour palette and created an exclusive (and super fun!) "Boobs" print. The collection will include tops, a rash vest and a wetsuit (design below), all mastectomy-friendly, and will be launched at NZFW!

 

* Worldwide, the color pink in general express moral support for women with breast cancer.

 

This is the Joaquina wetsuit!

 

THE MATERIALS

From the SS17/18 collection, AURAI started using ECONYL®, a revolutionary polyamide fibre made from 100% regenerated material, pre and post-consumer nylon waste such as nylon plastic scraps, old carpets and fish nets that litter our oceans.

For the SS18/19 collection, AURAI is also introducing AMNI SOUL ECO®, made from a polyamide with an improved formulation that accelerates biodegradation in the anaerobic (oxygen-free) environment, common in most landfills. As the clothes break down quicker, the impact on landfills is reduced. 

 

THE PLEDGE

We decided to open a crowdfunding project to share our idea with the community, hopefully inspiring other businesses to take action and improve their designs to be more inclusive. Also, because making the swimwear mastectomy-friendly will incur a few extra costs, especially for manufacturing and materials. To create the "pocket" where the prosthesis go, 2 layers of lining is necessary, so it's imperceptible when the top is worn. Below an overview of our cost structure. If you have any questions, please contact us and we'll be happy to help!

MANUFACTURING is definitely the biggest portion of our budget. Swimwear is a very specific product and it requires skillful workmanship. AURAI SWIMWEAR is proud to work with an ethical family-run small atelier in Natalia's hometown in southern Brazil.

MATERIALS represent nearly 25% of our budget. AURAI collections use Econyl, a fabric that is 100% regenerated nylon ( from old carpets, recovered fish nets and other recyclable plastics) and Amni Soul Eco, a biodegradable yarn that decompose in only 5 years in an anaerobic environment. 

PRINTS represent approximately 15% of our costs. All our prints are exclusive ( meaning they are our own designs) and made with digital print, a low-impact technique that doesn't require water or harmful chemicals, and it's zero waste.

PACKAGING AND LABELS include sew-in labels, paper tags, fabric drawstring bag, recycled paper box, ecc.

 

THE REWARDS

Very important! The rewards can be chosen from the entire AURAI SWIMWEAR collection (SS18/19)! Have a look at AURAI's website to know a bit more about the brand and our ethos. The SS18/19 collection is still in development but we are pretty sure you'll find something perfect for you. The SS18/19 collection is planned to be launched in September.

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

AURAI have all designing, manufacturing and logistics sorted out as the brand is already up and running. We have a great relationship with our suppliers and manufacturing and know that we will deliver in a timely manner. We hope you feel confident in our project! If you have any questions or concerns please contact us!

story:
Who are we ? 

Jehan, the brand behind Mosneaks, is a Canadian fusion fashion apparel brand embodying the Woman of the World; the woman who is industrious, fierce and empathetic. Our vision exudes the right amount of pantones and block colors, all the while culminating the simplicity and elegance of diverse crafts and cultures.

We are currently in the works, and have launched our first line of Mosneaks. "Mosneaks" are a modern day version of the Mojaris (centuries old footwear produced by artisans from the South Asian region), combined with a sleek white sole for that perfect edgy look. Each Mosneak has a memory foam insole cushioning, so all you gorgeous ladies out there don't have to compromise on comfort! 

How did we establish this brand ?

The brand Jehan was launched amidst the rising need for something different and unique; something that was not found at every store. Something that felt good to wear, yet does not let you compromise on comfort, style or money. Something that was well made and gave you your moneys worth. Style continues to evolve, however we rarely see new concepts being introduced in the fashion market. As a fashion enthusiast, I always found it difficult to shop, and reasons were the following:

  • Apparel that was well-made was expensive
  • Apparel that was in my budget was not stylish
  • If it was stylish, it was not well-made and not good quality
  • Footwear from leading brands was way out of my budget
  • Footwear that was in my budget was not comfortable
  • Footwear in my budget and stylish was never comfortable - had to bear a few blisters before I broke into them
  • Footwear that was stylish, comfortable for walking around and budget-friendly was no where to be found
  • Lastly, all stores carried the same thing, nothing "new" was ever to be found and my creative mind was always looking for something unique 

All of these struggles compelled me to work on a brand that was budget-friendly, stylish, well-made and a time-capsule collection in itself. Therefore I launched Mosneaks, an entirely new concept in the footwear industry that is an epitome of the brand's philosophy, unique, comfortable and creative footwear.

What have we done so far ? 

  • Found a manufacturer and established a relationship with them - A manufacturer who was willing to work with my idea of a shoe that they had never seen before.
  • Successfully designed the prototypes of six Mosneaks designs
  • Set up our website
  • Did a fashion shoot with the help of friends - yes we have creative friends too ;) 
  • With a few personal savings, ordered a few pairs for each design to finally get our online store going

 How can you help us ?

We now need your help in ensuring we have our production going for the six beautiful designs of our first collection of Mosneaks, since we have very limited inventory.

 

What We Need

How much funding do we need ? $10,000

  • $8000 towards the production cost ( materials, manufacturing, packaging ) 
  • $2000 towards shipping costs, handling, duties from the production country to Canada

 

The Impact

Mosneaks have received great feedback from people who have bought them! They're comfortable, stylish, unique, and at a fraction of the price considering their quality and make. The world needs a place for apparel that is creative and practical, and we need your help in ensuring our Mosneaks find their way into the fashion world! 

 

Risks & Challenges

Every business has challenges, we encountered a few as well on our journey so far. What might they be ? 

  • One of the greatest risks was finding a manufacturer who understood the concept. It took months to find someone who understood exactly what I was trying to create. We have a great relationship with our supplier and samples for each design and hence we've overcome this problem
  • Another challenge was convincing the manufacturer to produce below their required MOQ for our first shipment. However, they believed in the product and they believed in our love for the product and hence helped us. There were tradeoffs though, we had to pay a higher price/pair for a lower MOQ per design.
  • With your help, we can ensure we meet their MOQs for our next order, which means a lower cost price, which leads to a lower selling price as well.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We have had many people who have loved our Mosneaks, believed in the concept and the design, but cannot back us up financially. If you are one of them, not to worry! We appreciate all the love and support we can get, help us spread the word about these one of a kind shoes!

story:
Hello! My name is Glenda Pettaway. I am the owner of K.E.M. Supply Enterprises Group LLC located in Detroit, Michigan.  We are “A company on a mission with a vision to get it done.” I am a 58-year-old mother of two (Gabriel, 35 and Kayla, 21) with one grandson (Michael, 3). I grew up in Detroit since the age of five and I remember the vibrant neighborhoods and the bustling manufacturing that went on in the city.  As a retired Chrysler worker of 10 years, I established this company out of a need for my son and other mothers’ children who were coming from a past that left them unable to find decent employment opportunities. My thought was that if other employers wouldn’t give them a good job, I would create one for them.  Gratefully, in 2015, my son and a few other individuals were able to secure productive employment. However, there are so many others who are still in need of good employment. Through this experience, I discovered that the need I had to elevate my own son was also a need to elevate other sons and daughters.  This vision could only be accomplished through outreach and job creation and these two projects needed long-term funding. This vision is the driving force behind me and my company.  The magnitude of what each contributor can help us achieve by way of this campaign is life-altering on so many levels.

What We Need & What You Get

I am seeking to raise $110,000.  This campaign is intended to be a vehicle for funding the production and distribution of my company’s patented K.E.M. Wear Uniform Blouse w/underpinning. Our blouse comes in four colors: white, blue, pink and yellow. It also comes in two styles: short sleeve and long sleeve. The vision for the blouse will unfold in two stages. Stage #1, I will use the funds to have the blouse manufactured in the U.S. by Velvet Vision in San Diego, CA. and shipped to our Logistic and Fulfillment Center (Evans Distributions) here in Detroit. Evans will handle orders from all sales venues.  This point is very important to me because I want the blouse to be produced in America in order to support the resurgence of manufacturing here, particularly here in Detroit.  The funds will also be used for the marketing campaigns for our e-commerce website via Twitter, Facebook etc., as well as targeted electronic direct mail. We are positioned for the opportunity which will enable our blouse to be sold on three major cable shopping channels. We will also purchase two delivery trucks for the east side and the west side deliveries of the sales generated through local school uniform stores and charter and parochial schools. 

Stage #2 is long term. Funds generated from sales will then fund the company’s vision of job creation, as we eventually begin manufacturing the blouse ourselves. I envision creating jobs for the citizens of Detroit and other impoverished cities across America by reopening one of the five smaller manufacturing plants now closed here in Detroit. The healthy and productive restoration of any of these smaller plants revitalizes our neighborhood and community for my grandson and the many families living in the plight of the poverty which surrounds us.  It is a bold vision, nevertheless, an achievable one as we focus on “one blouse at a time.” With your help, this campaign will launch the  K.E.M. Wear Uniform Blouse in the trajectory of the second major step towards our vision.  My fervent hope and unwavering faith are that it will touch lives for the better and secure a future for the community of young people that I can reach.  My heart is to help as many as I can to be better and do better “one blouse at a time”

The Impact (SEE ABOVE)

This project is valuable to you, the contributors. Any effort that you make toward affecting positive change in someone’s life by helping them rise up from their lowest point adds momentum to an immediately better world at large. This may sound a little corny; nevertheless, it is so true! What you make happen for someone else opens the door for it to happen for you too. My success is only demonstrated by the fact that I made it to this point.  However, with your help, I know that I can finish the journey with an even greater level of success!!!

Risks & Challenges

In 2015, I began this journey by cobbling together my first prototype of the uniform blouse and contacting Wal-Mart.  They were impressed but told me I was not far enough along in the manufacturing process. I have faced many obstacles and setbacks. Each setback only served to fuel my determination to see and be the change I am striving for.  From then until now, I have worked hard to educate myself and become knowledgeable in this area. My hard work allowed me to receive my patent for the blouse and a Wal-Mart vendor’s contract. The task was daunting; however, with grace, favor and hard work, it was done.  The first leg of the journey, I believe, qualified me for the next step. It taught me diligence, tenancy, humility and gave me an ability to adjust and educate myself as needed.  It taught me that the vision is at an appointed time and not to give up.  I now understand that if I wait (stay diligent, work hard) for it, it would surely come to fruition one day. Financing this vision has been elusive because I have run into some unrelenting obstacles via the conventional way—until now. Because I did not give up, I heard about Indiegogo. Indiegogo’s platform allows me to take the blouse to its next level by seeking help and support from other people, who “get” the struggle and the drive to see a vision come to fruition. I am trusting that there are people who have the heart to see positive change implemented by one company that will then affect one life, one family, one neighborhood, and one community through the production and selling of  “one blouse at a time.”

Other Ways You Can Help

For those of you who can help monetarily, I thank you. Your financial donations are needed and appreciated. I trust that this campaign will do exceedingly and abundantly more than I could ask or imagine. Once again, thank you!!! For those who have a desire to give but are unable to (I’ve been there many times), I ask for your support by making some noise and getting the word out regarding this unique, patented uniform blouse.  Please use the Indiegogo share tool.  Thank you in advance for your support in either way. It is greatly appreciated!!!
story_txt:

Supply Enterprises Group LLC located in Detroit, Michigan.  We are “A company on a mission with a vision to get it done.” I am a 58-year-old mother of two (Gabriel, 35 and Kayla, 21) with one grandson (Michael, 3). I grew up in Detroit since the age of five and I remember the vibrant neighborhoods and the bustling manufacturing that went on in the city.  As a retired Chrysler worker of 10 years, I established this company out of a need for my son and other mothers’ children who were coming from a past that left them unable to find decent employment opportunities. story:
Short Summary

     Hello,

  My name is Luis

              I have lived in so-cal all my life. Ive always had the idea of starting a winning t-shirt line. So... here I introduce to you LEIZURE SUPPLY. The concept is basically everything skate, surf, beach, reggae music and GOOD VIBES. We have several designs in the making which are sure to be hits. Our featured designs have gotten great reviews among friends and family. So here we bring these designs to you and hopefully the masses. Our campaign is to help raise the money needed to purchase marketing material and print 6  t-shirt designs in the next 3 months. Our short term goal is to make a look-book and get our designs out there in the local shops and hopefully build some buzzz this summer.

What We Need & What You Get

  • In order to print the 6 t-shirt designs in the next three months we need to raise at least $2000 dollars. the money will be used for printing some t's and stickers so that we can get out there and start a buzzz. There's no better way than with sticker giveaways. 
  • With your support we can make it happen, All project backers will receive multiple stickers to help get the word out there.
  • If we do not reach our goal of $2000 dollars we will still move forward with printing the designs featured in this campaign and do what we can to reach the goal of 6 designs printed to get ready for this summer.

The Impact

  • By you backing this project, you will help get a badass idea off the ground and running.
  • I know that our hard work and your generous contribution, Leizure supply will go from an idea to a reality.
  • Help us bring our winning designs and COOL VIBES to life.

Risks & Challenges

  • There are many challenges out there for anyone trying to start a clothing line. For one theres too many options already out there! So were going to stand out from the crowd by not following the traditional ideas and recycled designs. We have fresh winning original designs and concepts to move us forward. Together putting our feet to the pavement, getting in front of people, sticker giveaways and social media we can make it happen.

  My name is Luis
              I have lived in so-cal all my life. Ive always had the idea of starting a winning t-shirt line. So... here I introduce to you LEIZURE SUPPLY. The concept is basically everything skate, surf, beach, reggae music and GOOD VIBES. We have several designs in the making which are sure to be hits. Our featured designs have gotten great reviews among friends and family. So here we bring these designs to you and hopefully the masses. Our campaign is to help raise the money needed to purchase marketing material and print 6  t-shirt designs in the next 3 months. Our short term goal is to make a look-book and get our designs out there in the local shops and hopefully build some buzzz this summer.

What We Need & What You Get

In order to print the 6 t-shirt designs in the next three months we need to raise at least $2000 dollars. the money will be used for printing some t's and stickers so that we can get out there and start a buzzz. There's no better way than with sticker giveaways. 
With your support we can make it happen, All project backers will receive multiple stickers to help get the word out there.
If we do not reach our goal of $2000 dollars we will still move forward with printing the designs featured in this campaign and do what we can to reach the goal of 6 designs printed to get ready for this summer.


The Impact

By you backing this project, you will help get a badass idea off the ground and running.
I know that our hard work and your generous contribution, Leizure supply will go from an idea to a reality.
Help us bring our winning designs and COOL VIBES to life.


Risks & Challenges
There are many challenges out there for anyone trying to start a clothing line. For one theres too many options already out there! So were going to stand out from the crowd by not following the traditional ideas and recycled designs. We have fresh winning original designs and concepts to move us forward. Together putting our feet to the pavement, getting in front of people, sticker giveaways and social media we can make it happen.

story:
Swiss company Osmotex has developed a revolutionary actively sterilising textile - the Osmotex Steriliser! Our new product is developed with many years of experience of specialising in electro osmotic and electro chemical reactions in textiles and membranes.

Osmotex Steriliser is a quick, effective, safe and environmentally friendly technology.  Through a controlled interaction of moisture and electric pulses we create an anti-viral and anti-bacterial effect inside and on the surface of a textile, proven by the Zürich University of Applied Sciences. For more details on the tests and results, please scroll down and take a look at the the enclosed reports from the Zurich University of Applied Sciences. 

Osmotex Steriliser being tested at the lab of Zürich university of Applied Sciences 

The Osmotex Sterilser kills 99,999% of viruses and bacteria within minutes based on interaction of moisture and electric pulse creating sterilising agents O3 and H2O2 in quantities that are completely harmless for humans but deadly for all viruses. The effect of the Osmotex Steriliser kills viruses and bacteria extremely rapid compared to other passive technologies using up to two hours to achieve a sterilising effect:

The Osmotex Steriliser cannot be compared to passive technologies based on passive properties of metal yarns and coatings, as the effect of these technologies are depending on the microorganisms to get in contact with the passive elements of the textile - opposite to the Osmotex Steriliser active sterilisation where the sterilising agents hunt down and eradicate any virus and bacterias.  

 

The Osmotex Steriliser face mask is our first commercial sterilising product. The face mask is a reusable textile facemask with a lifespan of two months. In addition to the Osmotex Steriliser technology, we have also implemented a N95 filter to meet the regular standards for face masks and optimise the safety for the wearer. The mask is powered by a fully reusable electronic control unit connected to the face mask with a textile cable. In our initial production we use a control box the user can put in a pocket, but in the volume production we are setting up we are planning to integrate the control box on the back of the head - similar to a head-light.

The Osmotex Steriliser facemask is unique, as the textile is auto-sterilising and protecting the wearer from breathing in virus, and at the same time the sterilising effect allows the wearer to touch the mask without the risk of contamination. As part of a usability study, the facemask has been used for several weeks at the Pfützner Science & Health Institute in Mainz, Germany. On this base we have gained important feedback including the usability of the mask design, but also a solid confirmation that the safety and protection provided meets the standards of a professional medical institute with daily patient contact.

 

The usage areas of our sterilising textile are practically limitless, and we plan to extend the product range in the first stage with a sterilising bag. Later development is planned to include textiles for different touch surfaces in places like shops, offices, medical institutions etc. This will strongly reduce the risk of touch contamination in public spaces, hence potentially contribute strongly to a general reduced risk for spreading of viruses on a larger scale.  Sterilising apparel and other equipment within the health sector is also on the agenda.

Here is a video of our proto Osmotex Steriliser bag for effective sterilisation of personal belongings:

 

The Osmotex Steriliser technology is highly innovative and revolutionary. The technology is positioned to make a difference for both the user of Osmotex Steriliser application, as well as the global society. The high and rapid sterilising effect protects the user from negative impact from virus and bacterias, including the Covid-19 virus. In addition, the technology has the potential to reduce the infection and contamination risks through immediate and effective sterilisation of masks, touch surfaces and in the end clothes worn by professionals in health care, as well as non-professionals. The technology is easy to implement on applications that are stationary and fixed, as well as non-stationary applications. Osmotex Steriliser is powered by moisture and electric pulses from a small battery. There are no need for added chemicals and the technology does not represent any risk for the users, the surroundings or the environment.  

To bring this unique technology to the market we have teamed up with the Swiss company Topa Konfektions AG (www.topa-ag.com) as our main development partner. Topa brings a very high expertise on implementing high-tech in textiles to the cooperation. We have also engaged the Zürich University of Applied Sciences (Zürcher Hochschule für Angewandte Wissenschaften - www.zhaw.ch) to take handle laboratory testing, independent evaluation and advising. Our main medical advisor is the Pfützner Science & Health Institute in Mainz, Germany (www.pfuetzner-mainz.com). We use high quality textiles from WidePlus International Co., Ltd, New Taipei City, Taiwan (www.wideplustex.com). Development and production of electronics is done by VarioSystems AG (www.variosystems.com)

We aim to reach a funding of CHF 200 000 with this campaign and will use the funds to finance set up costs and the start of volume production for masks and electronics. Our first priority is  to finance the production to deliver the perks, although the early bird perks are already produced and ready for immediate delivery in January 2021. 

This campaign is important for us to continue our work to further develop new products, not reaching our funding goal is what we see as our biggest risk. We know from experience that building a volume production always will include the need to solve arising challenges and hurdles, but based on the extensive experience within our partnership team we are confident that we will solve the challenges ahead.   

We need all the help we can get to spread the word of this unique new product and we hope that you will support us with both funding and promoting within your network. 

If you have any question relates to our technology, please take a look at the Q & A's or email us at info@osmotex.ch.

story: THANKS ALL TO SUPPORTING
story_txt: THANKS ALL TO SUPPORTING

story:
We are so stoked to share our first ever Kickstarter campaign with you!  We're passionate about making a hat that can be worn, beat up, washed, and packed for any and all of your adventures and still rebound to keep its shape and crisp, good-as-new look.   We wanted a hat for EVRYday use, for EVRYone, and can withstand EVRYactivity.  

Why the name Movi?  Movi comes from the latin root Movere meaning to mean or be moved.   We created Movi to 1) be the absolute best technical and durable trucker in the market and 2) create a motivational message within the hat to get people moving and advancing their life story and reaching their goals EVRYday. 

 

GIF

 

 

To answer this question, we asked why do some people end up ditching their favorite Trucker Hats because EVRYone loves a good Trucker until…..

...it gets accidentally sat on, or squished, or bent during packing and loses that crisp front-panel look.  Or that white salty sweatband develops over a hot summer day and then it just looks gross and if you wash it, it then looks deformed.  Or perhaps mid day when you just can’t take the squeezing, pressing forehead pressure of the front brim digging into your noggin and you’d rather ditch the hat to relieve yourself of your now headache but you’re hairs a mess so you deal with it.

So what’s different about the MOVI Trucker? We set out to create the ultimate Trucker Hat that would address everything current Trucker hats don’t. We wanted a hat that could be stuffed, rolled, packed and that would still look good and rebound to its original shape post. A hat that after a 4 day through a hike, you could machine wash it and it would look good as new.  A hat that was super lightweight, form-fitting right out of the box, and could be worn all day, EVRYday with a non-existent feel.  Ultimately a Trucker that could create history with you each step of your journey and one you’d never have to toss.  Welcome to a new Hat regimen: Smash, Pack, Wear, Wash - REPEAT.

 

 

Stretch Goal 1 unlocked when we hit $34K

Stretch Goal 2 unlocked when we hit $40K

 

 

 

 

 

 

Yes, this hat you can actually CRUSH into your bag or suitcase for your hike or while you travel.  No more worrying about permanent creases, wrinkles or your hat losing it's shape - the Movi hat can be completely smashed and will come back to it's original shape. 


GIF SMASHING THE HAT


 


 

 

 

While being Packable - this hat is also reboundable; meaning no matter what you cram this hat into, once you pull it out and give it a few seconds it will rebound back to its original, crispy look. You'll be AMAZED at what this hat can go through and then come back to life to and keep it's shape.  No more worrying about your hat accidentally getting a crease, wrinkle, or getting smashed and never looking good again. 

 

GIF SMASHING AND HAT REBOUNDING

 

OTHER PIC OF HAT 

 

Due to the careful selection of foams, padding and rigid material the hat rebounds once pulled out of the bottom of your duffle, day pack or suitcase in a matter of seconds.



 

 

 

 

This hat was built to breath for your outdoor adventures. Fully lined QUIK WIK MESH material and it’s blend of breathable polyfoam and hex mesh backing, staying cool on a high-intensity run, ski, hike or climb is a cinch for the hat.

 

GIF HERE OF RUNNING


 

 

 

 

 

Movi has been tested on a wide range of heads and every time the feedback is overwhelming at how comfortable this thing is!  This hat can be worn for hours and you won't feel any pressure points of discomfort in your forehead or anywhere really.  This hat is a go-to for trail runners, travelers, hikers, backpackers, rocker climbers and even walkers, and drivers.

 

When the sun’s out or you're simply wanting to look good on the weekend, the weight, feel, and nature of the hat seems non-existent while still providing all the shade, effects and appearance you're looking for without that squeezing, pressing, and forehead pressure.

 

 

 

 

We wouldn’t have included this if it didn’t mean a more advanced product than the status quo.  We truly feel and believe with all it’s features and benefits this is possibly the most technical (trucker style) hat on the market.

 

 

 

 

Once your activity comes to a halt, so does the sweat, dirt, dust and grime - on your hat that is. No worries though, throw your Movi hat directly in the wash for that brand-new out of the box look.

 

GIF of hat going in wash

 

Based on the concept of this being a trigger, we needed it to last and to be a tangible part of your story's history.  We’ve selected the toughest material we could find that still incorporated all our features to ensure this guy is in for the long haul.

 

 

GIF of hat being thrown in water

 

For those water lovers, SUP, Kitesurf, Wakesurf, Surfing, Kayaking Lake lounging the hat will be casually waiting for you to pick if up off the surface of the water should it fall off.

 

 

 

You think we would have include this  section at the very beginning so you didn't think we were misspelling words with "every" in it.  This was a big aspect the hat HAD to incorporate; it’s a message of getting out and moving EVRYday.  To act as a trigger in helping you work towards and achieve your goals and write your own story.  Whether that's bagging peaks, landing that promotion, or raising a solid family.  Our name means something to us and we hope it to mean something to you as a consumer.

 



 

 

 

 

 

 

Starting out on Kickstarter we have these six styles and are excited to release more in the very near future if we get funded. You'll be able to pick any of the styles you like based on your pledge.  For example if you pledge 4 MOVI Truckers, you can pick any assortment, or pick two of one color and two of another color.  Bottom line, whatever number you pledge, you'll have your pick of all the same hat or all different ones...it's up to you! 

Make your pledge today and by the end of our campaign we will send out a survey and YOU will pick exactly which style/color(s) you want.

 

Plus four additional styles as stretch goals! 

 

 

By popular demand of our backers and the awesome people of Indiegogo, we are doing two stretch goals offering FOUR MORE colors and styles to the lineup of Movi Hats.  There will be two different tiers of the stretch goal with two hats each as follows: 

 

 

 

Trev

 

 

 

 

 

FOUNDERS SECTION:

Trev Hill - Hat Tester

Ali Carlile - Product Designer

Beau Day - Marketing Extraordinaire

We grew up in hats, Grandpa's hats to be more specific and ever since we've been hooked.  As sports activities became more and more a part of our lives, hats were always on our heads and we became more and more obsessed.  The thing we weren't obsessed about is how fast we were going through them.  They were getting sweaty, crushed, squished, stinky, dirty and just gross looking.  If you washed them, they looked deformed and unattractive and that's when we realized we had to change that permanently ...welcome to the scene MOVI Trucker Hats.
story_txt:
We are so stoked to share our first ever Kickstarter campaign with you!  We're passionate about making a hat that can be worn, beat up, washed, and packed for any and all of your adventures and still rebound to keep its shape and crisp, good-as-new look.   We wanted a hat for EVRYday use, for EVRYone, and can withstand EVRYactivity.  
Why the name Movi?  Movi comes from the latin root Movere meaning to mean or be moved.   We created Movi to 1) be the absolute best technical and durable trucker in the market and 2) create a motivational message within the hat to get people moving and advancing their life story and reaching their goals EVRYday. 
 
GIF









 

 
To answer this question, we asked why do some people end up ditching their favorite Trucker Hats because EVRYone loves a good Trucker until…..
...it gets accidentally sat on, or squished, or bent during packing and loses that crisp front-panel look.  Or that white salty sweatband develops over a hot summer day and then it just looks gross and if you wash it, it then looks deformed.  Or perhaps mid day when you just can’t take the squeezing, pressing forehead pressure of the front brim digging into your noggin and you’d rather ditch the hat to relieve yourself of your now headache but you’re hairs a mess so you deal with it.
So what’s different about the MOVI Trucker? We set out to create the ultimate Trucker Hat that would address everything current Trucker hats don’t. We wanted a hat that could be stuffed, rolled, packed and that would still look good and rebound to its original shape post. A hat that after a 4 day through a hike, you could machine wash it and it would look good as new.  A hat that was super lightweight, form-fitting right out of the box, and could be worn all day, EVRYday with a non-existent feel.  Ultimately a Trucker that could create history with you each step of your journey and one you’d never have to toss.  Welcome to a new Hat regimen: Smash, Pack, Wear, Wash - REPEAT.

 



 
Stretch Goal 1 unlocked when we hit $34K

Stretch Goal 2 unlocked when we hit $40K
 
 

 
 
 

 
Yes, this hat you can actually CRUSH into your bag or suitcase for your hike or while you travel.  No more worrying about permanent creases, wrinkles or your hat losing it's shape - the Movi hat can be completely smashed and will come back to it's original shape. 
GIF SMASHING THE HAT




 
 
 

 
While being Packable - this hat is also reboundable; meaning no matter what you cram this hat into, once you pull it out and give it a few seconds it will rebound back to its original, crispy look. You'll be AMAZED at what this hat can go through and then come back to life to and keep it's shape.  No more worrying about your hat accidentally getting a crease, wrinkle, or getting smashed and never looking good again. 
 
GIF SMASHING AND HAT REBOUNDING
 

OTHER PIC OF HAT 


 
Due to the careful selection of foams, padding and rigid material the hat rebounds once pulled out of the bottom of your duffle, day pack or suitcase in a matter of seconds.
  

 
 
This hat was built to breath for your outdoor adventures. Fully lined QUIK WIK MESH material and it’s blend of breathable polyfoam and hex mesh backing, staying cool on a high-intensity run, ski, hike or climb is a cinch for the hat.
 
GIF HERE OF RUNNING
 




 

 
 

 
Movi has been tested on a wide range of heads and every time the feedback is overwhelming at how comfortable this thing is!  This hat can be worn for hours and you won't feel any pressure points of discomfort in your forehead or anywhere really.  This hat is a go-to for trail runners, travelers, hikers, backpackers, rocker climbers and even walkers, and drivers.



 
When the sun’s out or you're simply wanting to look good on the weekend, the weight, feel, and nature of the hat seems non-existent while still providing all the shade, effects and appearance you're looking for without that squeezing, pressing, and forehead pressure.
 


 
 

 
We wouldn’t have included this if it didn’t mean a more advanced product than the status quo.  We truly feel and believe with all it’s features and benefits this is possibly the most technical (trucker style) hat on the market. 






 
 


 
Once your activity comes to a halt, so does the sweat, dirt, dust and grime - on your hat that is. No worries though, throw your Movi hat directly in the wash for that brand-new out of the box look.
 
GIF of hat going in wash
 

Based on the concept of this being a trigger, we needed it to last and to be a tangible part of your story's history.  We’ve selected the toughest material we could find that still incorporated all our features to ensure this guy is in for the long haul.
 


 
GIF of hat being thrown in water
 

For those water lovers, SUP, Kitesurf, Wakesurf, Surfing, Kayaking Lake lounging the hat will be casually waiting for you to pick if up off the surface of the water should it fall off.
 
 

 
You think we would have include this  section at the very beginning so you didn't think we were misspelling words with "every" in it.  This was a big aspect the hat HAD to incorporate; it’s a message of getting out and moving EVRYday.  To act as a trigger in helping you work towards and achieve your goals and write your own story.  Whether that's bagging peaks, landing that promotion, or raising a solid family.  Our name means something to us and we hope it to mean something to you as a consumer.
 







 
 

 

 

 

 
Starting out on Kickstarter we have these six styles and are excited to release more in the very near future if we get funded. You'll be able to pick any of the styles you like based on your pledge.  For example if you pledge 4 MOVI Truckers, you can pick any assortment, or pick two of one color and two of another color.  Bottom line, whatever number you pledge, you'll have your pick of all the same hat or all different ones...it's up to you! 
Make your pledge today and by the end of our campaign we will send out a survey and YOU will pick exactly which style/color(s) you want.

 
Plus four additional styles as stretch goals! 
 

 
By popular demand of our backers and the awesome people of Indiegogo, we are doing two stretch goals offering FOUR MORE colors and styles to the lineup of Movi Hats.  There will be two different tiers of the stretch goal with two hats each as follows: 
 


 
 

Trev
 

 
 

 

 
FOUNDERS SECTION:
Trev Hill - Hat Tester
Ali Carlile - Product Designer
Beau Day - Marketing Extraordinaire
We grew up in hats, Grandpa's hats to be more specific and ever since we've been hooked.  As sports activities became more and more a part of our lives, hats were always on our heads and we became more and more obsessed.  The thing we weren't obsessed about is how fast we were going through them.  They were getting sweaty, crushed, squished, stinky, dirty and just gross looking.  If you washed them, they looked deformed and unattractive and that's when we realized we had to change that permanently ...welcome to the scene MOVI Trucker Hats.

story:
About

What is Smart Parka?

Smart Parka is the first winter coat ever with built-in gloves, a built-in scarf, and pockets for your smartphone, tablet, glasses, keys and a power bank. Smart Parka 1.0. is our 2nd generation winter coat that has been improved in all aspects with features like US standard 90/10 duck down insulation to tackle extreme cold, 100% cashmere lining in our touchscreen-enabled leather gloves and much more.

 

How much does it cost?

We think it's fair that we reward those who help us make it happen. Smart Parka 1.0. is offered at a massive discount for the backers who support us. Early backers will get a deeper discount. 

 

When will you get the coats

First 2000 backers will get their coats right after the end of the campaign which means you will be able to enjoy your coat this Christmas. We have available inventory of  almost 3000 coats. We will make this inventory for the first 2000 backers.

If you back this project after the 2000th pledge, your coat will be delivered on or before Oct 2019. Which means you will be able to enjoy your Smart Parka in the next winter. 

 

People on the streets react to Smart Parka 1.0.

 

 

What styles do these coats come in?

Smart Parka comes in three styles for women and two styles for men. We have something to fit every personality. Take a look at the styles below. For more details and photos, feel free to visit our website at http://northaware.com

 

Women's

 

Men's

 

FEATURES

 

Built-in gloves

Designed specifically for Smart Parka, the gloves tuck neatly inside the zippered pockets in the coat's sleeves. Gloves are made of sheep leather with 100% cashmere lining.

 

Built-in scarf to cover you up when you need it. Expandable to cover your chin and neck. Detachable for easy washing.

 

Tablet pocket designed to comfortably fit most tablets, clutches, etc.

 

Glasses pocket to keep your reading glasses, sunglasses, or ski goggles safe and handy. The special dirt resistant fabric will protect your glasses from scratches.

 

AirPods Holders never lose your AirPods again.

 

Removable Hood and Removable Fur

 

Water-resistant Exterior

 

Pockets for everything. Keep your phone accessible and safe. The keys pocket has a zipper closure with attached carabiner.

 

A Closer Look

Attention to detail is part of our promise.

 

 

 

 

Other Features

Hand warming fleece pockets for extra comfort.

Heavy-duty, YKK® zipper
Fill : 90/10 White Duck Down 750 Fill Power
Fur : Faux Fur (Removable). Fur and hood are not removable in Women's Vogue.
Gloves: Sheep Leather with 100% cashmere lining.

 

A Detailed look at the Styles

Take a look at the Smart Parka 1.0 styles and the colors available.

 

WOMEN'S

 

 

 

MEN'S

 

 

Quality Materials

Coats made for serious weather need serious materials. We've chosen the sturdiest hardware and fabrics with the ideal balance between luxurious feel and durability. 

Return and Exchanges

We are happy to exchange your coat for any reason. Just return your Smart Parka 1.0 and we will send you another one right away based on availability. 

We have a 100% refund policy. For Indiegogo backers, you can get refund within 10 days after the end of campaign. After 10 days, we will be happy to exchange it for a different size and colour but will not be able to issue refunds.

What sizes do your coats come in?

Our Men's Sizes go from S to 3XL
Our Women's Sizes go from XS to 2XL

 

Click here to download the sizing chart.

 

 

 

 

Risks and Challenges

The coats are perfected in all aspects and already did a production run. We have many coats ready to be delivered. For the backers who pledge after the 2000th pledge, there could be delays due to unforeseen production problems. The chances of any such delay are minimal, as we have gone through the process twice already.

story:
The primary goal is to be able to contribute in active and positive way of the spread of an ecofriendly culture. Because today we all live in a fast and frantic way, we feel the need to slow down, get back to the origins, our foundation, so we could simply have greater knowledge and consciousness of things around us. So we think every single action facing the respect of nature and the safeguarding of the atmosphere, contributes to a general improvement of the entire planet. Through a progressive design , environmental sustainability and simplicity, the main task of Elemento is therefore commit to make the collections of wristwatches in wood deriving from Japanese woods controlled harvest. All this for an extra support to an international association, one of many Italian realities to create new woodland areas for the descent harmful emissions in the atmosphere. From here the idea that all our watches will be sold to a certificate that attests grow plants that will be geolocalized to show the contribution that every single person will give to this project.



The ELEMENTO Collection

Per la nostra prima collezione, offriamo DUE modelli diversi tra cui scegliere.
For our first collection, we are offering TWO different models to choose from.


Maple

Bamboo

Now we're here, on Indiegogo, with a fully functional prototype that looks amazing. We just need one more thing... your support!

ELEMENTO is also backed with a warranty.We are so confident with the quality and durability of our watches, that if something were to happen within the first year, we hope you will send it back to us. This warranty covers manufacturing defects on the watch itself (movement, case, crystal).
 Note that repair/replacements will be charged in the following cases, even during the warranty term.

– Failure or damage caused by improper use or carelessness (knocks, dents, crushing, broken crystal, etc.)
– Failure or damage caused by unjustifiable repair or modification
– Failure or damage caused by fire or water
– Esthetic changes that occur during normal wear and tear and aging (minor scratches, etc.; on the case and/or cystal, alteration of the colour on the watchband and the peeling of the plating)
– In case the retail store and the purchase date are not indicated on the warranty, or if this information has been rewritten
– If the warranty is not submitted along with the watch.

Who is the team?

The idea sinks its roots from the mind of Davide Zanon, a young entrepreneur passionate about photography and lover of trips. Tired of the routine and fascinated with the eastern culture he meets in Germany Mayo, a Japanese girl, sharing with her his dream of being able to contribute to the safeguarding of the atmosphere, since then, back to Italy he begins to develop his business idea that would allow him to finance his plans related to the environment with the help of everyone. In the way he meets Geshe Mancini a friend, a young movie director and they plan together every detail of promotion and communications online and offline. On this team, take part too Marco Trestini (Marketing), Roberta (copywriters), Amina (translator) , Matteo (quality control and development), Fabiano (photographer).

Watch Specifications:

100% Natural Wood 
Hypo-allergenic 
Completely free of toxic chemicals
Case Material:  bamboo  or maple
Case Diameter: 49 mm
Band Material: genuine Leather
Band Width: 22 mm
Dial Window Material: Crystal Mineral Glass
Display: Analog
Movement: Japanese Quartz (Miyota)


We Need Your Support

We need YOU, too! We remind you that Indiegogo will allow us to raise the funds only if we reach our goal. We will try to promote the project in different ways,online and offline, and we hope, through the use of social media and the blogs we can address all traffic here. Sharing the page, promoting the project, publishing picture with the #hashtag elementowatches You can really contribute to the spread of this fund-raiser. You have just to subscribe in the Facebook page and Instagram to receive the latest news and share it with all your friends and the followers of our work.

If funded, how will you fulfill the orders?

We have  optimised the initial prototype, studied the different kinds of wood, perfected the design and choose our producer who has a great experience in our business.
Once the Indiegogo campaign is over and we'll get your funds, we can start the production which could take about 30 days according to the amount of the order. We'll do everything we can to respect the time of delivery and we'll keep you updated about your order.

Risks and challenges

The challenge for Elemento Watches are many. Once  we collected funds that are necessary  to production we will try all over the world to promote our watches with our echo-loyal concept.

To make this work we need the help of all to spread this project: blogger, friends, relatives, magazines, every channel is important to bring more and more visibility to our collection.

Some features may change the original watches. It all depends if we reach our goal .

Lo scopo primario è quello di poter contribuire in maniera attiva e positiva alla diffusione di una cultura eco friendly. Poiché al giorno d'oggi viviamo tutto in maniera veloce e frenetica, si sente il bisogno di rallentare, tornare alle origini, alle nostre fondamenta, semplicemente di poter avere maggiore consapevolezza e coscienza di ciò che ci circonda. Quindi crediamo che ogni singola azione rivolta al rispetto della natura ed alla salvaguardia dell'ambiente, contribuisca a un generale miglioramento dell'intero pianeta. Attraverso una progressiva progettazione di design, semplicità ed ecosostenibilità, il compito principale di Elemento è dunque di impegnarsi a creare delle collezioni di orologi da polso in legno derivante da foreste giapponesi a raccolto controllato. Tutto questo per dare un ulteriore sostegno ad una nostra azienda Partner, una delle tante realtà italiane che si occupa di creare nuove aree boschive per la riduzione di emissioni nocive nell'atmosfera. Da qui proprio l'idea che ogni nostro orologio sarà venduto con un certificato che attesti la coltivazione di una pianta, la quale sarà geolocalizzata per poter mostrare concretamente il contributo che ogni singola persona vorrà dare a questo progetto.

Ora siamo qui, su Indiegogo, con un prototipo completamente funzionale. Abbiamo solo bisogno di una cosa ... il vostro sostegno!

Gli orologi ELEMENTO sono venduti con la Garanzia internazionale. Noi siamo così sicuri della qualità e la durata dei nostri orologi, ma se qualcosa dovesse accadere entro il primo anno, non esitate a spedirci indietro l'orologio. Questa garanzia copre i difetti di fabbricazione su l'orologio stesso (movimento, vetro rovinato).
La riparazione / sostituzione sarà addebitata nei seguenti casi, anche durante il periodo di garanzia. - Danni causati da un uso improprio o disattenzione (colpi, ammaccature, urti, vetro rotto, ecc) - Danni causati da riparazione o modifica ingiustificabile - Danni causati dal fuoco o acqua - Cambiamenti estetici che si verificano durante la normale usura e di invecchiamento (piccoli graffi sul vetro, alterazione del colore sul cinturino) - Nel caso in cui la vendita al dettaglio e la data di acquisto non sono indicati su questa garanzia o se queste informazioni sono state riscritte. - Se la garanzia non è presentata insieme con l'orologio.

L’idea affonda le sue radici dalla mente di Davide Zanon, un giovane imprenditore appassionato di fotografia e amante dei viaggi. Stanco della routine e affascinato dalla cultura orientale incontra in Germania Mayo, una ragazza giapponese con la quale condivide il suo sogno di poter contribuire alla salvaguardia dell’ambiente, da quel momento, tornato in Italia comincia a sviluppare la sua idea imprenditoriale che potesse permettere a tutti di poterlo aiutare a finanziare i suoi progetti legati all’ambiente. Nel suo percorso incontra l’amico Geshe Mancini, un giovane regista cinematografico ed insieme pianificano ogni dettaglio di promozione e comunicazione online e offline. Nel team, fanno parte anche Marco Trestini (marketing), Amina (traduttrice), Matteo (controllo qualità e sviluppo), Fabiano (fotografo).

C'è bisogno anche di VOI!! Ricordiamo che Indiegogo ci permetterà di raccogliere i fondi solo al raggiungimento del nostro goal. Noi cercheremo di promuovere il progetto in tutti i canali online e offline e ci auguriamo che attraverso l’uso dei social media e dei blog riusciremo ad indirizzare tutto il traffico qui. Condividendo la pagina, promuovendo il progetto, pubblicando foto con l’hashtag #elementowatches si può davvero contribuire alla diffusione di questa raccolta fondi. E’ sufficiente iscriversi alla pagina Facebook e Instagram per ricevere le ultime notizie ed avere modo di condividere a tutti i vostri amici e followers il nostro lavoro.

Abbiamo ottimizzato il prototipo iniziale, studiato i vari tipi di legno, perfezionato il design e selezionato il nostro produttore che una grande esperienza nel nostro settore. Una volta che la campagna Indiegogo sarà finita e riceveremo i vostri fondi potremo avviare la produzione la quale richederà circa 30 giorni a seconda della quantità dell’ordine. Faremo il possibile per rispettare i tempi di consegna e tenervi aggiornati sul vostro ordine.

Le sfide per Elemento watches sono moteplici. Una volta raccolti i fondi neccessari alla produzione cercheremo di promuovere i nostri orologi insieme al nostro concept eco solidale in tutto il mondo.

Perché questo possa funzionare abbiamo bisogno dell’aiuto di tutti per diffondere questo progetto: blogger, amici, parenti, riviste, ogni canale è importante per portare maggiore visibilità alla nostra raccolta fondi.

We have 
optimised the initial prototype, studied the different kinds of wood,
perfected the design and choose our producer who has a great experience in our
business.Once the Indiegogo campaign is over and
we'll get your funds, we can start the production which could take about 30
days according to the amount of the order. We'll do everything we can to
respect the time of delivery and we'll keep you updated about your order.
Risks and
challenges
The challenge for Elemento Watches are
many. Once  we collected funds that are
necessary  to production we will try all
over the world to promote our watches with our echo-loyal concept.
To make this work we need the help of
all to spread this project: blogger, friends, relatives, magazines, every
channel is important to bring more and more visibility to our collection.Some features may change the original watches. It all depends if we reach our goal .Lo scopo primario è quello di poter 
contribuire in maniera attiva e positiva alla diffusione di una cultura 
eco friendly. Poiché al giorno d'oggi viviamo tutto in maniera veloce e 
frenetica, si sente il bisogno di rallentare, tornare alle origini, alle
 nostre fondamenta, semplicemente di poter avere maggiore consapevolezza
 e coscienza di ciò che ci circonda. Quindi crediamo che ogni singola 
azione rivolta al rispetto della natura ed alla salvaguardia 
dell'ambiente, contribuisca a un generale miglioramento dell'intero 
pianeta. Attraverso una progressiva progettazione di design, semplicità 
ed ecosostenibilità, il compito principale di Elemento è dunque di 
impegnarsi a creare delle collezioni di orologi da polso in legno 
derivante da foreste giapponesi a raccolto controllato. Tutto questo per
 dare un ulteriore sostegno ad una nostra azienda Partner, una delle tante realtà italiane 
che si occupa di creare nuove aree boschive per la riduzione di 
emissioni nocive nell'atmosfera. Da qui proprio l'idea che ogni nostro 
orologio sarà venduto con un certificato che attesti la coltivazione di 
una pianta, la quale sarà geolocalizzata per poter mostrare 
concretamente il contributo che ogni singola persona vorrà dare a questo
 progetto.Ora siamo qui, su Indiegogo, con un prototipo completamente funzionale. Abbiamo solo bisogno di una cosa ... il vostro sostegno!
Gli orologi ELEMENTO sono venduti con la 
Garanzia internazionale. Noi siamo così sicuri della qualità e la durata
 dei nostri orologi, ma se qualcosa dovesse accadere entro il primo 
anno, non esitate a spedirci indietro l'orologio. Questa garanzia copre i
 difetti di fabbricazione su l'orologio stesso (movimento, vetro 
rovinato).La riparazione / sostituzione sarà addebitata nei seguenti casi, anche durante il periodo di garanzia.
 - Danni causati da un uso improprio o disattenzione (colpi, ammaccature, urti, vetro rotto, ecc)
 - Danni causati da riparazione o modifica ingiustificabile
 - Danni causati dal fuoco o acqua
 - Cambiamenti estetici che si verificano 
durante la normale usura e di invecchiamento (piccoli graffi sul vetro, 
alterazione del colore sul cinturino)
 - Nel caso in cui la vendita al dettaglio
 e la data di acquisto non sono indicati su questa garanzia o se queste 
informazioni sono state riscritte.
 - Se la garanzia non è presentata insieme con l'orologio.L’idea affonda le sue radici dalla mente 
di Davide Zanon, un giovane imprenditore appassionato di fotografia e amante 
dei viaggi. Stanco della routine e affascinato dalla cultura orientale 
incontra in Germania Mayo, una ragazza giapponese con la quale condivide
 il suo sogno di poter contribuire alla salvaguardia dell’ambiente, da 
quel momento, tornato in Italia comincia a sviluppare la sua idea 
imprenditoriale che potesse permettere a tutti di poterlo aiutare a 
finanziare i suoi progetti legati all’ambiente. Nel suo percorso 
incontra l’amico Geshe Mancini, un giovane regista cinematografico ed insieme 
pianificano ogni dettaglio di promozione e comunicazione online e 
offline. Nel team, fanno parte anche Marco Trestini (marketing), Amina 
(traduttrice), Matteo (controllo qualità e sviluppo), Fabiano 
(fotografo).C'è bisogno anche di VOI!!
 Ricordiamo che Indiegogo ci permetterà di raccogliere i fondi solo al raggiungimento del nostro goal.
 Noi cercheremo di promuovere il progetto 
in tutti i canali online e offline e ci auguriamo che attraverso l’uso 
dei social media e dei blog riusciremo ad indirizzare tutto il traffico 
qui.
 Condividendo la pagina, promuovendo il 
progetto, pubblicando foto con l’hashtag #elementowatches si può davvero
 contribuire alla diffusione di questa raccolta fondi. E’ sufficiente 
iscriversi alla pagina Facebook e Instagram per ricevere le ultime 
notizie ed avere modo di condividere a tutti i vostri amici e followers 
il nostro lavoro.Abbiamo ottimizzato il prototipo iniziale,
 studiato i vari tipi di legno, perfezionato il design e selezionato il 
nostro produttore che una grande esperienza nel nostro settore.
 Una volta che la campagna Indiegogo sarà 
finita e riceveremo i vostri fondi potremo avviare la produzione la 
quale richederà circa 30 giorni a seconda della quantità dell’ordine. 
Faremo il possibile per rispettare i tempi di consegna e tenervi 
aggiornati sul vostro ordine.Le sfide per Elemento watches sono 
moteplici. Una volta raccolti i fondi neccessari alla produzione 
cercheremo di promuovere i nostri orologi insieme al nostro concept eco 
solidale in tutto il mondo.
 Perché questo possa funzionare 
abbiamo bisogno dell’aiuto di tutti per diffondere questo progetto: 
blogger, amici, parenti, riviste, ogni canale è importante per portare 
maggiore visibilità alla nostra raccolta fondi.

story:
I have now regained my dignity, self-confidence, my feeling of usefulness and again have a purpose in life. This is all due to Won with One, who took the time...to provide an opportunity for me to get out of the bottom of a cold, dark barrel. (Won With One Athlete.)

BACKGROUND

My name is Tim Scapillato. I live in Wakefield, Quebec, Canada. For me, 2015 is a year of milestones.

Thirty years ago, in the spring of 1985, I quit smoking and took up running. In fairly short order, I became a marathon runner and set my sights on the Boston Marathon. I ran my first one in 1991, and since then have completed 13 more. I will be returning this year for my 15th Boston Marathon. Another milestone.

But this one is going to be special in another way, because I'm using it to raise funds for an organization called Won With One. 

Won with One supports people who are visually or physically challenged to realize their dreams as athletes in the sport of triathlon by providing equipment, opportunities and solutions. We support their individual journeys to leave the sidelines and step onto the race course to experience the empowerment that comes from crossing a finish line.

Won with One helps physically and visually challenged athletes re-imagine what can be achieved by building a community of support which transforms lives and breaks down barriers.

In 2010 I joined Won With One as an athlete guide. Since then I have guided blind and visually challenged athletes in triathlons and marathons. I guided a blind runner in the 2011, 2012 and 2013 Boston Marathons. Running Boston is an experience like no other, but running it as a set of eyes for a blind runner made it even more special. Read about our experience in 2013, the year of the tragic bombing.

There is no other organization like Won With One. The experience has been life-changing for everyone who has been involved in this organization, whether as a guide or an athlete.


How You Can Help?

So far, Won With One athletes have competed in 23 major races in Canada and the United States. We have used 637 feet of tether to connect athletes and guides. We have moved tandem bikes over 25,473 kilometres to get to the start lines of these races.

These are impressive numbers! 

But these achievements don't come without a cost. And that's why we need your help. Won With One is a 100% volunteer-run organization, and it operates on a shoe-string budget. In order to keep providing these life-changing opportunities to our athletes, we need your help.

I have launched this campaign to ask for your financial support by sponsoring me as I run my 15th Boston Marathon on April 20, 2015. My goal is to raise $500 for every year that I've run Boston. 

Where we're at:

1991 ($500)

1993 ($500)

1996 ($500)

2000 ($500)

2003 ($500)

2005 ($500)

2006 ($500)

2008 ($500)

2009 ($500)

2010 ($500)

2011 ($500)

2012 ($500)

2013 ($500)

2014 ($500)

2015 ($500)

Won With One works on an annual budget of approximately $15,000, so $7,500 would be a big boost. It would allow us to enter a team of 24 athletes and guides to race triathlons in the 2015 season by helping to subsidize their race fees, accommodations, travel, transportation and equipment transport!

Your contribution will help keep Won With One athletes and their guides healthy, active and empowered!

Please note that not one cent of this money goes to me. It will not pay for my trip to Boston or my race registration. All funds will go directly to Won With One to ensure that our athletes will be able to compete in triathlons in the 2015 season. There is no overhead, no administration, no bureaucracy. 100% of the funds raised will go directly to providing opportunities to athletes who would otherwise be denied the chance to realize a dream.

At the end of the campaign, we will issue tax receipts to Canadian residents who make a donation over $10.00. Unfortunately, we are not able to provide tax receipts to non-Canadian residents.


You Can Make A Difference!

Shelley-Anne Morris of Ottawa is a visually challenged triathlete whose life has been changed by the support she has received from Won With One. Here's what she has to say about what Won With One means to her:

In the past four years, I have grown and developed both as an athlete and as a person. I’ve pushed myself physically. I’ve conquered 15 sprint distance/early bird tris and now hope to go on to participate in an Olympic distance in 2015. I’ve learned a lot about working as an athlete/guide team: one brain, two bodies. Triathlon takes logistical and organizational skill. I’ve learned a lot about preparing for the sport from my teammates. I’ve grown in confidence as a writer and as a communicator. That new-found confidence has led me to become a co-host on a disabilities radio show on one of Ottawa’s community radio shows.

When I am wearing my team uniform, I am standing proud, knowing that despite all the harshness and misconceptions that the world can dish out, my team has got my back. When we all show up en masse we take a definitive stance against discrimination, stereotype and the backward thinking that still holds many of us back from achieving our potential.  

Won With One has introduced me to some incredible people, each of whom has a story to tell. Athlete and guide alike, each and every one of us has a reason for being here. Many of my fellow teammates have lost vision and have had to re-define themselves within a ‘new normal.’ For some, vision loss meant a loss of employment and/or the need to ‘give up’ much-loved activities. Some never even considered becoming a triathlete until the opportunity presented itself.

All athletes have said that being part of the Won with One triathlon team has been ‘life-changing.’ Along with being a fitter, faster 52-year-old, I am doing things that once were out of my realm of possibilities. Being able to say “I’m a triathlete” has given me an incredible confidence boost. In 2013, I ran my first half-marathon!

Thank you for helping to change the lives of visually and physically challenged athletes who want nothing more than the chance to stand at the start line and test their limits.

______________________________________________________________________

Listen to Tim's radio interviews as he promotes his funding campaign:

On TSN 1200 Ottawa

On CKCU 93.1, "Welcome to My World"

TSN interview starts at the 7:50 mark.

CKCU interview starts around the 7:15 mark.

______________________________________________________________________

Won With One celebrates its fifth year of providing opportunities

story:
YOU + PLEDGE (or SHARE) = SIGNATURE SERIES!

BENEFITS OF BAMBOO

The benefits of bamboo fibers and viscose in clothing is the natural ability to wick moisture away from your skin to help keep you cool and dry. Bamboo has natural antibacterial properties which helps prevent the growth of odour causing bacteria in your clothes. Combat sweat. Eliminate stank. Less washing. Less wear and tear. Bamboo fabrics do not retain odours well, and do not stain easily. That's longer lasting clothes. Period.


SIGNATURE SERIES Men's Athletic Briefs (image)

SIGNATURE SERIES Women's Athletic Briefs (images)



SIGNATURE SERIES Bamboo Wood Frame Polarized Lenses Wayfarers (photo)



OUR MISSION

1. We need at least 50 orders on our Signature Series to finish our a limited edition pair of polarized bamboo sunglasses. Flex hinge for max comfort. Lightweight and they float!


2. We need at least 100 orders on our Signature Series to begin our first production of athletic briefs for men.

3. We need at least 100 orders on our Signature Series to begin the first production of athletic briefs for women.

For wholesale inquiries email thecrew@bamboo.clothing


FASTEST GROWING PRODUCT IN THE WORLD
Invest in a future of bamboo performance apparel.

The focus of our business is to change the way people think about sustainability and consumerism. Our success comes from educating consumers about the incredible potential and benefits of investing in a future made with bamboo.

SUSTAINABILITY
We manufacture some of our goods in Canada, USA, Mexico, China, India, and Indonesia. To help our economy, we can limit the carbon footprint caused by transportation of goods by delivering our products directly from our eCommerce and have our products made to order to limit the amount of needless overconsumption of products. Our definition of sustainability is not defined as being dependent on any one single source. In fact, we believe the definition of sustainability comes from collectively working together in a diverse global economy. The people involved with the sustainability movement are typically grassroots and often there is no incentive from governments, politics or media. We are working on changing this issue, and that's why you should invest in our campaign to raise funds. Plus, you're get some cool new sustainable product too!

HIGHLY RENEWABLE
In order for us to ensure that products are eco-friendly we need to focus our attention to the ingredients and the raw materials used to produce the products. This is the first and most important step in sustainability. In our case, our material source is bamboo.

Unlike the cotton industry that uses 40-50 different chemicals to grow and maintain their crops, bamboo uses none. That's right. Bamboo grows wild and naturally without the use of chemicals. Bamboo grows up to 4ft a day and over 100ft tall. It has no known pests or fungus. It's ultimate super plant!

SOCIALLY RESPONSIBLE
Founder and CEO, Justin Jack Bear has personally been doing independent research, with a study of bamboo products and the industry for the past 6 years. Justin has made successful business relationships with some of the most trusted bamboo brands in the North America and has been working together to bring the most socially responsible and eco-friendly products to market. We will offer the easiest and most convenient way to shop all the best bamboo made products. Right at your fingertips. Shipped worldwide, and directly to your door.

Thank you for joining us and investing in your sustainable future with the best made bamboo brands and products for all of your active lifestyle needs! Keep sharing the bamboo love :)

YOU + PLEDGE (or SHARE) = SIGNATURE SERIES!


RECAP: OUR MISSION

1. We need at least 50 orders on our Signature Series to finish our a limited edition pair of polarized bamboo sunglasses. Flex hinge for max comfort. Lightweight and they float!
2. We need at least 100 orders on our Signature Series to begin our first production of athletic briefs for men.

3. We need at least 100 orders on our Signature Series to begin the first production of athletic briefs for women.

For wholesale inquiries email thecrew@bamboo.clothing


YOU + PLEDGE (or SHARE) = SIGNATURE SERIES!


SIGNATURE SERIES

In total, we need to raise $10,000 for our first production of Signature Series briefs for both men and women. If we reach $20,000 we will introduce a Signature Series Bamboo athletic t-shirt for both men and women. If we reach $30,000 we will introduce new colours. We also have plans to introduce bamboo knitted running shoes and bamboo flex jeans for athletes, if we can reach $100,000.

If we don't reach our complete goal of $50,000 we will send you an awesome bamboo gift from one of our partners anyway! The rest of the money will go towards 3 months of business startup costs which will effectively help us bring in more capital to make our Signature Series a reality. When our Signature Series is available, you will be the first to be invited for the chance to own this production of Bamboo Clothing Co. Signature Series.

YOU + PLEDGE (or SHARE) = SIGNATURE SERIES!


With your help, we can offer these amazing lifestyle products to you and the world, and help sustain a healthy future for every consumers' lifestyle needs.

This is the easiest way to invest into healthier and more sustainable lifestyle. The Earth will thank you for it. Your friends and family will thank you for it. We will thank you for it. Not to mention the satisfaction knowing you helped to start one of the most sustainable brands in the world, from the ground up :)

Seeking outside funding is never easy. Then again, this is our opportunity to help reduce the carbon footprint on our environment. We are committed to simply doing business better.

Don't worry, if you can't contribute money, you can always help us spread the love by sharing this campaign with your friends and family through social media. We love you for helping us out in any way possible! Thank you.

For wholesale inquiries email thecrew@bamboo.clothing


   


YOU + PLEDGE (or SHARE) = SIGNATURE SERIES!


Bamboo Clothing Co. 2015 All Rights Reserved. For wholesale inquiries email thecrew@bamboo.clothing
