story:
Introduction

The main products;
1. The Mini F1-driver

A Mini F1-driver is a 3d-printed (stand-alone) miniature/figurine.
It's printed in a material called "full color Sandstone" You can compare it with plaster. When it's printed, it is injected with a binder and ink at the same time. The walls are 2mm thick (minimum print-thickness). It's a static object, for display purpose only (it's not a toy!) Printed in 3d, and hand-finished.




2. The Mini F1-car

The car is also printed in full color Sandstone. On average, the walls are 2mm thick. Some parts, like the wing-beams, are slightly thicker. They must be able to bare a small load. When it's being printed, the material is soft (like wet sand). It's left to dry for a few hours, before they can take it out of the print-tray. The tray is full of "plaster"-powder, which has to be removed manually afterwards. At this stage, the material is at its most vulnerable point. When it's cleaned, an extra coat of varnish is applied to the model to make it much stronger. It also makes the colors even more vibrant. Because the minimum thickness is 2mm, I chose to make some other parts in other materials. The supports for head and steering-wheel are printed in a material called "strong and flexible plastic". In this case, the black version, because it looks best! The minimum wall thickness for this material is 0.7mm.
The rim-material is called "metallic plastic" and has actual metallic powder mixed into it. The minimum thickness for this material is 0.8mm. By using this material, the rims can be very detailed, which otherwise would not be possible if printed in full color sandstone. It looks much better this way.

A full set comes with the main car-body, a matching head/helmet, steering-wheel, plastic supports and 4 metallic-plastic rims. The rims are snap-ons. The head and steering-wheel can rotate.


* The car and minif1driver are meant as display-models only. They're not toys. You can use them to make pictures (great for social media), or enjoy just looking at it.
It's a collectible piece of art.

The designer / about me;

My name is Alex van Ophuizen, and I'm a 3d-designer from Holland.
I have been working in graphics-related businesses throughout my career. I'm
36 years old, and have a lot of experience when it comes to design and related programs, like Photoshop, Illustrator and Indesign. I'm also a certified Avery-Graphics car-wrapper, with a passion for logo's and branding in general.

Somewhere in 2005, I had my first encounter with a 3d-program (Sketchup). Hooked ever-since! These days, I'm working with Blender3d. My biggest passion of-course, is F1. I started following the sport in 1994. Senna's last races, and Michael Schumacher's first, that's where it all started for me. Never ever missed a race from that moment.

The Concept;

Mini F1-drivers 2015 will be available in all of the F1-livery's. They want to connect with every F1-fan. The designs are made in a way that they are 3d-printable. Not just for rendering and animation! You're able to buy one, and make your own fan-content.
Like pictures for social media for example. It's fun, and you can share it!



What I need & what you'll get

I need: money to buy an F1-license

I've talked to an F1-team, and there is a way of making the Mini's with official livery. One of the key-points to make this happen; I have to pay royalties in advance.
This to secure the teams interests and business-goals.
In my case, they've asked for 100K. That is why my Mini's are inviting you to become part of this dream, this awesome project! Together, we can make this work.
When they become official merchandise, the team will promote and sell them. 
This will be a huge boost for Mini F1-drivers.

What you will get in return;

Make a pledge to this project, and you will get special Mini's, Mini-cars and other products in return. Become a part of the #MiniFamily! The Mini F1-drivers will share all their plans with you. Stuff that other fans will not be able to see. It's also an unique chance to have a special Mini-figure or Mini-car of your own, with your name or logo on it, or maybe a whole unique model of your own design.

Challenges and Risks

The main challenge is to reach enough people in order to get the royalty-payment in place. If the Mini's don't reach enough people, they will never be official team merchandise. The only risk that applies to you; having a Mini without official logo's. But they would still look like the official livery though! The project is based on flexible funding, so whatever happens, you will get your Mini F1-driver or Mini F1-car.


Production-wise, there is no risk. Shapeways can handle very large orders.
They are delivered by UPS. Logistically, there are no obstacles. World-wide shipping.
For you it's a chance to get them cheaper than when you order them in my shop. For example, the pledged Mini F1-driver will come to you for $25,- including shipping. That will save you some costs.
So get on board, order your Mini F1-driver today. You will get your 2015-livery model by the end of May 2015.

More ways for you to help

If you're not in a position to make a pledge, that doesn't mean you can't help:
as i mentioned before, F1 has a massive audience, on TV and also on social media!
I need your help to share my content and reach enough people. It's just as important as making a pledge.

Collaborations so far

  • A Schumi #Win92 tribute for Michael Schumacher Fan Page
  • A 3d-printed logo (miniature F1 wheel + rim) for ThePitCrewOnline / TheF1Taxi
  • Special tracks and items for 3DRacetracks
  • Artwork template for R4THBONE / Gridtoons
  • Plans for other merchandise and projects with Racingnews365
  • Jake Davis, aka JakeDDCreative (the maker of Speedyhedz) will also make some exclusive artwork for Mini F1-drivers


Future plans

  • My own animated Mini F1-drivers series, like McL*ns Tooned!
  • Create vintage cars, like the MP4/4, and other famous models.
  • Create vintage drivers, like James Hunt, Niki Lauda and many more.
  • Create special drivers, like a MiniStig, or MotoGP racers.

Mini's are already making headlines!

http://3dprint.com/36913/mini-f1-drivers/
http://www.3ders.org/Mini F1-drivers on Shapeways

Shapeways & 3d-printing in the future

3d printing is developing rapidly. I'm learning a lot about the materials,
color-management and what's possible to print, and what's not. Shapeways has allowed me to become a "pilot designer" for a new material, that will be available in 2016. (Full color plastic printing, by HP). I'm testing it in 2015! This will allow me to offer you some very exclusive, experimental models in the near future.

With your help, my Mini's will conquer the world. Together, we will make this the coolest F1-merchandise project ever!

Thanks for reading, please have a look at my project gallery and social media.
See for yourself what to expect from Mini F1-drivers this year.

Kind regards,
Alex van Ophuizen
Mini F1-drivers 

Mini F1-drivers shop
https://twitter.com/MiniF1Drivers
https://www.facebook.com/minif1drivers
http://instagram.com/minif1drivers

story:
What is Cryptonator?

It is an online cryptocurrency wallet which supports multiple cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin (BTC), Litecoin (LTC), Dogecoin (DOGE) and others. It enables the management of different digital currencies in one personal account.

The desktop version of Cryptonator is already home to over 17 000 user accounts and has received thousands of positive reviews.

Why we are here?

Because we believe that cryptocurrencies are shaping the future of money and payments. We want to make this innovative payment solution usable by as many people as possible. Today, however, cryptocurrencies are quite difficult for an ordinary consumer. It takes time to understand how they work and how one can start using them. We want to make managing cryptocurrency payments as easy as sending an email or text message, keeping it safe and secure at the same time.

Today the web version of Cryptonator is helping thousands of people send, receive and instantly exchange various cryptocurrencies in one personal account.

The ability to manage multiple types of digital currencies on a smartphone and send mobile payments on the go is another important step in bringing this breakthrough technology to even more people.

What We Need

We need $25,000USD to complete the development of the Cryptonator App and to release it for both iOS and Android. It includes prototyping, UI design, coding, security research and testing. After the initial release it will also cover bug fixes where necessary.

What You Get

Aside from cool rewards (at the right side), you will get an early access to an awesome multi-cryptocurrency mobile wallet with stunning functionality (iPhone and Android alike)

CHECK BALANCE

  • View current and pending balances on all accounts in all supported cryptocurrencies;
  • Manage cryptocurrency accounts (add new or remove present);
  • Manage your cryptocurrency addresses (create/remove/label);
 Balance on Android

clickable 		BTC Account

clickable

History on iPhone

clickable 		Main menu on iPhone

clickable

VIEW HISTORY

  • View transactions history (received, sent, exchanged);
  • Filter and search transactions;

SEND MONEY

  • Send cryptocurrency to address (enter manually or scan QR code);
  • Send cryptocurrency per email;
  • Quick-send to favorited recipients;
  • Send payment requests in selected cryptocurrency ;
 Send on iPhone

clickable 		Scan QR code

clickable
Exchange on Android

clickable 		Address info

clickable

INSTANT EXCHANGE

  • Instant exchange between all supported cryptocurrencies;
  • Activate auto-exchange for selected currency;

SECURITY OPTIONS

Strengthen protection of your funds by activating PIN/Touch ID and enabling Two-Step-Verification.

  • Require PIN/Touch ID to access funds;
  • Activate Two-Step-Verification to send out payments;
 PIN on iPhone

clickable 		2FA on Android

clickable

ALL CURRENT FUNCTIONALITY REMAINS

Of course, all current functions of our existing apps for iPhone and Android will remain.

  • Easy and smooth conversion 500+ cryptocurrencies and fiat @ actual rates across 40+ exchanges
  • My Rates for tracking favorite currencies
  • Portfolio tool for tracking value of owned coins
  • Cryptocurrency Winners & Losers for the past 24h, week, month
  • Widget price ticker for the home screen

Perks!

Back Cryptonator project and get cool perks!

Cryptonator Starter Pack $5 USD

Many thanks from Cryptonator team for backing our project, early access to the Cryptonator App ahead of everybody else and a special Cryptonator banknote, which you can redeem to immediately top-up your Cryptonator account with small amount of cryptocurrency (an equivalent of ~ $1 USD). Start using the Cryptonator app instantly!


actual banknote may differ

Cryptonator Supporter Pack $20 USD

As a Cryptonator supporter, your name/nickname will be listed in the app under the SPECIAL THANKS TO THE PEOPLE WHO MADE IT HAPPEN title. This list will be carefully carried into all new releases of the App. Plus all rewards from the Starter Pack above.

Cryptonator Poster Pack $30 USD

Cool Big Full-Color Cryptonator Poster sent to your postal address worldwide. Plus all the rewards above.

Cryptonator T-Shirt Pack $50 USD

Awesome High Quality Cryptonator T-Shirt sent to your postal address worldwide. 100% cotton, sizes S-XL. Plus all the rewards above.

Edition white Edition black
clickable

Personal Avatar Pack $100 USD

We will add your personal avatar to the app. Avatar will be displayed only on your smartphone, and you will be able to change avatar via account settings. Plus all the rewards above. Ten Early Bird Packs available at reduced price!

Without an avatar With your avatar

No Fees Account Pack $200 USD

Your personal Cryptonator account free from transaction fees for 2 years and with better exchange rates. Send unlimited cryptocurrency transactions free of charge! Plus all the rewards above. Ten Early Bird Packs available at reduced price!

Personal Splash-Screen Pack $1,000 USD

We will add your personal splash-screen to the app. Splash-Screen will be displayed only on your smartphone. Unlike personal avatar, personal splash screen could not be changed once submitted. Plus all the rewards above. One Early Bird Pack available at reduced price!

Standard Splash-Screen Personal Splash-Screen
clickable

Estimated delivery & International Backers

Both physical Items (posters, t-shirts) and digital Perks will be shipped in June 2015. We ship worldwide with the exception of Cuba, Myanmar/Burma, Iran, Sudan and Syria. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region. If you are unsure whether you could be reached by international postal services, please get in touch with us at support@cryptonator.com

Help us by sharing Cryptonator with your friends!

Have friends that might be excited to know about the new Cryptonator app? Share our campaign with them through the "Share buttons" at the left or use the links below. Make some noise!

Thank you for spreading the word by sharing this page to anyone who might be interested.

Risks & Challenges

We have already released a simpler cryptocurrency Apps for iPhone and Android. Both of them received positive reviews, and have a couple of thousands of downloads. The Android app even made it to the 10 best cryptocurrency apps for Android as  per recent Androidauthority review, and the iPhone App hit finance.yahoo.com. Generally speaking we have the knowledge and experience required to develop and deliver this app.

Time risks

Development of the server-side API and the authorization protocol is almost finished. Hiring additional developers and security researchers would allow us to release the fully functional app by the end of May 2015. While we do not expect these dates to change, it is possible that the estimated release date may shift due to unexpected difficulties in development.

Cryptocurrency ban risks

Certain governments may ban cryptocurrencies for some reasons, which might make our app unavailable in these countries. Re-establishing new iTunes/Google Play account helps solving such problems.

Logistics ricks

Despite tracking numbers, sometimes post services fail to deliver due to a variety of reasons. In the unlikely case your parcel is lost, we will resend your Perk.

Frequently Asked Questions

What would the App cost if I just wait for it to come out?

The App is free. Our supporters will have early access to the App, 2-4 weeks ahead of everybody else.

However, without your help we are unlikely to release the App anytime soon.

What’s Cryptonator done so far?

  • Fully operational multicurrency online wallet
  • Over 17 000 user account
  • Cryptocurrency conversion and portfolio apps for Android and iPhone
  • Free API and widgets which are currently used on hundreds of websites

What payment methods do you accept?

Indiegogo accepts all major credit cards and Paypal. It is also possible to donate in cryptocurrency.

Can I pledge in cryptocurrency?

Absolutely. Anonymous backers can donate to this Bitcoin address 14vn2KgqQyTp1Xd5tnFGWHqmK3Meme8KwS

If you want to pledge in cryptocurrency and claim your perk, please get in touch with us at support@cryptonator.com.

Will it be available for both iPhone and Android?

Yes. It might be released on different dates though, due to the Apple approval policy.

OS compatibility?

App requires iOS 7.0 or later to run on iPhone/iPad and Android 4.0 and up for Android devices.

How many cryptocurrencies will be supported by the App?

At the time of writing - 9. These are Bitcoin, Blackcoin, Darkcoin, Dogecoin, Litecoin, Paycoin, Peercoin, Reddcoin and Vertcoin. However we constantly add new cryptocurrencies. As soon as new currency is added to Cryptonator, it instantly appears in the App.

What are the fees involved in transactions?

All deposits and incoming transactions are processed free of charge. Depending on the user's account type, Cryptonator charges minor fixed fee on outgoing payments to cover cryptocurrency transaction costs.

Fees for outgoing transaction (regardless of the amount):

  • Blackcoin: 0.001 BC (less than 0.01 USD)
  • Bitcoin: 0.0001 BTC (equals ~ 0.05 USD)
  • Darkcoin: 0.001 DRK (less than 0.01 USD)
  • Dogecoin: 1 DOGE (less than 0.01 USD)
  • Litecoin: 0.002 LTC (less than 0.01 USD)
  • Paycoin: 0.001 XPY (less than 0.01 USD)
  • Peercoin: 0.001 PPC (less than 0.01 USD)
  • Reddcoin: 1 RDD (less than 0.01 USD)
  • Vertcoin: 0.001 VTC (less than 0.01 USD)

Is shipping included?

Yes. Since Indiegogo doesn’t allow us to add any extra shipping to the perks, so it is included in the suggested donation price.

We look forward to your support and feedback! Ask your questions and leave comments here on Indiegogo or send them directly to support@cryptonator.com

If you want to pledge in cryptocurrency and claim your perk, please get in touch with us at support@cryptonator.com.
Will it be available for both iPhone and Android?


Yes. It might be released on different dates though, due to the Apple approval policy.
OS compatibility?
App requires iOS 7.0 or later to run on iPhone/iPad and Android 4.0 and up for Android devices.
How many cryptocurrencies will be supported by the App?
At the time of writing - 9. These are Bitcoin, Blackcoin, Darkcoin, Dogecoin, Litecoin, Paycoin, Peercoin, Reddcoin and Vertcoin. However we constantly add new cryptocurrencies. As soon as new currency is added to Cryptonator, it instantly appears in the App.
What are the fees involved in transactions?
All deposits and incoming transactions are processed free of charge. Depending on the user's account type, Cryptonator charges minor fixed fee on outgoing payments to cover cryptocurrency transaction costs.
Fees for outgoing transaction (regardless of the amount):

Blackcoin: 0.001 BC (less than 0.01 USD)
Bitcoin: 0.0001 BTC (equals ~ 0.05 USD)
Darkcoin: 0.001 DRK (less than 0.01 USD)
Dogecoin: 1 DOGE (less than 0.01 USD)
Litecoin: 0.002 LTC (less than 0.01 USD)
Paycoin: 0.001 XPY (less than 0.01 USD)
Peercoin: 0.001 PPC (less than 0.01 USD)
Reddcoin: 1 RDD (less than 0.01 USD)
Vertcoin: 0.001 VTC (less than 0.01 USD)

Is shipping included?
Yes. Since Indiegogo doesn’t allow us to add any extra shipping to the perks, so it is included in the suggested donation price.
We look forward to your support and feedback! Ask your questions and leave comments here on Indiegogo or send them directly to support@cryptonator.com

story:
Modern handmade pet furniture

The idea for our products developed primarily from our own need for modern pet furniture that our cat would love to use. My brother and I spent countless hours in front of the computer searching for something that would fit into our home.

After a while we realized that with our expertise in carpentry and with access to some of the machinery at work, we could make our own items.

In our quest to improve the quality of lifestyle for Rossi (our cat), we have created top notch products. They offer comfort and add a modern touch to your house or apartment. 


After being thoroughly tested by Rossi and a number of friends and their feline and canine companions, we decided to help others who face the same dilemma we did.

To make this happen we need to buy our own machinery and for that, we need your support. Without you, this would be impossible. So we want to thank you in advance for supporting our dream.

Our products are suitable for both cats and small dogs!



MATERIALS AND MANUFACTURING

All products will be handmade in Slovenia (EU) and are also manufactured in a green and ecological manner. We will use only top notch materials as we want the best for our pets:


  • KERROCK is resistant to damage, water, is highly durable and is the base of all our products. It will not rust like metal or fall apart like your usual pet furniture made of wood. It is extremely easy to maintain and all the dirt washes off easily. Kerrock is also recyclable so our product are ECO friendly making it the perfect choice for your home!

  • SISAL is the textile compound made of 100% pure Agave Sisalana fibers. The material is antistatic and made of naturally renewable resources. During heavy testing on our pets we have concluded that they absolutely love it!

  • SYNTHETIC LEATHER is the material of choice for the pillow covers if you are buying our products for a dog. It's easily cleaned, durable and will look astonishing in your home. 

  • HEMP FIBERS is the best option for pillow covers if you want to order our product for your cat. They just love the material and will sleep on it  whole day long!

  • MEMORY FOAM is used to provide comfort and enables your pets to get the best, most relaxing nap they ever had! The memory foam also helps with joint pains and allows older cats and dogs to sleep comfortably


Synthetic leather on the left and hemp fibers on the right



PRODUCTS

We have created multiple items with variations to suit your every need. There are 17 different variations of 4 main items and you can also choose between hemp fibers or synthetic leather for the pillow covers!


ESCA - DRINKING AND FOOD BOWLS

Stylish yet functional food and water bowls for your pets. The sizes are just right for cats and smaller sized dogs!

SIZES: 350mm x 200mm x 65mm, 2dcl per bowl
(13,8" x 7,9" x 2,55", 6.8oz per bowl)


ESCA WALL - WALL MOUNTED FOOD AND WATER BOWLS

Want to place the food and water bowls at just the right height for your pet? Use ESCA WALL mounted bowls. They come with high end stainless steel wall mounts and are extremely easy to install. 

SIZES: 325mm x 220mm x 150mm, 2dcl per bowl
(12,8" x 8,7" x 5,9", 6.8oz per bowl)


QUIES - BEDS FOR CATS AND DOGS

There are three different variations of our beds. You can also choose between hemp fibers and synthetic leather for the pillow covers.

SIZES: 560mm x 365mm x 70mm (22" x 14,4" x 2,75")



FORMA - CAT SCRATCHER WITH A BED

Perfectly designed to combine play and relaxation. It will also keep those sharp claws from your beloved couch!

SIZES: 570mm x 365mm x 423mm (22,45" x 14,4" x 16,65")



ARIA - WALL MOUNTED CAT SCRATCHER

There is never any room for a scratch post right? Well why use up valuable space, when you can mount it perfectly on the wall! It also has a lip at the bottom that supports the cat while scratching or it can double as a place to rest.

SIZES: 1000mm x 550mm x 180mm (39,4" x 21,65" x 7,1")





MDELUXE IS SUPPORTED BY:



RISKS: No project is without their risk and challenges but we try to do our absolute best to minimize them. We felt that we have done all the necessary preliminary work prior to coming to Indiegogo.

MANUFACTURING: All our items are completely handmade and therefore require a lot of attention to detail plus a few custom machines. We spent almost half a year arranging and optimizing all steps in manufacturing of our items. We already financed some parts of necessary tooling, but we need your support in order to finalize all the details and missing parts.

DELIVERY DATES: We estimate that we will be able to deliver the items in March of 2015. Should there be any unforeseen circumstances we will let you know as soon as possible.

SHIPPING TO INTERNATIONAL FUNDERS: All our products come with free shipping within European Union. Due to the size and weight of our items we cannot cover the complete cost of international delivery by ourselves, so we ask you to please chose the "International Delivery Add-on" as well when placing an order from other countries.


We understand that Indiegogo funders want their MDeluxe items as soon as possible, but we also want the items to be of highest quality and up to our desired specifications.  

We are dedicated to our project timeline and will keep you informed on the status of our progress on a regular basis via updates.

story:
INTRODUCTION & BACKGROUND

My name is Mark Johnson. I was born in Hackney, East London. I was born on February 12 1971.  Born premature it nearly cost me my sight. I was born with a rare condition that would see me in and out of hospital for many, many years to come. Many operations would follow. My last was when I was 30 years old. 

While the scars around my eyes are clear to see it is a constant reminder of what I went through and still going through but I have to thank God because I have my sight.

It is fair to say my early educational years suffered due to being in hospital but from an early age I enjoyed drawing and was very creative. My fashion life began in secondary school. I had one of three options to choose. Photography, athletics or fashion.

I spent three years in fashion college but as time went on I taught myself things and would go into clothes stores to see how the clothes was made.

Dallas, dynasty took me in the direction of evening dresses. My sister was a model and my mother went to the London college of fashion.

In the past my designs have been on the same catwalk as Christian Dior and Pacco Rabanne. I worked for Ralph Lauren and the USA Olympic team for the 2012 London games. In 2009 I was the only British designer to take part in Geneva fashion fair.

CAMPAIGN

My brand label is called the House of Esther.

It is every fashion designers dream to take part in  fashion show in New York and for some years I have tried to fulfill that dream but it never came to pass until now. 

A great opportunity has come up for me to show my collection at the world famous Plitzs New York city fashion week on February 19. It will feature designers from around the world and get a great deal of press attention and I want to show my finest collection.

Time is short but I have people that will help me make the patterns and clothes. For my evening and bridal wear I want to use the best quality fabrics. Some will come from an area in West London called Shepherds bush. This is the show of all shows, It's New York, The press will be at the show so I need to deliver the very best. This could after all be the very break I have been looking for.

YOUR HELP

With your help you will help me full fill a dream by creating some of the finest red carpet style dress and Bridal gowns. Those that will attend will be I'm sure looking to buy. Press will want to feature the designers and so I want to do the very best and that's why your help is needed. Please help me buy the finest silks, satins, Ankara and trimmings.

BREAK DOWN

The money will go to buy fabrics and dress gowns and beads. The gowns will be travelling with me from London to New York.

I will need to buy: Duchess satin, Silk satin, Quality lining and netting. The finest trimmings and African textiles.

I will need to buy designer labels and dress gowns.

Duchess satin is probably the most common fabric used for bridal dress and because most of the clothes will be cut on the bias more metres/yards will be needed.

Some fabrics will have diamante beads hand sewn on them. The finest beads will come from the West end of London.

IF I DON'T REACH MY GOAL

I'm hoping I will and with your help it will happen.

THE IMPACT

You all can be apart of my success. When you see my designs in magazines and shops and on the Catwalk of New York you can say you helped. It means this British born designer's dream will come true and eventually I can help others with the same or  similar dream come true.

RISKS & CHALLENGES

My work is of a high standard. I don't rush my work but time is against me. I won't be taking any short cuts. Before the clothes are sewn the patterns need to be made.

I have already started to make the patterns. The last 3 weeks leading up to my flight to New York I will have more hands helping me and will be focusing on these garments and working long hours.

Other ways of helping

You may not be able to contribute money but it would be great if you could help me spread the word and make some noise about this campaign. You can also use the Indiegogo tools.

story:
Paloma & Angostura:  Who we are


Paloma & Angostura is a Colombian Impact design company, Sustainable fashion for peace building.

We conceived Paloma & Angostura with the core belief that through action and empowerment, true change and sustainable peace is possible.  We believe in Impact through design and Counciousness through industry. This is why we work directly with suppliers that were former members of ilegal armed groups in Colombia. People who used to belong to FARC and the AUC and now are creating a new beginning, a life in peace. 

With the initial guidance of The Colombian Agency for Reintegration (ACR) we started working with Ederlidia Garizao, who used to make the AUC´s combat uniforms and now employs former combatants not only from the AUC but also from the FARC. In 2006, she demobilized from the paramilitaries, and returned to her hometown in Urabá; however, because of threats from criminal bands in the area, she had to move to Bogotá in search of a new beginning. Thanks to her discipline and hard work she managed to put together a small workshop where she employs women heads of household and other demobilized guerrillas and paramilitaries. Ederlidia aspires to grow into a great business that creates value for society and employment for people affected by the conflict. At Paloma & Angostura, we want to help her fulfill that dream by rebuilding social fabric and promoting reconciliation.

Furthermore, In looking to fulfill our environmental values we sought to locally source in South America, organic Pima Cotton from Peru. There we met suppliers and found incredibly soft fabrics that make our products feel as good as the story they tell. 

For us it has never been just about fashion, but rather to create products that tell a compelling local narrative that has global resonance because of its intrinsic values of peace, liberty and empowerment.

Our Model


Media

Seen on CCTV America.

Other publications and recognition:

                      


Products

 


Environmentally Friendly Textiles


What We Need 

We need financing to fulfil a few goals, Mainly to make the company sustainable, create new jobs and better the working conditions for the workers who already produce our products: 

  • We want to better the working condition of our suppliers. This is why we want to change Ederlidia's cutting table and sewing machine, this will mean that our products will have better quality and it will generate an impact in her workshop.
  • We want to be able to enter new markets, finish our website and find more sales channels this will allow us to increase our production and create new well paying jobs for former combatants
  • Peruvian organic pima cotton is expensive, and we want to continue to sell organic fibers to our clients. We want to explore new fabrics to include in our product range.
  • Development of new products: We seek to be a lifestyle brand and would like to look for new suppliers that are peace builders. However, product development and quality assurance is slow and we need financial backing to get products to market. Right now we are talking with government institutions in order to create products that help build post-conflict economy. 
  •  We would like to sell primarily in the United States, United Kingdom, Europe and Canada. Entering these markets is expensive because it means going to trade shows, finding buyers and retailers or finding people that will manage our marketing, order fulfilment and distribution. Shipping from Colombia is too expensive and would drive up the price of our products to final consumers, this is against our values as we would like to sell social, environmental and economic value.


The Impact

By joining this movement you are helping us empower a whole generation to build peace, we want to rebuild and reimagine a peaceful society and take away the discourse of peace from politicians and empower local grassroots communities to take helm of this peace-building effort :

  • We look for local narratives that resonate value and for products that go beyond their stitching
  • We think that it is very powerful to create and sell products that are embedded with values of reconciliation and peace building. When people humanize and see those that are former enemies it is easier to forgive them.
  • We invest in our workers to better their working conditions
  • We use environmentally friendly textiles, Right now 70% of our cotton is Organic Pima Cotton  we want to increase this number to 100%


Risks & Challenges

There is some risk involved in the production process including times of delivery. Also the postage system is terribly slow and unreliable, but we will make our best effort to send you your reward as fast as possible.


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help Paloma & Angostura. We are an inclusive business and we need to get the word out to further our impact:

Please  follow, share, retweet and mention us on social media you can find us as @palomaworkshop. 

Please use hashtags #peaceisbasic and #peaceempowers

Also if you are a talented designer, business manager, marketing guru or angel Investor and would like to help in any way please contact us at info@palomayangostura.com

story:
THE PROJECT

Hey! I'm Alex a.k.a Bones 

I have wanted to start my own clothing line for a long time now, however, never had any true creative grounds from which to start. This spring, I inherited the nickname 'Bones' and it is sticking to me like glue. From that name alone, I was inspired  and began designing based on that one word. 

This campaign is to get Bones Clothing moving in the direction I want it to. As well as designing my own range, I want to collaborate with bands, artists, creatives and produce artwork together. Punk D.I.Y ethics and Youth is at the core of this project and your funding for this campaign will enable this to happen. 




What Bones Needs & What YOU Get

For this project I am asking for £500 to get it moving off the ground. The capital raised will flow directly into Bones Clothing; enabling new designs to be printed, new equipment to be bought ( a scanner, sticker/badge printer). Funding will allow prints to be made of the designs too. The money raised will go to the making of a new website and into social media.

For those rad people who fund my campaign, I will send them a Bones tee shirt and will make sure they will be the first to know about the latest of Bones Clothing, including promotions and deals. 
If the goal is not reached, the money will still go back into Bones Clothing. The main priority is buying equipment to move this project forward. 


KABOOM

This isn't just about tee shirts. This campaign is about celebrating and collaborating with other creatives too. Bones Clothing wants to work alongside others, as well as doing it's own thing,  so we can produce awesome artwork together.  Designing artwork and merchandise for bands, working alongside other designers/artists to produce artwork, competitions for someone to design a Bones tee shirt..these are just a few of the endless possibilities. 
Supporting this campaign will allow this to happen. 


Risks & Challenges

I am aware that with any project there are obstacles that you need to overcome. 

I appreciate that this is a tough market to break into and recognise that there is a lot of competition, and that there are a lot of setbacks that I could face.

These setbacks that could arise are:

Delays in printing 
Website crashing 
Unsatisfied customer(s) 
Delays in shipping 
Items lost in post 
Competition from other designers

I will endeavour to meet the customer's needs at all times and make sure the products are quality items.


Money Isn't Everything 


I understand that not everyone can splash the cash but there are other ways you can support this campaign:

I invite you guys to:

TELL your friends and family, work colleagues, about Bones Clothing

 LIKE Bones Clothing on Facebook 

FOLLOW Bones Clothing on Twitter

Use INDIEGOGO's tools to share this campaign

Whatever you do, Spread the Love and Shout about it

Please note that you can contribute anything from £1, however, the perks are for pledges of £20 or above. Your support is as important to me as the money.  

Thank You

SUPPORT CREATIVITY
story_txt:
THE PROJECT


Hey! I'm Alex a.k.a Bones 
I have wanted to start my own clothing line for a long time now, however, never had any true creative grounds from which to start. This spring, I inherited the nickname 'Bones' and it is sticking to me like glue. From that name alone, I was inspired  and began designing based on that one word. 
This campaign is to get Bones Clothing moving in the direction I want it to. As well as designing my own range, I want to collaborate with bands, artists, creatives and produce artwork together. Punk D.I.Y ethics and Youth is at the core of this project and your funding for this campaign will enable this to happen. 



   What Bones Needs & What YOU Get For this project I am asking for £500 to get it moving off the ground. The capital raised will flow directly into Bones Clothing; enabling new designs to be printed, new equipment to be bought ( a scanner, sticker/badge printer). Funding will allow prints to be made of the designs too. The money raised will go to the making of a new website and into social media.
For those rad people who fund my campaign, I will send them a Bones tee shirt and will make sure they will be the first to know about the latest of Bones Clothing, including promotions and deals. 
If the goal is not reached, the money will still go back into Bones Clothing. The main priority is buying equipment to move this project forward. 



   KABOOM
This isn't just about tee shirts. This campaign is about celebrating and collaborating with other creatives too. Bones Clothing wants to work alongside others, as well as doing it's own thing,  so we can produce awesome artwork together.  Designing artwork and merchandise for bands, working alongside other designers/artists to produce artwork, competitions for someone to design a Bones tee shirt..these are just a few of the endless possibilities. 
Supporting this campaign will allow this to happen.    


Risks & Challenges

I am aware that with any project there are obstacles that you need to overcome. 
I appreciate that this is a tough market to break into and recognise that there is a lot of competition, and that there are a lot of setbacks that I could face.
These setbacks that could arise are:
Delays in printing Website crashing Unsatisfied customer(s) Delays in shipping Items lost in post Competition from other designers
I will endeavour to meet the customer's needs at all times and make sure the products are quality items.



   
Money Isn't Everything 

 I understand that not everyone can splash the cash but there are other ways you can support this campaign:
I invite you guys to:
TELL your friends and family, work colleagues, about Bones Clothing
 LIKE Bones Clothing on Facebook 
FOLLOW Bones Clothing on Twitter
Use INDIEGOGO's tools to share this campaign
Whatever you do, Spread the Love and Shout about it
Please note that you can contribute anything from £1, however, the perks are for pledges of £20 or above. Your support is as important to me as the money.  
Thank You
